column2:
Singamaxhoba sonke
Ileta ezuze
I HIV/AIDS iyinxalenye yobomi bethu. Kuthethwa ngayo kwiTV, kwiirediyo, kwiimagazini nakumaphepha-ndaba.
Uninzi lwethu luyachaphazeleka. Iintsapho zethu nabahlobo baphethwe sesi sifo.
Abanye bethu abathethi ngesi sifo.
Kuyothusa kakhulu ukuv' iindaba zokuba uneHIV kodwa kufuneka ukhumbule ukuba ayikokuphela kobomi oko. Xa uzikhathalele ungaphil' ubomi obude kakhulu.
Yiya kubacebisi ufumane ukolulekwa ukuze uphil' ubomi obuza kukukholisa. Ungayenza loo nto.
Njengoko nditshilo isichaphazela sonke iHIV/AIDS. Masiyazi loo nto siyigcine ezingqondweni zethu. Masingayibaleki kuba sicingel' ukuba asoze isichaphazele nathi.
Masibakhathalele yaye sibanike inkxaso abayifunayo abantu abanesi sifo.
nguDE Kau, eMadikwe
i-R100
Baziphathele ntoni kakubi"
Amantombazana ayazimela emakhaya ebusuku aye kwiindawo zentselo nezolonwabo afike apho anxile. Adibana namadoda apho alale nawo.
Ngentsasa elandelayo avuka enodano ngento eyenzekileyo aze ayovul' ityala athi adlwengulwe. Iyabanjwa ivalelwe indoda.
Ndibhala le leta nje kungenxa yokuba ndaswelekelwa ngabazali bam kwaye ndikhulisa umntakwethu nomzala wam. Umzala wam wandixelela ukuba udlwengulwe ndaza ndafun' igqwetha ngobugcwabalalana bemali endandinayo.
Wasuka wathi akafuni ukuba liye enkundleni ityala.
Ndenza uphando kubahlobo bakhe ndaza ndayifuman' inyaniso...
Kwiimeko ezinjalo akufanelekanga ukuba kugxekwe amadoda!
nguMM Banda, eSundowner
Amabanjwa
Ndicinga ukuba amabanjwa afuna amaqabane kwiimagazini kufanele acacise umntu ukuba afuna ntoni na.
Ngaba afuna umntu aza kuthandana naye okanye afuna abantu aza kubhalelana nabo abangekho sentolongweni.
Andiqondi ukuba ungamthanda ngenene umntu ongeke ulifuman' ithuba lokumbona. Ningathetha emnxebeni kodwa xa ungekamboni, ungazange uchithe xesha naye, asoze uthi uyamthanda loo mntu.
Abantu abanobudlelwane nabantu abasentolongweni mababaxhase babakhuthaze ukuba baze bathi besakuphuma batshintshe iindlela zabo.
nguLuvo Makopo, eUgie
nabahlobo
Iileta Zenu
BONA XHOSA - June 2006
Masifund' ukusebenza!
Ndaphumelela imatriki ngo-2003 yaye babunzima ubomi kum. Ndafuman' umsebenzi efama ndihlawulwa i-R500 ngenyanga.
Ndazimisela ukuziphucula. Ndazixelela ukuba nabani na unalo ithuba elihle alifumanayo ebomini kwaye kufuneka ulibambe ngazo zozibini.
Andisasebenzi efama ngoku yaye ndizakhel' ikamva lokuba yimvumi yeGospile.
Ungabuguqul' ubomi bakho nawe!
nguTT, eGauteng
Kwanele!
Kutheni le nto abantu bekhohlakele kangaka, buyephi ubuntu xa amadoda asixhenxe exhwila intwazana eneminyaka eli-12, eyibetha, eyenza zonk' izinto ezibuhlungu kuba enye yaloo madoda ifun' ukutshata le ntwazana"
Masingasitheli ngesiko xa sisenza izinto ezingalunganga.
Kuza kuphela nini oku kuxhatshazwa kwabantwana" Kwanele! Abantwana bethu likamva kodwa batshatyalaliswa ngoonkohlakalo abazicingela bodwa!
Aphila njani wona la madoda" Nkqu nezilwanyana asoze ziziphathe ngolu hlobo.
nguNM, eLedig

Koomama abangatshatanga
UTATA womntwana wam wandishiya ndikhulelwe yaye ndadandatheka kodwa ndakwazi ukuzimela.
Ndiyamthand' umntwana wam kuba usisipho kum. Ungangamthandi njani umntwana omthwale iinyanga ezilithoba"
Le mvakalelo inamandla ukogqitha iintlungu ozive xa ushiywa ngutata wakhe.
Ungamlahli umntwana wakho!
Boomama, masizifundise ukubeka abantwana bethu phambili, hayi abantu esincuma nabo!
Unyana wam uyamfun' uyise, ndinabo abantu endincuma nabo kodwa...
Bona bayafika badlule, umntwana ngowakho soze akulahle. Yibani ngoomama abanothando nibek' abantwana benu phambili!
nguKK, Osizweni
Ungazityi
Eli lizwe lethu lombethwe yingxaki enkulu yeziyobisi. Kuthengiswa iziyobisi ezitshabalalis' ubomi babantu.
Lulutsha olusesichengeni kakhulu kuba lukufumana kunzima ukumelana neenguqu ezenzekayo kulo. Luye lucinge ukuba lufun' "uncedo."
Lunikezela lula kuxinzelelo lweentanga lokusebenzis' iziyobisi.
Azisiso isisombululo. Zikwandisel' iingxaki.
nguJT, eLynnville
iziyobisi
BONA XHOSA - June 2006
Ibanjwa lizityand' igila...
NDIVUMELE ndilungise iimbono zoluntu ezingalunganga ngamabanjwa. Zagqitha iintsuku apho amabanjwa ayengafuni ukuyolungis' izimilo. Ngoku amabanjwa anomdla kakhulu kwiinkqubo zokulungisa izimilo. Siyalibulel' ithuba esilinikwayo lokufunda indlela yokuziphilisa sakuphuma entolongweni ukuze singabuyeli kulwaphulo-mthetho. Andiyiva kakuhle le yokuthi athi amabanjwa ebalasele kwizinto ezifana nokulawul' umsindo, ulwazi ngobomi neziny' izinto esizifundiswayo kodwa angakhululwa. Ufumanisa nokuba la mabanjwa aziyekile iziyobisi kwaye azifundisa ngobungozi beHIV/AIDS.
Amanye afunde de afumana enomsila kodwa asavalelwe. Kunceda ngantoni ukugcin' umntu ongene entolongweni engafundanga kuyaphi kodwa athi ngenxa yokuziphatha kakuhle nokunyamezela azibone sele enemfundo enomsila"
Akakufanelanga ukukhululwa loo mntu" Maninzi amabanjwa azibonakalisileyo ukuba izimilo zawo zitshintshile kodwa asavalelwe.
Iintolongo ziindawo ezimbi. Abantu bathi siphathwa kakuhle ezintolongweni, akuyonyani leyo. Yonk' into endiyenzayo ijongwe ngeliso elibukhali. Andikwazi ukuya apho ndifun' ukuya khona okanye nditye into endiyithandayo apho ndithanda khona.
Andikwazi ukuba nosapho lwam.
Thina mabanjwa siluva umhla nezolo ulwamvila lwesohlwayo sethu. Intolongo yindawo ebuhlungu kakhulu.
Kutheni le nto amabanjwa engakhululwa xa ebonis' ukuguquka kwezimilo zawo" Ndicela iibhodi ezichophel' ukukhululwa kwamabanjwa ziqwalasele nangakumbi isimilo sebanjwa ngalinye. Asimiselwanga ukuba zizaphuli-thetho ubomi bethu bonke.
Sifuna ukutshintsh' iindlela zethu sibengabemi abanomahluko. Xa ugcin' ibanjwa entolongweni ixesha elide kukwandis' iingxaki oko!
Xa umntwana wakho onile uyamohlwaya igqithe loo nto. Eso sohlwayo asiqhubeki iminyaka eliqela. Makube njalo ke nakuthi. Sohlwayeni kodwa nikhumbule ukuba nathi singabantu kwaye abanye bethu bangenz' izinto ezintle xa benokukhululwa entolongweni.
Urhulumente ulindele ntoni kumntu okhululwa entolongweni eneminyaka engama-50 okanye engama-60" Andibi usazoqhubeka engumthwalo karhulumente"
Andithi makangohlwaywa amabanjwa, makohlwaywe kodwa ukuze kuliwe ngokukuko nolwaphulo-mthetho makakhululwe lawo azibonakalisayo ukuba atshintshile! Singangaphinde silwenze ulwaphulo-mthetho kwakhona!
nguS Ntuli, eMangaung Maximum Security Prison[x]
Ukuthathwa kakubi
kwamabanjwa
Iileta Zenu
Ungalisebenzisa
igama ozithiye lona xa
usibhalela, kodwa sicela usinike igama lakho lokwenene nedilesi yakho. Asitsho ukuba siyavumelana nazo zonke izimvo zabafundi kula makhasi, kwaye sinelungelo lokuzihlela ezo
siza kuzipapasha.

XA OOMAMA besela
Nokuba kusethekweni lasekuhlaleni okanye emva komsebenzi, ukuzama ukuphepha utywala kobu bomi bale mihla buxakekileyo kunzima. Kodwa ingaba abazalikazi bayakucinga okwenzeka ebantwaneni babo xa besela?
SEKULITHUBA elide ngoku utywala buyinxalenye yeziselo ezisetyenziswayo xa kukho iindibano zestokfela noomasingcwabane, neendibano zamanenekazi.
Kwaye oko kusela akupheleli apho - sele kuyinto eqhelekileyo ukuba amabhinqa aphumle emakhayeni awo nebhotile yewayini emva kosuku olude.
Amaxesha amaninzi abantwnana babakhona - bacinga ntoni ke xa bebona umama babo bephethe iglasi yewiski? Ingaba ayiyichaphazeli indlela abaziphatha ngayo bona?
Noxa amadoda esela phambi kwabo abantwana, akukaqheleki ukusela kwamabhinqa, ingakumi anabantwana. Oku kubangelwa kukuba ezinye indawo zethu zithatha amabhinqa njengabantu ekufuneka 'bekhuselwe' okanye ekungalindelekanga ukuba bakwazi ukuzikhathalela okanye bazenzele izigqibo," itsho ingcali yezengqondo uMike Nxumalo.
Xa siyibeka ngokucacileyo, amabhinqa afaniswa nabantwana kwaye, utywala - kubonwa bengenakho "ukumelana" nabo ngoko kubhetele bangaqali kwa ukubufaka, utsho uMike.
UThandi Mhambe unama-32, utshatile kwaye unomntwana oneminyaka emibini oyintombazana. Uhlala kwindawo yeengcungcu iParklands eKapa kwaye uyayisela iwayini ngamaxesha athile.
Naye akaboni nto imbi xa eselela phambi komntwana wakhe - kodwa wothuke waphants' ukufa kutshanje ebona intombi yakhe izama ukusela eglasini yakhe yewayini!
Emva koko uThandi wafundisa intombi yakhe umehluko phakathi kotywala nejusi usebenzise esi sifundo ukubethelela engqondweni yakhe ulwazi lokuba utywala buyingozi xa buselwa ngokugqithisileyo.
Indlela enza ngayo ifana neka-Ilze van der Merwe, ingcali kwezengqondo eBella Vida Centre eGauteng.
Abazali kudala babusela utywala phambi kwabantwana babo ukusukela busafika, kodwa abazali kufuneka babe ngumzekelo, utsho.
"Oomama kufuneka baxelele abantwana ukuba ingxaki akuyowayini, kodwa kokungenziwa yiwayini xa uyisela kakhulu," utsho u-Ilze.
Kodwa ukunxila phambi kwabantwna akulunganga, wongeze watsho. UMike naye uyangqina ngelithi ukusela ungegqithisi phambi kwabantwana ngumzekelo omhle ebantwaneni. "Ukusela iglasi yewayini enye okanye ezimbini akunabungozi, kwaye kungabonisa abantwana ukuba unakho ukusela utywala ngendlela endaweni yokuba linxila elingalawulekiyo," utsho.
Omnye umzalikazi usixelela ukuba kubachaphazela njani abantwana bakhe xa enxilela phambi kwabo.
Uneminyaka engama-34, unabantwana ababini, oneminyaka emi-6 noneli-10, unevenkile kwaye uselela ukwehlisa uxinzelelo lwengqondo.
Kodwa utywala bumenza abe bukhali kangangokuba abantwana sele bemazi.
Ngoku uzama ukwehlisa isikali, kuba uthi ubon' indlela abantwana bakhe abatshintshe ngayo. Bangamaphakuphaku kwaye bayangxola abalawuleki.
Ukusela kwakho kuyaboyikisa abantwana abancinci, abathembe wena ukuba ubakhusele, utsho uMike oyingcali kwezengqondo.
Umntwana wakho anga-chaphazeleka nangezinye iindlela.
NgoFebruwari ka-2008 iziphumo zophando olwenziwayo ngolutsha olunabazali abafika ngamandla etywaleni ezakhutshwa kwi-Alcoholism: Clinical & Experimental Research. Zazibonisa ukuba abantwana bachaphazeleka ngendlela ezimbini.
Okokuqala, umntwana usuke alandele ekhondweni lomzali kuba ecinga ukuba yinto elungileyo.
Okwesibini, kwafunyaniswa ukuba bagqibela ngokunga-bahloniphi abazali babo. Kaloku abazali abanxilayo ababahoyi abantwana babo, into abayenzayo nje kukubohlwaya rhoqo.
Abazali bobabini mabazigade xa besela phambi kwabantwana. Oomama nootata kufuneka bathethe ngokubi okungenzexa xa umntu esebenzisa utywala kakubi.
"Khumbula umntwana akazikhulisi ngokwakhe uxhomekeke emzalini. Ukuba umzali akawenzi kakuhle lo msebenzi, umntwana uza kungcungcutheka," utshilo oyingcali yezengqondo kwicala lezemfundo uKenneth Resnick, osele eneminyaka engama-25 esenza lo msebenzi.
Kucacile ukuba ibalulekile indlela abaziphatha ngayo bobabini abazali xa besele.
UMoses Twala weKara Heritage Institute, ekuliziko eliphanda ngenkcubeko yase-Afrika, uthi makungajongwa kuphela ekubeni amabhinqa kufanele asele okanye angaseli. Uthi kule mihla yempucuko nexakekileyo ukusela utywala akuyiyo eyona ngxaki.
"Thina sifanele siqwalasele uxanduva oomama abanalo lokunika indawo ekhuselekileyo nesempilweni abantwana babo."
Umbhali nomfoti: Brenda Nkuna/West Cape News

Oo-mama abasela ngoku- gqithi-sileyo baza ku-fuma-nisa ukuba aba-ntwana babo aba-lawu-
eki
BONA XHOSA March 2009
AMANYE AMANQAKU
Uphando lubonisa ukuba ambalwa amabhinqa aselayo kunamadoda - kwaye amabhinqa aselayo asela kancinci kunamadoda. Kodwa ke amabhinqa nawo anakho ukuzibona sele eziingedle zotywala njengamadoda.
Ngelixa amabhinqa aselula (18-34) enokusela kakhulu kunoodadewabo abadala, amabhinqa asele eqinile ngawona angaziingedle (35-49).
Amabhinqa amnyama (46%) ngawona anako ukungabuseli konke konke utywala kunamabhinqa amhlophe (34%). Kodwa inani lamabhinqa amnyama namhlophe asela kakhulu liyalingana.
Abanye abaphandi bathi ukusela kakhulu kungakubeka emngciphekweni wokuhlaselwa ngumhlaza webele - kodwa lusaqhubeka uphando ngale nyewe.
UCINGA NTONI?
Ingaba ucinga ukuba amabhinqa aselayo angumzekelelo ombi? Ingaba "le mihla yempucuko" ibangela ukuba abantu basebenzise utywala kakubi? Singenza ntoni ukuzama ukunciphisa ukuselwa kotywala kweli lizwe?
Sixelele okucingayo!
Sibhalele kule dilesi: Letters To The Editor, Box 32083, Mobeni, 4060.
Iingcali zengqondo zibonakala ngathi ziyavumelana ukuba, ukusela ngokunga-gqithisanga phambi kwabantwana akuyongxaki, kodwa abantwana kufuneka bafundiswe ngobungozi bokusebenzisa utywala kakubi.

BONA XHOSA - April 2006
H
Ukuba ngumthengisi wemizi...
KWINKOLISO yabantu ukutheng' umzi kudla ngokuba lolona tyalo-mali lukhulu abalwenzayo ebomini babo. Nokuthengis' umzi kudla ngokuba luzenge-zenge lwento enamaxesha okukucaphukisa. Abathengisi bezindlu ke bangaphezulu nje kokuba "ngabantu abathengisayo." Kufuneka kube ngabantu abazingcaphephe eziqeqeshwe zavuthwa ukuze bakwazi ukukhokela abaxumi babo kwezi ngxoxo zibalulekileyo.
"Njengoko inzalo yemali ebolekwa ezibhankini iphantsi kakhulu ngoku, umsebenzi wokuthengiswa kwezindlu utsala abantu abaninzi abafuna ukuwufundela, baninzi nabantu abaziqalela amashishini okuthengisa izindlu ukanti nabafundi abaphuma eziyunivesithi bafuna ukungena kulo msebenzi," utsho uGrant Gavin, ongumphathi wengingqi wakwaRE/MAX KZN naseMpuma Koloni.
"Kwixesh' elizayo abantu baza kufuna ukuthenga imizi ngeenkampani ezinkulu abazaziyo nabazithembayo. Ezi nkampani kuza kufuneka ziqinisekise ukuba zinika inkonzo esemgangathweni ophezulu ukuze zikhuphisane neziny' iinkampani."
"Kwakhona kuza kufuneka kugxininiswe kuqeqesho lwabathengisi bezindlu."
USimon Mzobe ubengumthengisi wemizi ukususela ngoMeyi nyakenye yaye usawufunda lo msebenzi.
"Ndizibona ndinako ukuphumelela kulo msebenzi. Ndinamava ekuthengiseni kuba bendikade ndingumphathi wonxibelelwano kwinkampani enkulu, ukanti kutshanje bendineshishini lam lokuqeqeshela abantu imisebenzi," utsho.
USimon waba nomdla ekuthengiseni izindlu emva kokuya kwindibano yokuncazelana ulwazi eyayenziwe ngabeServices SETA.
"Ndaqonda ukuba ukuthengisa izindlu kuza kundinika ithuba lokuvula ishishini lam ndize ndizenzel' imali entle," utshilo.
"Ndenza uqeqesho lomsebenzi lweenyang' ezintathu, emva koko ndaphangela nomntu owayendibonisa ukuba kusetyenzwa kanjani ngaphambi kokuba ndizisebenzele ndedwa.
"Ndisebenza kwiindawo ezahlukeneyo, ndibonisa abathengi izindlu ezixhomileyo ngamaxabiso nezinamaxabiso aphantsi. Eyona nto imnandi ngokusebenzel' inkampani enkulu kukuba usoloko unabantu osebenza nabo. Uyancediswa ngabantu ophangela nabo kwaye ndisebenzisa zonk' izinto esinazo e-ofisini.
"Ngoku ndithengisa indlu ibenye ngeveki. Bonke abathengisi bezindlu bamkela ngokuthi bathengise izindlu ezingaphi, ngoko umntu ofun' ukuba ngumthengisi wezindlu kufuneka abenayo imali yokuziphilisa iinyanga ezintathu.
"Andikholelwa ukuba ithamsanqa liyasebenza kweli shishini. Uyisebenzela nzima imali yakho kulo. Kuyenzeka kufuneke uthathe umntu omnye aye kubon' izindlu ezininzi ngemini.
"Kubalulekile ukusoloko uthetha nabaxumi bakho kwaye uzazi izinto abazithandayo ukuze basoloko bebuyela kuwe.
"Kufuneka uzimisele ukusebenza nangaliphi na ixesha kuba kuyenzeka abantu abafuna ukutheng' izindlu okanye abathengisa izindlu bafune izindlu zabo zibonwe emva kweeyure zokusebenza okanye ngeempela-veki."
Amathuba akulo msebenzi
Inkoliso yabantu abasaqalayo kulo msebenzi baqala ngokuba ngabancedisi bomthengisi wezindlu onamava baze babe yinxalenye yeqela. Namathuba okuba ngabaphathi ayavela kwaye abathengisi bemizi abanempumelelo nabanemali bayakwazi ukuzivulela awabo amashishini okuthengis' izindlu.
Abany' abathengisi bezindlu bakhetha ukuthengisa eziny' izakhiwo kunezindlu njengeevenkile nemizi-mveliso, okanye baqeshise ngezindlu.
Izinto ofuneka ubenazo
Ukuze ube ngumthengisi onempumelelo kufuneka:
PUkwazi ukuqhagamshelana nabantu.
PUfune ukunika abaxumi bakho inkonzo ephambili.
PUbe novelwano yaye ukwazi ukwakha ubudlelwano
obuluqilima
PUngali xa ubizwa emini, ebusuku nangeempela-veki.
PUthembeke (ufike ngexesha kumadinga akho
nabathengi)yaye unyaniseke.
PZimamele uze ube novelwano ngeemfuno zabaxumi bakho.
Izinto ofanele ubenazo: iselfowuni; imoto ethembekileyo; imali eyoneleyo engakuqhub' iinyanga ezintathu; kwaye ukwazi ukusebenza ngekhompyutha.
Umvuzo ongawamkela
Bonke abathengisi bemizi bamkela ngokwemizi abayithengisileyo, ngoko umvuzo uyashiyana ngokweenkampani. Ezinye zikunika isiqingatha semali oyingenisileyo ngoxa zikuvumela usebenzise impahla yazo simahla. Ukanti ezinye zikunika othe kratya xa nawe ufak' igxalaba kwiindleko zokuqhub' ishishini.
"Kunzima ukushiya umsebenzi obufumana umvuzo zonk' iinyanga uze uye kuphangela apho ungafumani mvuzo kungekabikho mzi uwuthengisileyo.
"Nkqu nokuba sele uwuthengisile umzi, kungathabatha eziny' iinyanga ezisibhozo phambi kokuba ufuman' imali. Xa kwenzekile ke wathengisa izindlu ezininzi ngenyanga enye kufuneka uyiphathe kakuhle loo mali," utsho uGrant.
Kuxhomekeke kwindlela ophangela ngayo nekhomishini oyifumanayo, ngoko unako ukufumana i-R5 000 ukuya kwi-R30 000 nangaphezulu ngenyanga, nangona ke umvuzo oqhelekileyo ungadli ngakuba ngaphezulu kwe- R5 000 ngenyanga. "Ishishini lokuthengis' izindlu alifanelanga libonwe njengento yokuzenzel' imali ngokukhawuleza," utsho uGrant Gavin.
Amanqanaba emfundo/apho ungafunda khona
Ngoku nabani na angabhalisa kwiEstate Agents Board (EAB) ukuze abe nggumthengisi wezindlu xa bengenachaphaza lolwaphulo-mthetho. Oko kuyabakhathaza abathengisi bezindlu abaqeqeshiweyo abathi bonke abathengisi bezindlu bafanele babhale iimviwo zeEAB ukuze eli shishi lihlale likwinqanaba eliphezulu.
Abafundi benza izifundo ezivunywe yiEAB kwingingqi yabo ekungaba zizifundo zemini yonke zeentsuku ezintathu okanye ezenziwa ngamaxesha athile iiveki ezintandathu. Emva koko babhala iimviwo ezinemibuzo ephendulwa ngokukhetha kwiimpendulo ezininzi.
Ngaphandle koko ungaba ngumthengisi wezindlu ovunyiweyo ngenxa yamava akho. Umthengisi wezindlu ongazibhalanga ezo mviwo angabasebenza abe efumana uqeqesho aze abe ngumthengisi wezindlu ovunyiweyo emva konyaka.
Abathengisi bezindlu abangazibhalanga iimviwo okanye abangekawugqibi unyaka bengabathengisi bezindlu abaqeqeshwayo, banokuthethela abaxumi kodwa abanako ukutyikitya izivumelwano de bagqibe uqeqesho.

5. Baya kuphulukana namabhaso abo abantu abangawalandanga emva kweenyanga ezintandathu. 6. Eli khefu limel' ukuthathwa ngexesha elingaxakekanga elingaphandle kwexesha leeholide ngesivumelwano. 7. Ophumeleleyo luxanduva lwakhe ukuya nokubuya e-Alpine Heath Resort. 8. Iziselo, iminxeba nezinye iindleko ezingakhankanywanga ziza kuhlawulwa ngophumeleleyo.
BONA XHOSA June 2009
ONGAKUZUZA
Umfundi omnye usethubeni lokuzuza ithuba lokuya kuchitha ubusuku obune phakathi evekini e-Alpine Heath kuquka indawo yokulala, isidlo sakusasa nesidlo sangokuhlwa sabantu abathandathu.
Ungaphoswa leli thuba lokuya kuphumla ezintabeni. Ngenela namhlanje!
INDLELA YOKUNGENELA
Zalisa ifom yokungenela ekweli khasi, phendula umbuzo, uthumele kule dilesi: BONA/Alpine Heath Competition, Box 32067, Mobeni, 4060, okanye uthumele impendulo ngeSMS ku-35919. (Inye i-SMS ixabisa i-R3.)
I-ALPINE HEALTH RESORT izinze kanye phambi kweentaba zaseDrakensberg KwaZulu-Natal, ineendawo zokulala ezikumgangatho ophezulu nemidlalo yokonwabisa usapho.
Izindlu zeplanga ezinamagumbi amathathu zimi kwindawo entle, kanti iLa Gruyeres ekuyivenkile yokutyela inezidlo ezimnandi.
Xa ufuna ukuzolula, ikho indawo yemithambo, amabala esikwashi nentenetya, iphuthi-phuthi kanti nomdlalo wokuqabela intaba ngeebhayisekile. Kukho nebala legalufa kumgama oyimizuzu emihlanu.
(Imibuzo nokubekisa indawo: 036-438-8500)

Bhotani bahlobo
Kwiinyanga ezimbalwa ezidlulilleyo kwabakho indibano yamabhinqa yasebusuku emzini womhlobo wam. Omny' umhlobo wathi xa esela iglasi yewayini, intombi yakhe yambuza ukuba usela "iyeza" lakhe kwakhona na.
Kaloku wayekhe wayiqhatha intombi yakhe wathi usela iyeza xa esela iglasi yewayini yePinotage.
Oko kundenze ndacinga ukuba: Ingaba yinto embi ukusel' utywala kukamama phambi komntwana wakhe? Kwikhasi lama-30 sizam' ukuphendula loo mbuzo.
Luthini uluvo lwakho ngalo mba? Sibhalele okanye usithumelele i-SMS kuba inkulu impikiswano ngawo.
Kumhlathi wethu Wamayez' esintu kwikhasi lama-83 sithetha ngendlela yokwamkel' igama "elibi" owalithiywa emva kokuzalwa.
Baninzi abantu abanagama angooGwababa, ooNontsokolo okanye ooDikeledi abangonwabanga nabacing' ukuba amagama abo abenza bangazithembi okanye achaphazela indlela abantu ababaphatha ngayo.
Nam ndandingalithandi igama lam lesikolo nangona "lalingalibanga". Kwiminyaka eli-12 yokufunda kwam ndandibizwa ngoMarjorie!
Ngethamsanqa ndafumana ithuba lokulisusa elo gama ndakupasa imatriki kwaye ngoku ndisebenzisa igama lam lenkobe.
Sicela usixelele nawe xa unegama ongalithandiyo - usenokufumana ukuba alilibanga njengokuba ucinga.
De kube yinyanga ezayo!
Nisikeleleke,

Ungalisebenzisa igama elingelilo elokwenyani, kodwa sicela usinike igama lakho lokwenene nedilesi. Izimvo ezikweli khasi zezabafundi, ayizozethu kwaye lilungelo lethu ukuzihlela iileta esizikhuphayo.
I NTO endiyiqapheleyo kutshanje kukuba abazali bawulahlile umsebenzi abawunikwa nguThixo wokukhulisa abantwana babo nokuqinisekisa ukuba bakhula babe ziinkokeli zangomso ezikwaziyo okulindelwe kuzo.
Kule mihla ubona imveku ene-12 leminyaka inxile ingazazi negama layo ihamba esitratweni, abantu abadala bayibethise ngoyaba loo nto.
Yayaphi intetho eyayisithi: "Abantwana bakho ngabam, nabam ikwangabakho, ngoko masibakhulise kunye"?
Kuyenzeka naxa uzihambela ubethwa ngumoya, uze ubone isimanga senkwenkwe ene-15 leminyaka isel' utywala abazali bayo beyibukele.
Eyona nto ibuhlungu ngokusel' utywala kwabantwana bebancinci kukuba bonakalisa iiseli ezithile zobuchopho. Singalindela njani ke ukuba obo buchopho bukhuphe oogqirha neenjineli.
Wonk' umntu uthi "ulutsha lulingomso lethu" - ingaba oko kusenjalo nakulutsha lwale mihla?

Ndandisoloko ndicing' ukuba amadoda adalelwa ukukhusela isizwe, kodwa ngathi izinto zatshintsha. Amadoda ayefudula ewahlonipha yaye ewakhusela amabhinqa, kodwa ngoku akusenjalo. Nkqu nabantwana abakhuselekanga.

Ndifun' ukuvakalisa imbono yam ngeenkokeli zethu zepolitiki. Ziyeza kuthi xa zisafuna sizivotele, zize ziphel' emehlweni emva kokuba sizivotele. Bayandikhathaza nabantu abanikwa imisebenzi baze bangayenzi kakuhle. Urhulumente wethu makasebenzisane nabantu ekwakheni ilizwe elibhetele.

Ukumelana nokuswelekelwa
Enkosi ngenqaku elithi Ukumelana nokuswelekelwa eliphume kushicilelo lukaDisemba 2008. NgoDisemba abantu baba semoyeni weholide, belindel' imini yeKrismesi, kodwa kukho nabangalithandiyo elo xesha lonyaka!
Ebantwini abaninzi uDisemba yinyanga yoxinzelelo. Inqaku lenu libancedile abo bebeshiywe zizihlobo nezalamane kwaye bengakwazi ukujongana nentlungu yabo ngeli xesha leholide!
Kwabo bashiywe zizihlobo ndibacebisa ukuba bagcine ibhokisana yesikhumbuzo saloo mntu uswelekileyo. Kuyo bangafaka iifoto, iileta kunye nayo nantoni na loo mntu obeyithanda. Bangaba namaxesha okuyivula loo bhokisana nabanye abantu ebebemthanda ukuze babuke ezo zinto xa bemkhumbula.
Ndiyathemba loo bhokisana ingabanceda ekupheliseni intlungu yabo. Kaloku masikhumbule ukuba kukho ubomi emva kokufa, ngoko masazi ukuba abantu esibathandayo baphila kunye nathi ngokomoya nasemva kokuba belishiyile eli phakade.
ngu-E Conradie, ePitoli

Uyabanceda ukuze bazincede
BONA XHOSA - February 2008
UTHOKO uvuka kusasa andlule, akhuphe ibhala neziny' izixhobo zokusebenza ukuze abantwana bakhe balungiselel' ukuy' esikolweni. Isidlo sabo sakusasa sisidudu sayizolo esineswekile.
Luyanduluka ekhaya usapho, uRolinda ongumntwana ophakathi uqhuba ibhala kwindawo enyukayo ukuya endleleni yezithuthi. Xa ebonakala esoyisakala uyamncedis' uThoko. Ngale ndlela ubafundisa ukuzimela abantwana bakhe.
Uyabayaleza ukuba bangashiyani endleleni ende eya esikolweni, aze axelele nentombi yakhe endala ukuba ibuye esikolweni ikh' amanzi.
UThoko ubuya apheke isopholo emva kwezifundo zomsebenzi wezandla azenza namany' amabhinqa asekuhlaleni.
Sekuyiminyaka mi-5 umyeni wakhe wamshiya wathi uyokufun' umsebenzi wangabuyi.
Bebephila ngamabona-ndenzile nabantwana bakhe ungekabikho lo msenenzi. Bencedwa ngaba melwane okanye ziipasile zokutya abaziphiwa ngurhulumente.
Uyohlukana nabo endleleni, bay' esikolweni uThoko aye kwindlela yezithuthi ayilungisayo.
Unzima umsebenzi awenzayo, kodwa umncedile wazimela kwaye wakwazi nokukhulis' abantwana bakhe ngeqhayiya.
Iikontraka
UThoko uphangela kwiphulo leKZN Zibambele Road Maintenance Programme elinika iintsapho ezingathathi-ntweni amathuba emisebenzi, kwaye i-95% yaloo makhaya iphantsi koomama.
Abantu abaphangela kweli phulo laqalwa ngo-2000 balungisa iindlela zegrabile eKZN ukanti lixhaswe ngemali liSebe lezoThutho leKZN.
Eli sebe lizimisele ukuqesh' abantu abangama-40 000 abaza kulungisa iindlela ezingumgama we- 17 000km ngo-2009.
Abasebenzi beZibambele bavula imisele nemibhobho yamanzi ecaleni kwendlela. Bavala imingxuma esendleleni, bacoce, basuse nokhula.
Umsebenzi ngamnye unikwa izixhobo zokusebenza, ivesti yokhuseleko nezinto zokubonisa abaqhubi indawo asebenza kuyo lize ixabiso lazo litsalwe emvuzweni.
Izivumelwano zomsebenzi zeenyanga ezili-12 ziyavuselelwa rhoqo ngonyaka xa ezo ndlela zisasetyenziswa luluntu, zisakufuna ukulungiswa naxa ingeniso yekhaya elinekontraka ingaphantsi kwe- R1 050 ngenyanga.
Ukuqhubeka
Njengoko kuqeshwa usapho, akuxhomekekwa emntwini omnye ukuze ikontraka iqhubeke nokusebenza.
Oko kukuthi usapho aluna kuphelelwa ngumsebenzi xa umntu omdala engasekho, usapho seluphantsi kwabantwana.
Isivumelwano sesokusebenza iiyure ezingama-60 ngeveki ngoko abantwana banalo ixesha lokufunda.
Ikontraka nganye yamkela i-R370 ngenyanga kwaye ilungisa i-500m ukuya kwi-800m yendlela.
Kukho iikomiti ezonyuliweyo luluntu ezicebisa iSebe lezoThutho ngeendlela ezifuna ukusoloko zilungiswa nangeentsapho ezifanele ukunikwa iikontraka.
Kwenziwe nemibutho enceda iikontraka zonge imali.
NgoMatshi ka-2006 besezingama-889 iiklabhu zokonga ezisekiweyo kweli phondo kwaye besezonge i-R6,2 yezigidi.
ISebe lezeKhaya neleNtlalo-ntle nawo afak' igxalaba ukuze abantu beekontraka zeZibambele bafumane ii-ID nezibonelelo zikarhulumente. Kuyathenjwa ukuba neSebe lezoLimo liza kungenelela kumba wokulinywa kokutya, unikezelo ngenkonzo yamanzi nangonkcenkceshelo.
Uqhagamshelwano olwenziwayo luza kunceda nasekuthunyelweni kwamachiza okuthibaza ulwamvila lukagawulayo (iiARV) nonyango lweTB.
Iimbasa
Iphulo leZibambele lithiwe jize ngembasa yeMpumelelo ngo-2002 ukanti noMongameli Thabo Mbeki walincoma ngelithi "lelona phulo lihle lenkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu" ngo-2003.
Nangona uThoko esekude nokuphumelele, iphulo leZibambele libeke yena nabany' abantu abaninzi kwindlela esinge empumelelweni.
Kumnike isidima ukukwazi ukondla nokufundisa abantwana bakhe. [x]

KHETHA IQHINA ELILILO
Iqhina elililo lingenza isinxibo esihle sibe sihle ngakumbi - liphucule nesinxibo esingekho sihle ncam
IFASHONI YAMADODA
IQHINA sesona sihombo siphambili samadoda (ngaphandle kokuba uyindoda esoloko iswenkile de uphathe nebhegi).
Naku omele ukukwazi ngokukhetha iqhina:
Ubude obububo - kufuneka le ndawo yeqhina ebunxa-ntathu iphele kanye esibhonweni.
Musa ukuthenga iqhina elinemifanekiso, oopopayi okanye izakhiwo ngaphandle kokuba uya ethekweni labantwana okanye kwindibano yosapho.
Khetha iqhina elindilisekileyo xa usiya kudliwano-ndlebe, entlanganisweni okanye nakweliphi itheko elindilisekileyo. Kuhle ukuba unxibe iqhina elinombala omnye.
Musa ukunxiba iqhina elinemigca nehempe enemigca,ngaphandle kokuba yihempe enemigca emincinci kakhulu.
Iqhina lakho malihambelane nelaphu leempahla zakho. Xa ihempe ihonjisiwe kuhle unxibe iqhina elinombala omnye kananjalo naxa iqhina lihonjisiwe wenza njalo nangehempe.
Musa ukunxiba ihempe enombala ongakhanyiyo neqhina elikwanjalo. Iqhina elingakhanyiyo lihle xa ulinxibe nehempe enombala okhanyayo ngokunjalo nehempe enombala oqaqambileyo ungayingxenga ngeqhina elinombala ongakhanyiyo. [x]

Bhotani bahlobo
Andisuki kusapho olunamabhinqa anamabele amakhulu.
Eneneni, umama nodadobawo banalamabele kuthiwa ngamabele "entombi nto".
Ndifuze bona ngesifuba esimtyaba kwaye le nto indihluphe ubomi bam bonke.
Ndandikurhalela ukunxiba iibhodisi ezinkulu, ndandihlohla isifuba sam ngeepentihowuzi.
Ukuqala kwam ukusebenza, umphathi wam - wadikwa kukukhalaza kwam - wandithengela iisilicone breast pads.
Kwakungathi yiKrismesi: isifuba sam nokuzithemba kwam kwanda.
Kodwa kwakungonelanga - ndaqala ndabeka i-R100 ngenyanga ukuze ndizokwenza utyando lokwandisa amabele.
Ndaze ndadibana nesinqanda-mathe sam, esasindithanda ndinjalo singaqondi nesona sizathu esenza ndinxibe amabele okuzenzela.
Ndaqala ngoko ukubona ukuba ndinamabele amahle!
Kodwa ke, indumasi yethu ekwikhava uMshoza yena ulwenzile utyando lokwandisa amabele.
Kudliwano-ndlebe elikukhasi-18 usixelela ukuba kutheni kubelutyando lweeyure ezintathu olumnike ukuzithemba nomzimba ekudala ewunqwenela.
Ngokuqinisekileyo, zininzi ezinye iindlela zokuzenza mhle, mawethu.
Kukhasi 112 sitshintsha inkangeleko yamanene okokuqlala. Tana! (Ukuba nje bendingenamntu!)
De kube lixesha elizayo.

Enkosi ngeendaba zebhola!

Ninamabali amnandi
Ndiyawathanda amabali enu amatsha angolwaphulo-mthetho kuba kumnandi ukuwafunda. Ayanceda ngokusikhumbuza ukuba ulwaphulo-mthetho alukho eMzantsi Afrika kuphela - kaloku ucinga njalo xa ufunda amaphepha ubukele neendaba zeTV.
Ulwaphulo-mthetho lukho kuwo wonk' amazwe, ngoko abantu baseMzantsi Afrika abazozaphuli-mthetho ngaphezu kwabamany' amazwe.
Qhubeka nomsebenzi omhle, BONA!
nguVeronica Mhlwazi, email
Uya kuphela nini lo mkhwa?
Kuya kuphela nini ukuqeshwa kwabantu ngokuzalana nokuthengiswa kwemisebenzi kweli lizwe. Kunzima ukufuman' umsebenzi kule mihla xa ungenabantu wazana nabo, kungenjalo kufuneka uhlawule intywenka yemali ukuze uwufumane. Nam ndahlawula imali enkulu ukuze ndiwufumane. Abantu basuka emakhaya bengenayo nepeni bayofun' imisebenzi kodwa kunyanzeleke ukuba baboleke imali "koomatshonisa" ukuze bathenge imisebenzi. Bayaphi Ubuntu?
Into embi kukuba abantu abathengisa imisebenzi bamkela imivuzo emikhulu.
nguLindeka Dubula, eNortham
Sizitshabalalisa ngokwethu?
Abantu batshabalalisa yonk' into, badodobalise nabantu ababancedayo. Bayeba kwiinkampani abaphangela kuzo - zize zivalwe nabantu baphelelwe yimisebenzi.
Sizitshabalalisa ngokwethu ngaloo nto. Masakheni ingomso lethu!
nguNMM, e-Olifansfontein

Abazali nolwaphulo-mthetho
Iiresiphi ezimnandi
Ndiyabulela kwiBONA ngeeresiphi ezintsha ezenziwa nguNtwenhle Mpanza. Andiphoswa yimagazini yenu oko waqalayo ukuzibhala, kanti ndiyakuthanda nokuzipheka. Bezimnandi kakhulu ezika-Aprili, ingakumbi iFish Finger Pockets neStuffed Tomatoes.
nguThobekile Mbonambi, email
Oomama abaselayo
Nazi iimbono zabafundi ngenqaku lethu elithi Oomama Abaselayo (elaphuma kwiBONA kaMarch 2009), elalithetha ngokwanda kwamabhinqa aselayo eluntwini lwakowethu nesasibuza kulo ukuba ngumkhwa ombi na ukusela phambi kwabantwana
Akulunganga ukusela kwabazali phambi kwabantwana kuba bafunda ngokubonela. Uza kubafundisa njani abantwana ngemikhwa emibi xa omnye bewubonela kuwe? Masibe yimizekelo emihle ebantwaneni ukuze nabo bazek' emzekweni.
Akazitshongo
Lindothusile inqaku lenu elithi Oomama Abaselayo. Ngathi ukucima kombane wakwa-Eskom akucimanga umbane kuphela, koko kucime neengqondo zabantu.
Inyaniso kukuba abantu abangamanxila bayalibala ukuba utywala abulonyango, kodwa busisifo ngokwaso.
Butshabalalisa ubomi babantu buzenzele namakhoboka. Masingazitshabalalisi ngabo ke.
nguNaseema Dhai, eRossburgh
Kutheni kulungile ukusela kwamadoda, kuze kuthiwe ukusela kwamabhinqa akulunganga? Ukusel' iglasi yewayini emva kokutya akunangxaki. Ngokunjalo nokusela iiglasi ezimbalwa emva kwemini ende yomsebenzi akunangxaki.
Into eyingxaki kukuba likhoboka lotywala - ngoko makhe siyeke ukuzenza abantu abangamalulwane.
Akulunganga ukunxila phambi kwabantwana nokuba uyindoda okanye ulibhinqa. Kodwa akunangxaki ukusela iiglasi ezimbalwa phambi kwabo, nokuba ungunina okanye uyise wabo.
ngu-AH, eQumrha
Imiba eveliswa linqaku lenu ibonisa omnye umzekelo wokujongelwa phantsi kwamabhinqa - zinto ezo zikhokelela ekuphathweni gadalala.
Amadoda angandivayo ukuba ndithini ndiza kuwachazela: yekani ukuzama ukucinezela amabhinqa nokuwaphatha njengabantwana abafuna ukuqeqeshwa.
nguBV, eNelspruit
Amabhinqa aphelelwe yintlonipho nokuziphatha. Angamanxila azintyintya ngotywala. Ukungakwazi ukuziphatha akusela kubonisa ukuba basisini esithambileyo. Akunxila amabhinqa uwafumana elala namadoda ezithoyilethi. Kukho noomama abathengisa ngeentombi zabo emadodeni amadala ukuze bafumane imali yokutheng' utywala.
Xa amabhinqa nawo engazihloniphi, angalindela njani ukuhlonitshwa ngamadoda?
ngu-Aaron Tlou, eTweefontein

BONA XHOSA - October 2007
Indlela yokonga ixesha xa uzilungisa ukuze ukwazi ukuzilungisa ngokukhawuleza xa ushiywe lixesha
XA USHIYWE lixesha kwaye unemizuzu embalwa yokuzilungisa ukuze ufike ngexesha entlanganisweni kunzima ukwenza bonke ubugoci-goci bokuzenza mhle. Ungathambisi izinto eziza kukulibazisa nezifuna ixesha elaneleyo koko thambisa izinto ezoma ngokukhawuleza.
Iinwele
Zikame iinwele zakho ukuze zingakuphazamisi ngokuza ebusweni ungenzi istayili esitya ixesha.
Imake-up
Xa uthambisa imake-up ungxamile, thambisa imake-up ebalulekileyo kuphela nongakwaziyo ukwahlukana nayo. Xa ungakwazi ukuhlala ngaphandle kwemake-up ungayithambisi imibala ebalaseleyo kuba iyahlupha xa ungxamile. Endaweni yokuthambisa ilipstick thambisa ilip gloss enombala - ungayosula ngomnwe xa uyithambise kakubi (Uluhlu olutsha lweYardley lukulungele...)
Iinzipho
Zintle iinzipho ezicocekileyo, ezingathanjiswanga nto kuneenzipho ezinepeyinti exobukayo. Susa ipeyinti yeenzipho exobukayo ngepolish remover uze uzilungise kakuhle iinzipho zakho nge-emery board. Thambisa ipeyinti yeenzipho engenambala xa likho ixesha.
Lunga ngemizuzu emibini
Xa uselwe uyaxhalaba kodwa akukuncedi nganto kuba kufuneka ube sele ulungele ukuhamba kwimizuzwana nje eli-120! Ungaphakuzeli: musa ukuzenza izinto ozenzayo qho kusasa uze wenze eziza kukongela ixesha.
Iinwele
Xa uvuka uneenwele ezivuku-vuku, zithambise ngesithambisi esinegel uze uzikame kungenjalo thwala iqhiya okanye umnqwazi.
Imake-up
Hlamba ubuso ubuthambise imoisturiser kuphela. (Ungalibali ukuxubha!) Thambisa ilipstick ukuze ikwenze ubalasele.
Iinzipho
Qinisekisa ukuba zicocekile kwaye zilungiswe kakuhle zalingana. Inyama embi ejikezele iinzipho nezandla ezomileyo azibukeki futhi zikubizela amehlo ngoko zilungise. Ungohlukani nekhrim yokuthambisa izandla kwaye yithambise ngaphambi kokuphuma endlwini.
Okokugqibela...
Qinisekisa ukuba akukhonto uyishiyayo - izitshixo, imali, iselfowuni, ipeni namaphepha oza kuwasebenzisa entlanganisweni kwanenombolo yomntu oza kumfowunela xa ulibaziseka endleleni.

BONA XHOSA - October 2006
Ukubhengeza ishishini lakho lokuthengisel' ekhaya
UKUBHENGEZA ishishini lakho kukwazisa abantu ofuna ukubathengisela imveliso yakho. Uza kukwenza njani oko"
Ukuthetha nabantu ofuna bakuxume kufanele kwenzeke ngemvano. Oko ungakwenza ngokubatsalela umnxeba okanye uthethe nabo, ngoko thenga izinto zokubhengeza ishishini lakho njengamakhadi azisa ishishini lakho, ufake izibhengezo kwiYellow Pages nangokubeka izibhengezo ezimotweni.
Ukunika abantu amakhadi achaza ngeshishini lakho (ukulithumela ngeposi emva kokuthetha nomntu ngomnxeba) kubonisa ukuba ungusomashishini ozimiseleyo. Xa ungenalo ikhadi elichaza ishishini lakho awunakuphumelela.
Ufanele ube nawo umnxeba weshishini ukuze ubenako ukufaka isibhengezo kwiYellow Pages. "Njengoko abantu besoloko befuna amashishini amahle, kubhetele ubhengeze kwiYellow Pages," utsho omnye usomashishini.
Xa imoto yakho inophawu lweshishini lakho, oko kuya kwenza abantu balazi nangakumbi ishishini lakho. Kaloku abantu baza kubona imoto yakho baze babhale inombolo yeshishini lakho.

Izithako

bread flour

1 itispuni yecinnamon
1/2 sekomityi yebhotolo,
inyibilikiswe

2 iitispuni ze-almond essence
Indlela yokuyenza
1. Beka i-onti ku-200oC. Xuba zonke izithako ezomileyo esityeni esikhulu uxubisise.
2. Dibanisa zonke izithako ezimanzi uze uzigalele kwezomileyo. Zamisa de kube yintlama ethambileyo engathi yeyeebhiskiti.
3. Khuphela intlama kwindawo efafazelwe iflawa. Yenze mtyaba ibe nobungqingqwa obuyi-2,5cm.
4. Yisike ibe nobukhulu obuyi-5cm x 10cm. Zibhake ushiye isithuba esiyi-5cm phakathi kwazo kwishiti yokubhaka imizuzu engama-25 de umphezulu ube krum-krum yaye ubemdaka.
5. Yicime i-onti. Yeka iirusk kwitreyi yokubhaka de i-onti iphole.
6. Iirusk ngoku zifanele zibe zomile. Zipholise uzigcine kwisitya esingangeni moya. (Iirusk ziya kuhlala iiveki.)
BONA - October 2006

SIYAZI sonke ukuba omelele amabhinqa aseMzantsi Afrika kwaye xa ngaba sele siyilibele loo nto, uBabalwa Ndleleni-Ramahlape uyasikhumbuza. Eli bhinqa linama-27 eminyaka lenze imbali ngokuba libhinqa lokuqala elimnyama eMzantsi Afrika ukuzuza imbasa yobhedu (bronze) kwicandelo lwabaphakamisa iintsimbi abanobunzima obuyi-75kg kwimidlalo yeCommonwealth ebiseMelbourne kutshanje.
"Yimbasa yam yokuqala le. Ndazixelela ukuba ndiza kuza apha ndonwabele imidlalo kwaye ndenza loo nto kanye," watsho emva kokudlala.
Njengabanye abadlali abangenathamsanqa lokufuman' inkxaso ngenxa yomdlalo wakhe "ongadumanga" uBabalwa naye uhlangabezane nobunzima.
Uncokole nathi esekhayeni lakhe eGugulethu eKapa ekunye nomyeni wakhe okwayimanejala yakhe esibalisela ngendlela aziqeqeshe ngayo ejimini eseNyanga engenankxaso-mali ayifumanayo.
Kwafuneka ukuba asebenzise imali enikwa iimbaleki xa kudlalwa ukuze azithengele izihlangu ezilungele ukuphakamis' iintsimbi kolu khuphiswano.
"Yonk' imali endandinayo ndathenga ngayo ezi zihlangu ndasala ndingenayo nepeni," utshilo.
Kuqala wayenxiba iiteki ezindala azithungisa ngokutsha kumntu othung' izihlangu esitratweni ukuze zilungele ukuphakamis' iintsimbi.
Ukanti nokutya okulungele lo mdlalo wakhe kuyadura kakhulu.
"Kungokunje ndithandazela ukufuman' inkxaso-mali," utshilo ezityand' igila.
Umongameli weSA Sports Confederation and Olympic Committee, uMoss Mashishi ubongoze oosomashishini norhulumente ukuba batyale imali kwezemidlalo ngethuba ebesenz' intetho eJoburg yokwamkela iqela leli ebelithath' inxaxheba kule midlalo.
Uthe iAustralia ichithe imali ephindwe izihlandlo ezingama-60 kwimbaleki nganye xa ithelekiswa noMzantsi Afrika.
UKevin du Plooy oyingqonyela yomdlalo wokuphakanyiswa kweentsimbi uthi uNdleleni usebenze nzima kwaye ukuzuza le mbasa kwakhe kuvulela nabanye amathuba. "Ngumzekelo omhle lo kwaye uyakhuthaza nakwabanye," watsho kwiCape Argus.
Sele eqalil' ukwenza amalungiselelo okuya eBeijing kwiminyaka emibini ezayo kuba uyakwazi ukuphakamisa intsimbi enobunzima obungaphaya kwekhulu leekhilogram.

BONA - August 2005

Imbalasane entsha yefashoni
KUYOTHUSA ukungen' ezihlangwini zendwalutho yefashoni, ngoko noBonang Matheba oyinzwakazi ezithembileyo nengumsasazi weLive uyavuma ukuba naye unalo idyudyu.
"Ndiziva ndiqala ukuba senkcopheni yehlabathi ngoku!" utshilo uBonang othand' ukuhleka. Ukuthanda kwakhe izinto ezintle kwenze ivenkile yeempahla yakwaLegit yakhupha impahla ebizwa ngaye.
"Iimpahla zethu ezibizwa ngoNoni Gasa zathandwa kakhulu ngabantu kwaye sineminyak' emibini sifuna omnye umntu esiza kubiza ngaye iimpahla zethu," umtsho umphathi wezentengiso kwaLegit, uGlenda Mthimkhulu. Ekugqibeleni bacele abathengi babo ukuba bavote kwiwebsite yakwaLegit - baza bavotela uBonang njengendwalutho elandelayo yefashoni.
"Andisokuze ndiyilibale imini endeva ngayo ezo ndaba zokugqwesa kwam kolo voto lwabathengi. Umsakwethu wayephambene luvuyo, umama yena engakwazi nokuzibamba iinyembezi zovuyo!
"Umama wathi 'ndiyakuvuyela ntomb'am, nokuba ndiyafa ndiya kushiya ndisazi ukuba unento yokuziphilisa'. Kum oku bekufana nokuzaliseka kwephupha.
"Mhla ndandiqala ukungena kwaLegit, ndabona isikipha sikaNoni ndathi akwaba bekuligama lam esibizwa ngalo eso sikipha. Ndikhumbula ukuba ndandiziva ndisentweni xa ndisinxibe nebhulukhwe kunyaka endandisenza imatriki," utsho.
UBonang ukhumbula imini yetheko lokuvaleliswa kwabafundi bematriki njengexesha elikhethekileyo njengoninzi lwamantombazana aseMzantsi Afrika. Kaloku ngale mini akhumbula izinto ezabantle nezabambi ngayo!
"Ndayibona ilokhwe endandiyithungelwe ngumthungi wam ngemini engaphambi kwetheko - ndlela le yayimbi yona. Yayithungwe kakubi nemibala yayo ndingayithandi. Kwanyanzeleka ukuba ndifune into endiza kuyinxiba ngaloo mvakwemini."
Ngethamsanqa wathanda ilokhwe ende ehonjisiweyo esifubeni yakwaHip Hop - wazithengela isihombo somqala namacici kwalapho ukuze aqiniseke ukuba isinxibo sakhe siphelele.
"Ndandifun' ilokhwe e-orenji kuba umama wayendiphathele izihlangu ezi-orenji eMelika. Kodwa ndazinxiba kuba zazizofihlwa yilokhwe!"
Iinwele zikaBonang zazibreyidiwe ngoko wazilungisa nje kancinane ukuze zibentle. Waba nendyweba yokuba nomlungisi-buso owayeza kulungis' ubuso bakhe.
Kodwa waphoxwa kukungafiki komnyobo wemoto owayeyiqeshelwe ukuba uza kuhamba ngayo. Ukungafiki kwayo kwamnyanzela ukuba ahanjiswe ngeToyota Tazz yakowabo.
"Laba mnandi kakhulu itheko lethu lobo busuku elaliseGallagher Estate eJohannesburg.
"Ndandihamba noTumi endadibana naye eRhema Bible Church. Wayeliyolisa lendalo kwaye kwakumnandi, bekhona bonke abahlobo bam. Ngelishwa salahlekana naye emva kweenyanga ezimbalwa emva kokuba efumene umsebenzi kweny' indawo."
UBonang waya kwenza izifundo zentengiso nezonxibelelwano - wazifumanela nomfana ancuma naye. "Sineminyak' emibini sithandana. Xa ndithetha ngaye ndibanoncumo lukaBlankethe," utshilo ngenene encumile, kodwa wale kwaya ngaye ukulithi pahaha igama lakhe.
"Kulul' ukungena kwisigcayiseli sokuzifumana uvana nabantu abangalunganga, kodwa ndineminyak' eli-10 ndikwishishini lolonwabo kwaye uyandikhuthaza kakhulu.
"Indlela akhuthele ngayo ikwenza kwawena uzibone ikuvuselela loo nto. Xa usenza into ekhona ufuna ukuphumelela kuba uphenjelelwa nje bubukho bakhe.
"Sifanelene kakhulu naye yaye andazi ukuba ndingayintoni ngaphandle kwakhe. Undenza ndihlale ndisezingqondweni."
Ngenene ke uyamfuna umntu onjalo njengokuba ephila ubomi babantu abathathu ngexesha elinye - uyafunda ngokuzeleyo, usasaza inkqubo ethi Live ukanti usebenza neqela elithunga impahla ebizwa ngaye yakwaLegit. Njengokuba ngoku ikhutshiwe le mpahla ngokusesikweni uza kuxakeka nangakumbi efotwa ukuze akhutshwe kwiibhodi ezinkulu nakwiintengiso zamaphepha-ndaba, kwiTV nakwimiboniso yefashoni.
"Kuthabath' iinyang' ezintandathu ukuya kwezisibhozo ukuyila impahla ize igqibele ithengiswa ezivenkileni. Ndibacebisa ukuba bayithunge ngendlela nam endinxiba ngayo. Bona ke bayayazi impahla ethengwayo ezivenkileni.
"Sizama ukuvelisa okuthandwa yintombazana enxiba kwaLegit. Sijolise kwiintwazana ezineminyaka ephakathi kwe-16 nama-22. Kaloku zona azinamali ininzi yokutheng' impahla enamagama kodwa ziyafuna ukubabahle. Zinjalonje zinqwenela ukuba ziindwalutho ezivela kwiTV," utshilo uBonang.
Ngokutsho kukaGlenda ezi mpahla ziza nemixholo eyahlukeneyo. Uninzi lwazo zisekelwe kwiimpahla zamatheko okuvalelisa abafundi bematriki.
"Kuza kuba mnandi ukubona ubuso bam kwiibhodi ezinkulu kodwa ndinayo intwana yoloyiko. Ndibanexhala lokuba 'Ndiya kuthini xa zingathandwa ngabantu? Ndiya kuthini xa zingathengwa?' Kodwa ke ndiyazithemba kwaye ndiyazithanda. Kunjalonje ndizinxiba naphi na apho ndiyakhona" utsho uBonang.
Akakholwa uBonang ukuba oku kumnike ithuba lokusebenzisa akufunde kwizifundo zentengiso.
"Ndiyawabona onke amanyathelo esifundiswa ngawo, kwaye oko kwenz' izinto zibelula. Kaloku bendisoloko ndizifunda iimagazini zefashoni ndibukela neF-TV ukuze ndingasali kwezefashoni!
"Ndiyanqwenela ukungena kwishishini lokuthunga. Ndingathanda nokwenza izihombo neziqholo eziphambili. Kodwa ndiyafuna nokuhlala kwezolonwabo. Kodwa ndiyafuna nokuhlala kwezolonwabo, ngoko ndinethemba lokufumana inkqubo endiza kuyisasaza kunomathotholo.
"Ndiziva ndingathi ndiyafikelela enkcopheni yehlabathi kuba amaphupha am ayaqala ukuzaliseka. Kaloku bendisebenza nzima kule minyaka mihlanu idlulileyo.
"Ndikhe ndaba ngumphathi-theko, ndashicilela iintengiso, ndaba ngumgwebi kukhuphiswano loonobuhle, ndenza neziny' izinto ezininzi, ngoku ndiqale ukuvuna iziqhamo zaloo misebenzi. Ndizibona ndisikelelekile." [x]

BONA XHOSA - January 2007
AMABHINQA kufuneka awaxilonge amabele awo kanye ngenyanga yaye kufuneka aye kugqirha kanye ngonyaka ubuncinane ukuze naye awaxilonge amabele.
Uninzi lwamaqhuma asemabeleni akanguye unobangela womhlaza kodwa kufuneka uwabone kwangoko yaye uwanyange ukuze uthintele umhlaza. Iindaba ezimnandi zezokuba kulula ukuwaxilonga ngokwakho amabele akho.
Amabhinqa aselula kufuneka awaxilonge amabele awo emva kokuqal' ukuya exesheni aze lawo amadala awaxilonge xa sele eyekile ukuya exesheni qho ngenyanga. Wukhumbule qho umhla wokuxilonga amabele akho. Yiya kugqirha xa usiva iqhuma ebeleni.
Nanga amanyathelo amathathu okuxilonga amabele:-
Inyathelo 1: Khulula ume esipilini ujonge ibele lakho ngalinye ujonge amaqhuma, ukwahluka kwawo nolusu lwawo.
Ziqwalasele ngokukodwa iingono - jonga iinguqu ezikhoyo kwinkangeleko yazo.
Phakamis' iingalo ujonge ukuba ulusu lwakho aludumbanga na okanye alunazinxonxo na.
Inyathelo 2: Lala kakuhle phantsi ubek' umqamelo phantsi kwegxalaba lakho lasekunene. Bek' isandla sasekunene emva entloko. Sebenzis' iminwe yesandla sasekhohlo uve ibele lasekunene ulicinezele kakuhle uqalise ngaphandle ulijikeleze de ulixilonge lonke kuquka nengono. Yenza ngolo hlobo nakwelasekhohlo.

GETTING INVOLVED
Indlela yokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho
Noxa amanani asemthethweni ebonakalisa ukuba luyancipha ulwaphulo-mthetho eMzantsi Afrika, kodwa abemi beli abaninzi bakholelwa ekubeni ayanyuka - kaloku abantu abazikhathazi ngokuxela ulwaphulo-mthetho kuba besithi amapolisa akazukwenza nto. Kodwa ikhona indlela esingalwa ngayo ulwaphulo-mthetho - yaye siloyise... kubhale Kwafota uGAVIN FOSTER
ULWAPHULO-MTHETHO luyalitshabalalisa eli lizwe, kodwa ukuba mna nawe singasebenzisana ekulweni nale ngxaki singawenza umehluko. Imibutho egada ebumelwaneni, eyasekuhlaleni, egcin' ucwangco nekhusela abahlali ingasebenzisana ukuze izikrelemnqa ziphil' ubomi bentshontsho aze akhuthazeke namapolisa amel' ukukhusela abantu.
Imibutho egada abamelwane kulapho abahlali kwiindawo ezisezidolophini bevumelana ukuba baza kuncedisana ekugadeni imizi yabo. Bayasebenzisana bedibene namapolisa, amavolontiya azula-zula ezitratweni ebusuku egadile.
Xa kukho umntu oya eholideyini abamelwane bayamgadela indlu yakhe.
Kodwa inye into efanele ukuba ingavunyelwa, kukuba abantu bathabathele umthetho ezandleni zabo. Ukuba nizibambile izikrelemnqa, zinikezeleni emapoliseni. Ewe kona unganqwenela ukuzohlwayela ngokwakho, kodwa loo nto ikwenza ufane nqwa nezikrelemnqa ozama ukuzilwa.
IiCommunity Policing Forum
(CPF) yimibutho emikhulu kuneyabamelwane abagadelanayo, kwaye sele yenze umsebenzi oncomekayo kwezinye iingingqi, ingakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
Umthetho uyanyanzelisa ukuba iiCPF zixhaswe zizikhululo zamapolisa kwaye zakhiwa ngabahlali, amaqela ezenkolo, ulutsha, iiklabhu zemidlalo, imibutho yoonoteksi, ooceba noosomashishini abahlala kwiindawo eziphantsi kweso sikhululo samapolisa, kunye namagosa asiphetheyo isikhululo.
I-CPF iba neendibano kanye ngenyanga nalapho kuxoxwa ngokwenzekayo kuloo ngingqi.
Imibandela efana nolwaphulo-mthetho nezinto ezikhokelela kulwaphulo-mthetho ziyaphicothwa kuze kuziwe nezisombululo.
Eyona nto incedayo ke ngeCPF kukuba intsebenzo yamapolisa iyajongwa kwezi ndibano, izinto azenzayo ezingafanelekanga, xa engawenzi umsebenzi okanye esebenzisa amagunya ngendlela engeyiyo, kuze kudityanwe ngokukhawuleza namagosa aphetheyo akulo ngingqi.
I-CPF idibanisa yonke imibutho yabamelwane abaqadelanayo ephantsi kweso sikhululo samapolisa sibandakanyekayo.
Ingcamango esandula kuqalwa yiCommunity Safety Forum (CSF) yona ibandakanya iingingqi eziliqela kuneCPF - inakho ukudibanisa iindawo eziphantsi kwezikhululo zamapolisa ezi-5 okanye ezi-6 - kwaye ayijongi lwaphulo-mthetho nje kuphela.
KuMeyi wonyaka ophelileyo uCharles Nqakula onguMphathiswa weSebe loKhuselo noKhuseleko, uthe lo mbutho mtsha uza kuba nolawulo oluphangaleleyo kunemibutho yabamelwane abagadelanayo neeCPF.
Uza kusebenza namasebe karhulumente njengeSebe lezeKhaya ukuqwalasela imeko yeembacu, incedisane neSebe leeNkonzo zoLuleko kwinkqubo yokukhulula amabanjwa ukuba abuyele eluntwini akugqiba izigwebo zawo, isebenze kwaneSebe lezoBulungisa ekuqinisekiseni ukuba uluntu luyawazi kwaye luyawaqonda amalungelo alo.
Ngokuqinisekileyo ke bukho ubuthathaka kule nkqubo. Akhona kwaye maninzi amapolisa anobuqhophololo nangawenziyo umsebenzi kwaye ukuba akasebenzisani noluntu oluzama ukuphucula intlalo yeli, iziphumo azinakuba zezihle kwaphela. [x]
BONA XHOSA July 2008
Qhagamshelana nesikhululo samapolisa ufumanise ukuba kule mibutho ayikho na esele iqaliwe (ukuze ungazichithel' ixesha). Ukuba ikhona esele iqaliwe, cela inkcukacha zayo ukuze uqhagamshelane nayo unikele ngeenkonzo zakho ezinokunceda.
Qala ngeCommunity Safety Forum uye usiya ezantsi kwiCPF ukuya kwimibutho yabamelwane abagadelanayo, ngolo hlobo uyakufumana inkxaso kuMkomishinala wengingqi, wenkonzo yamapololisa oMzantsi Afrika, iSebe lezeKhaya namanye amasebe karhulumente, loo nto itsho ikunike isithunzi kumagosa angezantsi. UMphathiswa uNqakula wathembisa nokuba inkxaso yemali izakubakho ukuhlangabezana neemfuno ezinjengendawo ye-ofisi neziny' indleko zeeCommunity Safety Forums ezikhoyo. Buza ngale nyewe, utyhale ngesifuba ukuba kukho imfuneko.
Beka abantu ezikhundleni ezibafaneleyo ukhethe ngobulumko. Sebenza ngolwazi abantu abasele benalo kunokuqala ubaqeqeshe. Kumba wentsebenziswano namapolisa, fumana elona polisa likwisikhundla esiphezulu onokulifumana nelinoncedo.
Musa ukutyhafa xa sele uqalile. Amaxesha amaninzi abantu benza njengemibutho yabamelwane abagadelanayo yona iqala ngodlamko, kodwa ikhawuleze ukutyhafa xa ingafuman' ingxelo okanye izincomo.
Ukuba isikhululo samapolisa sengingqi asinantsebenziswano, gqithelani kwabangaphambili - iSebe loKhuseleko lwabaHlali lephondo liza kunincedisa ukwenza izinto zihambele phambili.Bhalelani abaphathi bamapolisa aseMzantsi Afrika kanti namajelo eendaba ukuba niqala ukuxhalaba. Kweliny' icala, ukuba amapolisa "enu" enza umsebenzi omhle, bonakalisani umbulelo.

Zenzele ngokwakho
Amazwi enkuthazo koomama abangatshatanga abazikhulisela abantwana
N NDINEMINYAKA engama-24 kwaye ndingumama ongatshatanga, ndihlala nomakhulu, oodadewethu ababini nonyana wam oneminyaka emithathu. Ndandimthanda uyise wonyana wam endithembisa izulu nomhlaba, kanti akathethi loo nto.
Ndathi ndakumxelela ukuba ndikhulelwe waphel' emehlweni. Ndandingafanelanga ukothuka, kodwa yophuka intliziyo yam.
Ndandiziva ndilahlekile ndindedwa. Kodwa ndajonga usana lwam oluhle ndaqonda ukuba ndisikelelekile.
Ngaphandle kwezinto ezimbi ezenzekileyo phakathi kwam noyise womntwana, uThixo ubendikhokela.
Ngoku ndinamandla kwakhona, ndiyakwazi ukuzimela. Ndim kuphela osebenzayo ekhaya, kodwa siyakwazi ukuphila.
Ngoku ndifuna ukuthi kuwo onke amabhinqa angoomama abangatshatanga abanokuba bakhathazekile - akukokuphela kobomi.
Enyanisweni, eli lixesha lokuba ukhule uphucule nobomi bakho.
Zifunele umsebenzi uphakamisa igama lawo onke amabhinqa!
Wathint' abafazi, wathint' imbokodo.
nguNT Kwebu, eVilliers
Iinkonzo zikarhulumente
Ndinexhala ngeentetho zabantu abathi urhulumente akazizisi iinkonzo ebantwini. Namhlanje sibona iindawo ezazingenawo umbane namanzi zisonwabela ezi nkonzo.
Urhulumente akanako ukunika bonke abantu iinkonzo ngaxeshanye, ngoko abo bangekazifumani mabangakhalazi. Endaweni yoko, mababe nomonde!
Kananjalo nabantu mabangasong' izandla balindele uncedo oluvela kurhulumente. Mabaqale iiprojekthi eziza kuphuhlisa ubomi babo.
Singawoyisa amaxabiso okutya axhomileyo ngokuqala iigadi zasekuhlaleni apho siza kulima imifuno.
Ndiqinisekile norhulumente angakuvuyela ukunceda abantu abazizamelayo nabo.
nguNosizwe Bhontshi, eMaclear

Cinga okuhle
IBONA ithi...
NGUNYAKA omtsha kwaye eli lixesha lokwenza izigqibo ezitsha. Uyazazi ke ezo "zithembiso" esizenzayo sakugqiba sizophule - kungaphelanga neeyure ezitheni sifungile. Phofu ke singabantu. Kodwa mhlawumbi isigqibo esingakwazi ukunamathela kuso sonke kukucinga okuhle - indlela esizibona ngayo thina nendlela esibona ilizwe ngayo.
Eneneni, okufanele sikwenze kukuqala ngathi kuba ukuba sizithiyile thina ilizwe liza kubonakala lidangele ngenene.
Nazi izinto ezisixhenxe ongazixelela zona xa kufika amaxesha obunzima kwezi nyanga zizayo...
Ndingaziphuncula kwimeko yayizolo. Xola. Ukubamelela kumanxeba ayizolo kuza kukuvusela iintlungu ngakumbi!
Ndifanelwe kokuhle. Musa ukuzigweba - okanye utyhole abanye. Ukuveza isakhono sakho kungafuna usebenze nzima, kodwa unakho ukuzenzela ubomi obunempumelelo nothando.
Yonke ingxaki iveza ithuba. Yonke ingxaki inesisombululo kwaye ikwalithuba lokufunda ukhule womelele.
Andizukubanjwa luloyiko neembophelelo zabanye. Suka ebantwini abacinga okubi. Bafuna ukukubona ungaphumeleli. Musa ukulawulwa yintandabuzo. Babonise ukuba unako.
Mandingatyholi mntu. Awusenakujika nto. Ukukhangela umntu oza kumtyhola akuzukunceda. Zikhumbuze ukuba wonke umntu wenza kangangoko anako.
Ndivuna endikulimileyo. Xa usoloko ugxeka, abantu bakubanjalo nakuwe. Yiba nothando novelwano, uya kufumana oko nawe.
Okokugqibela amaxesha amaninzi "abuhlungu" enziwa ziingcinga ezimbi. Njengokucinga ukuba umntu ukuphoxile abe engenzanga kwanto.
Isisombululo kukuqwalasela iingcinga zethu sikhumbule ukuba mkhulu umahlupho phakathi kwendlela izinto eziyiyo nendlela esicinga ukuba ziyiyo thina!
Amaqhawe alityelweyo
Izitrato zeli loMzantsi Afrika zithiywa ngabantu bezopolitiko ikakhulu. Kodwa kuthiwani "ngamaqhawe alityelweyo"? Kuthiwani ngabantu abasebenza bethe cwaka betshintsha izinto.
Khona, kunyanzelekile ukuba kuthiywe ngabantu abangasekhoyo kuphela? Kuthiwani ngamadoda namabhinqa onga iziguli, ancede abolupheleyo, nabaxhaphazwayo ngalo mzuzu sithethayo?
Abaninzi babo ngamavolontiya afuna ukunceda nokwenza umehluko ngaphandle kokufuna intlawulo.
nguLM, eTembisa
Kumabhinqa eli
Oodade, oomama, oomakhulu nawo onke amabhinqa kufuneka aziphathe kakuhle. Sibalulekile kwaye sibahle. Sithi esongamele ilizwe, kodwa kufuneka siqale ngokuthandana.
Ngolu hlobo amadoda aya kufunda kuthi, abone indlela esifuna ukuphathwa ngayo. Endaweni yokukhangela ibala elibi kwelinye ibhinqa, khangela okuhle uze usebenzise kona. Funda kulo ube neqhayiya ngalo kuba kulibhinqa laseMzantsi Afrika. Ngokwenza njalo uvala ikroba lokuba amadoda afumane ithuba lokuxhaphaza amakhosikazi, andithethi ke ngokungawahloniphi.
nguTsidi Nchabeleng,
e-mail
Ukulinda inqwelo yeziguli
Ndingumhlali waseKroonstad kwaye ndinengxaki yindlela iinqwelo zeziguli ezisebenza ngayo. Ulinda iiyure ezintathu phambi kokuba ifike. Ndicela eli sebe liphucule indlela elisebenza ngayo.
nguSandile Khompela,
eKroonstad
Ezi zinto azihlali unaphakade
Ubuhlungu, nonxunguphalo... izinto ezininzi ezimbi ziyenzeka ebomini. Singangcatshwa ngabahlobo bethu, silahlekelwa zizihlobo, sizifumane singenamisebenzi - singabala kuse phandle.
Sonke siyafikelwa ngaloo maxesha anzima. Apho kuvakala ngathi uzele ziintlungu zodwa. Ixesha apho umthwalo usongamela. Sicinge nangokuzibulala.
Kodwa kufuneka sikhumbule ukuba ukufa kokwanaphakade, kanti iingxaki zethu zezexeshana.
Iintlungu zezethutyana. Ukuba siyakwamkela oku siyakuba nesibindi sokujongana neengxaki zethu - sizisombulule!
Xa ugubungelwe bubumnyama ngenxa yentlungu zixelele ukuba nayo iyedlula!
ngu-Aaron Tlou,
eTweefontein
Impilo yethu isengozini
Iivenkile zokutya ezininzi zibhaka isonka namabhanisi aye ashiywe ezibhaskithini ezivulekileyo.
Ayibobungozi obo kwimpilo yethu? Cinga ukuba bangaphi abantu abafika baphathe bacofe ezi zonka, besiva ubudala baso. Sithini ngaba abangazihlambiyo izandla xa besuka endlwini yangasese?
Ndithi makubekho imizamo eyenziwayo ukuze ezi mveliso zibekwe ngendlela ekhuselekileyo empilweni.
nguLazarus Makgafela,
eTembisa
Mayipheliswe?
Ndithi ibheyile mayipheliswe, ingakumbi kwityala lokubulala. Ezi zikrelemnqa zophula umthetho kuba zinethemba lebheyile. Ezinye ziyibhatala ibheyile ngemali ebiweyo. Ndinesicelo kwabasemagunyeni ukuba ziyekise ibheyile.
nguThoto Bereng,

Ngokuya umazi uya ngokumthanda
Izithandani ezininzi ziqala ngothando oluvuthayo kuba zifuna ukubonakalisa uthando lwazo omnye komnye. Kuze kuthini ke ngoku?
Ziqale sihlalisane luye ngokuphela uthando. Zilwe endaweni yokuthandana. Ukuqala kokuthandana kwahlukile - eyona nto ibalulekileyo yindlela eniphathana ngayo ngokuya iminyaka ihamba!
nguMatome Kubu,

Masibambisane
Singabemi beli, kufanele sibambisane ukutshintsha eli lizwe. Kuthatha ixesha elincinane ukulungisa izinto kunokukhalazela okungahambanga kakuhle.
Ukuba singatshintsha indlela esicinga ngayo singayitshintsha nendlela esenza ngayo - senze okuhle. Masifune izisombululo, singasoloko sikhalaza.
nguCS, eJouberton [x]
Kuthiwani ngabantwana?
Ndinexhala ngendlela abantwana abalahleka ngayo kweli xesha lethu. Sekusisiqhelo ukubona abantwana abancinci abaneminyaka emihlanu bezula-zula ezitratweni ebusuku. Abanye bahamba phandle kuba bethunywe ngabazali babo ezivenkileni.
Ngelixa thina sinamathele kwii-TV abantwana bethu bayalahleka kwaye/okanye bazifumane besengozini.
Abanye babulawelwa ukwenza amayeza. Siyeva sifunde ngezi zinto yonke imihla, kodwa akukho nto siyenzayo ukukhusela abantwana bethu. Asincedi nabantwana babanye abantu xa sibabona bebodwa.
Masisukume sincede abantwana!
nguThabo Moja,
ePimville

IMADIKWE River Lodge iselunxwemeni lomlambokazi iGroot Marico River kumda waseBotswana kwaye ivumela abatyeleli ukuba bonwabele ubuhle bendalo base-Afrika behleli kweli bhotwe lobuncwane.
Yakhiwe kumhlaba oziihekthare eziyi-75 000 ongenabungozi besifo secesina (imalariya), kumbindi weMadikwe Game Reserve, le ndawo inamagumbi okulala ali-16 kunye nendawo yokutyela eyakhelwe ngaphandle kwisiqithi somlambo.
Igumbi ngalinye lokulala lihonjiswe ngokwahlukileyo kwaye lineveranda yalo eyodwa eyenziwe ngamaplanga.
IMadikwe River Lodge iphisa ngeentsuku ezintathu zokulala, izidlo ezithathu kunye nemidlalo yolonwabo emibini (ukuhamba nibuka izilwanyana okanye nilandela imizila yazo) ngemini.
Lingakuphosi eli thuba lokonwabela ubuhle bendalo, ubone iintaka ezinemibala-bala nezilwanyana zasendle.

Ukuze uzuze neBONA, iInecto SuperBlack nabakwaTown Talk, zalis' ifom yokungenela, uphendule imibuzo, uyithumele kwiBONA/Inecto/Town Talk Competition, Box 32067, Mobeni, 4060, okanye uthumele iSMS ethi SUPERBLACK and TOWNTALK ku-35919. (I-SMS nganye iyi-R3.)
ONGAKUZUZA
Kuza kuzuza abafundi abali-10 emnye kubo uya kuzuza ifenitshala exabisa i-R15 000 - iMother Of Pearl Base Set; iWellington Bedroom Suite; iOrlando Wall Unit; i-74cm Sinotec TV, neKIC 223L Double-door Fridge.
Oweshumi elinanye umfundi uya kuzuza imoto iChana entsha kraca.

Ngamangenelo angakotshwanga nathunyelwe ngeposi aya kwamkelwa. 5. Amabhaso angalandwanga kwiinyanga ezintandathu baya kuphulukana nawo abaniniwo. 6. Asiyi kubekwa tyala ngeempazamo nezinto ezishiyelelweyo.

Olu khuphiswano luza
kuqhuba iinyang' ezine, kuza kutsalwa abathathu abaphumeleleyo ekupheleni kukaJuni, kutsalwe esiny' isithathu ekupheleni kukaJulayi, kuze kutsalwe isihlanu sokugqibela ekupheleni kuka-Agasti.
Isithathu sokuqala siya kukhutshwa kwiBONA kaSeptemba 2008, esesibini kweka-Oktobha 2008, size isihlanu sokugqibela siphume kwekaNovemba 2008. Ungabi saphozis' amaseko - lungenele ngoku yaye UNGAZIBONA uwelwa ngumq' esandleni![x]

Ungaziqesha njani ngokwakho!
Phantse sonke sinomnqweno wokuba namashishini ethu - ukuziphatha ngokwakho ube nemali eninzi kuvakala njengento emnandi - kodwa akuyonto ilula. Inyaniso kukuba, ambalwa amashishini asakhasayo awugqibayo kwa unyaka omnye esavulile. Ewe unakho, kodwa kunzima! Nantsi indlela...
Ibali nguGrace Khuzwayo
NOKUBA ngumbono omhle kangakanani na nawo ufuna usebenze nzima ngokuzinikela ukuze ibe lishishini elinempumelelo. Kweli nqaku leBONA elilodwa sizakucathula nawe kula manyathelo. Ngala...
Ubuqu bakho - zazi ukuba unakho.
Izinto oma uzijonge - ezona zinto ziyimfuneko ekumele uziqwalasele phambi kokuqala.
Ukubona ikroba - fumanisa ukuba yiyiphi imveliso okanye inkonzo eyimfuneko ekuhlaleni.
Ukuzipapasha - ukulithengisa ishishini lakho.
PANEL 1
Ingaba unakho?
U MELWE kukunyaniseka ngenene apha. Usenokuba ubabonile abanye osomashishini benyuselwa kwiindawo ezingaphezu kwamandla abo. Ngoku, nguwe omawuthengiswe kwaye elithuba lelokuba uzibuze ukuba ingaba ukulungele na ukuqhuba ishishini elilelakho. Unakho ke...
UTHANDO!
Kufuneka uyithande into oyenzayo ingabi yindlela yokwenza imali nje kuphela.
SUKUSOLOKO UPHUPHA!
Yazi ukuba impumelelo ayizuvele iwe okwemana ezulwini.
SEBENZA NZIMA!
Xa uziphethe iiyure ozisebenzayo ziyanda. Kwazi ukuzilawula. Xa kungekho mphathi ukujonge ngelihlo elibomvu uyalingeka, ufune ukuvuka nokuthatha ikhefu ngexesha olithandayo - kodwa kufanel' uhambe ngokwexesha elicwangcisiweyo.
UKUMELANA NEEMEKO!
Yiba nako ukutshintsha izicwangciso xa izinto zingahambi ngendlela - ukwazi nokubuyela ezingqondweni kwakhona!
YIBA NOKUYILA!
Fumana iindlela ezikrelekrele zokuthengisa izakhono zakho okanye iimveliso.
GCINA UMGANGATHO!
Kwazi ukubaluleka kokunika inkonzo esemgangathweni ngalo lonke ixesha, njengokuhoya abathengi bakho emva kokubathengisele.
PANEL 2
Unazo izinto eziyimfuneko?
PHAMBI kokuba uqale ishishini lakho zikho izinto oma uziqaphele. Ezi zezi...
IMALI
Uzakudinga imali ezakukwazi ukukuthwala wena neshishini lakho iinyanga ezi-6 ukuya enyakeni, kuxhomekeke kuhlobo lweshishini onalo. Khumbula - noxa kuzakube kumnandi ukungabi namphathi - yazi ukuba ngoku akukho mphathi uzakukuhlawula ukuphela kwenyanga
INDAWO YOKUSEBENZELA
Indawo osebenzela kuyo mayibukeke kuyindawo yomsebenzi. Ukuba usebenzela ekhaya qiniseka ukuba i-ofisi yakho ikude engxolweni yosapho.
IZIXHOBO ZOKUSEBENZA
Ambalwa amashishini asebenza ngaphandle koncedo lwekompyutha. Kuhle ukuba i-ofisi yakho ibe nekompyutha, iprinta, ifaxksi ne-Intanethi kunye ke nezixhobo zokuvelisa loo nto uzakube ushishina ngayo.
IZAKHONO
Kuhle xa unezakhono eziliqela. Cinga ngokwenza izifundo zezakhono kwezoshishino, eziquka indlela yokwenza iincwadi nokuzithengisa.
PANEL 3
Ukubon' ikroba
LUMKA! Ukuba ubona kukho imfuneko yemveliso/inkonzo ethile, yima kancinci, utsho uFran Piggott, ongumcebisi wosomashishini abasakhasayo.
"Zibuze ukuba kutheni?
"Ukuba ngumbono omhle, kutheni ungasetyenziswa?"
Kwelinye icala, ukuba khukho abantu abenza into enye nale uyenzayo,yinto entle leyo.
Luyafuneka ukhuphiswano, ayikugcini uphapheme nje kuphela kodwa iyakwazisa ukuba bakho abathengi bemveliso yakho.
Indlela elula yokubona imfuneko yemveliso kukujonga ingxaki exhaphakileyo uze wenze imveliso apho ishishini lakho libe sisisombululo. Ngokwenza njalo uyakuphumelela.
Uzibona kanjani ezingxaki? Mamela izikhalazo zabantu.
Bakhalazela ntoni? Ungakwazi ukubanceda?
PANEL4:
Ukuzithengisa
SELE ukulenge ukuqhub' ishishi lakho? Ngoku kufuneke uxele ihlabathi ngalo, ukwenze oku isengqondweni into yokuba umel' ukuba nenzuzo engaphezulu kwemali ozakuyichitha !
"Imveliso entsha izakudinga imali, ixesha namandla amaninzi ukuze yaziwe, ngoko kuzakufuneka kukho imali oza kuyisebenzisela ukuzithengisa," itshilo enye yengcali kwezentengiso.
Eyona ndlela ilungileyo - nefikilelelkayo - yokuzithengisa "ngumlomo" abantu bethetha ngawe kakuhle ngenxa yokwaneliseka. .
Kodwa ke, kuzakufuneka uzipapashe nangeziny' indlela.
Ungafak' intengiso kumaphepha-ndaba asekuhlaleni/okanye uzenzele amaphepha akho.
Kukho ke nokuzithengisa ngokunamathisela amaphepha ezipalini nasemigqomeni ezitalatweni. Phanda ngezi ndlela ubone ukuba uzawukwazi na ukuzihlawulela .
Ungalibali ukufaka uphawu kwindawo osebenzela kuyo - nasemotweni yakho.
Zimbini izinto ezibaluleke kakhulu - xa uzithengisa yenzela ngqo abathengi bakho okanye uyakuba umosha nje ngexesha .
Ngokunjalo, iimpawu, namaphepha ozithengisa kuwo qiniseka ukuba zenziwe ngendlela eyiyo. Iintengiso ezenziwe ngesadla ezingacacanga azizukuba nika ithemba abathengi. [x]
XA UFUNA ULWAZI OLUTHE VETSHE:
I-SEDA (Eyi-Arhente ejongene namashsisini asakhulayo) ikunika ulwazi malunga nokuqala ishishini - kuquka neenkampani ezibolikisa ngemali. Banamasebe kweli jikelele.
Batsalel' umnxeba ku: 086-010-3703; okanye 012-441-1000; email: info@seda.org.za; Web: seda.org.za.

Musa ukungxama...
Ukuba uqashiwe, musa ukuwuyeka umsebenzi de "ulinge abathengi," ngexesha lakho elisecaleni.
Umzekelo, uba ufuna ukuqala ishishini lokupheka, qala ngokuphekela amatheko empelaveki. Ukuba abantu bayaqhuba ngokufuna inkonzo yakho, kwaye kunzima noku.
NGUDOREEN NGCOBO, ongumnini weshishini lokupheka eliphumeleleyo

Banike into abayifunayo...
Xa ukhangela ikroba le ntengiso kufuneka uvula amehlo nengqondo ukuze ucingisise kakuhle ukuba ungenza ntoni na ngokubonayo !
Okubalulekileyo kukuba wazi ukuba abantu ubanika into abayifunayo hayi ocinga ukuba bayayidinga.

Ukufundis' iilwimi
Ziqeshe ngokwakho
ibali libhalwe nguGRACE KHUZWAYO
kufote uBRETT FLORENS
EMVA kokutitsha ngaphezulu kweminyak' elishumi phantsi kweSebe leMfundo naphantsi kombutho ofundisa abantwana abangaboniyo kakuhle nabaneziphene emzimbeni, uMyma Ngwenya wagqiba ekubeni aqalise ukufundisa isiZulu abantu abangasaziyo.
"Ndathi ndibuya kwikhefu ngo-2002 ndabona elo kulithuba elihle lokuba ndiziqalele elam ishishini. Andizange ndoyike ukuthabath' inyathelo elikhulu kangako kuba ndandisazi ukuba ziya kusoloko zikhona izithuba zeetitshala eziqeqeshiweyo."
UMyma walibiza ishishini lakhe ngokuba yiMuhle Training And Development kwaye kungekudala wafumana amashishini namasebe karhulumente afuna abasebenzi bawo bafundiswe ulwimi nezithethe zesiZulu.
Kungoku nje usebenzela amaziko oqeqesho iEduOptions neKZN Business Training Centre. Abafundi bakhe ngabeLungu namaNdiya ubukhulu becala, kodwa ukho nomdaka waseMelika awufundisayo.
Xa ungena kwiklasi yakhe uva intswahla yentsini nengxoxo enomdla. "Ndisoloko ndiqinisekisa ukuba konwatyiwe eklasini yam. Kaloku eyona nto ibalulekileyo lunxibelelwano olukhululekileyo xa ufundisa ulwimi. Neendlela ezintsha zokufundisa ngoku zilungiselelwe abafundi kuneetitshala.
"Kodwa esikwenzayo kungaphezulu nje kokufundisa abantu. Ezi zifundo zifuna uzilungiselele iiyure ezininzi kuba kufuneka zilandeleke lula kubafundi. Izifundo zesiZulu zenziwa iiyure ezimbini ngeveki kwaye zenziwa iiveki ezisibhozo. Siqala ngokubafundisa izinto ezilula njengamagama ezinto zasekhaya nokuthetha emnxebeni, njalo-njalo," utshilo uMyma.
Kutshanje ucelwe yiKZN Business Training Centre ukuba ayenzele izifundo zokufundisa abasebenzi indlela yokuphath' imali. "Iinkampani ezininzi zifumanise ukuba abasebenzi bazo abakwazi ukuphath' imali - bamkela namhlanje ngengomso babe bebolek' imali. Le ngxaki ke ibenza babe zizisulu zoomatshonisa."
UKUQALISA
Kufuneka ubeyititshala eqeqeshiweyo okanye ubenolwazi ngokufundisa.
Kufuneka uzithembe kwaye ube ngumntu osoloko etyhilekile xa uza kufundis' abantu abadala!
Kufuneka ukwazi ukusebenzis' ikhompyutha kwaye ubenayo. Iya kukunceda xa uzilungiselel' umsebenzi naxa uhlohla izifundo zakho.
Kufuneka usazi isiNgesi nolwimi ofuna ukulufundisa. Yiba nomonde, uhlekise kwaye uzithande izifundo ozihlohlayo.
Ukufundisa kufuna ukhuthale kwaye uzinikele. Kufuneka uchith' iiyure ezininzi uzilungiselela uqinisekise nokuba awuphelelwa ziimbono.
UKUFUMANA ABANTU OZA KUBAFUNDISA
"Bayafuneka abantu abanesakhono sokufundisa isiNgesi neziny' iilwimi zomthonyama abaza kufundisa abasebenzi beenkampani," utshilo uNicky Lillywhite noJenny McGrath abangabanini beKZN Business Training Centre. "Bonke abantu abafundisa abantu bethu banamashishini abo. Oko kubandisela amathuba emisebenzi ukuze bangemi ngento enye. Kuhle uqale ngokuzazisa kumaziko oqeqesho engingqi okuyo. Yenz' iCV nezifundo oza kuzihlohla - emva koko ufowunele kwiindawo ngeendawo."
UMVUZO ONGAWAMKELA
Kunzima ukutsho ukuba ungalindela umvuzo ongakakani kuba oko kuxhomekeke ekubeni ufundisa abantu abangakanani, ubafundisa ntoni nokuthi bafunda ixesha elingakanani. Njengesikhokelo nje xa uhlawulisa ngeyure, ungahlawulisa imali ephakathi kwe-R150 ne-R200 umntu (mhlawumbi ke nangaphezulu).
Ukuze ufuman' eziny' iingcebiso ngokuqalis' ishishini, qhagamshelana neSEDA (Small Business Development Agency - banamasebe kulo lonke eli) ku-0860-103-703 okanye ku-012-441-1000, okanye uvule iWebsite ethi: www.seda.org.za [x]
Bayafuneka abantu abanesakhono sokufundisa iilwimi zomthonyama, izithethe nesiNgesi abasebenzi beenkampani...
NGASENTLA: Ukufundisa kungumsebenzi onzima ofun' ukuzimisela...neeyure ezininzi zokuzilungiselela, utsho uMyma.
EKUNENE: "Ndisoloko ndiqinisekisa ukuba iiklasi zam zinomdla yaye ziyonwabisa," utsho uMyma.

Xa intloko ingathi IZOGQABHUKA
SONKE sibanazo iintloko ezibuhlungu kakhulu, kodwa sinako ukuzithomalalisa okanye ukuzithintela xa sicinga yaye sicwangcisa. Zimbini iindidi zeentloko ezibuhlungu, ebuhlungu ngokungephi nekuhlasela ngamandla. Intloko ebuhlungu ngokungephi yeyona ixhaphakileyo kwaye iquka...
INTLOKO EBUHLUNGU AMAXESHA NGAMAXESHA
Le yintloko ebuhlungu kakhulu ngamaxesha ngamaxesha kwaye ihambisana neziny' iimpawu ezinjengokuba nesicaphu-caphu nokungaboni kakuhle.
Ngokutsho kweHeadache Clinic, ubuhlungu busuka emithanjeni ehambis' igazi ebuchotsheni nasentlonzeni yentloko, umqala nemihlathi. Xa izihlunu zezi ndawo ziqina, imithambo " ibabuhlungu."
Olu hlobo lwentloko ungaluthintela ngokunyanga ukuqina kwezihlunu okwenza imithambo ibebuhlungu.
Ukuyinyanga: Iipilisi ezithomalalisa iingqaqambo zinganceda ezinjenge-Ibuprofen neVoltaren, ngoko linga zona kuqala. Xa zingakuncedi, gqithela kwezifumaneka ngomyalelo kagqirha ekuthiwa yitriptan. Zintlanu iindidi zetriptan ezifumaneka kweli. Xa ukhawuleze wazisebenzisa ziya kukunceda. Xa kungekho mtyhi yiya kwagqirha.
INTLOKO YOXINZELELO
Le intloko iqala ngasemva ukuba buhlungu yaye xa ikuphethe kubangathi kukho ibhanti obotshwe waqiniswa ngayo entloko. Le ke ibangelwa luxinzelelo nenkxalabo emandla.
Ukutya itshokholethi neemveliso zobisi kungakwenza ube nale ntloko, ukanti uphando lubonisa ukuba iphatha abantu abathanda ukusel' izinto ezinecaffeine njengekofu, ize ibaphathe xa bengayiselanga.
Unyango: Iipilisi ezithomalalis' iintlungu njenge-aspirin, iParacetamol okanye i-Ibuprofen iya kuyinyanga xa ingakuphathanga kakhulu. Kodwa xa ikuhlasela kabini ngeveki ithuba elingaphezulu kweentsuku ezimbini, kufuneka ufumane amayeza okuyithintela.
INTLOKO EKUTHI NKQE
Le yintloko ekuthi nkqe okwexeshana izihlandlo eziliqela ngemini kwaye ikuhlasele iinyanga eziliqela iphinde ithi shwaka. Le intloko ayixhaphakanga njengezinye kwaye ingasuswa luhlobo oluthile lokutya. Le ntloko ihlasela amadoda ikakhulu kunamabhinqa.
Unyango: Ngokutsho kweHealth24.com le ntloko iyaphela xa ikhawuleze yanyangwa. Iyayithomalalisa i-ergotamine tartrate, ukanti ungayisebenzisa netriptan.
INTLOKO YESAYINASI
Ngokutsho kweHeadache Clinic izinto ezingevaniyo nawe ezibangela "iingxaki zesayinasi" azidli ngakubangela olu hlobo lwentloko ebuhlungu. Oko ke kwenza amayeza ozithengela ngokwakho angancedi nganto.
Unyango: Ngokutsho kweHeadache Clinic kubalulekile ukufumana ukuba unentloko ngenxa yesayinasi na ngaphambi kokuba usebenzise unyango. Oko kungaxilongwa ngugqirha oyingcali yendlebe, impumlo nomqala. Unyango lwayo ke luquka ukunyangwa kosulelo lwesayinasi, ukuvula iimpumlo nokuthomalalisa iintlungu.
Unyango lwale ngxaki ludla ngokuhamba nonyango lwentsholongwane yesayinasi.
INTLOKO EYENZIWA KUKUDINWA KWAMEHLO
Le ntloko ibangelwa bubuhlungu bezihlunu ezilawula ukuhamba kwamehlo nemithambo ezizisela igazi.
Unyango: Ayibangelwa kukungaboni kakuhle. Kufuneka uxilongwe owona nobangela uze unyangwe.
UTHINTELO
Yiba nencwadana obhala kuyo iindidi zentloko ebuhlungu ukuze ikuncede ekuqondeni uhlobo lwentloko ekuphetheni wazi nokuba ibangelwa yintoni. Kuyo ungabhala uhlobo lwentloko ekuphetheyo nokuba iqale ngeliphi ixesha, ubutye ntoni, ubulele kanjani nezinto obuzenza ukuze ubenentloko.
Bhala nokuba ikuphathe ixesha elingakanani nokuba uyinyange ngantoni. Oko kuya kukunceda uyazi intloko ekuphetheyo nokuba ungayithintela njani.
Ubomi obusempilweni busoloko bunceda.
Xa ibangelwa luxinzelelo, funda ukumelana nayo ngonyango okanye umthambo wentamo. [x]
BONA XHOSA June 2008
INQAKU LEMPILO
Wonk'umntu ubanayo intloko ebuhlungu ngamaxesha athile, ukanti abanye ibahlasela ngaphezu kwabanye. Nantsi indlela yokumelana nobuhlungu bayo... Kubhale uThandi Zulu
INTLOKO EBUHLUNGU KAKHULU
Zikho iintloko eziba buhlungu kakhulu nezidla ngokuba ziimpawu zezifo ezibulalayo ezinjengebrain aneurysms (ukuceketheka kodonga komthambo wegazi ubengathi uza kugqabhuka wophele ebuchotsheni), amathumba asebuchotsheni, istrowukhu nosuleleko lobuchopho olunjengemeningitis okanye i-encephalitis.
Ngoko intloko ekuhlasela ngamandla ngequbuliso nehambisana nefiva, ukuxhuzula, ukubhideka nokushiywa ziingondo zifuna unyango olukhawulezileyo.
Ezinye ezifun' unyango olugxamisekileyo kuxa zihamba nokutshintsha emzimbeni njengokungathi uzakufa icala, ukungaboni kakuhle, ukungakwazi ukuthetha okanye ukuma nokulibala. Intloko ebuyelelayo emntwaneni nakumntu ongaphezulu kwama-50 eminyaka ifuna unyango olugxamisekileyo.

Headache Clinic: 011-484-0933 TNS Clinic: 031-904-1613
BONA XHOSA June 2008

'Urhulumente angenza ngokuthe kratya!'
Sincokole noJacob Zuma ngeenkomo, amakhosikazi, ucalulo lweentlanga - nengomso lelizwe loMzantsi Afrika
UKUFUYA iinkomo kusegazini kuJacob Zuma. Kaloku le ndedeba ingumongameli we-ANC yakhula ingumalusi weenkomo, ifundiswa nokubeth' iintonga eNkandla kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal. Iinkomo zakhe zanda zangaphaya kwe-100, kodwa loo wabulawa yimbalela.
"Yazibulala kakhulu iinkomo zam loo mbalela kuba ndashiyeka nezimalunga nama-30. Ndiza kutheng' ezinye kuba ndiyazithand' iinkomo, ndithand' ivumba lobulongwe bazo!" utshilo kwiBONA.
Kutshanje umbutho woonoteksi weKZN Taxi Owners Association uthengele uZuma eziny' iinkomo. Kubekho amarhe okuba bamthengele iinkomo ezili-18, kodwa uwakhabile loo marhe.
"Bandithengel' iinkomo ezisibhozo, baza bandixhelel' ezine," utshilo. Ukwathe eso sipho seenkomo ezine sibe negalelo ekuvuseleleni umhlambi wakhe.
Uninzi lwabantu lukholelwa ukuba imimandla ethile yaKwaZulu-Natal naseMpuma Koloni ibingahoywanga phantsi kolawulo lukaThabo Mbeki.
Le mimandla ibeke amathemba ayo kuZuma ukuba ayiphuhlise, kwaye naye uyathembisa ukuba yeyona aza kuyibeka phambili kuluhlu lwezinto aza kuzenza akuba ngumongameli weli lizwe.
Uphuhliso
"Bendisekhaya ndixoxa kutshanje kanye ngezinto ezinjalo. Abantu abawusebenzisi umhlaba. Kufuneka sizijonge ngokutsha iinkqubo zokuphuculwa kweendawo ezisemaphandleni kunye nabantu basezilalini ababaziyo ubomi basezilalini.
"Sifanele sikhuthaze abantu ukuba basebenzise umhlaba. Baninzi abantu abakulungeleyo oko kuba ukunqongophala kwamathuba emisebenzi kubenze babona umhlaba ungabakhuph' endlaleni. Ndiyakholwa urhulumente unokwenza okuthe kratya ukubanceda. Oko kubalulekile ekulweli ingxaki yentswela-ngqesho.
"Abantu basezilalini bafudukela ezidolophini kuze oko kwandise imimandla yamatyotyombe. Kufuneka sifumane iindlela zokusombulula loo ngxaki," utshilo.
UZuma uzenzel' igama ngokuba ngumxolelanisi kwilizwe laseBurundi naseKZN.
Uceba ukusebenzisa obo buchule bakhe ukuphelisa ukungavani kweentlanga ngeentlanga xa enokuba ngumongameli weli.
"Asikhange siyitshaye isaqhuma kulo mba - sazixelela ukuba izinto ziza kuzenzekela ngokwazo.
"Sinabahlali basezifama, abasebenzi nabalimi abahlala ndawonye kwaye asikhange singenelele ekwenzeni kubekho imvano phakathi kwabo."
Ukwathele ngxaki yenziwa nakukuba abantu basuka balindele izinto ezingenakwenzeka.
"Umntu ohlala efama uzixelela ukuba kwakuthiwa ukhululekile, imeko yakhe iza kutshintsha ngoko nangoko. Iimeko zoqoqosho azivumi ukuba ezo zinto zenzeke ngokukhawuleza.
"Sifanele sibe neendlela zokuqhagamshelana nabalimi. Kufuneka sibe nezivumelwano eziya kunceda iinkokeli zamacala omabini zikwazi ukuwusingatha ngendlela lo mba," utshilo.
Uthe ukholelwa ekubeni izenzo zocalulo ngobuhlanga ezenzeke kutshanje, njengeso sevidiyo yaseYunivesithi yaseFree State ziziganeko ezingenzeki rhoqo.
Impumelelo
"Ingxaki kukuba amabali empumelelo akapapashwa. Ndikhe ndadibana nabantu beentlanga ngeentlanga abazimiseleyo ngentsebenziswano.
"Inkulu inkqubela esele yenziwe kweli lizwe xa ucinga apho sisuka khona."
Kumba weZimbabwe, uZuma uthi abantu bakhona mabazisombululele ngokwabo iingxaki zabo.
"Siwenzile amatile-tile ukubanceda, asinako ukwenza ngakumbi. Abanye abakhange benze nto, bebegxeka nje qha. Thina siwadibanisile amaqela opolitiko akhona athetha. Kungoku nje bayaqala ukusibona ngokwabo isisombululo sengxaki yabo."
Usuke woma yintsini xa simbuza ngamarhe okuba uza kuthatha amanye amakhosikazi amabini, nokuba nguwuphi oyena aza kuba yinkosikazi yakhe esemthethweni xa engumongameli.
"Amajelo eendaba asoloko enditshatisa nabantu, ngoko andisayiphenduli imibuzo enjalo!"
Ingaba useza kulicula igwijo lomzabalazo elithi Umshini Wami xa sengumongameli waseMzantsi Afrika"
