OKUTSHIWO NGABAFUNDI
Xa uJacob Zuma ebangumongameli welizwe, KULUNGILE ukuba abe nesithembu"
AKULUNGANGA. Indoda ifanele ibe nenkosikazi enye. Kunzim' ukuthemb' indoda enesithembu.
KULUNGILE. Isiko liyamvumela ukuba atshate isithembu. Akanakulahla isiko lakhe ngenxa yezinto ezitshiwo ngabantu. Xa ekholelwa kwisiko lakhe makayekwe alenze nokuba ungumongameli welizwe.
AKULUNGANGA. Siya kuba nomongameli onjani onesithembu" Kule mihla ukuba nesithembu ngumthwalo onzima entlalweni nakuqoqosho.
AKULUNGANGA. Uya kuba ukhuthaza ukutshata isithembu. Umongameli ufanele abe ngumzekelo ebantwini - ingakumbi kule mihla yobhubhani weHIV/AIDS.
KULUNGILE. Kaloku ibuyambo yobu-Afrika isikhumbuza ngokubaluleka kwezithethe zethu. Abantwana abazalelwe esithenjini banesimilo, kwaye oko kubenza bakhule babe ngabantu abadala abayiqondayo imbopheleleko.

Ubomi bam emva kokuqhawula UMTSHATO
IKHAVA YETHU
BONA XHOSA July 2008
SELE ingunyaka ngoku uKB ohlukene noTerry Pinana obeliqabane lakhe leminyaka emi-6, emibini yaloo minyaka betshatile. Kuye uPinana ubekwangumhlobo osenyongweni, umanejala, iprodyusa yomculo wakhe... notata wonyana wakhe, uPhala.
Xa ubomi bakho buxhomekeke emntwini, ukwahlukana naye kungakubetha kanobom. Kodwa ke xa sijonga inzwakazi ekhazimlayo bubuhle ayiyo uKB namhlanje, kuyamangalisa ukwazi ukuba usuka kule ntlungu kwaye uphume kuyo ephumelele njengendumasi yomdlali ophambili kamabona-kude, waqwela nangokufumana imbasa yeSAMA.
"Uye ucinge ukuba awunako ukwenza into, kodwa usuke uzibone ukwimeko ekunyanzelisa ukuba ume ngeenyawo. Kulapho ke abahlobo nosapho lubaluleke khona," utsho.
U-KB ukutsho oku enyanisile kuba uye wanyanzeleka ukuba ashiye umntwana wakhe oza kugqiba iminyaka emibini akhuliswe ngumakhulu.
"Bendifuna afumane uthando losapho lokwenene. Bobabini abazali bam basaphila, uhlala nabo eMmabatho.
"Ndifuna abazi ubomi basezilalini. Kukho igadi nendawo ephangaleleyo, inja, kunye namanye amakhwenkwe aya kunye nawo esikolweni. Ngamanye amaxesha ke bayalwa!" Igama lakhe nguPhala, lithetha isixhobo somculo esivuthelwayo ngesiTswana kwaye kubonakala ngathi naye uzakuba nesiphiwo somculo njengabazali bakhe.
"UPhala uyandiculela iingoma zam emnxebeni kodwa izolo ucule eyeJoyous Celebration. Ukrele-krele - ufunda ngokukhawuleza. Uyasiqhwabela isingqi somculo kwaye uyakwazi ukulinganisa isandi samahobe," utsho.
Ukwathe akanangxaki xa ethe ekukhuleni kwakhe uPhala wafuna ukuba yimvumi.
"Kodwa loo nto akuyonto ndingayikhuthaza nakubani na. Kaloku mna ndazikhethela ukuba yimvumi, andikhethelwanga lusapho lwasekhaya okanye abahlobo - abacelanga ukuba ziindumasi bona ngoko ke ndiza kubakhusela, ndingabadibanisi nomsebenzi wam. NoPhala ke akayonxalenye yokuzithengisa kwam," utsho.
U-KB uchitha iiyure zili-12 ngemini eJozi, iintsuku ezintlanu evekini edlala kwiRhythm City.
"Kuyanceda kubekho into ekuhambela kakuhle xa kukho engakuhambeli kakuhle - ifana neleli ekukhupha entlungwini. IRhythm City yaba yintsikelelo. Ndiyakuthanda ukuba yinxalenye yento entsha kwaye indinike umsebenzi weeyure ezili-12 ngemini.
"Ndiqale ndisoyika kuba ndingumdlali ophambili kwixesha elithandwayo u-6.30 ngokratya. Kodwa ngoku ndiyazithemba kuba ndinolwazi olwaneleyo. Ndiyayiqonda, indawo akuyo uLucilla nalapho aya khona.
"Kodwa mna ndiqhubeka nobomi andifani naye oman' ukubuy' umva - undenza ndizibuze ukuba 'Kazi ngekunjani"'"
Uqale ubomi obutsha ngokufudukela endaweni eyeyakhe, indlu yodidi eseMorningside eneendonga ezintle ezikhrim, ezihonjiswe ngo-orenji. KwiiDVD anazo kukho umculo okusukela kokaJay-Z, uLauryn Hill no-2-Pac ukuya kuRingo noMbongeni Ngema.
"Bendiyidinga indawo eyeyam kodwa ke ndikwakufutshane nombindi wommandla woshishino. Kukho abantu endifuna ukudibana nabo neminyango endifuna ukunkqonkqoza kuyo.
"Ngoku ndizibambele ngokwam ulawulo lwemali yam," utsho, emva kokuba yena, uTerry nogxa wabo uKing Beatmaker Mathemo beyivalile inkampani yomculo ebebeyiqhuba kunye. "Eli shishini likhula ngokucotha kodwa ndinezicwangciso ezikhulu!"
Angakuthanda ukuba noluhlu lweempahla nezihombo ezibizwa ngoKB nokubona iimvumi zeli ezingamabhinqa zisenza njengeemvumi ezingamadoda, zicula kunye amaculo, zizimisela ngokudanisa, zilungisa iinwele ziphucula nezinxibo esele zithandwa kakade ngabalandeli.
U-KB akanangxaki nokudibanisa umsebenzi nolonwabo.
"Abazali bam banendlu ekufutshane neSun City ngoko ndiphumla khona phambi komsitho weeSAMA ukuze ndivuke ndizilungele."
Uyakuthanda ukugoduka. Maxa wambi uhamba ngomnyobo weBMW yakhe emnyama okanye ahambe ngenqwelo-ntaka, kabini ngenyanga.
"Umama walizwa ngabantwana aba-6 ngoku uthi lixesha lakhe lokuphumla. Ngoko xa ndigodukile, ndiyakonwabela ukupheka ndicoce ndiphumze abazali bam.
"Ukuhlala kwam eRhawutini kundibonise ukubaluleka kwabazali ebomini bam, ndiyababulela badlal' indima enkulu ebomini bam. Bayandikhuthaza kakhulu.
"Bakwazile ukuzakhela imizi emibini bengadingi nto kum. Kodwa basoloko bethandazela ukuba uyaphumelela kangangokuba ukuqinisekisa ukuba uyaphumelela sisipho esihle nakuwuphi na umzali." [x]
Ukulahlekelwa kukaKB kumenze wakhula. Kubhale uPatricia McCracken
Kufote u-Ivan Naude; iinwele nolungiso-buso nguFaith Seuoe; isinxibo nguMarina Walsh; umlungiseleli nguPatricia McCracken; ilokhwe: YDE; iibhutsi: Woolworths; amacici: Ruby In The Dust
BONA XHOSA July 2008
Amagama kaKB ama-5 okumelana nokuqhawuka komtshato
1. Ukwamkela: "Ukufikelela kwakho kwesi sigqibo suke sekukudala usazi ukuba kufanele kube nje."
2. Vula umtyhi: "Mna noTerry sohlukene ngokupheleleyo. Sibonana xa kunyanzelekile kuphela."
3. Ubuntu: "Ndisafuna ukumhlonipha, ingakumbi kuba unguyise wonyana wam."
4. Zibambe: "Ndinezimvo zam nam ngonobangela wokwenzekileyo kodwa andizithethi kuba andifuni abantu bathathe icala."
5. Ikamva: "Zibulele izinto ezintle ebomini bakho nezinto onazo nozilindeleyo."

Kuphunyezwe umthetho omtsha olawula izitovu zeparafini kodwa ezi zitovu zisenobungozi kwaye zibulala abantu zitshabalalise namakhaya abo kuMzantsi Afrika uphela. Naku okungakusindisa...
BONA XHOSA - September 2007
Uphando lweBONA
Nqanda amadangatye oyikisayo
KUFANELE ukuba kube ngunyaka wolonwabo kwabo bakwiphulo lokhuseleko lokusebenzisa izitovu zeparafini. Ngowoku-1 kuJanuwari walo nyaka ziyekisiwe ukuthengiswa izitovu zeparafini ezinobungozi - emva kweminyaka emine iBONA yaveza ubungozi bazo.
Kungani phofu sisaqhubeka nokuva amabali okutsha kwabantu ngenxa yemililo" Kungani kusekho iingxelo zokuba iintsapho ezingama-100 000 zilahlekelwa yinto yonke ezinayo ngenxa yamadangatye omlilo atshabalalisa amakhaya azo"
Kungokuba umthetho okhusela abantu awukwazi ukugxininiswa ngenxa yokuba unabahloli ababini kuphela abajongene nelizwe liphela abahlola ukusebenza kwalo mthetho. ISebe leZimbiwa naMandla lathi alinawo umthetho olawula ukusetyenziswa kwezinto zamandla neparafini emakhaya.
"Nangona ingaphaya kweshumi iminyaka sikhululekile, abantu abasebenzisa izitovu zeparafini emakhaya abaqikelelwa kwizigidi ezili-18 abakalixhamli ilungelo labo lokuhlala kwindawo engenabungozi nekhusela impilo yabo," utsho uPatrick Kulati weParaffin Safety Association (PSA).
"Iparafini iluncedo emakhaya kwaye iyafikeleleka kodwa iilitha zayo ezingama-700 ezigidi ezithengiswayo ngonyaka kweli zithengiswa, zigcinwe kwaye zisetyenziswe ngeendlela ezinxamnye nempilo entle kubemi beli."
UVimba weLizwe (iNational Treasury) uyithelekelela kwi-R104 yeebhiliyoni ngonyaka imali echithwa xa kulungiswa umonakalo owenziwe yimililo yezitovu zeparafini - ukucinywa kwemililo, ukunyangwa kwabatshileyo, ukugcinwa nokwakhelwa kwabo ngokutsha. Le mali iphindwe izihlandlo ezingama-50 kunaleyo yenziwa ngokuthengiswa kwezi zitovu ezizigidi ezi-2 zeerandi.
Ingxaki yokucima kombane kwiindawo ezininzi zeli inyanzelisa abantu ukuba basebenzise iparafini. Ukuze usapho lwakho lukhuseleke vavanya ubungozi bezi zitovu uze ubone indlela eningasinda ngayo.
Ziyimfuneko
UBUNGOZI 1: Kunyanzelekile ukuba ndibe naso isitovu separafini ngenxa yokucima kombane nexabiso lawo.
Umbane ubukade ufikelela kakuhle kubemi beli. Phakathi kuka-1994 no-2001 linyuke ukusuka kwi-34 phesenti ukuya kwi-70 phesenti inani labantu abanombane. Kuncede nangakumbi ukuziswa kwenkonzo yombane wasimahla ebantwini ngo-2003.
Kodwa ngoku uEskom akakwazi ukuvelisa umbane owaneleyo njengoko sibonile umbane umana ucima. Usihlalo wakwaEskom uValli Moosa uyavuma ukuba le meko iya kuphucuka ngo-2013 xa amaziko amandla amatsha eqala ukusebenza.
Loo nto iza kutya imali eqikelelwa kwiibhiliyoni ezili-R150 kwaye uEskom unethemba lokuba loo mali uza kuyifumana ngokonyusa ixabiso lombane.
Abantu babuyela kwizitovu zeparafini ababecinga ukuba bohlukene nazo khon' ukuze bangalali bengatyanga ngenxa yokucima kombane.
"Zizigidi ezili-18 zabantu abasebenzisa izitovu zeparafini kweli - elo nani phantse isiqingatha sabemi beli.
"Abantu abaninzi basesichengeni sokuqhushumbiswa yimililo yezitovu zeparafini abazisebenzisayo nezingekho mthethweni," utsho uKulati.
OMAWUKWENZE: Ungaze ubeke isitovu separafini phezu kwesitovu sombane, ungazisondelanisi izinto zeparafini nezombane. Kaloku xa kumka umbane izinto zombane zishiywa zingacinywanga uze uthi xa sele ubuya zitshise nto leyo ingabangela umlilo.
Ukuthenga isitovu esitsha
UBUNGOZI 2: Ndiza kutheng' isitovu esitsha separafini.
Uyaphazama xa ucinga ukuba izitovu zeparafini sele zikhuselekile!
Ngethuba sibhala eli nqaku luhlobo olunye kuphela lwezitovu ezikhuselekileyo olwenziwe lwaza lwaphunyezwa ukuze luthengiswe kweli lo gama ezinye ezili-10 zisavavanywa ukanti esinye sezicelo siphunyeziwe ngokutsho kukamanejala omkhulu wokulungiswa kwezinto neekhemikhali kwiSABS, uThomas Madzivhe.
Kodwa aph' ebusika izitovu ezinobungozi bezithengiswa yonk' indawo.
Kaloku iinkampani ezivelisa ezi zitovu zinobungozi aziyekanga ukuthengisa ezi zitovu. Eli shishini alifani neleemoto kuba kulo abantu abathenge iimoto ezinengxaki bayayalelwa ukuba bazibuyise zizolungiswa.
NgoMatshi uMoses Moeletsi oligosa eliphezulu kwiSA Bureau Of Standards Regulatory walumkisa abavelisi nabathengisi bezitovu ezinobungozi ukuba bazirhoxise. Iinkampani ezoyisakalayo wazoyikisa ngokuba ziza kuba sengxakini.
I-SABS ayinawo amandla aneleyo kuba inabahloli ababini kuphela abajongene nelizwe lonke, ngokutsho kukaMadzivhe.
Ekuqaleni konyaka abavelisi bezi zitovu bebexelela oosomashishini ukuba iSebe loRhwebo noShishino libanike iimvume yokuthengisa ezi zitovu. UMadzivha uthi ngelo xesha kwakungekho nesinye isitovu ebesiphunyeziwe phantsi komthetho omtsha.
OMAWUKWENZE: Sebenzisa ezi ngcebiso zePSA xa uthenga isitovu esitsha separafini:
Jonga ukuba sisemthethweni na kwanokuba sinayo na ilayisenisi yeSABS - jonga ikhowudi ethi SANS 1906:2006.
Ungasithengi isitovu ongakwaziyo ukusisebenzisa. Cela umncedisi wasevenkileni akubonise ukuba sisetyenziswa njani na kwanokuba silayitwa phi.
Ungasithengi isitovu esingenayo imigaqo yokusebenza nokhuseleko ecacileyo.
Ungasithengi isitovu esakhiwe ngezinto ezithambileyo nezophuka lula.
Ungasithengi xa singabhalwanga iinkcukacha zokuqhagamshelana nomvelisi waso kwibhokisi.
Izitovu ezivela ngaphaya kwemida yeli
UBUNGOZI 3: Zizitovu ezivela ngaphaya kwemida yeli ezithengiswayo.
Kwaba yinto entle ukuyeka kweefektri zeli ukuvelisa izitovu zePanda neHippo. Zazihambisana nomthetho omtsha kuba zaziyinxalenye yokuqulunqwa kwawo, utsho uMadzivha. Ezinye zavakalisa ukuba azikulungelanga ukuguqula indlela ezivelisa ngayo.
Loo nto yakhokelela ekubeni zinqongophale izitovu nto leyo yenze ukuba ziqhubeke nokuzivelisa ezi nkampani kunye neenkampani zangaphandle, ngokutsho kukaGqr. Philip Lloyd weEnergy Research Centre eUCT. UGqr. Lloyd uthi iSA Customs & Excise yayingenalwazi ngalo mthetho mtsha wokulawulwa kokuveliswa kwezitovu.
"Kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba iSebe loRhwebo noShishino lenzele iCustoms & Excise iincwadi ezicacisa ngalo mthetho ukuze bazi ukuba kufanele benze ntoni na ukuthintela ukungeniswa kwezi zitovu ezivela ngaphandle kweli. Loo nto iqale ukwenzeka ngoJulayi," utsho uGqr Lloyd.
Akwaziwa ukuba zingaphi izitovu ezinobungozi ezingene kweli.
OMAWUKWENZE: Izitovu ezivela ngaphaya kwemida yeli kufuneka zihambisane nomthetho omtsha weli ngoko ke sebenzisa imigaqo yePSA oyinikiweyo xa uzithenga uze ukhumbule ukuba: xa uthenga esivela ngaphaya kemida yeli, thenga esineenkcukacha zoqhagamshelwano ze-arhente yeli okanye zenkampani ezithengisayo elapha eMzantsi Afrika.
Kaloku xa ubanengxaki uza kuncedwa ngumntu okufutshane.
Iprayima
UBUNGOZI 4: Ucinga ukuba iprayima ikhuselekile"
Uninzi lwabantu luthenga izitovu zeparafini ezifikelelekayo - ziyi-R30 lo gama iprayima iyi-R100. Izitovu zeparafini zipheka ngomlilo ophantsi kuneprayima, ngokutsho kukaPatrick Kuleni wePSA.
Iiprayima zona ziyampontshwa ngaphambi kokuba zilayitwe kodwa zibhetele kuba zipheka ngamandla ngeparafini elinganayo naleyo isetyenziswa zizitovu zeparafini. Enye into eyenza zikhuseleke bhetele iiprayima kungokuba awukwazi ukugalela iparafini kuzo xa zivutha.
Okwangoku lo mthetho mtsha ulawula ukusebenza kwezitovu zeparafini kuphela, imithetho elawula iiprayima isaqulunqwa. Kufuneka ukhethe ngononophelo xa ukhetha isitovu oza kusisebenzisa.
OMAWUKWENZE: I-PSA icebisa ngelithi kufuneka ujonge ezi mpawu zilandelayo kwisitovu separafini okanye kwiprayima okanye isifudumezi separafini:
Xa siwile siyazicima.
Sakhiwe ngento eyomeleleyo nezinzileyo ukuze singawi lula.
Sinento exelayo xa iparafini izele okanye iphelile
Sinemigaqo ecacileyo yokusisebenzisa
Ukudlala ngomlilo
UBUNGOZI 5: Ungxamile.
"Ndiyazincama ndiyigalele iparafini ngoku sivuthayo isitovu kodwa umlilo ube uphantsi," utsho umama waseMlazi kwingcali yophando yeHSRC uSibongile Mafu.
Abanye oomama bathe bona bagalela amanzi ukuze lizale itanki leparafini okanye basihlukuhle isitovu ukuze sivuthe noxa iparafini sele iphelile khon' ukuze kuvuthwe ukutya abakuphekileyo.
Khumbula ukuba xa usebenzisa iparafini usebenzisa into efanayo naleyo isetyenziswa kwiinqwelo-ntaka kuba ivutha ngokukhawuleza kubushushu obuyi-43oC - nto leyo yenza izitovu zeparafini zibe ngathi ziziqhushumbisi emakhaya.
Ukwakhiwa kwezitovu zeparafini ezizinzileyo neziyigcinayo iparafini ingachitheki xa ziwile zizinto ezimbini ezibalulekileyo kulo mthetho ulawula ukusebenza kwezitovu zeparafini.
Mhlawumbi kungaba nzima ukuba ubakhusele ngokukuko lo mthetho xa ezi zitovu zakhiwe ngeentsimbi ezigobayo xa zisetyenziswa nzima ixesha elide.
OMAWUKWENZE: Qinisekisa ukuba wonk' umntu osebenzisa isitovu separafini ekhaya usisebenzisa ngendlela ekhuselekileyo:
Isitovu sibeke endaweni ezinzileyo ungabeki ilaphu ngaphantsi kwaso elingatsaleka size siwe isitovu.
Ngaphambi kokuqalis' ukupheka qinisekisa ukuba izithako unazo zonke. Xa kukho into oyifunayo yithenge ngaphambi kokuba usilayite isitovu.
Yizalise itanki xa sele iphelile okanye incinci iparafini ngaphambi kokusilayita isitovu. Xa iphela usaphekile, yisuse imbiza yakho uyisonge ngetawuli ukuze igcine ubushushu, cima isitovu uze usigalele iparafini. Silayite uqhubeke nokupheka.
Abantwana mabangasondeli esitovini esilayitiweyo. [x]

Uzithengela
isigwebo sentambo
UZINHLE Mahlaba akazange akholwe xa edibana nebhinqa angalaziyo lathi kuye: "Ndiyazi sisi wam uyazifuna ezi pilisi." Latsho lincumile laza lasondela kuZinhle lamwola.
"Ndaziva ndonwabile ngaphakathi. Kaloku ndandineenyanga ezine ndifakwe kuluhlu lwabantu abalindele iipilisi ezithomalalisa ulwamvila lukagawulayo (iiARV), suka kwathi gqi lo sisi wayendinika uncedo olukhawulezayo lokuzithenga," utsho uZinhle. Ukuthenga ezi pilisi emntwini kufana nokutheng' impahla ebiweyo kwaye oko kukwenza ube nesandla kulwaphulo-mthetho - ukanti kuthiwa zithengwa ngabantu abaneHIV/AIDS eMpuma Koloni naseMpumalanga.
Babeka ubomi babo esichengeni ngokuzithenga ngemali efikelela kwi-R200 benethemba lokuba ziza kubanceda.
Kaloku xa uzithenga ngondlela-mnyama uthenga ezo zikhoyo ngelo xesha xa unemali, ukanti iiARV ezisemthethweni uzinikwa simahla kwaye uyaqeqeshwa ukuba uzisebenzise ngendlela ethile elungele wena.
Kutheni ulindiswa nje"
"Ndakhe ndacinga okomzuzwana ukuba ndingumama ofanele akhulise unyana oneminyaka emihlanu nentombi eneminyak' emithathu," utshilo uZinhle waseMpumalanga.
"Umsakwethu ungumongikazi eJozi kwaye uyazama ukundikhuthaza. Kodwa ndandizibuza ukuba ndiya kuze ndizifumane ndisaphila na ezo pilisi xa ndisiva ukuba bangama-35 000 abantu abakuluhlu olulinde iiARV.
"Ndiyazi ukuba bakho abantu abaphelelwe ngumonde njengam. Ndeva nasezindabeni ukuba kukho abantu abasuka lee eGraaff-Reinet baye eBhayi bafike baqeshe ematyotyombeni kuba befuna ukufakwa kuluhlu lweeARV khona. Uphinde uve uSekela-Mphathiswa wezeMpilo esithi kukunyhashwa kwamalungelo ethu oluntu ukungazifumani iiARV - uze uzibuze ukuba wenza ntoni ukulungisa loo nto."
Nangona kunjalo zimbini izinto ezenza uZinhle waqhubeka nokulinda.
"Xa ndingaya eNelspruit ukuze ndikhawuleze ndizifumane iiARV bekuza kundenza ndishiye abantwana bam bodwa," utsho.
Eny' into eyamenza walinda sisilumkiso asinikwa ngumsakwabo.
"Abantu bebemcela ukuba anyuse amagama abo eluhlwini lokulinda okanye abathengisele iipilisi. Wala ukwenza oko kuba esithi kukho abantu abaziyo abaswelekayo ababetheng' iiARV ngondlela-mnyama. Uthi abo bantu babulawa kukungazisebenzisi ngendlela iipilisi, ababulawanga kukuba zingasebenzi."
Oko kungqinwe nanguVuyiseka Dubula weTreatment Action Campaign.
"Kufuneka ukuqeqeshelwe ukusebenzisa iiARV. Kaloku zona azifani neepilisi ozisebenzisa nje okwethutyana, uzisebenzisa ubomi bakho bonke. Olo qeqesho ke aluthabathi iyure okanye imini enye.
"Uya kaninzi kwiziko lempilo elikuqeqeshayo isithuba seeveki ezintathu okanye ezine.
"Ufundiswa ngoncedo neengozi zazo, indlela yokubona ukuba umzimba wakho uzamkela njani, nokuba ufanele ulufune nini uncedo. Umntu okuthengisela zona ke ngondlela-mnyama akanalo ixesha lokukufundisa ezo zinto zibalulekileyo."
Iipilisi ezinyangayo
"Xa ukwinkqubo esemthethweni yokusebenzisa iiARV uba yinxalenye yeqela elinika inkxaso kwaye uyazi ukuba ufanele uqhagamshelane nabani xa unengxaki. Kungaba yintloko engaqhelekanga ebuhlungu, isisu esihambisayo esingapheliyo, okanye nayiphi na ingulo," utsho uDubula.
"Umntu okuthengisele iipilisi ke umfumanaphi xa unengxaki".
"Xa uyolanda ezinye eklinikhi, uyaxilongwa ukuze kubonwe ukuba ziyakunceda na, ukuze xa zingakuncedi zitshintshwe.
"Umntu ke ofun' ukwenz' imali akazenzi ezo zinto kwaye kubalulekile ukwazi ukuba iiARV ozisebenzisayo ziyakusebenzela na okanye azikusebenzeli."
"Amajoni omzimba ayayeka ukusebenza xa abantu beneCD4 ephantsi egazini labo," utsho uGqr. Gillian Tarr weAIDS Care, Training & Support Community Clinic eWhite River okhathazekileyo ngokuthengiswa nokuthengwa kweeARV.
"Ukuqalisa ukusebenzisa iiARV kuvuselela amajoni omzimba kugxothe nezifo ezisemzimbeni wakho njengeTB negcushuwa. Yiloo nto kubalulekile ukuba abantu abazisebenzisayo basoloko bephantsi kweliso kuba ezo zifo zifanele zinyangwe ngokukhawuleza," utsho uGqr. Tarr.
"Xa uzisebenzisa ngendlela iiARV ozinikiweyo ziyenza iHIV/AIDS ibe sisifo esilawulekayo njengesifo seswekile."
UVuyiseka uyibethelele into yokuba "iiARV ezisetyenziswa ngomnye umntu azisebenzi komnye". Imeko yomntu ngamnye kufuneka iqwalaselwe ngunompilo kuba ubukhulu bomzimba wakhe buya kuchaza ukuba iipilisi aziselayo azininzanga na zize zimbangele ezinye iingxaki.
Iipilisi ezibulalayo
Kukho uloyiko lokuba kuza kugqibela kukho iHIV engeva yeza njengeTB.
"Yiloo nto kufuneka ungaphosi nolunye usuku ungazisebenzisi iiARV kuba uziva ungamnandanga okanye kuba unesicaphu-caphu," utsho uVuyiseka.
Ukwathe ukuphelelwa zezi pilisi abe engekho umntu ozithenga kuye okanye kuba ungenamali yokuzithenga kuba neziphumo ezifanayo ezibi.
"Xa uvumela le ntsholongwane ingeva yeza, iipilisi azisebenzi - uze usweleke" utsho.
Oko ke kuya kuthetha ukuba uthe uyazinceda ngokuzithengel' iipilisi kanti uzibizel' ukufa, uze ubengomnye wezigidi ezibini eMzantsi Afrika ezibulewe ngugawulayo.
Ingxaki yoMzantsi Afrika kukuba okwangoku kukho iindidi ezimbini zeeARV ezikhetha kuzo iiklinikhi xa zizinika abantu. Kukho ezibizwa ngoLine 1 nezibizwa ngoLine 2 ozinikwa xa kubonakala ngathi le ntsholongwane ayiva yeza kuwe.
"Sisalwa nokuba kubekho uLine 3. Yiloo nto sizama ukugcina abantu kuLine 1 ixesha elide kangangoko sinako," utsho uVuyiseka.
Le ngxaki ifun' intsebenziswano yomntu wonke - mazingathengwa iiARV ngondlela-mnyama, abazinikwe eklinikhi mabazisebenzise ngendlela. [x]
Igama likaZinhle litshintshiwe kweli bali. Usandul' ukuqala ukusebenzisa iiARV ngokusemthethweni emva kokulind' iinyanga ezintlanu.
BONA XHOSA - July 2007

Kukho abazitshayayo
Ngaphaya kweengxelo zokubiwa kweeARV ezibhedlele zikarhulumente zithengiselwe abantu, ngoku kuvakala namanyala okuba ziyaphangwa zizihange zizitshaye!
"Kuthiwa izihange zive ukuba ezinye zezinto ezibangelwa zezi pilisi kukuba ziyakuqhunywa yaye ube namaphupha amabi," utsho uPhillip Mokoena, ongumnxulumanisi weTAC eKZN nophanda ngezi zityholo kweli phondo.
"Xa abantu bengakwazi ukusebenzisa iyeza ngendlela yabo, bayakwenza oko. Kodwa bafanele bakhumbule ukuba babeka ubomi babo esichengeni kuba la machiza anokungabasebenzeli xa sekufuneka bawasebenzise," utsho uGqr. Gillian Tarr weACTS Clinic.
"Ngubani owaziyo ukuba aya kubanxilisa bona" Kaloku akenzi into efanayo kumntu wonke.
"Ngaphezulu ezi zihange zibevisa iintlungu abantu abagulayo kwaye ziphazamisa nonyango lwabo. Zinto ezo zingaxolelekiyo."
t
BONA XHOSA - July 2007
Ukusebenzisa iiARV ungafundiswanga ngazo kwenza iHIV ingeva yeza
Ukulwa nabathengisi beepilisi
"Ukuba iiARV uzithengise kunxamnye nomthetho nobuntu," utsho uAdila Hassim oyintloko yecandelo lomthetho leAIDS Law Project eseJohannesburg.
Uthi kukunqongophala kwezi pilisi okwenza abantu abanyolukileyo bazithengise. Ukukhutshwa kweeARV kwaqala ngesantya solovane ngo-2004 kwaye uthi nesicwangciso se-2007-2011 Plan asibonakali siza kunceda. Kuza kufuneka senziwe sisebenze ukuze sincede abantu abaneAIDS kweli - inani labantu abalinde la machiza linyuke ngokuphindwe kabini laya kutsho kuma-70 000 ukususela ngo-2000 kwaye kulindeleke ukuba linyuke ngokuphindwe kabini ngo-2010.
"Ukwandisa amaziko empilo akhupha iiARV lelona cebo liya kunqanda ukubiwa kwazo. Kululwaphulo-mthetho ukuziba nakubeni abazibayo besithi banceda abantu," utsho uAdila.
"Xa utheng' amayeza emntwini ongakuqeqeshelwanga ukukhupha amayeza abe engakubeki phantsi kwengqwalasela nendlela owasebenzisa ngayo, oko kubeka esichengeni impilo yakho neyabany' abantu. Oko kungayenza intsholongwane ingeva yeza ize ibe yingozi nangakumbi.
"Xa kukho unompilo okuthengisela iiARV, mxele eklinikhi okanye kwisibhedlele axelenga kuso. Xa uzithengiselwa ngumntu ongamaziyo, mxele emapoliseni. Masingakuvumeli oku kuqhubeke kuba kuyingozi kuluntu nakwilizwe ngokubanzi."
' Xa unemibuzo ngeeARV, qhagamshelana nabakwa:

NOKUBA ngumbono omhle kangakanani na nawo ufuna usebenze nzima ngokuzinikela ukuze ubelishishini elinempumelelo. Kweli nqaku leBONA elilodwa siza kucathula nawe kula manyathelo. Ngala...
Ubuqu bakho - zazi ukuba unakho.
Izinto omawuzijonge - ezona zinto ziyimfuneko ekumele uziqwalasele phambi kokuqala.
Ukubona ikroba - fumanisa ukuba yiyiphi imveliso okanye inkonzo eyimfuneko ekuhlaleni.
Ukuzipapasha - ukulithengisa ishishini lakho.
Ingaba unakho?
U MELWE kukunyaniseka ngenene apha. Usenokuba ubabonile abanye oosomashishini bebekwa kwiindawo ezingaphezu kwamandla abo. Ngoku nguwe omawuthengiswe kwaye eli thuba lelokuba uzibuze ukuba ingaba ukulungele na ukuqhuba ishishini elilelakho. Unakho ke...
UTHANDO!
Kufuneka uyithande into oyenzayo ingabi yindlela yokwenza imali nje kuphela.
SUKUSOLOKO UPHUPHA!
Yazi ukuba impumelelo ayizuvele iwe okwemana evela ezulwini.
SEBENZA NZIMA!
Ziyanda iiyure ozisebenzayo xa uziphethe. Kwazi ukuzilawula. Uyalingeka xa kungekho mphathi ukujongileyo, ufune ukuvuka nokuthatha ikhefu ngexesha olithandayo - kodwa ufanel' usebenze ngokwexesha elibekiweyo.
UKUMELANA NEEMEKO!
Yiba nako ukutshintsha izicwangciso xa izinto zingahambi ngendlela - ukwazi nokubuyela ezingqondweni kwakhona!
YIBA NOKUYILA!
Fumana iindlela ezikrele-krele zokuthengisa izakhono zakho okanye iimveliso.
GCINA UMGANGATHO!
Kwazi ukubaluleka kokunika inkonzo esemgangathweni ngalo lonke ixesha, njengokuhoya abathengi bakho emva kokuba ubathengisele.
Ukuzithengisa
SELE ukulungele ukuqhub' ishishini lakho? Ngoku kufuneka uxelele ilizwe ngalo, ukwenze oku isengqondweni into yokuba umel' ukuba nenzuzo engaphezulu kwemali oza kuyichitha!
"Imveliso entsha ifun' imali, ixesha namandla amaninzi ukuze yaziwe, ngoko kuza kufuneka kubekho imali oza kuyisebenzisela ukuzithengisa," itshilo enye yeengcali kwezentengiso.
Eyona ndlela ilungileyo - nefikelelekayo - yokuzithengisa "ngumlomo" abantu bathethe kakuhle ngawe ngenxa yokwaneliseka.
Kodwa ke, kuza kufuneka uzipapashe nangeziny' iindlela.
Ungafak' intengiso kumaphepha-ndaba asekuhlaleni/okanye uzenzele amaphepha akho.
Kukho ke nokuzithengisa ngokuncamathisela amaphepha ezipalini nasemigqomeni esezitratweni. Phanda ngezi ndlela ubone ukuba uzokwazi na ukuzihlawulela.
Ungalibali ukufaka uphawu kwindawo osebenzela kuyo - nasemotweni yakho.
Zimbini izinto ezibaluleke kakhulu - xa uzithengisa yenzela ngqo abathengi bakho okanye uyakuba umosha nje ngexesha.
Kananjalo, iimpawu namaphepha ozithengisa kuwo qiniseka ukuba zenziwe ngendlela eyiyo. Iintengiso ezenziwe ngesadla ezingacacanga azizukubanika ithemba abathengi.

Musa ukungxama...
Ukuba uqeshiwe, musa ukuwuyeka umsebenzi de "ulinge abathengi," ngexesha lakho elisecaleni.
Umzekelo, ukuba ufuna ukuqala ishishini lokupheka, qala ngokuphekela amatheko empelaveki. Ukuba abantu bayaqhuba ngokufuna inkonzo yakho, kwaye kunzima nokujongana nezicelo, umbono wakho ungawujika ube lishishini.

Ukubon' ikroba
LUMKA! Ukuba ubona kukho imfuneko yemveliso/inkonzo ethile, yima kancinci, utsho uFran Piggott, ongumcebisi woosomashishini abasakhasayo.
"Zibuze ukuba kutheni iyimfuneko?
"Ukuba ngumbono omhle, kutheni ungasetyenziswa?"
Kwelinye icala, ukuba khukho abantu abenza into enye nale uyenzayo, yinto entle leyo.
Luyafuneka ukhuphiswano, loo nto ayikugcini uphaphamile nje kuphela kodwa iyakwazisa ukuba bakho abathengi bemveliso yakho.
Indlela elula yokubona imfuneko yemveliso kukujonga ingxaki exhaphakileyo uze wenze imveliso apho ishishini lakho liza kuba sisisombululo. Ngokwenza njalo uyakuphumelela.
Uzibona kanjani ezi ngxaki? Mamela izikhalazo zabantu.
Bakhalazela ntoni? Ungakwazi ukubanceda?

akukho sizathu esenza ukuba ishishini

Unazo izinto eziyimfuneko?
PHAMBI kokuba uqale ishishini lakho zikho izinto omawuziqaphele. Ezi zezi...
IMALI
Uza kudinga imali ezakukwazi ukukuthwala wena neshishini lakho iinyanga ezi-6 ukuya enyakeni, kwaye loo mali ixhomekeke kuhlobo lweshishini onalo. Khumbula - noxa kuza kube kumnandi ukungabi namphathi - yazi ukuba ngoku akukho mphathi uza kukuhlawula ukuphela kwenyanga.
INDAWO YOKUSEBENZELA
Indawo osebenzela kuyo mayibonakale kuyindawo yomsebenzi. Ukuba usebenzela ekhaya qiniseka ukuba i-ofisi yakho ikude nengxolo yosapho.
IZIXHOBO ZOKUSEBENZA
Ambalwa amashishini asebenza ngaphandle koncedo lwekhompyutha. Kuhle ukuba i-ofisi yakho ibe
nekhompyutha, iprinta, ifeksi ne-Intanethi kunye ke nezixhobo zokuvelisa loo nto uzakube ushishina ngayo.
IZAKHONO
Kuhle xa unezakhono eziliqela. Cinga ngokwenza izifundo zezakhono kwezoshishino, eziquka indlela yokwenza iincwadi nokuzithengisa.

Ziyanda iiyure ozisebenzayo xa uziphethe. Kwazi ukuzilawula. Uyalingeka xa kungekho mphathi ukujongileyo, ufune ukuvuka nokuthatha ikhefu ngexesha olithandayo - kodwa ufanel' usebenze ngokwexesha elibekiweyo.
UKUMELANA NEEMEKO!
Yiba nako ukutshintsha izicwangciso xa izinto zingahambi ngendlela - ukwazi nokubuyela ezingqondweni kwakhona!
YIBA NOKUYILA!
Fumana iindlela ezikrele-krele zokuthengisa izakhono zakho okanye iimveliso.
GCINA UMGANGATHO!
Kwazi ukubaluleka kokunika inkonzo esemgangathweni ngalo lonke ixesha, njengokuhoya abathengi bakho emva kokuba ubathengisele.
Ukuzithengisa
SELE ukulungele ukuqhub' ishishini lakho? Ngoku kufuneka uxelele ilizwe ngalo, ukwenze oku isengqondweni into yokuba umel' ukuba nenzuzo engaphezulu kwemali oza kuyichitha!
"Imveliso entsha ifun' imali, ixesha namandla amaninzi ukuze yaziwe, ngoko kuza kufuneka kubekho imali oza kuyisebenzisela ukuzithengisa," itshilo enye yeengcali kwezentengiso.
Eyona ndlela ilungileyo - nefikelelekayo - yokuzithengisa "ngumlomo" abantu bathethe kakuhle ngawe ngenxa yokwaneliseka.
Kodwa ke, kuza kufuneka uzipapashe nangeziny' iindlela.
Ungafak' intengiso kumaphepha-ndaba asekuhlaleni/okanye uzenzele amaphepha akho.
Kukho ke nokuzithengisa ngokuncamathisela amaphepha ezipalini nasemigqomeni esezitratweni. Phanda ngezi ndlela ubone ukuba uzokwazi na ukuzihlawulela.
Ungalibali ukufaka uphawu kwindawo osebenzela kuyo - nasemotweni yakho.
Zimbini izinto ezibaluleke kakhulu - xa uzithengisa yenzela ngqo abathengi bakho okanye uyakuba umosha nje ngexesha.
Kananjalo, iimpawu namaphepha ozithengisa kuwo qiniseka ukuba zenziwe ngendlela eyiyo. Iintengiso ezenziwe ngesadla ezingacacanga azizukubanika ithemba abathengi.

LUMKA! Ukuba ubona kukho imfuneko yemveliso/inkonzo ethile, yima kancinci, utsho uFran Piggott, ongumcebisi woosomashishini abasakhasayo.
"Zibuze ukuba kutheni iyimfuneko?
"Ukuba ngumbono omhle, kutheni ungasetyenziswa?"
Kwelinye icala, ukuba khukho abantu abenza into enye nale uyenzayo, yinto entle leyo.
Luyafuneka ukhuphiswano, loo nto ayikugcini uphaphamile nje kuphela kodwa iyakwazisa ukuba bakho abathengi bemveliso yakho.
Indlela elula yokubona imfuneko yemveliso kukujonga ingxaki exhaphakileyo uze wenze imveliso apho ishishini lakho liza kuba sisisombululo. Ngokwenza njalo uyakuphumelela.

IMALI
Uza kudinga imali ezakukwazi ukukuthwala wena neshishini lakho iinyanga ezi-6 ukuya enyakeni, kwaye loo mali ixhomekeke kuhlobo lweshishini onalo. Khumbula - noxa kuza kube kumnandi ukungabi namphathi - yazi ukuba ngoku akukho mphathi uza kukuhlawula ukuphela kwenyanga.
INDAWO YOKUSEBENZELA
Indawo osebenzela kuyo mayibonakale kuyindawo yomsebenzi. Ukuba usebenzela ekhaya qiniseka ukuba i-ofisi yakho ikude nengxolo yosapho.
IZIXHOBO ZOKUSEBENZA
Ambalwa amashishini asebenza ngaphandle koncedo lwekhompyutha. Kuhle ukuba i-ofisi yakho ibe

IZAKHONO
Kuhle xa unezakhono eziliqela. Cinga ngokwenza izifundo zezakhono kwezoshishino, eziquka indlela yokwenza iincwadi nokuzithengisa.

Qinisekisa ukuba nobabini niyonwaba
YINTWASAHLOBO! Iintyatyambo zithe qhakra ngemibala emihle, uziva uchulumancile kwaye imozulu entle ikwenza uzive urhalela ukubethwa ngumoya. Kodwa ukuzikhupha nosana lwakho akululanga njengokuya kwipiknikhi. Zininzi izinto ofanele uziqwalasele njengokuba uya kuhamba ngantoni ukuya apho nokuba uza kuluphathela ntoni usana lwakho.
Uyaphi" Oku kubalulekile xa uhamba nosana. Kaloku iintsana ziyayithanda indalo neendawo ezizolileyo - azikuthandi ukuya kumaziko eevenkile neendawo eziphithizelayo. Abantu abaninzi, izibane, ingxolo nokuphithizela kwabantu kungenza usana lwakho lungalali kakuhle, lulile lungathuli yaye lungazoli.
Xa utyelele abahlobo bakho usana lwakho malungaphathwa ngabantu abaninzi okanye luvuswe lulele. Oko kungalwenza lungazoli kuba alukwazi ukuthi: "Ndidiniwe ngoku kukudlala, ndifun' ukulala." Oko kungalwenza lulibale ixesha olulala ngalo ngenxa yokudlala.
Uluphathele ntoni" Yiba nebhegi yamalweyile xa uhamba nosana. Ukhumbule ukuphatha izinto ozisebenzisayo xa utshintsha ilweyile losana. Luphathele nokutya okwaneleyo, ngaphandle kokuba uyaluncancisa. Phatha ingubo nempahla yalo yokunxiba nezinto zokuluthambisa.
Nihamba ngantoni" Luqhube ngeprem xa ikufutshane indawo eniya kuyo. Xa nisiya kude kubhetele nihambe ngemoto. Abadlezana abahamba neentsana abahambi kakuhle ngezithuthi zikawonke-wonke. Xa ungenamoto enganisa apho nizikhuphela khona, kubhetele ningayi kude kungenjalo uhambe nomntu oza kukuncedisa.
Yintoni ongathwala ngayo usana" Iprem ungayisebenzisa xa nisiya kufutshane, kodwa inganenzel' umthwalo xa nisiya kude kwaye nihamba ngezithuthi zikawonke-wonke. Unako nokulubeleka ngembeleko usana.
Yiba nesitulo sosana xa uhamba ngemoto yakho ukuze ulugcine lubophelelekile esitulweni.

nosana olusandul' ukuzalwa, nangona kona iintsana ezinjalo zingenwa lula ziintsholongwane kuba imizimba yazo isakha
amajoni akhusela umzimba. Xa uphuma nalo kufuneka uqinisekise ukuba lunxibile nokuba lukhuselekile elangeni. Malungaphathwa ngabantu abaninzi kwaye phatha eny'

Ukuthiya igama
UKUTHIYA usana igama akululanga njengokuba uninzi lucinga. Igama umntwana alithiywe ngumzali lihlala naye ubomi bakhe bonke kwaye kuba lelona gama aziwa ngalo. Ukuthiya usana igama ke kuba ngumsebenzi onzima kuba maninzi amagama onokukhetha kuwo.
Zininzi izinto ezingakwenza ukhethe igama elithile. Umzekelo unokukhetha igama elayamene nenkolo yakho, okanye igama olive kumajelo eendaba, okanye igama elinento yokwenza namasiko osapho.
Nanga amacebiso angakunceda xa ukhetha igama oza kulithiya usana lwakho...
ONGAKWENZA
Khetha amagama amadala: La ngamagama ekudala abantu ababethiwa ngawo kwaye aseza kuhlala ithuba elide esetyenziswa. Umzekelo: uBongani, uLebogang, uThabang, uNoxolo.
Qwalasela isandi salo: Igama olikhethileyo libize ukuze ulive ukuba livakala njani.
Lijonge xa lishunquliwe: Bhala igama nefani ukuze ubone ukuba xa igama lishunquliwe alitsho into embi na!
Vuselela igama elidala: Kungalivuselela igama elidala ukutshintsha indlela elipelwa ngayo okanye elibizwa ngayo. Umzekelo xa umthiya ngegama elithi Eric, ungasebenzisa elentombazana elinguErika.
Ziqambele elakho: Amnandi amagama ozakhele wona, kodwa kuqala yiva iimbono zabanye abantu ngawo. Abakutshoyo ngalo kungakwenza ubone ukuba abantu baza kulithatha njani igama lakhe ebomini.
Zikhumbule iingcambu zakho: UMzantsi Afrika uneelwimi zomthonyama ezininzi. Amagama ezi lwimi akangomagama nje kuphela, akwamele iingcambu nesithethe sakhe.
OMAWUNGAKWENZI
Xa uluthiya igama lolwimi ongalwaziyo, qinisekisa ukuba uyalazi ukuba lithetha ukuthini. Libuze ebantwini abathetha olo lwimi, ungazixeleli ukuba linentsingiselo emnandi kuba livakala limnandi. Iindidi zeemoto, izixhobo zombane, namagama eendwalutho ngamagama efashoni kwaye umntwana wakho uya kuhlala nelo gama ubomi bakhe bonke.

Fundis' abantwana ngemali
ABANTWANA abaselula abalazi ixabiso lemali nokuthi isetyenziswa njani ukuthenga izinto. Kubalulekile ukubafundisa beselula ukuphath' imali ukuze olo lwazi lubancede bakukhula.
Qala ngokubafundisa ukonga imali uze ubafundise "ukuyandisa" imali yabo. Mthengele into ekhuselekileyo yokugcin' imali ukuze afake kuyo imali ompha yona nayiphiwa ngabahlobo nezalamane zakho.
Mkhuthaze ukuba onge imali yokuzithengel' into yokudlala okanye umdlalo weTV. Oko kuya kumfundisa ukuzibekela izinto afuna ukuziphumeza.
Akukwazi ukubaluleka kokong' imali, mfundise ukuyityala ngokumvulela i-akhawuniti yebhanki ukuze afumane inzala kwimali ayongileyo.
Mchazele umahluko phakathi kwezinto azifunayo neziyimfuneko kuye - "Kuhle ukuyonga imali kunokuthenga izinto ezingeyomfuneko."
Ukufundisa abantwana oko kungakunceda nawe kungabikho mfuneko yokubathengela izinto zobuncwane.
Abantwana bayathanda ukuzibona belawula, ngoko mababe nelizwi kwindlela enye imali yekhaya esetyenziswa ngayo.
Xa becel' into edurayo, baxelele ukuba uza kubancedisa bonge imali yokuyithenga. Xa becela into evenkileni uhamba nabo, yithi mabakhethe phakathi kokuthenga loo nto okanye ukuyigcina loo mali.
Ukubala imali anayo umntwana kuya kumnceda ekufundeni ukubala nokufunda ukuphath' imali ngendlela.

ULONWABO LWEENGCUNGCU ZASERHAWUTINI E-Inc
Ibali lethu lekhava likaKelly Khumalo lifotelwe e-Inc The Club, indawo yakutshanje yokonwaba eBraamfontein, eJozi.
Yindawo ekumgangatho ophezulu, ngaphakathi intle ihonjiswe ngobukhazikhazi bexabiso, kulula ukubona unobangela wokuba i-Inc ibenomtsalane kwiingcungcu zaseJozi.
Ukususela kumculo weHawusi neR&B ngobusuku bangoMgqibelo ukuya kumatheko abucala engcungcu ezineendumasi zeli nezamazwe angaphandle ezifana noDJ Mixwell no-Akon, i-Inc iza kuwenza unyaka ka-2009 ubeluncuthu ngokwenene!
Xa ufuna ukubekisa indawo batsalel' umnxeba kule nombolo: 011-403-9834.
IBALI ELIKWIKHAVA
Ulungele ukuba nosana!
UKELLY KHUMALO akaseyiyo intombi nto - kwaye akazisoli ngaloo nto. "Ubuntombi bam babusisithsaba sam esasingenakuthatyathwa mntu kum de ndikulungele oko," itsho le mvumi ineminyaka engama-25 eyayisaya kubizwa ngokuba nguKelly "Oyintombi nto" Khumalo kwaye isolwa ngokuxoka ngobuntombi bayo.
Kudliwano-ndlebe lwakutshanje, uKelly uvumile ukuba owayeza kumtshata nongugxa wakhe kwezoshishino, uProsper Makwaiwa nguye indoda eyaba nethamsanqa lokungena ubuntombi bakhe. Kodwa akaphela apho wamshiya nentliziyo eyaphukileyo.
Le mvumi ye-Afro pop eselula iyavuma ukuba kuthando lwabo wayengeyedwa babebaninzi, kwaye ke namaphepha engayekanga ukubhala ngokungathembeki kukaProsper.
"Ndandiphulukana nokuba ndim ngexa ndikunye noProsper. Ndandisoloko ndinomsindo. Ndandisophula iifowuni, maxa wambi ndimqhwabe naye ukuba ukufutshane kum. Kwakumele ndikhethe, ndaza ndakhetha ukumshiya," utsho.
Ukumshiya kwaba yeyona nto ilungileyo ayenzayo. Ngoku ujongene nomsebenzi wakhe. Ngaphezulu ufumene umntu omtsha kwaye uKelly sele ethetha nangokuba nomntwana.
Iintsikelelo ziya ngokwanda kule ndumasi eyakhulela eThokoza eJoburg, neyaqala ukucula ecaweni.
Kukho icwecwe lakhe lakutshanje elithi Simply Kelly ekufuneka lithengisiwe, okuthetha ukuba uza kukhenketha ilizwe lonke - kwaye abalandeli bakhe baza kuqhuba nokumbona kuRhythm City, apho adlala indawo kaSunay. Kuphinde kubekho isithembiso soluhlu lweempahla ezinomtsalane zangaphantsi ezinegama lakhe, ifilim engobomi bakhe kunye nesivumelwano sokuba abebubuso beemveliso zobuhle.
UKelly wonwatyiswa yile mpumelelo yokugqibela. Ngexesha lokushicilelwa kwemagazini walile ukusixelela ukuba zezakwabani na ezo mveliso, kodwa watsho esithi yimali leyo kuye nethuba lokuba yimodeli.
"Esi kuza kuba sisivumelwano sam sokuqala kwaye ndiyakuvuyela ukwenza enye into engenguwo umculo," utshilo.
Ukuba bubuso beemveliso zobuhle kuza kwenza lukhulu emculweni wakhe kuba kaloku imifanekiso yakhe, neentengiso zeTV ziza kumenza asoloko esemehlweni abantu.
Kodwa nangona enako konke oku, uKelly uthi ukufumana umntwana kukona kuya kumenza azive esenkcochoyini.
IBONA ibincokola naye kwivenkilana yekofu entle ezolileyo eHyde Park eJoburg. Ubenxibe kakuhle kwaye kunzima ukumcinga enxibe iimpahla zabantu abakhulelweyo.
Uthe xa ehlala phantsi inkwenkwana encinci yagaqela ngakuthi. Kwangoko uKelly wathabatheka yiyo.
"Ndifuna ukuzibona ndisiya ngokutyeba ndivele iminyama nayo yonke loo nto, kuza kube kufanelekile!" Utshilo ethetha ngokukhulelwa.
"Ndicinga ukuba intombi encinane efana nam iza kubantle. Kukuphela kwento endicinga ngayo kule mihla; ziyandoyikisa ezi mvakalelo," utshilo ebonakala emangalisiwe.
"Umama wandifumana esemncinane, ngoko ukungabi namntwana kwam yinto yangabom. Bendingekalungi kwaye bendingakholelwa ekubeni nomntwana ndingatshatanga."
Konke oku kubonakala ngathi kutshintshile kuba ngoku akazukulinda umsesane phambi kokuba nomntwana. "Naliphi na ixesha ukusukela ngoku lixesha elilungileyo lokuba ngumama."
Sele ekuthethile oku nonina. "Ndimxelele: 'Mha, ndicinga ukuba nomntwana!' Uyazi" Uyavuya!"
Umama uNtombi Khumalo uyavuma ukuba uyazivuyela izicwangciso zentombi yakhe zokuqala usapho. "Ndikulungele ukuba nomzukulwana. Sendiqalile ukufuna amagama koogxa bam emsebenzini, ukuba yintombazana uza kuba nguMonica, athiywe ngegama lika-anti kaKelly," utshilo
"Endingakucebisa ngokuba ngumama kukuba uKelly abenesibindi njengam. Ukuba ngumama kumnandi ekuqaleni, kodwa ekuhambeni kwexesha udibana nemiceli-mngeni kwaye kuza kufuneka omelele.
"UKelly wakhula ngaphandle koyise, kodwa uThixo wayenguyise kuye ngoko kufuneka akhumbule ukuba uThixo ukho yonke imihla," utsho umam' uNtombi.
Noxa uKelly elibhinqa elizimeleyo, kodwa ukukhulelwa akuyonto ungayenza uwedwa. Ngoko ngubani oza kuba nguyise walo mntwana"
UKelly uphendule ngentsini, kodwa watshintsha kwangoko sakutsho ukuba sicingela ukuba uyise womntwana kungaba yindoda emhlophe ebemana ukuvezwa nayo emaphepheni.
"Ubani" UDevan" Hayi mani, laa ndoda ngumhlobo endikhululeke gqitha xa ndikunye naye. Abantu basuke basicingela."
Saqhuba ke thina nokuzama ukuphanda eyona ndoda isebomini bakhe. Ujonge phezulu wacinga kuqala: "Andazi. Andiqinisekanga. Kulungile ke, ewe ukhona umntu."
Akasixelelanga kuba esithi uthando luselutsha.
Sikhumbule ingoma yakhe edumileyo ethi Sobabili ayicula noRobbie Malinga enamazwi athi "uthando lwami nawe lolwethu sobabini, umuntu wesithathu akafuneki." Kubonakala ngathi ngoku uKelly uzimisele ukubukhusela eluntwini ubomi bakhe bezothando.
Kodwa intombi eseluthandweni ayikwazi kufihla de kuphele ngoko usixelele ukuba uyindoda elungileyo - ngethemba lokuba - uya kuba nguyise womntwana wakhe.
Uthe akubona ukuba sele ethethe kakhulu wathi: "Iseziinyangana ezimbalwa, andifuni koyikisa usizi lomfana agqibele ebalekile!"
Okumangalisayo kukuba, uKelly ucinga ukuba Ikumkani yeKwayito, u-Arthur Mafokate ngumzekelo wootata abalungileyo.
"Uyamangalisa xa ekunye neentombi zakhe. Unguyise nonina, nento yonke kubantwana bakhe," utsho uKelly.
Ingaba ululungele utshintsho oluza kuza nokukhulelwa emzimbeni wakhe"
"Hayi suka, ndiseza kuba nomtsalane," utshilo uKelly. [x]

EZOLUTSHA:
Sincokola noFat Charlie
Ukufun' ukuba necala okulo
XA usemtsha uva rhoqo ngoxinzelelo lweentanga zakho. Iititshala nabazali basoloko bekuyala ngokuba ungaqhelani "nabantu abangalunganga". Kodwa ke xa sithetha inyaniso "uxinzelelo lweentanga" kudla ngokuba lelona sebe lenkawu esizimela ngalo xa senze iimpazamo. Kaloku uFat Charlie uyayazi loo nto kwaye ulutsha malwazi ukuba alunakumqhatha yena njengabazali neetitshala.
Udla ngokuva umntwana esithi "Ngoobani abandenzise le nto," atsho ngokunga yena ubengenako ukwala ukuyenza.
Iintanga zakho ngabantu enilinganayo ngeminyaka, ofunda nabo noncokola nabo. Ngoko ke uxinzelelo lweentanga aludli ngakukunyanzela ukuba wenze into ongayithandiyo.
Eziny' izinto sizenza kuba nathi sifuna ukubonwa njengomntu olandelayo. Okanye ke lube olo xinzelelo lusezingqondweni zethu. Sizixelela ukuba siya kubonwa njengabantu "abasemcimbini" xa sisebenzisa iziyobisi, siqalisa ukutshaya nokusela okanye sinxiba ngendlela ethile.
Ngoko mlisela nomthinjana wakowethu masingazimeli "ngoxinzelelo lweentanga". Okubalulekileyo kukuba masingenzi abazali bethu nabantu abasithandayo babeke ityala abantu esivana nabo ngezinto ezimbi esizenzayo.
Masingazifaki ezingxakini ngokwazi ukuba bacinga njani abantu abaliqela. Kutshanje ndidibene noGD endandifunda naye, nangona sasingazani kangako naye kuba wayevana nabafana abazibona bekrele-krele.
Uyazi ke nawe ukuba ngabanjani abo. Kaloku abo ngabanxiba kakuhle, abawaziyo amaqela omculo aphambili, abaphatha iindidi ezintsha zeeselfowuni nabasoloko bebonakala bonwabile.
SinoGD saya kufuman' iziselo sancokola "ngeemini zakudala" - waza wandibalisela into ebe nomdla. "Uyazi ndiyacaphuka xa ndicinga ngexesh' endalichithayo ndizama ukuziqhelanisa naba bafana," utshilo.
Babengabahlobo bakhe xa enemali yokutheng' ibhiya. Kodwa amathuba maninzi babemshiya ngaphandle kwizicwangciso zabo.
Oko wakubona emva kwexesha kodwa unethemba lokuba isifundo aya kusigqithisela ebantwaneni bakhe sesokuba: xa ungevani nabantu awusokuze uvane nabo nokuba ungazifaka kanjani kubo.
Ukanti xa uzama ukuzinyanzela ebantwini, baya kukusebenzisa yaye bangakuhloniphi.
Okubi nangakumbi kukuba ukuzama ukuzifaka ebantwini abangakuthandiyo kukwenza uphoswe ngabantu ebebeya kuvana ngokwenene nawe. Njengoko bekho abantu abakuthanda uyilento uyiyo ungagqibela ungabahoyi kuba bengekho kwiqela olifunayo.
Umlisela nomthinjana wakowethu mawuzibuze oku: ngaba abo "bantu bahle" bonwabe njengokuba nawe ucinga ukuba bonwabile" Ngaba bonwabe njengokuba nabo becinga" Ngaba kukho into ekuphosayo ngokungabi ngomnye wabo"
Zincede wena ngokwenza oku: phulaphula izinto abathetha ngazo aba bantu. Uya kuva ukuba ixesh' elininzi bathetha ngezinto abazenzileyo nabaza kuzenza. Xa besepatini bathetha ngokuba baza kuyaphi xa besuka apho, nangokuba bekumnandi kangakanani kwipati engaphambili. Abathethi ngendawo abakuyo.
Ngaba kukonwaba ke oko"
Ngaphezulu amabali olonwabo ababe nalo ngempela-veki ayabaxwa ukuze abanye barhale!
Ungaziva ulilolo kanti ubulolo bakho kulapho kwakhiwa khona ukuba ungumntu onjani, apho ujonga ukuxabiseka kwakho uze ufunde oko kubalulekileyo.
Abantu abaqhaqhileyo nabonwabileyo baya kuhlala bengamawexu-wexu ebomini.
Usenokuziva ulilolo, kodwa yazi ukuba akuwedwanga. Xa unokujonga abantu abakufutshane nawe uya kubona abanye abafana nawe, abanqwenelayo ukufana nabantu abonwabileyo, kodwa abaziyo ukuba ubomi abuphelelanga nje ekubeni neselfowuni ephambili nokuya kwiipati ezimnandi.
Mlisela nomthinjana ukufunda esikolweni kokwethutyana.
Nifakwa eklasini enye kuba niziintanga. Kuthiwa awunako ukukhetha abantu bosapho lwakowenu, kodwa ungabakhetha abahlobo bakho - esikolweni ke ababaninzanga abahlobo ongakhetha kubo.
Kuxa sele ufunda ekholejini apho uya kufunda nabantu abaneminyaka eyahlukeneyo - kwaye apho makhulu amathuba okuba udibane nabantu abacinga njengawe.
Xa okwangoku uziva ungaphandle kodwa ujonge ngaphakathi, yisebenzise loo mvakalelo. Yisebenzise loo mvakalelo ukufikelela kwabany' abantu - inkwenkwe okanye intombazana efikayo esikolweni, okanye kumntu ongathethiswayo ngabantu, okanye umntu osoloko ehletywa ngabantu bonke.
Uya kumangaliswa ziziphumo zoko. Uya kuhlonelwa ngabantwana ofunda nabo, kuba ubonisile ukuba unaso isibindi sokungakuhoyi abanye abantu abakucinga ngawe.
Okubaluleke nangakumbi kukuba uya kuzenzel' abahlobo bokwenene, baze bathi abo bazixelela ukuba bakrele-krele besaxakiwe ukuba baza kuyaphi kubusuku bangoMgqibelo, wena ube utshintsha ihlabathi! [x]

Abantu bayahlekisa
Abahlobo benene abakunyanzeli xa into ungayifuni.
Umntu ofun' ukukwenzis' into ongayithandiyo, okuntlontayo nokugrogrisayo akangomhlobo wakho!
Abantu abasebenzis' iziyobisi nabenz' ezinye "izinto ezimdaka" njengokuqhekeza imizi nokuthengisa ngemizimba yabo emadodeni amadala kuba befuna "izipho" bayazi ukuba ezo zinto azilunganga. Azilunganga kuba zingekho mthethweni, kodwa kuba ziyingozi ngoko zikubeka esichengeni.
Akumnandanga ngaphakathi kubo ukwenza ezo zinto. Ngoko benza ntoni" Xa besazi ukuba benza into engalunganga, bafuna ukufaka nabany' abantu kuloo nto. Oko ke kubenza bazive bengenasazela kuba "wonk' umntu uyayenza."
Abantu obaziyo abafuna wenz' izinto ezingalunganga njengokusebenzisa iziyobisi, bakwenza oko kuba befuna ukuphelisa isazela sabo. Abakukhathalelanga wena okanye "iingxaki" zakho.
BONA XHOSA - May 2006

Umsebenzi
wamaphupha akho
Ukuba u-2008 awubanga ngunyaka omhle kuwe, funda ukuzondelela ulungiselele amaphupha akho kwezi holide ukuze ukwazi ukuphumeza injongo zakho kunyaka ozayo
KUNDITHATHE iminyaka emine ukufikelela kumsebenzi wamaphupha am - emva kokungathathwa kwisicelo sam sokuqala somsebenzi. Ndenza yonke into efanelekileyo. Kodwa wakho owenza kakuhle ngaphezulu kwam. Noxa kwabanjalo andizange ndiyeke ukubambelela ephupheni lam.
"Wawusoloko unditsalela umnxeba," utsho uDumisani Ntshentshe ongumhleli wesiXhosa weBONA ongumphathi wam ngoku. "Ndandifumana umnxeba wakho rhoqo emva kweenyanga ezi-6 ubuza izithuba ezikhoyo - kodwa wawungandixheshi!"
"Emva kokuhamba komguquli wethu, uNtombikhona Kwebulana esiya kuba ngumhleli wakwaHansard kwiPalamente yePhondo laseMntla Koloni, uDumi wandicela ukuba ndifake uNeliswa kuluhlu lwabantu abafake izicelo zomsebenzi. Kodwa ukuwufumana umsebenzi kwakuxhomekeke kuye - uDumi wathi makava-vanywe kwakhona, njengomntu wonke. Kwamonwabisa ukuphucuka komsebenzi wakhe ngokuqinisekileyo uNeli wayengayekanga ukusebenza nzima ephuhlisa isakhono sakhe," utshilo usekela-mhleli weBONA, uPatricia McCracken.
Kwakukho amaxesha apho kwakunzima. Ndachitha phantse iminyaka emithathu ndilivolontiya ndifund' iindaba kwisikhululo sasekuhlaleni. Ndandivuka ngenj' ixukuxa ndiye kulungiselela iindaba zokuqala zosuku kungekho ntlawulo ekupheleni kwenyanga.
Kodwa ekugqibeleni kwakufuneka ndizame indlela yokuziphilisa ngoko ndathatha umsebenzi wokuba ngumabhalane kwinkundla yamatyala ephakamileyo eMthatha. Sasihlawulwa ngemini!
Ndaze ndafumana umnxeba ovela kuDumisani, ongumphathi wam ngoku - oku kwandenza ndafunda ukuba xa usenza into ngokuzimisela unamaphupha, uyakhuthala. Iphupha lakho lilo elikwenza uzimisele ukulifezekisa.
Indlela esingise empumelelweni ayilulanga, kodwa ukuba uyanyamezela uphikelele ngokuqinisekileyo ngenye imini uyakufikelela emaphupheni akho.
Ukuze oku kwenzeke, kufuneka ucinge ngokuhle kuphela. Ndiyazi ukuba ukuthetha akufani nokwenza, ingakumbi xa ungazithembanga.
Kodwa oku kuzithandabuza kusibuyisela umva kulibazise ukufezekiswa kwamaphupha ethu. Yamkela ukuba kuza kubakho amaginxi-gingxi - kwaye yazi ukuba umelwe kukuzithemba kanye ngeli xesha lobunzima.
Ukuze ubengumntu ngokupheleleyo umelwe kukuzithemba, utsho u-T.D. Jakes, ongumbhali wencwadi ethi Mama Made A Difference. Inyathelo lokuqala kukwazi ukuba ungenza okungaphezulu kunokuba ucinga, utsho uJulie Silverthorn noJohn Overdurf, kwincwadi yabo ethi Dreaming Realities.
Impazamo esihlala siyenza kukuzithelekisa nabanye abantu, silibale ukuba sidalwe sangafani kwaye sineetalente ezahlukeneyo. Ndaba noxolo ngaphakathi kum mhla ndaqala ukuba nombulelo ngomgama esele ndiwuhambile - ndafumanisa ukuba ukuba ulibala kukujonga abanye abantu ugqibela ngokuleqa awabo amaphupha.
Ubomi buba lula xa uzithemba. Kanti ukuba ubambelela ephupheni lakho iingxaki odibana nazo zikonyusela ngentla.
Ndithembe kuba umazi wendlela ngoseleke wayihamba!
Umbhali: Neliswa Mzimba
Umhleli wesiXhosa uDumisani Ntshentshe wamkela uNeliswa Mzimba kwiBONA.
INKUTHAZO
ILIZWE ELITSHA
INTETHO ka-Andiswa Mlisa ethe ngqo yamsindisa ekubeni yingxwelerha yogwayimbo yamenza walawula inkampani eyaziwayo ehlabathini jikelele ejongene nezenzululwazi zemhlabathi Umvoto, isebenzisana neenkampani eziphezulu ezifana neSebe lezaManzi kweli, umbutho weZizwe eziManyeneyo kunye neBhanki yeHlabathi.
"Kanye phambi kokuba ndibhale imviwo zam zokuphela konyaka wesibini kwiYunivesithi yaseFort Hare, kwabonakala ngathi ititshala yesifundo sam endisithandayo ayizukubakho kunyaka olandelayo!
"Ndandingenaxesha lakutoyi- toya ngenxa yezifundo, ndaze ndaya ngqo kwintloko yesebe lezifundo zam.
"Ndamchazela ukuba xa ingekho le titshala kuza kunyanzeleka ndibuye kunyaka olandelayo. Iyunivesithi iza kuzihlawula ngokwayo izifundo zam nemirholo yonyaka wonke endiphosileyo."
Umphathi wakumamela oku waza u-Andiswa wazigqiba izifundo zakhe zeBSc ngo-1999. Isifundo awayesithanda yiGeographic Information Systems, enceda ngolwazi lokusebenzisa izinto zendalo yehlabathi ngobulumko - isincede sikwazi ukulungiselela intlekele.
Ngezincomo awazifumana kwititshala yakhe entsha yeGIS u-Andiswa waqeshwa nguMvoto, inkampani yaseKapa. Emva kweminyaka esibhozo, sele enze neehonours zakhe ngo-2002, u-Andiswa ngoku ngumlawuli wecandelo leGIS e-Umvoto.
"Kuyandonwabisa ukusebenza ngobugcisa obukhula ngokukhawuleza nokufumana izisombululo ezisebenza kwangelo xesha," utsho u-Andiswa.
Umvoto uphanda ngendalo evelisa amanzi okanye ubungozi obungadala intlekele. Kodwa uchith' ixesha lakhe elininzi ekhangela iindawo ezinamatye anqabileyo zase-Angola naseBrazil ejonge kwimifanekiso yesatellite.
U-Andiswa waqala ukusebenza ene-PhD - njengonina ogqibezela eyakhe ngoku ongumlawuli wecandelo eliCebisa abaFundi eFort Hare."Ndikhuthazwa ngumama, uLily. "Waqala eyititshala, watshintsha wangumongikazi onezifundo zepsychology, unaso nesidanga sezifundo zetheology - zonke ezi zinto uzenze ekhulisa thina abantwana bakhe abane."
Nanga amacebo ka-Andiswa:
Fumana umcebisi
"Umseki wenkampani Umvoto, uRowena Hay undenze ibhinqa elingusomashishini kanti ndaqala ngomsebenzi ophantsi. "Ngoku ungumcebisi wam," utsho.
Zingce
"URowena undifundise yonke into. Kodwa okona kubalulekileyo kukwakha inkampani abazingcayo ngayo abasebenzi bayo, ekwenza ungazisoli ngokushiya ikhaya."
Yandisa ulwazi lwakho
U-Andiswa ungusihlalo we-SA Group on Earth Observation Capacity-building Committee kwaye esebenzisana neSebe lezeNzululwazi nezoBugcisa nguye omela eli kwiGlobal Group on Earth Observation Committee.
Fumana kodwa nawe unike U-Andiswa naye ungumcebisi wabafundi baseFort Hare nasePeninsula xa beze kufunda ngamava omsebenza kwiiveki ezine e-Umvoto. Baqala berhola i-R6 000 ngenyanga.
- Patricia McCracken
Mthunzi fo sho!
Uzalelwe wafunda eThekwini uMthunzi Gumede (24) kwaye ufumene umsebenzi wamaphupha akhe njengeprodyusa ye-Kids News edlala ku-SABC 1, eRhawutini - "Umsebenzi wam uyamangalisa kwaye ndiyawonwabela," utsho.
Uqala ngokukhangela izihloko ezinika umdla nezinemfundiso ukulungiselela le nkqubo yendaba. Aze aqalise ukuphanda.
Xa kuza kufotwa, kufuneka ibali linike umdla kangangoko ebantwaneni abangabona babukeli bale nkqubo. Nguye owenza udliwano-ndlebe nabantwana kunye nabantu abadala kwaye nguye oyalela umfoti nomhleli wevidiyo amabakwenze.
Nantsi indlela enza ngayo:
Uqeqesho
UMthunzi wenza izifundo zobuntatheli wafumana inational diploma yeminyaka emine eDurban University Of Technology waze waziqhuba izifundo zakhe wenza iBTech kwizifundo zobuntatheli. Waqala kwinqanaba labahlawulwa i-R8 000 ne-R10 000 ngenyanga.
Ubunkokheli nokwakha ubuhlobo
"Yakha ubuhlobo nabantu abangaluncedo," utsho uMthunzi. Ngexa engumfundi, wayengusihlalo weKhasho Journalism Society, eyi-PRO ekwangunobhala waseThekwini wabafundi kwiDUT Students' Representative Council, noweSASCO, ilungu leBlack Management Forum nomququzeleli we-ANC Youth League.
Zimisele
"Ungayeki ukuthandaza nokufaka izicelo zomsebenzi. Zithembe - ikamva lelakho."- Patricia McCracken [x]
Ukuba ujonga abanye abantu, ugqi- bela ngoku-leqa ama-phupha abo
UMthunzi Gumede.
Umlawuli we-Umvoto GIS u-Andiswa Mlisa ucacisela abafundi umsebenzi wabo wemini obandakanya imifanekiso yesathelayithi nolwazi eza nalo malunga nokusebenzisa indalo kakuhle.

Imali: Zingela amaxabiso aphantsi ukuze uyibone imali obuyiqingqile.
Uthando: Zigcine uxakekile. Lixesha elihle eli lokwenza izicwangciso zengomso.
Umsebenzi: Uza kuvuzwa ngokuba nomonde wonwabele nempumelelo.
Impilo: Ungavumeli ukutyeba. Yitya okusempilweni.
Imali: Wasebenzise amathuba okwenz' imali.
Uthando: Yiba nothando novelwano xa ufuna luqhubeke uthando lwenu.
Umsebenzi: Umnqweno wakho ungawufezekisa. Iindab' ezimnandi zivusa ithemba.
Impilo: Linganisa ixesha lomsebenzi nelolonwabo. Phumla kakhulu.
Imali: Umntu omtsha angakuzisela inzuzo xa ukulungele ukusebenzis' ithuba.
Uthando: Ungoyiki ukuxelela iqabane lakho ukuba uziva njani.
Umsebenzi: Xa ufun' ukwaziwa, kufuneka uzame ukuzibonakalisa.
Impilo: Uza kuba namandla xa ukujonga okutyayo.
Imali: Eli lixesha lokungcakaza ngobulumko.
Uthando: Lixesha elihle lokuhlala nabahlobo. Qinisekisa ukuba wonwaba kangangoko unako.
Umsebenzi: Qhubeka nezicwangciso zakho - lixesh' elihle loshishino.
Impilo: Qwalasel' impilo yakho xa ufun' ukuhlala usempilweni yaye wonwabile.
Imali: Xa ufun' ukonwabela ubomi ungafekethi ngemali.
Uthando: Eli xesha elinomdla. Phuma uhamba-hambe uzenzel' abahlobo.

Imali: Tyala imali ngobulumko uze ucebele ingomso elihle.
Uthando: Uthando lwenu luqinile yaye wenza izigqibo ezibalulekileyo.

Impilo: Yenza umthambo phandle. Zibandakanye neqela lemidlalo lasekuhlaleni.
Imali: Uza kufuman' imali ungayilindelanga uze uzive ukhuselekile.
Uthando: Yiba nomonde novelwano. Iqabane lakho lifun' ulikhuthaze.

Imali: Zithembe xa ufuna ukwenza okuza kukwenzel' imali

Izoluleko zikaFat Charlie
KWINYANGA ephelileyo sithethe ngokubaluleka kokuzibekela iinjongo nezinto ongakwazi ukuzenza ngempumelelo. Kule nyanga sithetha ngeendlela zokwenza ubomi bakho buzinze - sikunika amacebiso aya kukunceda uphelise ukubhideka ulutsha olubanako xa lukhula.
Cinga ngezi ngcebiso kwaye uzisebenzise, ziya kukwenza uzive womelele, ubesempilweni yaye ukulungele ukuzalisekisa iminqweno yakho ozibekele yona.
Okunye okuhle ngokusebenzisa ezi ngcebiso mlisela nomthinjana wakowethu, kukuba oluny' uncedo lwazo uza kulubona ngoko nangoko...
P Ndiza (kuzama) kucinga ngaphambi kokuthetha: Banyanisile abantu abathi kuyanceda ukubala uye kuma eshumini ngaphambi kokuphendula xa unomsindo. Oko kwenza nokuba ingxabano ingaqhubeli phambili.
Ukuthetha nje ungacinganga kubenza abantu abaxabeneyo bayilibale into ebaxabanisileyo, bagqibele besitsho nezinto ebezingafanelanga.
Ukucinga ngaphambi kokuthetha kukwenza uyive kakuhle nento etshiwo ngumntu oxabana naye. Angakucaphukisa uzive urhalela ukumtyabeka ngesithuko esikhulu, kodwa kufuneka ungakuvumeli oko uze wetyise akutshoyo ngokuzibuza ukuba: Uthetha ukuthini ngento ayitshoyo"
Umntu usenokukungxolisa kuba inguwe omcaphukisileyo - kwaye xa kunjalo kufuneka uzole, uzame ukufumana ukuba wenze ntoni.
Kungenjalo umntu angafuna nje ukukucaphukisa ungamenzanga nto kuba efuna ukukubona unomsindo. Xa kunjalo kuyanceda ukucinga ngaphambi kokumphendula kuba ayenzeki into ebefuna ukuyibona! Uya kubona ukuba awukho moyeni wokuxabana namntu uze usuke umshiye.
Xa kungabazali bakho abakucaphukisayo, ukucinga ngaphambi kokuthetha kuya kukwenza ukwazi ukuqonda ukuba bakukhathalele, nkqu nokuba abathethanga nawe ngendlela endilisekileyo.
Ukuthula kokona kukuhle ukuze ungazifumani sele uxolisa kamva!
PNdiza kuzicingela ngokwam: Ngaba ufanele ube neselfowuni yodidi oluphambili njengomntu wonke, okanye unxibe iimpahla zodidi oluphambili" Ucinga ukuba ufanele ubenomsindo xa abazali bakho bengakwazi ukukuthengela ezo zinto"
Ngaba nawe ungasebenzisa iziyobisi kuba ubona abany' abantu bezisebenzisa"
"Xa undithanda vuma ukulala nam" - ucinga ukuba umntu otsho kanjalo kuwe uyakuthanda ngenene"
Xa impendulo yakho ingu-"hayi" kule mibuzo uyakwazi ukuzicingela - kwaye uzimisele ngobomi bakho.
P Ndiza kwenza umthambo: Xa udlal' ibhola okanye inetball uyazi ukuba kubaluleke kangakanani kuwe, kodwa kubaluleke kakhulu xa ungumntu ongenamdla emidlalweni.
Kwanele ukuthamba iyure enye kathathu ngeveki.
Akukho mfuneko yokuba ujoyine indawo yokwenza umthambo okanye ubaleke endleleni - ukuhamba kwanele. Zimbini izinto ezibalulekileyo: lixesha olichitha usenza umthambo nokuthi uwenza kangaphi.
Nangona ukuhamba ngeenyawo ukuya esikolweni kukugcina usempilweni, akufani nokwenz' umthambo.
Ukomelela komzimba kwenza ingqondo yakho isoloko ithe qwa. Ixesha owenza ungalisebenzisela nokucinga ngemini yakho nangokucwangcisela ixesha elizayo.
P Ndiza kufunda nangakumbi: Ungatsho ukuba ukufunda yeny' indlela yokwenz' umthambo, qha xa ufunda yingqondo ejimayo. Kulo nyaka zixelele ukuba uza kufunda incwadi enye ngenyanga ngaphezulu kweencwadi zakho zesikolo.
Yiya kwithala leencwadi uze uqale ukufunda.
P Ndiza kubanceda nangakumbi abazali bam: UFat Charlie wakhe watsho yaye usatsho nangoku - ningasoloko nihleli ngoxolo nabazali bakho xa ubancedisa kangangoko unako kwimisebenzi yekhaya.
Oko kungenza bayekelele kweziny' izinto babone nokuba uyakwazi ukuba nembopheleleko.
P Ndiza kwenza okunomehluko xa ndingenzi nto: Ngaba ubuya esikolweni ufike uthi ntimfa phambi kweTV" Kuyeke oko. Yiba nento oyenzayo xa ungenzi nto.
Anditsho ukuba ungazibukeli iinkqubo ozithandayo - kodwa fund' ukukhetha. Ceba ukuba uza kubukela ntoni uze eliny' ixesha ulisebenzise ekwenzeni eny' into. Dlala umdlalo nomntakwenu okanye udadewenu - nabo babonise ukuba mabangapheleli ekubukeleni iTV.
Kungenjalo xa usazi ukuba wena nomakhulu wakho nithanda inkqubo enye, yiya kuyibukela emzini wakhe. Oko kuya kuninika ithuba lokuhlala ndawonye - nelokwenza into kunye.
PNdiza kuqinisekisa ukuba ndiwenza ngexesha umsebenzi wam wesikolo: Mlisela nomthinjana wakowethu asisokuze sibe krele-krele sonke esikolweni, kodwa ungakwenza ukufunda kubelula ngokusokolo uwenza ngexesha umsebenzi wakho wesikolo nangokumamela xa useklasini.
Xa unikwe umsebenzi wesikolo oza kuwenza ekhaya, wenze ngokukhawuleza kangangoko unako. Ungawuyeki de kuthiwe ufuneka ngengomso - uya kuziphephisa kuxinzelelo lwengqondo olungeyomfuneko.
Ayikho into emnandi njengokwazi ukuba umsebenzi wakho uwenzile nokubukela abany' abantu bemanxada-nxada okanye benoxinzelelo lwengqondo.
P Khumbul' imihla yokuzalwa yabany' abantu neminye imihla ebalulekileyo: Oku ungakubona kungabalulekanga, kodwa yindlela ongonwabisa ngayo abany' abantu. Thath' ikhalenda uziphawule zonke ezo ntsuku.
Akukho mfuneko yokubathengela izipho ezidurayo. Ikhadi nje lilodwa lonele nokwazi ukuba kanti kukho umntu okukhumbulayo.
Xa ungumfana ukukhumbula umhla wokuzalwa kamama wakho - neMother's Day - kuya kumenza onwabe nangaphezulu kokuba ucinga. [x]

BONA XHOSA - January 2007
Kukangaphi usitsho kanjalo" Kukangaphi ubaxelela loo nto unomsindo abazali bakho" Kukangaphi usithi ufun' ukuphathwa njengomntu omdala, kodwa wabonwa uyinjubaqa ngokwenza loo nto"
Ndifun' ukuphathwa njengomntu ondala - impendulo yoko idla ngokuthi Nawe ziphathe njengomntu omdala!
Yimpendulo efanelekileyo leyo. Uziva umdala ngokuya ukhula kuba ufuna nokuphuma ekuphathweni kakubi ngabazali nasesikolweni - kodwa wena sukuba ungekabi mdala.
Ndiyazi ukuba kukho amaxesha obunzima, kodwa kufuneka sikukhumbule oko! Useneminyaka ekwishumi elivisayo, awukabi ngumntu omdala. Azikapheli iinguqu eziyaluzelisa umzimba nengqondo yakho.
Ndiyazi kunzima ngamany' amaxesha, kodwa kufuneka ubenomonde. Ngeny' imini uza "kukhululeka"...
... ukhululeke ukuba ube namatyala, ukuphangela kumsebenzi onomvuzo ophantsi kuba awukho omnye, ukhululeke ukuba uzikhathaze ngokuhlawul' irenti, nangokuthwala iingxaki ezahlukeneyo...
Khumbulani oku mlisela nomthinjana - akukho mntu angakuthintela ekubeni ngumntu omdala, nguwe oya kuzikhethela ukuba ufun' ukuba ngumntu omdala onjani ngezinto ozenzayo ngoku.
'Ndifun' ukuphathwa njengomntu omdala!'

ICHICKEN AND MUSHROOM OPEN PIE
Ixesha lokulungiselela: imizuzu engama-20, kunye nemizuzu engama-20 yokupholisaIxesha lokupheka: Malunga neyure e-1
Yanela: 4
* 2 amacephe (30ml) amafutha okupheka
* 1 itswele, lislayiswe
* 2-3 amagaqa e-garlic, acunyuzwe
* 350g amathanga enkukhu angenamathambo, angenasikhumba asikwe amaqatha ayi-2,5cm
* 200g button mushrooms, asikwe izilayi
* 3/5 yekomityi (150ml) yekhrim
* 2 amacephe (30ml) ethyme esentsha enqunqiweyo
* ityuwa ne-freshly ground black pepper uzigalele zivakale
* 500g yepuff pastry, inyibilikiswe ukuba ikhenkcezisiwe
* iflawa yokubhuqa-bhuqa
* 1 iqanda, eliqhuqhiweyo
1. Gcada itswele kwimbiza enamafutha ngobushushu obuphakathi imizuzu emi-5. Galela i-garlic, upheke umzuzu omnye. Galela inyama yenkuku, upheke imizuzu esi-8 ukuya kweli-10. Galela amakhowa, pheka imizuzu emi-5 de zonke iincindi zibe ngumphunga.
2. Galela ikhrim, bilisa. Pheka imizuzu emi-5 wenze isosi ijiye. Galela ithyme, qhola kakuhle. Galela esityeni, kuyeke kuphole.
3. Yenza mtyaba ipastry kwitreyi efafazelwe iflawa wenze iskwere esingama-33cm x 33cm. Sika ibezizikwere ezine. Thambisa imiphetho ngamanzi, yikha ngecephe umxube wenkuku ubeke kumbindi weskwere ngasinye. Phakamisela iikona zezikwere embindini ukwenza ipasile. Cinezela imiphetho ukuze ivaleke, ushiye umngxuma omncinci embindini. Thambisa iiphayi ngeqanda eliqhuqhiweyo kwiphepha elikhulu, pholisa kwisikhenkcisi imizuzu engama-20.
4. Beka i-onti ku-200°C. Bhaka iiphayi imizuzu engama-30 ukuya kwengama-40 de zibe mdaka bugolide.
Iiphayi neesausage rolls
Ziyathandwa kakhulu ngabantu, ngoko iBONA neFood For Fun And Funds ikubonis' indlela yokuzenzel' imali ngazo
II-SAUSAGE ROLL EZINEKHARI
Ixesha lokulungiselela: Imizuzu engama-25
Ixesha lokubhaka: Imizuzu
engama-30
Yenza: 16
* 450g yepuff pastry, enyibilikisiweyo
* 450g yecurried mince meat
* iflawa yokubhuqa
* ubisi lokuthambisa
* iqanda eliqhuqhiweyo lokumenyezelisa
1. Fudumeza i-onti kuma-220°C. Yenza mtyaba isiqingatha se-puff pastry kwitreyi eneflawa encinci ukwenza uxande olungama-40cm x20cm. Sika ngobude imicu emibini.
2. Yahlula kubini i-mince meat ngokulinganayo, bhuqa ngeflawa. Beka isahlulo ngasinye ngakubude bomcu omnye bemicu yentlama.
3. Qaba imiphetho yeflawa ngobisi oluncinci, songa icala elinye uze ucinezele kunye ukuvala. Cheba imiphetho. Ngoku uza kuba nee-sausage roll ezimbini inye ibenobude obungama-40cm.
4. Qaba ngeqanda ukuze imenyezele. Sika i-roll nganye kangangobude be-5cm. Yenza iziliti ezibini okanye ezithathu ngaphezu kwe-roll nganye.
5. Khuphela kwitreyi yokubhaka, bhaka kangangemizuzu eli-15. Cutha ubushushu be-onti buye kwi-180°C, bhaka eminye imizuzu eli-15. Khuphela kwirekhi yocingo ukupholisa. Phaka ishushu okanye ibanda. [x]
AMABALI EMPUMELELO
Umntu ovukayo akazuzi nje into enye - dibana noRachel Moloi!
NGELIXA uninzi lwethu lukobentlombe ngentsimbi yesine xa kumpondo zankomo, uRachel Moloi waseSoweto sukuba sesendleleni eya kwirenki yeeteksi ekufutshane.
Waqala ukuthengisa iilekese kwiirenki zeteksi nezebhasi kwiminyaka eli-10 edlulileyo. Kodwa wabona ukuba angenza ngaphezulu kunoko! Wayefuna ukwanelisa abo bantu balambileyo, nabangxamileyo waza wanengcingane ethi: Yintoni endinokuyenza ekhawulezayo nelula onokuyitya xa usendleleni?
Kulapho kwathi kwavela umbono we-Vetkoek Paleis.
Amagwinya akhe aduma ngokukhawuleza! Emva koko waqalisa ukuthengisa ikofu kwaye wayenomxube ogqibeleleyo wabakhweli abalambileyo.
URachel uliphathe ngempumelelo ishishini lakhe wafundisa abantwana bakhe, walungisa ikhaya lakhe, wathenga nesitovu esitsha nezixubi kunye nezinye izixhobo zokuncedisa ekukhuliseni ishishini lakhe.
Icebiso likaRachel kwabo bafuna ukuzimela bangaxhomekeki mntwini ngemali?
"Yithande into oyenzayo!"
Sithumelele ibali lakho usinike neenkcukacha zokuqhagamshelana nawe. Bhalela kwa: Food For Fun And Funds/BONA, Box 1610, Parklands, 2121. I-meyili: foodforfun@caxton.co.za
Iindima eziNtathu eziDlalwa ngooSomashishini abaPhumeleleyo
Phambi kokuthetha ngeendima ezintathu ezidlalwa ngoosomashishini abaphumeleleyo, masijonge indlela abantu abaninzi abasebenza ngayo. Sikhuliswa kwihlabathi apho sixelelwa ukuba ukuze uphumelele zuza oku- wenze oku ubeyile nto.
Oko kukuthi sixelelwa ukuba kufuneka sibenezinto ezithile phambi kokuba senze izinto ezinkulu ukuze sibezizinto. Umzekelo: Sisoloko sicinga ukuba kufuneka sibenethamsanqa, okanye "amancedo" awodwa, phambi kokuba senze nantoni na kwaye siphumelele.
Kodwa oosomashishini abaphumeleleyo bakuqondile ukuba oku akuchanekanga. Ngokukhawuleza bafunda ukuba indlela eyiyo yempumelelo kukuba ubenguwe -wenze oku-uzuze oku! Ukuba sinokubona/sizicingele apho sifuna ukuba khona - siya kuthi sivuselelwe ekwenzeni izinto eziya kuthi zisivumele sibenako konke esikufunayo.
Ndenza umngeni kuwe ulinge le ndlela intsha yokucinga uze ubone indlela ihlabathi lakho eliza kutshintsha ngayo xa "uyinguqu ofuna ukuyibona ehlabathini".
Ngoku masijonge kwizinto ezintathu ekufuneka oosomashishini babe zizo kwishishini labo:
1 UMNINI-SABELO. Abanini-zabelo banomdla kuphela kwisiphumo esiphumelelayo seshishini. Ngalo lonke ixesha thina singosoomashishini sivaleleka "kuthando" lweshishini lethu, asiqumami sijongisise kwimeko eyiyo yeshishini.
Umbuzo oza kunceda apha ngulo: "Ukuba bendingumtyali-zimali, bendiza kutyala imali kweli shishini?"
Okokuqala ndizibuza lo mbuzo, impendulo yaba ngu "Hayi" kwaye kwafuneka ndenze iinguqu ezinobuzaza phambi kokuba ishishini likwazi ukwanelisa iimfuneko zam njengomtyali-zimali kwishishini.
2 UMLAWULI. Umlawuli unoxanduva lokuyila "umfanekiso omkhulu" wombutho. Bangaphi abaxhasi esingathanda ukuba sibenabo, siza kuvelisa eziphi iimveliso, sizakwenza inzuzo engakanani? Kodwa ukucwangcisa iinjongo sisiqingatha soxanduva somlawuli, esinye isiqingatha kukuphendula. Konke amaxesha amaninzi usomashishini uyakuzama ukukuphepha oku, abenezizathwana kwanokumisa amanyathelo abalulekileyo. Ze sithi xa singazuzi oko besikufuna, simangale.
Kufuneka siyenze sibenoxanduva lweziphumo zethu. Singabaphathi bethu, akekho omnye umntu oza kusolwa.
3 UMPHATHI. Kulapho sithatha uxanduva lwezinto zemihla ngemihla ekufuneka zenzeke. Ezi zingaquka uku-odola iimveliso, ukuqinisekisa sivelisa izinto ezikumgangatho ophakamileyo, sithengisa iimveliso zethu, ukuqinisekisa ukuba sigcina iirekodi zemali zethu zonke kwaye abasebenzi bethu bonwabile.
Khawukhangele kwishishini lakho kwaye ubone ukuba zonke ezi ndima zintathu zikhona na kwaye uyakubona iindawo ezinengxaki ezinokufuna ukuhoywa.
Lluwellyn Diedericks

Uyakuthanda UKUPHEKA
UKUTHANDA kwam ukupheka kwaphenjelelwa likhaya endakhulela kulo kuba kwakusoloko kukho ukutya okushushu nevumba elimnandi lokutya - kwaye oko kusabalulekile kum. Indoda endincuma nayo iyazi ukuba xa isiza kwam iza kufika itye ukutya okushushu.
Ndiyakuthanda ukuba sekhitshini kuba ikhitshi lam livulekile, ngoko ndiyakwazi ukuncokola neendwendwe zam ndibe ndiziphekela isidlo esimnandi.
Ndinqwenela ukuba nekhitshi elikhulu, libe nekhawunta yokusebenzela kunye nestovu segesi kuba ndiyakuthanda ukupheka ngaso.
Ndineminyak' emithathu ndihlala apha kwaye ndiyayithanda le ndlu kuba isestayileni. Inamagumbi amabini okulala, nto leyo ithetha ukuba ndinendawo yokugcin' izihlangu nempahla yokunxiba!
Ngaphezulu inezinto endizithandayo. Kaloku abantu abaziintanga zam (abaneminyaka engama-40 evisayo kodwa ungaxeleli mntu!) bathanda ifenitshala yakudala, kodwa ke mna andingomntu wakudala.
Kwiminyaka edlulileyo bendiqokelel' ifenitshala yale mihla eyifaneleyo indlu yam. Enye ifenitshala ndiyenzelwe ngokukodwa, kwaye leyo iquka itafile yokutyela neetafilana ezincinane. Ndiyazithengela yonk' into oyibona apha.
Ndihleli kamnandi apha, qha ndikhe ndebelwa izitshixo endingazisebenzisiyo, emva koko ndebelwa ikhompyutha neselfowuni. Ngethamsanqa ndandingekho endlwini ngelo xesha! Leyo yinto eyenzekayo xa uhlala wedwa, kodwa andinako ukwenza ngakumbi kuba umsebenzi wam uyandihambisa kakhulu. Umntu wam ufika kathathu evekini kwaye ndiyathemba ukuba ngunyaka wokugqibela lo ndihlala ndedwa - sicebe ngolo hlobo!
Kungoku nje ndidlala emidlalweni emibini eboniswa eMarco Polo Theatre eSandton, kodwa xa ndisekhaya undifumana ekhitshini okanye ndithe zava esofeni.
Ndithi ndibukele iTV ndibe ndisebenza nakwilaptop yam. Ndiyathanda nokuphumla ngeglasi yewayini, kwaye andibi nesithukuthezi.
Ndibhala nencwadi yeeresiphi endikhe ndazipheka. Ndingayibiza ngokuthi There's A Diva In Your Kitchen kodwa andikagqibi ukuba ndiza kuyinika igama elithini.
Isofa engaphambi kwetafilana ezele iincwadi neemagazini zokupheka yiyo endiphembelelayo. Ndihlala kuyo naxa ndibhala iingoma zecwecwe lejazz endiza kulikhupha.
Kaloku mna andaneliswa yinto enye!
Ndifuna ukuba nomzi onamagumbi okuhlamba amakhulu anjengalawo uwabona kwiifilim! Ndifuna nokuba newadrophu yokugcina izihlangu neempahla zam endikwazi ukungena kuyo. [x]

Umfoti: Andrea Caldwell

AMANDL' OSAPHO
Unyaka wokuqala wosana lwakho
Ukusuka ngexa usana lwakho usiya nalo ekhaya de kube lusuku lwalo lokuqala lokuzalwa, ayamangalisa amanqanaba olidlula kuwo xa lukhula...
BONA XHOSA September 2008
BONKE ABANTWANA bakhula ngamaxesha ohlukeneyo, ngoko ke ungothuswa kukuba umntwana wakho engenzi into ethile "ngexesha elifanelekileyo." Amanye amanqanaba uza kufika kuwo ngokukhawuleza... kwamanye athabatha ixesha. Kodwa xa unexhala lokuba "uyashiyeka," mse eklinikhi aye kuhlolwa.
Gcina oku engqondweni, ujonge nasi isikhokelo somawukulindele emntwaneni kunyaka wokuqala...
KWIINYANGA EZINTATHU...
Usana lwakho belusoloko luhlala kwindawo emxinwa, esiswini sakho iinyanga ezilithoba, ngoko iiveki zokuqala "lungaphandle" luzichitha luhleli ngathi lusesesiswini, lulele, lusongelwe ngengubo.
Luza kuya ngokuya luseluleka usana lwakho lukhabakhabe, ngaxeshanye lusomeleza izihlunu.
Iyakuphela inyanga usana sele lukwazi ukuphakamisa intloko kancinci, imizuzwana xa lulele ngesisu. Izandla zalo ziza kuvuleka zivaleka, ziye ngasemlonyeni lufune nokubamba izinto ezinomtsalane.
Luza kube sele lusenza nengxolo - luthimla, luvungama, lutswina, lufutha lukhala, lusenza neengxolo ezinjengo-"aaah" "oooh."
Luza kuncuma xa lusiva ilizwi lakho, lujikise intloko lujonge ngakuwe. Luza kukhala xa lushiywe lodwa kwaye izikhalo zalo ziza kwahluka ngokwemfuno zalo. Luza kuqalisa ukuhleka - le yindlela oluthetha ngayo nawe.
Ukubona: Usana lwakho luza kuqwalasela ngakumbi ubuso. Lulandele izinto ezihambayo, lukwazi nokwehlula phakathi kobumnyama nokukhanya. Luza kuzibona izinto eziqhelekileyo nabantu elibaziyo xa bekumgama ongangama-30cm ukusuka kuye. Amehlo akhe aza kuqala ukusebenzisana nezandla.
PHAKATHI KWEYESINE NEYESIXHENXE ...
Umntwana ngoku uyakwazi ukubamba izinto, nokuzisusa kwesinye isandla azise kwesinye. Ufuna ukuhlola yonk' into... ngokuthi ayifake emlonyeni.
Uyasokola ukufumana izinto ezikude kunaye, kwaye uyaqalisa ngoku ukuqonda izinto ezilula "isenzo nesiphumo" - umzekelo, xa ekhaba ibhola iza kuqengqeleka iye kude.
Uyakwazi ukudlala ngokungxola kwaye, xa elele ngomqolo, uyakwazi ukubamba iinyawo zakhe neenzwane azizise emlonyeni wakhe.
Usana lwakho uza kuqala ukuqengqelekela emacaleni xa elele ngesisu. Ekuqaleni kungothusa emntwaneni nasebazalini, yiloo nto ke kungafunekanga umntu ashiye usana lodwa kwindawo ephakamileyo.
Ubunzima bentloko bubo obumqengqelekisa ayokuwa kwaye kwiinyanga ezimbalwa ezizayo oku kuqengqeleka kuza kuya ngokuphucuka... de akwazi ukugaqa.
Ngeli xesha umntwana wakho sele elazi igama lakhe uyakuva naxa usithi "Hayi!" Ilizwi lakhe sele likhulile ngoku uyakwazi ukubiza oonobumba, abanjengo- "d," "b" "no-m."
Uza kumane elivavanya "ilizwi" lakhe enze izandi ezahlukeneyo.
Nanini na ukusukela kwinyanga yesithandathu, uza kuvela izinyo lakhe lokuqala. Amazinyo angaphambili amabini asezantsi nasentla azakuvela kuqala. Oku kuza kumthukuthezela, akhale, mhlawumbi abe nazo neentsini ezibomvu, ezibuhlungu. Uza kubhibhidla afune ukuhlafuna kwanto.
Xa sele eneenyanga ezintandathu uza kube sele ekwazi ukuginya ukutya okuthambileyo. Xa zisixhenxe sele ekwazi ukuhlafuna kancinane.
Uza kube efunda ukuhlala, kodwa uza kufuna ukuxhaswa kuqala.
Ngoku umntwana wakho ukhula ngokukhawuleza uqalisa ukubonakalisa iimvakelelo ezininzi, njengokonwaba, ukuvuya, ukukhathazeka, umsindo, ukoyika nokumangaliseka.
Ukubona: Umntwana ngoku uyakwazi ukwehlula imibala eyohlukeneyo abon' izinto zikude. Akwazi nokulandela izinto ezihambayo ngamehlo akhe.
PHAKATHI KWEYE-8 NEYE-12...
Apha umntwana sele eyiqonda into "ephakathi" kunye "nengaphandle" kwaye uqalise ukudibanisa imifanekiso-ngqondweni namagama kunye nemifanekiso.
Kweli nqanaba umntwana uyayazi intsingiselo yamagama ngaphezu kokukwazi ukuwabiza. Uza kuzama ukubiza eziny' izandi ezinzima, kwaye uza kuwazi namagama aqhelekileyo afana "nodada'"kunye "nogogo."
Uza kuzama ukulinganisa amagama kwaye enze akuthunywayo okanye asebenzise iintetho ezilula xa ecela.
De kube ngoku umntwana wakho ubesebenzisa isandla sonke ukubamba - ngoku uza kuqala ukuphakamisa izinto ezincinci esebenzisa ubhontsi nocikicane.
Uza kuqalisa ukunyola izinto ngomnwe, abethekise athulule izinto zakhe zokudlala. Uza kuthanda ukubhabhayisa nokukhomba!
Xa elapha kwiinyanga ezilithoba umntwnana wakho uza konwabela ukutya ngezandla. Amaxesha amaninzi uza kukhotha alume... achithe! Afunde nokusela ngekomityi.
Ukusukela ngoku, uza kuziphakamela, ngokubambelela ezintweni, azulazule kakhulu kunakuqala.
Abanye abantwana bakwazi ukugaqa xa beneenyanga ezilithoba kwaye ngoku sezikwazi ukuzihlalela zingaxhaswanga. Abanye bakhetha "ukuzirhuqa," barhubuluze ngeempundu bezitsala ngemilenze.
Ukubona: Usana lwakho ngoku lukwazi ukubona izinto ezincincane (neemvuthuluka zesonka eziphantsi), kwaye luqonde umahluko phakathi "kwaphezulu," "naphansti."
Kunyaka wokuqala ingqondo yosana lwakho iza kuphindana kabini ukuze ibe sisiqingatha sengqondo yalo epheleleyo
