Njengoko abazali besazi, abantwana abancinci ziziphithi-phithi ezifuna ukusoloko zilityaziswa ngento emabayenze. Kodwa kunzima ukubonwabisa xa ungenamali. Nantsi imidlalo, eyonwabisayo, elula kwaye engafuni mali ongayidlala wena nomntwana wakho...
Ukuvuthela amadlu: Abantwana abancinci bayakuthanda ukuvuthela ukuleqa, banqakule amandlu. Kufunek' isepha engamanzi, amanzi nendawo ephangaleleyo ukuze wonwabe nabantwana bakho.
Izitampu zeetapile: Sik' itapile phakathi uze uqingqe nokuba yintoni ngalo eza kuba lula. Umntwana wakho makalithi nkxu epeyintini, akugqiba alicinezele phezu kwephepha elicocekileyo. Umfanekiso lowo ningahombisa ngawo kungenjalo nenze ikhadi.
Ixesha lebali : Ukufunda yenye yeendlela ezilula zokonwabisa umntwana wakho. Ungamonwabisa ngakumbi ngokutshintsha amazwi xa ufunda de uwabaxe. Ndwendwela ithala leencwadi elikufutshane ukuze ufumane iincwadi ezintsha wandise ukucinga kwengqondo yomntwana wakho.
Fanisa: Khangel' iibhotile zeplastikhi ezingasenanto ekhitshini. Susa iziciko ukuze umntwana wakho azame ukufanisa ukuba sesiphi isiciko esihambelana neyiphi ibhotile.
Ibhokisi yeemfihlo: Thatha ibhokisi yethishu, ufake ezinye zezinto zokudlala zakhe ezincinci, itawuli yobuso, intyatyambo, njalo-njalo. Umntwana wakho makavale amehlo, afake isandla ave izinto. Ngokuya ekhula angazama ukuqashisa ukuba ubambe ntoni phambi kokuba ayikhuphe. (Zitshintshe izinto rhoqo.)
Ukwahlula iimpahla: Yenz' umsebenzi wasekhaya wonwabise. Mbonise ukohlula iimpahla ngokwemibala yazo njengomhlophe, umfundise namagama ohlukeneyo emibala. Emva koko myeke azifake emashinini wokuhlamba aze akuncede naxa uzikhupha.
Iintyatyambo: Umntwana wakho makagcwalise isitya seentyatyambo ngomhlaba, afake imbewu ayinkcenkceshele. Oku kuza kumfundisa inkathalo, kanti ke xa sel' imilile ukumangaliseka oza kukubona ebusweni bakhe sesona sipho sakho.
Inkampu: Phosa ingubo phezu kwezitulo ezine wenz' intente. Bek' imiqamelo kunye nezinto zokudlala azithandayo umyeke ahlale khona kusasa. Oku akumniki nje ulonwabo olunomahluko kodwa akuchith' ixesha, ukuyakha nokuyichitha.
Makujuxuzwe: Akukho nto ilula neyonwabisayo ngathi kukudanisa nomntwana wakho. Kodwa ngomculo onesingqi sokujuxuza umbukele xa ezophula. Uza kulinganisa wena, ngoko yithi "makaqhwabe izandla" okanye "amatshe." Ungamenza abe nomdla ngokumnika isikhenkxezisi aza kusikhalisa ngexa edanisa. Kuza kuba mnandi... kungxolwe!
Nandini Naidoo [x]

Uthungela
INJONGO kaMildred kukuba neshishini lakhe lokuthunga nesikolo esifundisa ukuthunga. Okwangoku izinto zimhambela kakuhle kuba usebenzela ekhaya kwaye wonwabela ukuba eziqeshe ngokwakhe.
UMildred Ngubane wayezimisele ukuphucul' ubomi bakhe waza waqalis' izifundo zokuthunga netitshala yakhe uNellie Nyawo kwiminyaka emithathu edlulileyo.
Ngelo xesha wayengumncedisi wasekhaya kwaye wayefunda kanye ngeveki ngenjikalanga.
Wathi esakukwazi ukusika iipateni nokuthunga waqalisa ukuthatha ii-odolo zabantu esakuphuma emsebenzini - de wanyanzeleka ukuba ayeke emsebenzini ngenxa yokwanda kwabathengi waza waqalisa ukuqhub' ishishini lakhe lokuthunga.
Ukususela ngoko usoloko exakekile zii-odolo zabathengi kwaye usebenza ukusuka ngentsimbi ye-9 kusasa de kube yeyesi-5 malanga iintsuku ezintlanu ngeveki.
"Ndisebenza nzima kodwa ndiyawuthand' umsebenzi wam ingakumbi kuba ndiziqeshile," utsho ngoncumo olugoso.
UMildred uthunga iiyunifom zezikolo, izinxibo zakwantu nezinxibo zomtshato.
Uyaziwa ekuhlaleni ngeempahla azithungayo ezintle.
UKUQALISA
Qala ngokuthenga umatshini wokuthunga oxabisa malunga ne-R600. Kodwa xa uthenga umatshini onezinto ezininzi ezifana nomthungo wezig-zag uthunga ngokukhawuleza!
Kufuneka ube nezikere ezibini zokusika, i-ayini netheyiphu yokulinganisa.
Abanye abathengi beza namalaphu abo kodwa kufuneka ube nawo amalaphu amahle ukuze utsale ngawo umdla wabathengi.
UKWENZA INZUZO
Kubalulekile ukuba uyibale imali oza kuthenga ngayo amalaphu, iiziphu, umqhaphu njalo-njalo ngaphambi kokubeka ixabiso lempahla oyithungileyo.
Uthi uMildred xa ukhawulezisa ukuthunga kwaye uthenga ngobulumko wenz' inzuzo entle.
"Umzekelo, ndithunga izikeyiti ezihlanu ngemini. Ndithenga ilaphu leskeyiti esiphantsi ngexabiso nge-R50, umqhaphu neziphu ndizithenge nge-R10," kuchaza yena.
"Ndichitha i-R60 ngeskeyiti ndize ndisithengise nge-R120. Ndithunga zibe zihlanu ngemini nto leyo ithetha ukuba ndenza inzuzo ye-R300.
"Xa ndikhawulezisa ukuthunga ndenz' inzuzo entle.
"Kuthath' ixesha ukuthunga iibhulukhwe zamadoda ngoko andikwazi ukuzithunga zibe ntlanu ngemini!
"Ndicebisa abanye abathungi ukuba bawenze afikeleleke amaxabiso abo kwaye bathunge iimpahla zexabiso ukuze bagcine abathengi babo.
"Enye inzuzo ndiyifumana kwiimpahla endiziqeshisayo ngoko kufuneka uhlale unazo ezithungiweyo. Xa ndiqeshise ngeempahla zomtshato ndifumana i-R1 000-R3 000, kuxhomekeka kwinani leempahla eziqeshwayo.
IINDAWO ZOKUFUNDA
Kuxhomekeka emalini nakwixesha onalo. Zininzi izikolo zokufundel' ukuthunga ezikunika isiqinisekiso okanye idiploma kwizifundo zokuyila ifashoni. Funda kwisikolo esithenjwayo. Hlal' uthe qwa ukuze uve xa kukho izifundo ezenziwayo kumaziko oluntu nasezicaweni. [x]

Molweni bahlobo
Kundichwayitisile ukuvuma kukaWinnie Modise okwikhava yethu ukuthetha ngezicwangciso zakhe zokuqala usapho. Kaloku ungumkhaya wam, kwaye noxa ndingamazi kwizitrato zaseShowe, KwaZulu-Natal, kum kuvakala ngathi ndiyamazi!
Kaloku usoloko uneqhayiya xa kukho indwalutho esuka kwindawo yakho. Ikunika ithemba loo nto kuba ikubonisa ukuba nawe ungenza okukhulu ngobomi bakho nokuba usukaphi na.
Ndikhulele kwilokishi yaseGezinsila kwaye ndineenkumbulo ezintle ngayo. Ngoku ndihlala edolophini, ndijikelezwe ziindonga neengcingo zombane, okubi kakhulu, ngabantu abajavu-javu.
Nam ndikwanjalo maxa wambi, ndingabulisi abamelwane, nezinye izinto.
Edolophini kuthiwa "ujonga indaba zakho" kwaye ngokokwam loo nto ichasene noBuntu.
Ukubonisa uthando kwiilokishi zethu, sinenkqaku elitsha kwiKhasi 22 nalapho iindumasi zeli zihamba nathi zisise ezikolweni zazo zakudala, kwizpaza ezazithenga kuzo isonka nkqu neekona zabo ababethandanela kuzo.
Sisekwezothando njalo, sibhiyozela inyanga yothando yonyaka, ekwenzekileyo ukuba ibe yinyanga yokuzalwa yam nonyana wam. Ngokuqinisekileyo ke kuza kuphekwa kubekho nemibhiyozo emininzi ekhaya, ndiza kusebenzisa iiresiphi ezininzi ezikumakhasi ethu okutya. Ingathi alisafiki ixesha lokuba ndenze umqombothi ndize ndiwujike ube sisilebelo, njengoko kubonisiwe kwiKhasi 66.
De kube lixesha elizayo!
Nihlale nisikelelekile,

Umyalezo oya kumantombazana aselula eli
I GAMA LAM ndinguKabelo, ndineminyaka eli-14. Ndibhalela iBONA kuba ndikhathazekile yindlela amantombazana aselula aziphethe ngayo, abeka ubomi nekamva lawo esichengeni.
Acinga ukuba ukuthandana namadoda amadala kunawo kuyawakhulisa, okanye kuwenza abe bhetele. Iqala apho ke inkathazo.
Athandana namadoda amadala kuba enemali - kaloku akafani nabafana abaselula!
Indlela la mantombazana acinga ngayo ibonakalisa ukuba akakakhuli ngokwaneleyo noxa esenza ngathi kunjalo, kodwa le yingxaki encinane kunajongene nazo.
Ntombazana, khawutsho: kutheni amadoda amadala ekuthanda? Akatsalwa kukuba ukrelekrele okanye umhle, enziwa kukuba ulula.
Wenza nantoni na ayifunayo kuba anemali. Akakuhloniphi kwaye akakhathalelanga neemvakalelo zakho.
Jonga ukuba kwenzeka ntoni
xa ukhulelwa! Ibaphi indoda ngelo xesha? Uphi "umphathiswa wezemali" wakho?
Kanti ke unethamsanqa xa uye wakhulelwa kuphela. La madoda ahamba elala.
Awuqondi ukuba oku kuthetha ukuthini?
Imali iza kukunceda njani xa ubulawa ngugawulayo? Thandana nabafana abalingana nawe wonwabe kwaye ukhuseleke!
nguKabelo Makati, eLimpopo

Musani ukubaxhasa
Xa sifuna uncedo emapoliseni nasezibhedlela izikhalo zethu azikwazi ukufikelela kubo. Oololiwe abafiki ngexesha baze abantu balahlekelwe yimisebenzi. Yintoni unobangela? Ngamasela aba iintambo zombane!
Kutheni abantu bewakhusela la masela?
Kulahleka izigidi zeerandi ngenxa yawo, kodwa abanye abantu bacinga ukuba ngamaqhawe!
Abantu abaqondi ukuba aba bantu ngabagrogrisi abagxobha-gxobha inkululeko yethu?
Ezi zikrelemnqa kunye nabaxhasi bazo bafanelwe kukugwetywa ixesha elide xa bede babanjwa. Xa benikwa ibheyile abazukuyeka kuba befuna ukubuyelwa yimali yabo.
Amasela nabaxhasi bawo mabalumke kuba ngenye imini abahlali baya kudikwa bawuthathele kubo umthetho baphelise obu busela!

Ibuhlungu into yokwahlukaniswa kwabantwana noonina kuba kungavumelekanga ngokwesintu ukuba ibhinqa lende nabantwana balo bangaphandle komtshato.

Kutheni le nto kulindeleke
ukuba amabhinqa ashiya abantwana babo ukuza kukhulisa abantwana bendoda?

Akukho bhinqa limele lishiye abantwana balo ngenxa yendoda! Ukuba uyakuthanda ngenene, uza kubathanda nabantwana bakho!

Inzala yemali ephezulu
Masizondle ngokwethu!
Ndithumela le foto ukunibulela ngenqaku lenu lezolimo. Mhlawumbi iya kutsho ikhuthaze nabanye abafundi ukuba basukume balwe nendlala ngokuziqalela ezabo iigadi zemifuno.

KULE MIHLA ingxaki asingomaxabiso okutya axhomileyo okanye indleko zezithuthi kuphela. Ngoku izinto ezazisaya kuba zezemihla ngemihla ngoku zithathwa njengobuncwane. Abaninzi bethu basuke ekuhlawuleni ilobola ukuya ekungakhuphini nesenti, ekuthengeni iikhondom ukuya ekusebenziseni eziphisayo. Ezi zimeko abantu abajongene nazo ebomini babo.
Masiqale ngowona mceli-mngeni ethi indoda ijongana nawo xa ifuna ukutshata - ilobolo.
Kula maxesha anzima amadoda azama ukwenza iimfanelo zawo. Angazange acele imitshato ngokukhawuleza, njengakunyaka ophelileyo, ngokuqinisekileyo ayazisola. Ipetroli nenzala yemali-mboleko ayikokuphela kwezinto ezonyukayo - abazali babiza imali ethe kratya xa besendisa iintombi zabo.
Abo abakwazileyo ukuyihlawula yonke ilobolo ngoku bazibona bengenako ukuthwala iindleko zemitshato emibini - omhlophe nowesintu.
Ngoku abatshati abaninzi bakhetha ukwenza umtshato wesintu wona ungenazikeyiki zibude bukrweca izulu, abakhaphi abathandathu, iiholo zexabiso neelokhwe ezimhlophe eziyokozelayo.
Eli xesha linzima lichaphazela nemibandela yasegumbini lokulala. Abantu abadala abakhathalayo ababethenga iikhondom ezinamavumba amnandi nezinye ezikhethekileyo ngoku basebenzisa ezikarhulumente zasimahla, nkqu neLovers-Plus azifikeleleki.
Izitokfela nazo zisengxakini. Akusekho mali igcinekayo, ngoko amalungu ashiyekela ngemva kwiintlawulo zenyanga. Ngokuqinisekileyo oku kuza kushiya amalungu engonwabanga kuba kaloku athembele emibuthweni ukuba ibahlangule xa besengxakini, njengaxa umntu kufuneka engcwabe isihlobo ebesingasebenzi.
Sisathetha ngemingcwabo njalo, ingaba uyayiqaphela indlela elehle ngayo inani lokutyhilwa kwamatye? Le nkonzo ingena nzulu epokothweni ayisenziwa kwiintsapho ezininzi kodwa ibe inyanzelekile ibekho. Kaloku ifuna inkomo, ukutya okuninzi notywala, iimpahla zokunxiba, iintente, iibhasi eziza kuhlawulwa.
Njengama-Afrika asixabisanga nje amasiko nezinyanya zethu kuphela kodwa siyixabisile necawe kwaye siyamthanda uThixo. Abaninzi babesaya kunikela ngeemali ezinkulu ecaweni nezishumi, kodwa ngoku abasenako.
Kwaye ukuba ungumntu othanda ukupholisa ingqondo ngebhiya emva komsebenzi wemini, imele ikukhathaze le meko yezoqoqosho.
Umzekelo, endaweni yokukhe ujikele eMeisies Shebeen e-Orlando East eSoweto, unyanzeleka ukuba uye ngqo ekhaya. Kwaye unyanzeleka ukuba utye ekhaya nokuba awuthandi. Kaloku amadoda amaninzi akasenayo imali yokuzithengela ipapa nolusu kwaBra Ben's Place.
Ukuba ukwazile ukuphuma ekhaya unendawo yakho kwaye ubusoloko ungumntwana omhle othumelayo ekhaya kuza kuba nzima ngoku. Usapho lwakho luza kukuva ukhalaza usithi awusenayo imali onayo ayeneli ukuthenga ukutya kwabo nokwakho.
Nanjengoko uTito Mboweni etshilo, lixesha lokuba sibophe amabhanti. Kuza kuba nzima: abanye bethu baza kuncipha emizimbeni ngenxa yokungatyi inyama yonke imihla nangenxa yokukhathazwa kukungabi namali.

UMKHUHLANE wenziwa yintsholongwane engena emzimbeni ichaphazel' umbhobho wokuphefumla. Uyosulela yiyo loo nto ufumanisa ukuba uphatha abantu abaninzi ngaxeshanye.
Umkhuhlane udla ngokuthatha iveki kuphela kwaye iimpawu zawo zifana nezeflu nezokukrala kwemiphunga (pneumonia).
Xa umntu onomkhuhlane ekhohlela okanye ethimla kuphuma amaqabazana asasazeka emoyeni aze athelele nabanye.
Abantwana bayaphathwa kakhulu ngumkhuhlane njengoko bona befunyanwa lula kukugula xa bedlala nabany' abantwana.
Uwubona njani umkhuhlane
Umkhuhlane uneempawu ezininzi eziquka umqala obuhlungu, ukuvaleka kwempumlo nomkhunyu ovuzayo, ukukhohlela nokuthimla. Kulula ukuzibon' iimpawu zomkhuhlane ebantwaneni kwaye ziyaziveza ngokunokwazo.
Yintoni umahluko phakathi kokungenwa yingqele nomkhuhlane"
Uninzi lwabantu lucing' ukuba yinto enye umkhuhlane nokungenwa yingqele. Zombini ezi zinto zineempawu ezifanayo kwaye ziyosulela. Ukungenwa yingqele kubhetele kunokuphathwa ngumkhuhlane. Umkhuhlane wenza ube nobushushu obuphezulu, umzimba oqaqambayo, intloko ebuhlungu nokudinwa.
Ukunyanga umkhuhlane
Umkhuhlane nje oqhelekileyo ukuphatha iveki kuphela kwaye ungawunyanga ngamayeza owathenga ekhemisti ingakumbi umqala obuhlungu nokuxinana kwempumlo. (Buza ekhemisti.)
Xa kungapheli ukukhohlela de kuphele iiveki ezimbini mse kugqirha umntwana wakho kuba kungenzeka ukuba unosuleleko.
Mnxibise iimpahla ezishushu umkhuthaze ukuba atye ukutya okunempilo asele izinto ezishushu ukuze omeleze amajoni omzimba.
Iingxaki
Umkhuhlane awenzi zingxaki zitheni kodwa uwenza buthathaka amajoni omzimba.
Ukukrala kwamehlo nendlebe ngaphakathi, ukuxinana, ukudumba kweendimla nokukrala kwemiphunga kwenziwa yenye intsholongwane engena kuba umntwana ebuthathaka.
Mgcine ekhuselekile
Amajoni omzimba abantwana awomelelanga kuyaphi ngoko kufuneka umkhusele. Qinisekis' ukuba ibhotile yakhe needami zicocekile kwaye zikhutshwe intsholongwane ngaphambi kokuzinik' umntwana wakho.
Xa kukho umntwana ogulayo makangasondeli elusaneni lwakho.

Ukumelana nokulunywa
XA sele lusiza usana uva ngeentlungu nangokulunywa. Ukulunywa kuyindalo kodwa zikho iindlela zendalo nezonyango zokukunceda umelane neentlungu zokulunywa.
Iindlela zendalo zokuphelis' iintlungu
Ababelekisi baneendlela zendalo zokuphelis' iintlungu abazikhuthazayo ingakumbi xa ufuna ukubeleka ungakhange usele mayeza. Eziny' izibhedlele neekliniki azinazo iipilisi zeentlungu ezifana ne-epidural. Ngoko ke khauzame enye yezi ndlela zendalo zokuphelis' iintlungu...
uUkuphulula: Iqabane lakho malikuphulule isinqa ukuze zibe bhetele iintlungu kuba inkoliso yoomama abalunywayo baphathwa sisinqa.
uUkuphefumla: Uza kuba bhetele xa uqwalasel' indlela ophefumla ngayo. Xa uyohlukuhla ufund' iindlela zokuphefumla omawuzisebenzise xa ubeleka. Phefumla kancinci, uphefumle nzulu ngempumlo uze uwukhuphe ngomlomo. Phefumla njengesiqhelo xa ulunywa.
Iindlela zonyango zokuphelis' iintlungu
Zintathu ezona zisetyenziswayo. Ukuzifumana kwakho kuxhomekeka kwindawo obelekela kuyo...
uINitrous oxide (igesi): Ifumaneka ezibhedlele kwaye ngumbelekisi oqeqeshiweyo oyikhuphayo. Uphefumlela ngaphakathi igesi usebenzisa isigqubuthelo sobuso. Initrous oxide izitheza amandla iintlungu kodwa ayiziphelisi tu kwaphela.
u IPethidine: Esi sisitofu esiphelis' iintlungu esihlala iiyure ezimbini ukusa kwezine. Usifumana kuphela esibhedlele ngoko ke xa uza kubelekela ekhaya awunakusifumana.
uI-Epidural: Esi sisibulali-zintlungu esisetyenziswa kumabhinqa azibelekelayo nalawo abeleka ngotyando. Utofwa ngaso emnqonqweni kwaye sikwenza ube ndindisholo ukuqala esinqeni ukuhla. Iepidural iyanceda kodwa ifumaneka kuphela xa uyicele kuselithuba kwisibhedlele sabucala.
Inkxaso yeqabane lakho
Inkxaso yeqabane lakho xa ubeleka iyakunceda ukuthoba inkxalabo onayo ngokubeleka. Hamba nalo xa uyohlukuhla. Kaloku loo nto iza kulinceda ilifundise emalikwenze ngomhla omkhulu.

kwabantwana
UBUSAZI na ukuba kubalulekile ukuthetha nabantwana bakho" Kuphando lwakutshanje iingcali zophando zaseUK zifumanise ukuba abantwana abaneminyaka emithathu abakwazi kakuhle ukuthetha. Ezi ngcali zikholelwa ekubeni abantwana abaninzi baqal' ukufunda ekhreshi bengekakwazi ukuncokola nabazali babo.
Zithi abazali abaziniki ixesha elaneleyo lokuthetha nabantwana ngenxa yokuba bedlala ngezinto zokudlala, bebukela iTV, bedlala imidlalo bengaphazanyiswa ngabazali. Abantwana kufuneka bathethe nabazali babo ingakumbi xa bengekho abantakwabo abanokuthetha nabo ukuze bakwazi ukuthetha kakuhle.

Omawukwazi ngokungo-ndleki
KUBANTWANA abaswelekayo isiqingatha sabo babulawa kukungondleki okwenza umzimba ungakwazi ukumelana neengulo.
Ukungondleki kwenz' umntwana angakhuli (abe mfutshane kuneentanga zakhe), abe mncinci, angabi naye uvithamin A, i-ayoni, i-iodine, izinc nefolic acid.
Ukungondleki kwenziwa yintlupheko, ukungabikho kococeko nezempilo.
Xa umntwana engondlekanga kwiminyaka yakhe emibini yokuqala ingqondo nomzimba wakhe zikhula kancinci. Akabi bhetele nokuba sele ekhulile - uchaphazeleka ubomi bakhe bonke.
Umntwana ongondlekanga uthatha kade esikolweni, akakwazi ukusebenza, ingqondo yakhe ithatha kade, akonwabi kwaye uba sesichengeni sokungenwa zizifo.[x]

WAZI AMALUNGELO AKHO
Kule nyanga sichaza ilungelo lokugcin' abantwana nokuba kutheni abazali bobabini befanele bafune ilungelo lokugcin' abantwana xa beqhawul' umtshato
UKUGCIN' ABANTWANA
Siqhawul' umtshato nenkosikazi yam. Abantwana bethu ababini baza kuhlala nenkosikazi. Siyevana nayo. Kodwa umntu endiphangela naye undicebise ukuba mandifune ilungelo lokuba "sibagcine sobabini abantwana". Uthi oko kuya kundikhusela xa izinto zingahambi kakuhle, okanye xa inkosikazi ifuna ukutshata nomny' umntu. Yintoni "ilungelo lokugcin' abantwana nobabini"?
ICEBISO LESCORPION
Unyanisile umntu osebenza naye! Kubalulekile ukuba nelungelo lokugcin' abantwana.
Into oyiva kakhulu kuqhawulo-mtshato ngumba "wesondlo sabantwana". Kodwa ke oko akuthethi kuthi imiba ebalulekileyo mayingahoywa.
Omnye wayo ke kukugcinwa kwabantwana. Ukugcin' abantwana ayikokuhlala nje nabantwana ababini eninabo. Baninzi nabantu abangaziyo ukuba unako ukukhetha kumba wokugcinwa kwabantwana. Akunyanzelekanga ukuba elo lungelo linikwe umzali omnye!
Zimbini iindidi zelungelo lokugcin' abantwana: "bayagcinwa ngumzali omnye" okanye "bagcinwe ngabazali bobabini".
Inkundla inika ilungelo lokugcin' abantwana umzali obafunayo - nekudla ngokuba ngunina.
Elo lungelo linikwa umzali omnye xa bexambulisana abazali ngokuba ngubani ofanele agcin' abantwana.
Kodwa ngenxa yokuguquka kweendima zobuzali, kuya kusetyenziswa ngakumbi ukunikwa kwabazali bobabini ilungelo lokugcin' abantwana.
Oku kwenza abantwana bachith' ixesha elininzi nabazali bobabini kwaye abazali kufuneka bathethane ngaphambi kokwenza isigqibo esichaphazel' abantwana.
Nazi eziny' izinto oku okuluncedo ngazo:
Umntwana akaziva elahliwe ngomnye umzali.
Umsebenzi wokukhulis' abantwana niyabelana ngawo.
Awubi nengxaki yokungababoni abantwana.
Utata uyakwazi ukubona ukuba isetyenziswa njani imali yakhe yesondlo.
Kufuneka intsebenziswano kubazali ukuze eli lungelo lisebenze - kwaye kungenzeka oku kubenzima. Kaloku basukuba boyisiwe kukuhlala ndawonye emtshatweni.
Ukuze nilinikwe nobabini eli lungelo kufuneka niphumeze le miqathango mine:
1 UTHANDO NENTSEBENZISWANO. Abazali bobabini mabazinikele ekuthandeni nasekukhathaleleni abantwana, basebenzisane ekuphumezeni oku.
2 IINJONGO. Abazali mababe neenjongo ezifanayo ngobomi babantwana. Iyantlukwano yabo ingababhida abantwana kuze kungabikho mvano kubazali.
3 MABANGAQELELANI. Abazali mabangaqelelani. Ilungelo lokugcin' abantwana bobabini abanakulinikwa xa omnye ehlala eJoburg, abe omnye ehlaba eKapa.
4 UBUDALA. Ubudala babantwana nokuba bangaphi kuya kuba negalelo kwisigqibo senkundla.
Kunzim' ukufumana ilungelo lokugcin' abantwana nobabini. Kodwa xa usazimisele ngokuba nenxaxheba kubomi bomntwana wakho, lilungelo ongalifuna. [x]
AMANDL' OMTHETHO
KUJONGWA IIMFUNO ZOMNTWANA
Inkundla ibeka iimfuno zomntwana phambili xa isenza isigqibo ngomzali oza kugcin' abantwana. Ngokwesithethe kudla ngokuba ngumama obonwa engabagcina kakuhle abantwana. Nenkundla ke ingacinga kanjalo kwaye nisethubeni lokunikwa ilungelo lokubagcina nobabini xa nivumelana ukuba ngunina oza kubagcina ixesha elininzi.
ABAFOTIWEYO BAYALINGANISA
Thumela ingxaki yakho yomthetho ku -BONA Legal Advice, Box 32083, Mobeni, 4060 - uya kufumana ithuba lokuxoxa negqwetha imizuzu engama- 30 ngaphandle kokuhlawula, kwi-ofisi zalo naphi na kweli okanye emnxebeni.
Sizamile ukuqinisekisa ukuba ufumana iingcebiso ezizizo. Kodwa ityala netyala lifuna ukuphandisiswa kwaye abeScorpion Legal Protection (Pty) Ltd, igqiza labacebisi neBONA nabashicileli bayo abanakubekwa tyala ngelahleko engafunyanwa ngumntu osebenzise iingcebiso zalo mhlathi.

Indlela eyiyo YOKUSEBENZISANA
UKUBA umqeshi wakho ucinga ukuba awukwazi ukusebenzisana noogxa bakho, loo nto ithetha ukuba ukwacinga ukuba wena usoloko ukhalaza kwaye awuwazi nomsebenzi wakho! Ngoko ukuba ufuna ukuqhubela phambili emsebenzini wakho, lixesha lokuba ubonise inkampani yakho ukuba wena unentsebenziswano ngokwenza oku kulandelayo:
1 YIBA NENTSEBENZISWANO NOKUQONDA
Kufuneka ujonge iimfuno zabanye ngaphambi kwezakho, uncede xa unako.
2 PHUCULA INDLELA YOKUTHETHA NEYOKUPHULAPHULA
Mamelisisisa uhoye oogxa bakho! Oku kuza kubabonisa ukuba uzimisele ukunceda baze baqale ke ukukuthemba. Xa usenza ngolu hlobo ukhuthaza intembeko.Oko ke kukusebenzisana!
3 YIBA NGUMSOMBULULI
Umsebenzi ozisombululayo iingxaki, angasoloko ekhalaza ubonwa njengomntu owenzayo umsebenzi. Nanjengoko uJoel Osteen oyingcali kwezemisebenzi esithi: "Ungaze uze neengxaki kumqeshi wakho ngaphandle kokuza namacebo okuzisombulula."
4 UKUHLONIPHANA
Imacala mabini le nto: xa ufuna ukuhlonitshwa nawe bahloniphe abany' abantu. Zama ukuluphepha ukruthakruthwano phakathi kwamalungu eqela osebenza nalo, kwaye ungasondeli ebantwini abaziwa ngokuhleba.
5 UNGAGWEGWELEZI
Ukuba unengxaki nomnye woogxa bakho, yilungiseni ninobabini ungafaki umntu wesithathu. (Kodwa kukho umehluko xa utshutshiswa ngesondo okanye enye into embi.)
6 ZISHIYE EKHAYA IINGXAKI ZOSAPHO LWAKHO
Musa ukuza emsebenzini unomsindo. Akukho mntu uthanda umntu osoloko ekhalaza ngeengxaki zakhe.
7 BENZE BAKUKHUMBULE.
Yiba ngumsebenzi oxabisekileyo kangangokuba abantu bayakukhumbula xa usekhefini!

IZINTO EZI-5 ONGAFANELANGA UZENZE
Ukubaleka umsebenzi uwushiyele abanye abantu.
Ukusoloko ucela ukwenzelwa izinto njengokujongelwa izinto ezithile kwi-Intanethi kodwa kungekho nto uyenzayo.
Ukuba sisiphazamiso, njengokusoloko uncokola emnxebeni.
Ukuxoka nokugada okwenziwa ngabanye wakugqiba uhambe uyokuthetha ngabo kumphathi.
Ukuhamba uyalela abantu ngomsebenzi wabo.
Ungaphumelela kwaye uhlonitshwe ngabany' abantu ukuba nje ungafunda ukukhuthaza abanye, usebenzisane nabo kwaye wabelane nabo ngolwazi onalo
YIBA
NGU-MPHATHI
Ibhinqa eli-phumeleleyo lisinika amacebo
Kwiminyaka eli-10 edlulileyo, u-Ayanda Mbanga wabona ithuba lokuvula ishishini - ngoku yena neqela lakhe bazuza iimbasa
LALINGEKHO elinye ibhinqa elingumdaka elalineshishini lokuqesha abasebenzi elisebenza ngeenkampani endaweni yabantu abakhangela umsebenzi - de u-Ayanda Mbanga wavula elakhe.
"Endaweni yokukhangelela abantu abafuna umsebenzi iinkampani eziza kubaqesha, sinceda iinkampani zizithengise ebantwini abaphezulu abakumgangatho wokuzikhethela iinkampani abafuna zibaqeshe," litshilo xa licacisa eli nenekazi linama-34 eminyaka, elinenkampani esandul' ukuwongwa iimbasa zoshishino ezi-6.
"Sasibane kuphela ukuqala kwethu, kodwa ndandikonwabela ukwenza yonke into - ukuya eposini, ndibhale iintengiso nokuthetha neenkampani ezisebenzisa iinkonzo zethu.
"Ngoku sinabasebenzi abangama-34 nee-ofisi eziseRhawutini, eKapa naseThekwini."
Iingcebiso zika-Ayanda:
Yiba nothando:
"Kufuneka uyithande into oyenzayo ukuze uphumelele, kaloku xa unothando lwento oyenzayo uyakhuthazeka naxa sekunzima."
Hlala ulungile:
"Ukuba neshishini lakho kuza kukuzisel' imali ekugqibeleni kodwa kufuneka ulungele ukusebenza iiyure ezininzi."
Yenzisisa:
"Okubalulekileyo kukuzisa iinkonzo ezisemgangathweni ebantwini, hayi ukuthetha kamnandi nokwaziwa kuphela kuba kaloku maninzi amashishini akhuphisana nawe."
Nyamezela:
"Wonke ubani unamahla-ndinyuka - maxa wambi uye ubone ngathi akusokuze kuphinde kulunge!"
Khangela elakho ithuba:
"Ikroba endalibonayo kwiminyaka eli-10 eyadlulayo alisekho ngoku; ngoko kufuneka sitshintshe ukuze siqhubele phambili."[x]
Umbhali: Patricia McCracken
Umfoti: Peter Whitfield
FUMANA UMSE-BENZI
JIKA UMSEBENZI WETHUTYANA UBE NGOSISIGXINA!
Ungawujika umsebenzi wakho wethutyana ube ngosisigxina xa ungazibonakalisa kuloo nkampani kwelo thutyana lincinci ukuba ingakugcina ixesha elide, ukholelwa koku uGayleen Baxter wakwaKelly. Uthi ungakwenza oku ngolu hlobo:
Zithembe:
Uza kuqaqamba kunabanye xa uzithembile, unenzondelelo kwaye uzimisele ukwenza kakuhle.
Thembeka:
Musa ukuhambis' ixesha - sebenza zonke iiyure omele ukuzisebenza nangaphezulu! Umphathi wakho makazi xa uthatha ikhefu, kwaye ubuye ngexesha.
Volontiya:
Ukuba ngowokuqala ukuvolontiya xa kukho umsebenzi kubonakalisa ukuzimisela nokuba nomdla wokufunda ngomsebenzi - kwaye kukwenza uwufunde ngokukhawuleza.
Thetha phandle:
Nika izimvo zakho xa ubuzwa. Zithethe iimbono ezintsha onazo, ungalahli amathuba.
Zinza engqondweni:
Xa kulixesha apho kuxakekwe kakhulu, zibonakalise ukuba unako ukumelana nemeko enjalo.
Makwaziwe okufunayo:
Mxelele umphathi wakho ukuba ukhangela umsebenzi osisigxina - kodwa musa ukusoloko umkhumbuza!
Bonisa ukuba uyimfuneko:
Nantoni na oyenzayo yenze ngokuzimisela, ukuze abaphathi bakho babone ukuba uyimfuneko.

ULWAPHULO-MTHETHO
Babohlukene nomkakhe kwaye ezimisele ukutshata kwakhona - kodwa ngenxa yamatyala wayengenako ukuthwala iindleko zokuqhawula umtshato. Kodwa xa umkakhe wayengasweleka wayengafumana imali yakhe ye-inshorensi. Ngoko wenza iyelenqe lokumbulala
UJEFF LAMB ongumqhubi wetraki erhuqa iimoto wasePalm Beach, eFlorida, watsalela umnxeba amapolisa wawaxelela ukuba inkosikazi yakhe iswelekile, kwakunzima nokuthetha ngendlela awayekhathazeke ngayo.
Ngomhla we-15 kuJuni 2004, wagoduka wafika inkosikazi yakhe, uCathy ibethwe yabulawa.
Kwakukho igazi yonk' indawo. Phantse onk' amathambo emzimbeni kaCathy Lamb ayophukile, kodwa umbulali wayembethe entloko kakhulu, kuba "yayithambe" okwebhola eflethi.
Izinja zesi sibini ezimbini kwezintathu zazibethwe kakhulu nazo, de kwanyanzeleka ukuba zibulawe. Eyesithathu yafunyanwa egumbini lokulala itshixelwe, kodwa ingenawo nomkrwelo.
Amapolisa amangaliswa yiloo nto. Ngubani ongaqhekeza emzini onezinja ezintathu? Kaloku umqhekezi ubemel' ukukhetha umzi ongenabungozi.
Kwakukho nezinye izinto ezikrokrisayo, utsho uKim Bradley, owayengumcuphi weli tyala.
UJeff wathi emapoliseni alahlekile amacici egolide kaCathy. Loo nto ke yawenza acinga ukuba injongo yolo hlaselo yayikukuqhekeza. Ngenene kwakubonakala ukuba kukho umntu obehamba evula iiwadrophu needrowa indlu yonke, kodwa abacuphi bafumanisa ukuba ngamacici kuphela angekhoyo!
Oku ke kwakuthetha ukuba kukho umntu obezama ukwenza ngathi ubezokuqhekeza waze wabulala engaqondanga. Oko kwenza uJeff owayengumyeni womfi abengumrhanelwa wokuqala.
Iingcali ezihlola umzimba zona zafumanisa ukuba uCathy wabulawa phakathi kwe-4.30 nentsimbi yesi-5 malanga.
UJeff wathi wayesemsebenzini ngelo xesha - kwaye kukho abantu abanokumngqinela kuloo nto.
Abacuphi baqalisa ukukhangela abanye abarhanelwa. Baqala ngokukrokrela uJoey Steidel.
Kaloku yena wayesisinqanda-mathe sikaJeff kwaye wafika kanye emva kokufika kwamapolisa kwindawo yexhwayelo.
"Kwakungaqhelekanga ukubona umyeni ofelwe yinkosikazi ethuthuzelwa yintombi ancuma nayo," utsho uDetective Bradley.
Wathi akubuzwa ngaloo nto, uJeff wathi bebebuyelana nomkakhe, uCathy.
UJoey Steidel osisinqanda-mathe sakhe wayengayazi loo nto. Ngokokwazi kwakhe yena noJeff babeza kuhlala kunye.
Yena ubephi ngexesha lokugwintwa kukaCathy? Amapolisa afumanisa uyiweyitala kwivenkile yokutya ekufutshane kwaye abathengi abaninzi babembonile.
Athi amapolisa xa ejonga iselfowuni kaJeff afumana umrhanelwa wesithathu.
Yayilelinye ibhinqa elalithethe emnxebeni noJeff ngaloo njikalanga.
Emva nje kokubulawa kukaCathy, malunga nentsimbi yesi-5 emalanga, uJeff watsalela umnxeba ibhinqa elinguLisa, ekwafumaniseka ukuba lingummelwane wesinqanda-mathe sikaJeff.
ULisa wayetshatile enabantwana ababini kwaye wavuma ukuba naye wayethandana noJeff Lamb.
Enyanisweni babesandula ukubhaqwa ngumyeni wakhe kwiiveki ezimbalwa ezidlulileyo phambi kokubulawa kukaCathy.
URay ongumyeni kaLisa wathi emapoliseni: "Ndamshiyela umyalezo kwiselfowuni yakhe othi, ukuba uke waphinda walubeka emzini wam okanye asondele kusapho lwam ndiza kumbulala.
"Ndathi ndakwenza nantoni na ukukhusela usapho lwam."
Ngenxa yala mazwi uRay wazenza umrhanelwa wesine.
Kodwa abacuphi bakhawuleza bafumanisa ukuba uRay nowakwakhe banamangqina athi ayekunye nabo ngexesha lokubulawa kukaCathy, batsho bakhutshwa kuluhlu lwabarhanelwa.
Uphando lwamapolisa olujonga iselfowuni ukuba ibiwutsala iphi umnxeba, lwanceda abacuphi bakwazi ukubona ukuba uJeff wayekufutshane nendlu abulawelwa kuyo uCathy ukutsala kwakhe loo mnxeba.
Oko kwakuthetha ukuba wayexoka emapoliseni ukuba wayekude nendlu leyo de kwangentsimbi yesi-7 apho wafumana isidumbu sikaCathy.
Wathi inja yakhe, uBandit yayisegumbini elitshixiweyo ukubulawa kukaCathy.
Ingene njani, ingenela ntoni?
Khona kutheni inja kaJeff yona yodwa ingalimalanga, kodwa zibe ezikaCathy zibethwe kangaka?
Amapolisa aphanda nzulu ngakumbi ngoJeff aze afumana enye yeenjongo ezindala zokubulala - imali.
Kwiminyaka embalwa edlulileyo umqeshi kaJeff wamtyhola ngokuba imali emalunga
ne-R200 000. Wayibuyisa loo mali waze wavuma ukuhlawula
i-R60 000 ngaphezulu esisohlwayo ngezavenge.
Kodwa kwaya kusiba nzima ukwenza ezo ntlawulo.
Kwakhona amapolisa afumanisa ukuba i-inshorensi kaCathy ibiza kuhlawula uJeff malunga ne-R60 000 xa esweleka.
"Yayiyi-inshorensi encinane kodwa ndicinga ukuba uJeff wayethembe yona kwaye wayengakhathali nokuba uyifumene njani na," utsho uDetective Bradley.
Kwafunyanwa amachaphaza egazi likaCathy ezimpahleni zikaJeff awayezinxibe ngemini yokubulawa kwakhe.
Kwakhona umcuphi wafumana elinye lamacici awathi uJeff alahlekile epokothweni yakhe.
Emva kweenyanga ezimbini ebulewe uCathy, umsebenzi othile wafumana intsimbi kuphahla lwesakhiwo salapho uJeff wayesebenza khona. Kwathi kanti sesona sixhobo ekwabulawa ngaso.
UJeff Lamb wabanjwa phantsi kwesityholo sokubulala.
Amapolisa ayekholelwa ekubeni uJeff wayefuna ukuwuqhawula umtshato. Esi sibini sasike sohlukana iminyaka embalwa, saphinda sabuyelana. Kodwa kwakungekho nto itshintshileyo, kuba uJeff waqhuba nokungathembeki.
UCathy wayeyinyamezele le nto kodwa engayithandi.
Phofu wayembulalela ntoni? Kutheni wayengasuke aqhawule umtshato?
Isizathu sinye, yimali. UJeff wayehlawula i-R60 000 eyayisisohlwayo kwaye ukuqhawula umtshato kwakuza kumshiya engenamali ngakumbi kubenzima ukuhlawula elo tyala.
Amapolisa akholelwa ukuba uJeff wayezimisele ukuqala ubomi obutsha ngale mali kaCathy.
Ngenjikalanga yaloo mini wayesemsebenzini. Ngokutsho kukagxa wakhe uJeff wathi uyokutha ipetroli emotweni, wemka phakathi kwe-4.30 ukuya kwintsimbi yesi-5 emalanga.
Walinda uCathy wabuya emsebenzini, waze wamhlasela wambetha ngentsimbi wambulala. Wenza ngathi uphazamise umntu obegqekeza. Ukubetha izinja zikaCathy ayeke eyakhe kwaba yimpazamo.
NgoSeptemba ka-2006 uJeffrey Lamb wagwetywa ubomi entolongweni. [x]
Umbhali: Marissa Charles/Splash News

UCathy noJeff Lamb ngamaxesha abo obumnandi.
Ibhedi enegazi eyayilele uCathy.
Isixhobo ekwabulawa ngaso. Safunyanwa kuphahla lwe-ofisi emsebenzini kaJeff.
UJeff wathi amacici kaCathy abiwe - kodwa kamva elinye lawo lafunyanwa epokothweni yakhe.
Iidrowa awazishiya zivuliwe uJeff ukuze kube ngathi uCathy ubulewe ngumntu obegqekeza.
Izinja ezingasekhohlo zezikaCathy kwaye zazibethwe kakhulu kwanyanzeleka ukuba zibulawe. Inja engasekunene yekaJeff kwaye yona yayingalinyazwanga.

Sincokole noKeketso weTV
UKatlego Danke usenokuba udlal' indawo yomfundi owayephambene "wanyangwa" kwiTV, kodwa ebomini bokwenene uyayazi into ayifunayo...
kubhale uDOUG GORDON
kufote uPETER WHITFIELD; iinwele nemakeup yenziwe nguFAITH SEUOE; umnxibisi nguMARINA WALSH; umlungelelanisi nguPATRICIA McCRACKEN
KUMNCEDILE uKatlego Danke ukudlal' indawo yomlinganiswa onguKeketso. Lo mlinganiswa owayeligeza wenze uDanke onama-27waziwa njengomnye wabalinganiswa abaselula abazibaluleyo kwimidlalo yeTV kweli.
Kodwa uDanke uyavuma ukuba uziv' ekhululekile njengokuba sele eyekile ukuba ngumfundi ophambeneyo.
Ngoku uyakwazi ukumshiya ngasemva estudiyo umlinganiswa amdlalayo kwiBackstage.
UKatlego akanamdla nangokuzenzel' imali ngokuba nomtsalane kwakhe emadodeni. Kungoku nje uzithengel' umzi wakhe kwaye uthi uya kuze ayifumane indoda emfaneleyo ngeny' imini naza kuzinza nayo.
Kodwa uthi akangxamanga: akahendwa kukubona indoda enemali. Uthi akafani namabhinq' athi kuba eziindwalutho asebenzise oko ukutsal' amadoda anemali ayichitha ewathengela le naleya.
"Anditshatanga kwaye andifuni ndoda ecaleni kwam ukuze ndizibone ukuba ngenene ndilibhinqa. Andiwafuni amadoda acinga ukuba ndiza kuwawela kuba eneemoto ezintle, esazana nabantu abaphambili yaye esenza imisebenzi ephezulu," utsho.
"Ngaba ukudlala kwam kwiTV kuthetha ukuba kufuneka ndiziphathe ngokungathi ndingowaseHollywood" Kaloku andithengisi ngomzimba wam mna. Ndiyayihlonipha indoda ethetha nam njengomntu olinganayo nayo, endihlekisayo, nendenza ndingonqeni ukuphinde ndidibane nayo.
"Iyandidika indoda engazenziyo ezo zinto, nokuba kungaba yindoda ezibona iphezulu kangakanani."
UKatlego uthi emva kweminyak' emine edlal' indawo kaKeketso uzibona sele kukho izinto abafana ngazo, kodwa uthi kwezothando abafani tu.
UKeketso wafika kwiBackstage ngo-2002 engumlandeli kaKaybee onomona ngaye - wayengumfundi oselula owayephambene kukuthanda le mvumikazi kangangokuba wade wayixhwila wayigrogrisa nangokuyibulala.
"Indawo endandiyidlala yayisoyikisa kwaye izinto ezazisenziwa nguKeketso zaba neempembelelo eluntwini ngelo xesha. Abantu babengazi nokuba ulibhinqa elithanda amanye na nelithe phithi nguKaybee, okanye wayengumlandeli wakhe omkhulu waseVulindlela College owayeshiywa ziingqondo," utsho uKatlego.
UKatlego wafunda ukuba abalandeli "baphambaniswa" kanjani ziintandane zabo emva kokuba uKeketso wasiwa kwisibhedlele sabantu abagula ngengqondo. Ababukeli balo mdlalo babecinga ukuba lo mlinganiswa uphambene kulo mdlalo nasebomini bakhe bokwenene.
"Abantu babesuka bahambele phaya xa ndisondela kubo kumaziko eevenkile. Abanye babendibhambatha engalweni bathi 'Owu, torho'," ukhumbula atsho uKatlego.
"Ndandiqala ukubona ukuba abantu bambona kanjani umlinganiswa endimdlala kwiTV xa engaphandle kwestudiyo. Kwakufuneka ndizikhuphe iingqondo zabantu kuloo nto.
"Ngoko wathi uKeketso akubanjwa avalelwe waza wakhutshwa kwiBackstage, ndaya kudlala komny' umdlalo. Oko kwandinika ithuba lokuba ndibonise ukuba ndiyakwazi ukudlal' omny' umlinganiswa."
Ukudlal' ithutyana kwi-7de Laan ekuSABC 2 kwabonis' ukuba uKatlego uyathandwa ngenene. Emva koko wabuyela kwiBackstage sele enguKeketso ongumfundi ophilileyo.
Ababukeli balo mdlalo baza kubon' izinto ezintsha eziza kwenzeka eVulindela.
Omnye umhlobo wakhe uza kugetyengwa, kuza kufika abadlali abatsha abanomtsalane - kuyo yonke loo nto uKatlego useza kubalasela ngokwenza ababukeli basoloko bejonge ngabomvu isiqendu salo mdlalo esilandelayo.
"Eli linqanaba lesibini lebali likaKeketso yaye libonis' ukuba uyakhula. Ngoku uzithembe ngaphezu kwakuqala kwaye akoyiki mntu," utsho uKatlego.
"Ukuba ngumlinganiswa wemidlalo yeTV akungomsebenzi ozinzileyo; ndineminyak' emine ngoku ndidlala kwiBackstage, kodwa kuxa ndiwubona umsebenzi wam ukhuselekile ukuba ndingatheng' umzi."
UKatlego uhamba ngemoto encinane yaye akakuthandi ukuthenga ukutya esekuphekiwe, ngoko uyaziphekela ekhaya.
"Ndiya kumatheko amajelo eendaba kuba kuyinxalenye yomsebenzi wam, kodwa ndiyakuthand' ukukhawuleza ndilale kunye nencwadi endiyifundayo.
"Phakathi neveki ndiphangela ngo-6.30 kusasa ndize ndifote iziqendu zomdlalo iiyure ezili-12.
"Ndingathanda ukufuman' indoda endifaneleyo endingatshata nayo, kodwa ukuphangela kwiTV kwenza kubenzima ukudibana nayo.
"Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku babini abafana endikhe ndancuma nabo - owokuqala ndandiseKapa ndifund' eyunivesithi, ukanti owesibini kungoku sendidlala kwiBackstage.
"Uthando lwethu lwalungantsokothanga nomfana wokuqala. Nokuba ungadlala iindawo zothando ezininzi emdlalweni weTV, alufani nakubomi bokwenene. Qho xa ndidibana nomfana, ndisoloko ndizibuza ukuba ngaba ubona mna na nokuba ubona uKeketso," utshilo. [x]

NDITHI mandidlulis' ilizwi lombulelo kwiititshala zethu ngokunceda abantwana nabantu abadala basekuhlaleni.
Kumnandi ukwazi ukuba kukho abantu abazinikeleyo ezikolweni zethu - abantu abasebenzisana noluntu baqalise iiprojekthi zokufundiswa kwabantu abangafundanga.
Abany' abazali bayaqhitswa ngenxa yokungakwazi kufunda nokubhala. La maqhetseba anyanzela abantu abadala ukuba basayine iimpepha ezithile eziwenza akwazi ukubathathel' iimpahla nemali yabo ebhankini.
Kukho abantu abangakwazi nkqu nokubhala amagama abo.
Izinto ziyaguquka ngoku ngenxa yezi projekthi zimiliselwa ziititshala.
Masingalivumeli igcuntswana leetitshala libulale isidima seetitshala ezilungileyo.
Uninzi lweetitshala zenz' umsebenzi omhle - masizibulele!
nguAaron Tlou, eTweefontein

Ndichukumisekile!
Ndichukunyiswe libali likaEmmanuel Yeboah kwiBONA kaNovemba 2005. Ndilusizi ukuva ukuba uyise walifulathel' ikhaya ngenxa yobungxwelerha bukaEmmanuel. Unina uComfort wakhalipha kwaye ndiyambulela ngokungahambisani nokubulawa kwabantwana abaziingxwelerha.
Ndaba sisithulu xa ndifunda iBanga lesi-6. Abazali bam babengafuni kundifundisa kodwa ndabacenga bavuma.
Utata wathi uza kundifundisa kodwa ndingatshoni.
Azange ndiye esikolweni seengxwelerha kodwa nam ndaphumelela njengabanye abantwana. Babendiqhula maxa wambi ndilile ndizibuze ukuba, "Ndona ntoni kuThixo""
Ngoku ndinesidanga kwezolawulo lwemfundo.
Kwiingxwelerha ndithi: ubungxwelerha ayikokuphela kobomi.
Masisebenzis' iitalente esiziphiwe nguThixo.
Ndiza kuthath' umhlalaphantsi ngoku kwaye ndicel' impilo ende kuThixo. Ndiyambulela ngokundisikelela ngobungxwelerha bam.
nguP. Mdletye, eMount Fletcher

Yivange imibala yokutya!
Umsitho weInternational Union of Nutrition Sciences Conference obuseThekwini uququzelelwe yiFive-A-Day For Better Health Trust ucebise wakhuthaza abantu ukuba batye imifuno neziqhamo. Nanga amanqaku abafuna sihlale siwakhumbula:
n Yitya imifuno neziqhamo ubuncinane kahlanu ngemini yaye unganciphisa isichenge sokuphathwa sisifo sentliziyo nge-30 phesenti, ze isifo sokuf' icala nomhlaza zona zihle nge-20 phesenti.
n Yivange imibala kuba ngaloo ndlela uza kube ufumana izondlo ezahlukeneyo ezifumaneka kwimibala yokutya okutyayo - umbala wombona otyheli ukhusela ukubona kwamehlo, oluhlaza okwibroccoli ulwa nomhlaza, obhlu okwiiplam nasemaqunubeni womeleze amajoni omzimba.
n Iitapile neminy' imifuno enestatshi aziqukwa kwezi zidlo zeziqhamo nemifuno. Kufuneka isidlo sakho sibe yi-80 grams, umnqathe omkhulu, itumato enkulu, ibhanana ephakathi, ipesika elingeneyo, isipha seediliya ne-3/4 yekomityi yemifuno okanye imifuno eluhlaza yeesaladi - ngoko ke lonwabele ihlobo kulo nyaka!
INYANISO:
Zigcine uphilile ngamacebiso kaPATRICIA McCRACKEN
Yibize ngegama
NgeWorld Aids Day engomhla woku-1 kuDisemba nangaphaya kwayo - yibize ngegama, kudomboza uAdam Levin, wePWA nombhali weAidsafari, Memoirs Of My Journey With Aids (Zebra, R129,95):
"Ndikhumbul' indlela endandisoyika ngayo ukulibiza eli gama ndisoloko ndisebenzisa eleHIV lona livakala bhetele. Ndazinyanzela ukuze ndikwazi ukulibiza nokuba ndiphi na. Ndandisithi, Aids, Aids, Aids. Lwaphel' uloyiko ngokuya ndiqhela ukulibiza. Ukuliqhela kwakho eli gama kukwenza uyazi intsingiselo yalo, nto leyo yenza kube lula ukuphila nayo."

Isondo liyakukhusela kwiprostate cancer
Sineminyaka eliqela silumkisa ngeprostrate cancer yaye phakathi kwabantu abanesi sifo kukho lowo owayesakuba nguMongameli weli, uNelson Mandela, uArchbishop Emeritus waseKapa, uDesmond Tutu nemvumi yaseMelika uHarry Belafonte. UGqr. Shingai Mutambirwa, oyingcali yezifo zangasese eMEDUNSA uthi uninzi lwethu asikuboni ukubaluleka nokuba lula kokuthintela esi sifo yaye nokuba singanwenwela emathanjeni siyanyangeka yaye asibulali.
Iindaba ezimnandi ke zezokuba amadoda asikhupha qho isidoda sawo ayasinda kwesi sifo, kutsho uGqr. Mutambirwa. Eziny' iindlela zokuthintela esi sifo kukutya itumato ephekiweyo, iipilisi ezinoVitamin E nezinc kuba xa zizonke zineekhemikhali ezibalulekileyo ezibizwa ngee-antioxidants ezisithintelayo esi sifo singaqali. Ukususela xa uneminyaka engama-40 kufuneka uxilongwe ilungu langasese qho ngonyaka, uqala ngokuhlolwa igazi - alusenziwa uvavanyo lwedigital rectal oloyikisayo.

BONA XHOSA - November 2007
Unceda iingxwelerha zomphefumlo
"Ndifuna ukwandisa inkqubo yam yezakhono zabafundi ngokuthatha abantwana basedolophini ndibase kwindawo ezolileyo eza kubanceda bakwazi ukumelana noxinzelelo nokuphathwa gadalala," utsho uAndile.
U-Andile Carelse wasuka kwikwaito wasasaza inkqubo ethi Khumbul'eKhaya kwaye uyakhula - enjalonje ufuna ukukhula noMzantsi Afrika uwonke
kubhale uPATRICIA McCRACKEN
USAHLABE ikhefu uAndile Gaelesewe Carelse kwinkqubo yakhe ethi Khumbul' eKhaya kwaye uthi lo nyaka ubemhle kakhulu kuye. Inkqubo yakhe ibe yimpumelelo enkulu kangangokuba iileta zababukeli ezilindele ukubuya kwakhona kwale nkqubo zizele iibhokisi.
U-Andile uchitha ikhefu lakhe ngokulungis' umzi wakhe nokuvuselel' isitiya sakhe. Kwiinyanga ezimbalwa ezidlulileyo wakhuthazwa ngumbethi wekatala waseMozambique owayelima umbona, "ikhaphetshu enkulu" neminye imifuno kwisitiya sakhe esiseYeoville.
U-Andile naye walima imifuno neziqhamo kwesakhe isitiya baza batyelela eMozambique nomyeni wakhe uUdo osebenza kwi-e-tv. Olo hambo lwamvula amehlo nangakumbi uAndile.
"Ilizwe laseMozambique lithwaxwa yindlala nenkxwaleko kodwa abantu bakhona bayakwazi ukusebenzisa umhlaba ukuze bafumane ukutya.
"Iziqhamo ezithengiswa kweli lizwe zihle kwaye abantu abazithengisayo abazithenganga emalikeni koko bazilime ezitiyeni zabo.
"Ilizwe laseMozambique lihlaselwe zizikhukhula neHIV/AIDS kodwa abemi beli lizwe batya iziqhamo nemifuno abazilimele yona.
"Abemi beloMzantsi Afrika bathanda ukwamkela iipasile zokutya okudala.
"Baninzi abantu abangamahlwempu kweli kwaye abanye abakwazi ukusebenza ngenxa yeHIV/AIDS - kodwa baninzi abanokulima imifuno enempilo njengekhaphetshu netumato ezitiyeni zabo."
Inkxaso
U-Andile uyibona kakuhle imfuneko yokulima le mifuno kuba uyinxalenye yeqela leembalasane ezinika inkxaso ebantwini abanogawulayo neziny' iimbalasane ezifana noSibongile Khumalo noMarks Maponyane.
"Sichitha imini nomntu ogulayo ngenxa kagawulayo - simnike ithemba kuze nabamelwane emzini wakhe aze azive ethandwa."
Ngeny' imini uAndile waphantsa walila emva kokuba efike emzini wenye indoda eAlexandra.
"Safika oonompilo begqiba ukuyihlamba yaza yasixelela indlela eyibawela ngayo ityhukhamba. Yathi zimbini iiveki iyibawela kodwa ayinayo imali yokuyithenga.
"Yandikhathaza kakhulu loo nto kuba usapho lwale ndoda lwalungenayo imali yokuthenga ityhukhamba kodwa kulula ukuyilima."
Iziqhamo
U-Andile uyayithanda inkqubo ethi An Inconvenient Truth eyenziwa ngulowo owayesakuba ngusekela-mongameli eUS uAl Gore kwaye uthi kudala edomboza kwiSebe leZolimo ukuba lenze usuku loluntu eSoweto - "Ayikaphumeleli le mizamo okwangoku," utshilo.
Akazimiselanga ukuncama uAndile kuba uyibona intle into yokulinywa kwemithi yeziqhamo kwiUS yonke.
"Ndifuna ukubona imini apho iindawo esihlala kuzo ziya kuba nezitiya zemifuno neziqhamo. Xa sinokuzilima kwiindawo ezinkulu ezilingene wonke umntu akukho mntu uya kuba iziqhamo nemifuno yomny' umntu," utsho uAndile.
Imbewu iyafikeleleka ngexabiso. Into esiyifunayo ziinzame zokulima nokukhathalela imifuno neziqhamo zethu.
"Ngubani othi abekho abantu" Xa wonk' umntu esenza into nokuba incinci kangakanani, singaliguqula eli lizwe.
"Ukwakha ikamva lethu ayikokuvezwa kwamathuba emisebenzi ngurhulumente nokuphisa ngokutya koko kukuziphatha kwabantu ngesidima nokuzenzela izinto ngebhongo neqhayiya."
Ukuphathwa gadalala
"Kwiminyaka emithandathu edlulileyo ndathetha phandle ngezinto ezandehlela ebomini bam kuquka nokudlwengulwa ngutata wam xa ndandineminyaka eli-11. Kwakulixesha lengxwaba-ngxwaba kaBaby Thabang. Ndazil' ukutya ndithandazela isigqibo endisenzileyo. Ndamxelela umama kuba wayeza kuziva kunomathotholo ezo ndaba," utsho.
"Ndazama ukunxibelelana nomfazi omtsha katata nentombi yakhe kodwa andakwazi ukubabona. Indiphatha kakubi into yokokuba azange ndikwazi ukumnik' inkxaso udadewethu kuba ngelo xesha wayeneminyaka elithoba okanye eli-10."
U-Andile uyayazi intlungu yokungahlali nosapho lwakhe kwaye usasaza inkqubo enceda iintsapho zimanyane zisombulule neengxaki zazo.
"Ndifun' ukubabona kodwa utata yena andifuni kumbona. Ndimxolele ngezinto andenza zona.
"Andifuni ukumzingela kodwa xa kungenzeka sidibane ndingabona ukuba ndenza njani na. Ndonwabile kule ndawo ndikuyo - uThixo undinike utata onothando kwindoda etshate nomama."
U-Andile wazama ukulibala ngento eyamehlelayo ngokuthi enze into eza kunceda abantu abangxwelerheke emphefumlweni nasenyameni.
Yiloo nto eyamenza waseka idesika ecebisa abantu kwiYFM nenempumelelo enkulu. Yiyo eyaphembelela iKhumbul'eKhaya, ekuyinkqubo eveliswa yiUrban Brew.
Iziko losasazo elinamandla
"Abany' abantu bothuswa kukuba ndisuke emculweni nakwiYFM ndiye kwiTV. I-TV inamandla kakhulu. Ndizibhalela ngokwam amazwi endiza kuwathetha kwaye ndiza nemibono ngenkqubo.
"Le nkqubo yenza abemi beli babone ukuba iingxaki abajongene nazo ziyafana nezabany' abantu. Kufuneka sibabonise ubunyaniso bezinto ezenzekayo ababukeli."
Nkqu nokuba isiphelo senkqubo sibi uAndile ubelwela ukuba sivezwe sinjengoko sinjalo - njengemvumi yejazz eyabuyela kweli kodwa yangakwazi ukwakha ubudlelwane nentombi yayo; nehenyukazi elalineHIV eladityaniswa nonina kodwa labuyela kwiindlela zalo zobuhenyukazi.
Ukwanoluvo lwenkqubo yeengxoxo nolutsha lweAfrika iphela kwiMTV Base eza kugqithisa ulwazi oluchanekileyo ngemiba efana neziyobisi, iHIV nokuphil' impilo enomvuzo.
"Ulutsha lweAfrika iphela lujongene nemiceli-mngeni efanayo. Ndinqwenela ukulunceda kuba kum kubalulekile ukuba inkqubo yeTV ixhobise umbukeli," utshilo.
Amandla
U-Andile ukwangumlawuli wombutho iOpen Disclosure, onceda ukuxhobisa abafundi ukuze bakwazi ukuthetha phandle ngeengxaki abahlangabezana nazo zobundlobongela, iziyobisi nokuphathwa gadalala ngokwesondo esikolweni nasekuhlaleni.
Ziinjongo azimiseleyo ukuzifezekisa ezi nditsho nkqu nokuba ethetha ngomhlaba awuthandileyo eMozambique.
Nomyeni wakhe uUdo uneenjongo ezifanayo nezikaAndile. Badibana ngethuba besebenza kwiYFM. Batyelela bobabini xa benexesha kwaye izakhono zabo ziyahambisana.
"Ndikholelw' ekubeni uThixo usinika amaqabane aza kuvana nathi. Kubalulekile ukuba xa nitshatile nithande izinto ezifanayo.
"Sifun' ukwakha umzi eMozambique size sibize amaqela abafundi isithuba seveki. Ndifuna ukuba bakhumbule ukudlala baze bafunde ukumelana neemeko zabo zasemakhaya bekude namakhaya abo. Kukufutshane naseJoburg kunaseThekwini kodwa kukho olwa chulumanco lokuba ngaphaya kwemida yelizwe lakho - mhlawumbi loo nto inganceda iphelise inzondo ephakathi kwabantu bamazwe ahlukeneyo."
Uvakale ethethela phantsi uAndile xa esithi: "Ndifuna bayazi ukuba nokuba kwenzeka ntoni na ebomini bakho zikho izinto ongazenza ukuze ubuyise isidima ebomini bakho.
"Uyazikhethela into omawuyenze. Ungakhetha ukufa ngoku okanye ukhethe ukuba nekamva eliqaqambileyo."
U-Andile yena wazikhethela ukuba nekamva eliqaqambileyo.
"Ndathi xa ndandineminyaka esibhozo ndalima umthi wepesika esitiyeni sikamakhulu eMeadowlands. Ndandiwunkcenkceshela ngekomityi yamanzi yonk' imihla ukuze ukhule.
"Usakukhula wawumcaphukis' umakhulu kuba amakhwenkwe asebumelwaneni ayetsiba ucingo esiba iipesika kuwo.
"Kodwa ngoku uthandwa ngumntu wonke kuba ukhule wamkhulu kwaye usinika umthunzi omnandi."
Ucebisa ukuba abantu baqhubeke bakhule. Naye uyazibona ukuba uyakhula ngoku kuba uzifumana sele enomnqweno wokuba nabantwana bakhe.
"Uthando lwethu lukhule ngongxamo kangangokuba sisafundana. Kodwa ndiziva ndonwabile - kunjalonje ndisuke ndaxhatshakelwa ngamabhinqa akhulelweyo neentsana!"
Akazi naye ukuba uza kukhulelwa nini na kuba uxhomekeke

Ukukhulelwa emsebenzini
Phambi kokuxelela umphathi wakho ukuba ukhulelwe, qiniseka ukuba uyawazi amalungelo akho ukuze ubone xa enyhashwa
UKHULELWE, sivuyisana nawe! Kodwa uza kumazisa njani umphathi wakho? Kukuwe ukuba ubazisa nini ngokukhulelwa kwakho emsebenzini. Umthetho ungecala lakho, ukukhulelwa kwakho akumelanga kuchaphazela umsebenzi wakho.
Ngoko ke phambi kokuba ubazise, qiniseka ukuba uyawazi amalungelo akho.
Awuzikhuseli kucalulo kuphela. Ukuwazi amalungelo akho ekhefu lokubeleka, kuza kukunceda ukwazi ukulungiselela ukufika kosana lwakho.
Kwi-Website yeSebe lezaBasebenzi kukhuthazwa amabhinqa ukuba azise abaqeshi bawo kusekwangoko. Oko kuza kuqinisekisa ukuba umqeshi unethuba lokuhlola izinto ezinobungozi kuwe aze athathe amanyathelo okuthintela ezo ngozi.
Kodwa ugqirha wezifo zamabhinqa esithethe naye, uGqr. Daniel Mahapa uthi kuhle ukulinda iinyanga ezintathu zokuqala phambi kokuxelela umphathi wakho kuba ubungozi bokuphunyelwa sisisu ngeli xesha buyehla kakhulu kwaye ubasele uqinisekile ngokukhulelwa kwakho.
Kwelinye icala, ezi nyanga zintathu zokuqala zezona ziye zibenzima kumabhinqa akhulelweyo. Ungazifumana unqumka kuba umzimba uzama ukuziqhelanisa nemeko yokukhulelwa kwakho.
Ngoko ke ukuba ukukhulelwa kwakho kuchaphazela kakhulu umsebenzi wakho - mhlawumbi usoloko ungezi kuba ugula - kuhle ukuba umxelele umphathi wakho kusekutsha.
Okunye okubalulekileyo omel' ukujonge kukuba ingaba umsebenzi wakho awunabungozi kusini na.
Masithi mhlawumbi umsebenzi wakho kukuphakamisa izinto ezinzima, ukwindawo enamachiza namayeza abukhali okucoca okanye umsebenzi wakho uyakumisa okanye ukuhlalisa phantsi ixesha elide, kuhle ukumazisa umphathi wakho ngoko nangoko.
Nkqu nemisebenzi yokufundisa ezikolweni zabantwana abancinane kunganobungozi xa usanda kukhulelwa kuba abantwana abancinane baye babenezifo ezifana nemasisi okanye ichicken pox ezingayingozi kusana lwakho olungekazalwa.
Thetha nogqirha okanye umongikazi ngenkxalabo yakho. Baza kubanako ukukuxelela ukuba umsebenzi wakho unobungozi.
Ukuba kunjalo kuza kufuneka umazise umqeshi wakho kwangoko, ukuze kuthatyathwe amanyathelo okukukhusela.
Ukuba ikhona imfuneko kuza kufuneka kuqwalaselwe izinto ezithile ezinganobungozi. Ezifana nokusebenza iiyure ezininzi, ukusebenza ngamachiza, ubundlobongela, imisebenzi efuna amandla, njalo-njalo.
Zakufunyanwa mazisuswe. Xa kungenzeka, ibhinqa elikhulelweyo lingasuswa emsebenzini kodwa lihlawulwe ngelixa lisalungiselelwa.
Eziny' izinto omawuzikhumbule:
Umqeshi akanako ukukugxotha okanye akunyanzele ukuba uyeke umsebenzi kuba ukhulelwe.
Akanako ukukwehlisela emsebenzini, atshintshe imisebenzi oyenzayo okanye ehlise umvuzo.
Awunako ukungonyuselwa okanye uphoswe luqeqesho kuba ukhulelwe.
Abanakuthi qhomfa isisu ukuze ungalahlekelwa ngumsebenzi. [x]
Umbhali: Kamogelo Sebola
WAZI AMALUNGELO AKHO
Umthetho ulindele ukuba abaqeshi benze oku kulandelayo ukulungiselela abasebenzi babo abakhulelweyo:
Babenendawo yokuphumla elungele amabhinqa akhulelweyo.
Banikwe ixesha lokuba baye kumadinga alungiselela ukubeleka - kuquka neeklasi zokwenza imithambo.
Abaphathi nabasebenzi abasebenza nelo bhinqa likhulelweyo banikwe iingcebiso nenkxaso.
UKUKHULELWA KWAKHO
UDLIWANO-NDLEBE LOMSEBENZI XA UKHULELWE
Ukuba unodliwano-ndlebe lomsebenzi ngexa ukhulelwe, yazi oku:
Akukho semthethweni ukubuza ngokukhulelwa kwakho.
Nokubuza ngemeko yakho yempilo engaveza isiphene somzimba.
Umqeshi wakho akanalungelo lokukubuza ngezicwangciso onazo malunga nokukhulelwa kwakho kudliwano- ndlebe okanye emva kokukuqesha.
Ukuba uyabuzwa, wuthathe njengombuzo ongekho semthethweni.

UMZALI OFANELEKILEYO
Ukunceda emsebenzini wesikolo
XA uMpho eza kuya nasebholeni emva kwemini ibande imini yakhe yesikolo. Ufik' ekhay' ediniwe kwaye elambile, ngelo xesha ke ukwenza umsebenzi wesikolo yinto yokugqibela ayicingayo. Kuvakala kuqhelekile oku?
Njengomama uyazi ukuba umsebenzi wesikolo ugqitywa ngokukhawuleza xa uncedisa, kunaxa uMpho ezenzela ngokwakhe.
Kodwa lumka! Ingaba uyamnceda umntwana wakho? Impendulo kulo mbuzo nguhayi. Kaloku xa kubhalwa uvavanyo, umntwana wakho uyakube eyedwa!
Kodwa ke zikho iindlela onganceda ngazo kumabanga aphantsi ungadange uwenze ngokwakho umsebenzi...
Iilwimi: Nceda umntwana wakho aphucule ulwazi lwakhe lolwimi ngokumkhuthaza ukuba afunde yonke imihla.
Makafunde akhwaze. Ngokuya ekhula uya kukhetha ukuzifundela yedwa - kodwa eyona nto ilungileyo kukuqwalasela amagama anzima ubone ukuba uyamelana na nawo.
Ukufunda akwandisi nje ulwazi lomntwana, koko kongeza kuphucule nesigama sakhe. Oku kuza kumnceda akwazi ukubhala izincoko kuba enamagama amaninzi awaziyo.
Ukupela: Le yeyona nto ungamnceda kuyo. Akugqiba ukufunda ikhasi, yiba "ngutitshala wokudlala" uze uthi makapele amagama akwelo khasi. Ukuze akonwabele qala ngamagama alula... oku kuya kumkhuthaza.
Xa umnceda ukulungiselela uvavanyo oluzayo lopelo-magama, mbhalele amagama ephepheni, kodwa ushiye izithuba aza kuzizalisa ngokwakhe umntwana. Umzekelo: FO_T_N_ _ _ (FORTUNATE).
Kubalulekile ukuba umntwana awabhale amagama angawatsho nje ngomlomo kuphela.
IMaths: Akunguye wonke umntu oyincutshe kwizibalo, kodwa ukuba umntwana wakho ufumene isiseko esisiso kumabanga aphantsi oko kuya kumnceda nakwixesha elizayo.
Ukusukela kwizibalo zikaGrade 1 (iitime table) eziphindwa rhoqo.
Xa umdala uyazibuza ukuba ikho na imfuneko yokumamela oku yonke imihla, kodwa yicinge le nto.
Yonke imihla senza izibalo zophinda-phindo ngaphandle komatshini wokubala. Siyakwazi. Nomntwana wakho ngokunjalo umelwe kukwazi, kwaye ungamnceda.
Izibalo zokudibanisa nokuthabatha nazo zibalulekile.
Linga lo mdlalo wonwabisayo...
Thatha amakhasi okudlala ususe anobuso (iking, iqueen ne joker).
Xa umntwana wakho usekumabanga aphantsi kakhulu ungawabeka ecaleni amakhasi anamanani amakhulu, kodwa ukuba ukuGrade 5 ukuya kuGrade-7 sebenzisa onke amakhasi ukuya kufika kwele-10.
Hlalani nijongane, beka ikhasi phambi kwakhe ukuze abone inombolo yalo. Ngokucotha beka elesibini phezu kwelo. Umntwana makakhwaze adibanise amanani akula makhasi atsho impendulo .
Umzekelo: 3 + 5 = 8 + 7 = 15 + 3 = 18 + 4 = 22 + 10 = 32, njalo njalo.
Xa ubona ukuba sele ekulungele ukudlulela ngaphambili - yenzani izibalo zokuthabatha. (Ukhumbule ke ukuwabeka kakuhle amakhasi ukuze inani lokuqala libe lilo elikhulu!)
Ngokuqinisekileyo ngolu hlobo uza kuluphucula ulwazi lwakhe lwezibalo. Ukuze ayonwabele ngakumbi mnik' ithuba naye akubuze okanye nibuze utata!
Ukufunda ezinye izifundo: Ziba lula ngakumbi ukuba umntwana unomdla kuzo. Kwaye ngokuya umntwana efunda malunga nesifundo, kukona kuba lula ukusiqonda.
Apha ke unganceda ngokumcacisela xa kukho into angayiqondiyo.
Mcele ukuba akucacisele ngokwakhe, abe ngutistshala wena ube ngumfundi.
Iiprojekthi: Musa ukumenzela umntwana iprojekthi yakhe - kuba okokuqala utitshala uya kuyibona xa ingenziwanga nguye!
Kodwa ungamnceda umntwana ayicwangcise iprojekthi... nithethe malunga nalapho angafumana khona ulwazi ngayo imifanekiso, nangeyona ndlela ilungileyo yokuyenza nikunye. Mncede nje ngokumcebisa, kodwa qiniseka ukuba naye uza nezakhe izimvo.
Oku kungalichitha ixesha elininzi, kodwa khumbula umntwana wakho uselula kwaye usayifunda yonk' into.
Awokugqibela: Sonke sifuna abantwana bethu babe nekamva eliqaqambileyo, ngoko esikwenzayo ngoku makulungiselele ingomso labo.
Umsebenzi womzali kukujonga ukuba umsebenzi wesikolo wenziwe.
Ngamany' amazwi, mamela xa efunda, uvavanye upelo, ujonge izibalo - kodwa musa ukumenzela!
Zibandakanye - uncedise, ukhuthaze kodwa okona kubalulekileyo konwabele oku!
BONA XHOSA July 2008
Ufuna umntwana wakho aqhube kakuhle esikolweni - kwaye ke nokuba awunalo ulawulo egumbini lokufundela, unako ukuthetha naye malunga nomsebenzi wesikolo wasekhaya. Kodwa ingaba oko kuthetha ukuba menzele umsebenzi wesikolo?
Umelwe kukumnceda uphele phi?
UBUSAZI?
Ukuphefumla umsi ophuma kumntu otshaya icuba emotweni kukona kuyingozi ngokuphindwe kali-10 kwimpilo yomntwana wakho kunomsi wecuba elitshaywa endlini
IINGCEBISO
Cwangcisa! Yenzani ikhalenda yokucwangcisa (ngasekunene) apho iprojekthi, uvavanyo nomsebenzi wexesha elizayo uza kubhalwa phantsi. Ngolu hlobo umsebenzi awusoze ulibaleke; iprojekthi ingahlula-hlulwa kuze kubekwe umhla wokugqiba umsebenzi ngamnye - kwaye umntwana uziva ephumelele xa umsebenzi ewugqibe ngexesha.
Qala ngezinzima. Qala ngeendawo ezinzima phambi kwezona zilula. Umzekelo, izibalo zithatha ixesha elide, kwaye umntwana abe ekuthanda ukufunda. Engqondweni yakhe, icala "elibi" lomsebenzi wesikolo lisukile, kushiyeke elonwabisayo.
Indawo. Qiniseka ukuba umntwana wakho uwenzela endaweni engenaziphazamiso umsebenzi wakhe wesikolo. Umntwana ngamnye umelwe kukuba nendawo eyodwa, kude ne-TV nengxolo yabanye.

BONA XHOSA July 2008
IINCWADI ZOKUQALA UKUFUNDA
Umntwana wakho uza kuyithanda imifanekiso emikhulu eqaqambileyo kuse kude nokuba akwazi ukuthetha kwaye ixesha olichitha naye umfundela umsingethe lelona xesha lihle lokuzisondeza kuye. Uza kufunda ukukwazi ukuyibona imifanekiso yezinto azibonayo imihla ngemihla.
Khetha iincwadi ezinemifanekiso emikhulu, enemibala nemibhalo engephi. Amakhasi atyebileyo ngawona kulula ukuwatyhila, ukuze umntwana wakho azityhilele.
Iincwadi ezenziwe ngamalaphu nazo zilungile, ziyahlafuneka, angazixhwitha, azishwabanise, azimanzise kwaye ziyahlambeka. Akukho mfuneko yeencwadi ezininzi kuba abantwana abakhawulezi ukudikwa kukuphinda-phinda into enye.
ABANGAPHANTSI KWEMINYAKA EMI-5
Zininzi iincwadi zabo zemifanekiso ezikhoyo. Ukuze ufumane ezininzi, yiba lilungu lethala leencwadi engingqini yakho.
Khangela ezinamabali alula, nemifanekiso ecacileyo enemibala eqaqambileyo apho umntwana eza kubona izinto aziqhelileyo.
UKULUNGISELELA UKUKWAZI UKUFUNDA
Abantwana benza izinto kwiminyaka ehlukahlukeneyo, ngoko ke ukuba umntwana womelwane wakho olingana nowakho sele ekwazi ukufunda, musa ukumxhesha umntwana wakho. Okubalulekileyo kukumlungiselela ukukwazi ukufunda, endaweni yokumfundisa ukufunda. Khuthaza umdla ezincwadini - nokukwazi ukubona ukumila kwezinto noonobumba. Biza unobumba ngokucotha, uze uthi ngaxeshanye umntwana makamkhombe unobumba encwadini.
Musa ukuzikhathaza ngokuphinda-phinda ibali elinye. Ukufunda kukumamela, uqonde uze wonwabele ukwazi okuza kulandela.
OKOKUGQIBELA...
Ungamxheshi umntwana enze nangakufuniyo.
IINGCEBISO NGOKUFUNDA
Qala ukumfundela umntwana esazalwa. Oku kukhuthaza ubudlelwane phakathi kwakho nosana lwakho lukwazi nokukhawuleza ukuthetha.
Qiniseka ukuba nikwindawo ezolileyo engenangxolo naziphazamiso.
Dlala nomntwana wakho, ngokumfundela umana ukutshintsha amazwi ulinganise abadlali bebali, ulinganise nangesandla, umdlalise ngokumwola ngakumbi. Abantwana abaninzi bayakukuthanda ukulinganisa nabo... bazakhele awabo amabali.
Mfundele rhoqo phambi kokulala.
UKUTHENGA ISITULO SOSANA
BONA XHOSA July 2008
UKUBA unayo imali nendawo, isitulo seentsana esiphakamileyo sakuwenza amaxesha okutya abelula. Naku omawukuqwalasele phambi kokuthenga...
Ukukhululeka: Umntwana uza kuchitha ixesha elininzi esesitulweni sakhe, ngoko ke qiniseka ukuba indawo yokuhlala esitulweni ithambile kwaye sinendawo yokweyama. Abantwana bayakuthanda ukugungqa ngoko qiniseka ukuba unendawo eyaneleyo yokushukuma, neyokuba akhule naso. Indawo yokubeka iinyawo kuhle ukuba nayo ibekho.
Ukuphakama: Ingaba uyakwazi ukusehlisa usenyuse? Oku kubalulekile kwabanye oomama.
Ukusicoca: Ukutya kwabantwana kungena naphi! Ngoko qiniseka ukuba akukho kona zininzi, apho ukutya kungazifihla khona. Ubuninzi bezi zitulo benziwe nge-PVC ngoko ke kulula ukuzosula. Ezinye ziyohlukaniswa ukuze zihlanjwe.
Itreyi: Ingaba itreyi iyasuka ukuze ufikelele emntwaneni? Ujonge nobukhulu bayo.
Ukusigcina: Izitulo zabantwana zisoloko zithatha indawo eninzi, ngoko cinga ngendawo oza kusigcina kuyo. Ingaba siyasongeka? Ingaba kulula ukusiphakamisa? Ingaba sisebenzisa amavili xa usityhala? Ukuba kunjalo, vavanya iziqhoboshi.
Ukhuseleko: Khetha isitulo esizinzileyo esinesiseko esibanzi. Masibe namabhanti okhuseleko, kubekho ibhanti elihamba phakathi kwemilenze ukuz' umntwana angatyibiliki awe.
Ukutya okulungileyo
Abantwana bayabathanda abantu, ngoko ke qhelani ukuhlala ndawonye njengosapho xa nisitya.
Luvumel' usana lwakho lungcamle ukutya okwahlukeneyo.
Khumbula: abantwana bathanda ukukuva ukutya - ngokukubamba ngezandla, bakumunce, bakukhothe, bade bakucubhe - phambi kokuba bakutye.
Abany' omama abakwazi kungamsuli umntwana xa ezingcolisa ebusweni nasezandleni xa esitya. Myeke! Oko kungamenza aphelelwe ngumdla. Myeke umntwana - nokuba uzingcolise kangakanani - mcoce akugqiba ukutya.
Xa umntwana sele ekwazi, myeke azityise ngokwakhe. Ayiphumzi wena nje kuphela loo nto, koko inika nomntwana wakho ithuba lokuba akwazi ukuzimela, akwazi nokuzenzela izinto - njengokufaka icephe elinokutya emlonyeni kuba oku kuthabatha ithuba ukukufunda.[x]
OKWASIMAHLA! Kweemveliso zakwaJust for Baby
Iimveliso zakwaJust For Baby zilungiselelwe umama oyikhathaleleyo impilo yosana lwakhe, kanye njengoko ekukha-thalele nokufumana izinto zexabiso ngemali yakhe. Uluhlu lwakwaJust For Baby lunohlobo oluqholiweyo nolungaqholwanga lwe-aqueous cream nePetrolium Jelly, ibaby talc kunye nebaby oil.
Ukuze ube sethubeni lokuzuza esakho kwizixa ezingama-20 eziphisayo ezixabisa i-R200 sisinye, thumela igama lakho nedilesi kwi- BONA/Just For Baby Giveaway, Box 32067, Mobeni, 4060 okanye iSMS ethi JUST FOR BABY ku-35919.(ISMS inye ixabisa iR3)

BONA - August 2005
XA ungenamali mhlawumbi uphelelwe ngumsebenzi uzama iindlela zokunciphis' inkcitho - kodwa kufuneka ujonge izinto ezibalulekileyo zethutyana nezexesha elide ukuze ungabinangxaki yemali ngoku nakwixa elizayo.
Umzekelo, abantu abaninzi bayakhawuleza ukuyeka ukuhlawul' imirhumo yeepolisi zabo zotyalo-mali. Loo nto iyenza maxongo imeko yakho yezemali endaweni yokukongela imali.
Awukwazi ukubona izinto eziza kwenzeka ebomini bakho ngomso nokuba ungaceba ngononophelo olungakanani na, ngokutsho kukaJanine Greeff, oyimanejala yonxibelelwano kwiMetropolitan Retail.
Xa uhlangabezana nengxaki thetha nabantu abaluncedo abaza kukunceda ukhusele imali yakho oyityalileyo ukuze ungalahlekelwa kakhulu yimali.
"Ukungahlawuli umrhumo omnye kuluchaphazela kakubi utyalo-mali lwakho," ulumkise ngelo uGreeff.
Nazi iingxaki ezingavela:
t Makhulu amathuba okuba iphelelwe ipolisi yakho.
t Xa uyeka ipolisi lingekafiki ixesha layo ungahlawuliswa uze ufumane imali encinane kunaleyo ubuyilindele.
t Xa ixabiso lemali liphantsi libe lingekafiki nexesha lepolisi yakho ufumana imali encinci nangakumbi yaye neepolisi ezinemali eqinisekisiweyo ebuyiselwayo ziyalahlekelwa yiloo mbuyiselo xa ingasahlawulwa imirhumo.
Ukungahlawuli imirhumo yakho akuthethi kuthi ipolisi ivaliwe kuba ungakwazi ukuphinda uyihlawule xa ivuma imigwaqo yepolisi yakho.
Kungani ubeka ikamva lakho lemali esichengeni zibe zikho eziny' iindlela ongazisebenzisa ngaphandle kokuyiyeka ipolisi yakho"
UGreeff uthi abathengi abasengxakini yezezimali kufuneka bacinge iindlela abangazisebenzisa okanye bathethe nabacebisi bezezimali kungenjalo baqhagamshelane neMetropolitan Life Contact Centre ukuze bafumane uncedo.
"Kubalulekile ukuzinik' ixesha usenz' isigqibo ngeepolisi zakho onazo njengamhla wawuzithatha. Xa usenz' izinto ngongxamo aziphumeleli," utshilo.[x]
NGOLWAZI OLUZELEYO: Tsalela iMetropolitan Life Contact Centre ku-0860-724-724.

BONA XHOSA - July 2007
Hlangula ipolisi yakho!
UJanine Greeff weMetropolitan Retail ucebise ngelithi xa usengxakini yemali ungalukhusela utyalo-mali lwakho okanye ulusebenzise ukuze lukuncede .
Yihlawule uyigqibe:
Ukuyihlawula uyigqibe ipolisi kuxela ukuba uzihlawule zonke izavenge ebezifuneka ukhusela imali yakho oyityalileyo.
Thethana ngomrhumo wakho:
Xa ipolisi yakho inobungozi notyalo-mali ungakwazi ukuhlawula imirhumo ephantsi - buza kumcebisi wakho wemali ukuze ucacelwe.
Xa ufuna imali:
UGreeff uthi ungayiboleka imali kwipolisi yomnikelo (endowment). Ungayithengisa ipolisi yomnikelo. Xa ufuna imali ngokukhawuleza le ndlela iyakunceda uyifumane imali.
Nokuba uyixakekele kangakanani na imali kufuneka uboleke imali ethile kwipolisi yakho ungayivali ukuze ukwazi ukuqhubeka nokuhlawula imirhumo kutyalo-mali lwakho.

Fumana uncedo
lomcebisi ngobomi
Umfana utshate umntu acawa naye
Bhota Sis Angie: Ndineminyaka engama-22. Umfana ebendincuma naye utshate nomnye umntu.
Xa ndimbuza ngaloo nto, uthi uyandithanda qha kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba athobele umthetho wecawe wokuba atshate umntu wasecaweni.
Ndivumile saqhuba, kodwa ngoku akasandihoyanga njengakuqala. Ndincede kuba ndisamthanda.
nguPetunia, eKrugersdorp
Bhota Petunia: S'thandwa sami, ndibuhlungu ngokuva ukuba usentlungwini enje usemncinane kangaka.
Uthando luhle, luyakhathalela yaye luyakhusela, ukanti lungakuvisa nobuhlungu.
Ungagqitha kule ntlungu, kodwa kuqala kufuneka ugqibe ngokuba ukufanele na lo mfana.
Ukhumbule xa uqhuba naye, uza kuthandana nomntu owabelana ngesondo nomnye umntu nowenza izigqibo
nomnye umntu ngaphandle kwakho.
Ndikucebisa ukuba uzame ukumcima entliziyweni yakho. Lixesha lokuba ujonge isiqu sakho, jonga izinto onamandla kuzo nozenza kakuhle nezo ufuna ukuziphumeza ebomini.
Ndiphila ubomi bobuxoki
Bhota Sis Angie: Ndilibhinqa elineminyaka engama-45 elinengxaki yokuthand' ukuxoka.
Ndixokise abahlobo bam nabantu endiphangela nabo ngokuba ndingubani. Ndixokise nabantu basecaweni ukuba ndihlalaphi nokuba ndiphangelaphi.
Ngoku ndidibene nendoda endithandayo, nayo ndayifihlela ukuba ndakhe ndatshata ngaphambili.
Ngoku icela ukunditshata yaye ndinexhala lokuba iza kuyiva inyaniso ebantwini basekhaya. Ndincede!
nguBongi, eKZN
Bhota Bongi: Uvakala ngathi ukuxoka yinto esegazini kuwe. Nawuphi na umntu kuyenzeka axoke, kodwa ixoki lendalo lixoka lonk' ixesha yaye alizenzi.
Ukuxoka kuyakungena uze ugqibele uxoka ungasahoyi neziphumo zokuxoka kwakho.
Ukuxoka kungakwenza ukhululeke yaye uzibone ubalulekile, kukwenze ufumane ingqalelo okanye kukukhuphe ezingxakini.
Yeka ukuxoka nokuba ubuxokiswa yintoni na kuba kuza kukuxabanisa nabahlobo, abantu bakowenu okanye uphelelwe nangumsebenzi.
Ngathi sele ulikhoboka lokuxoka, ngoko kufuneka uzame iindlela zokukuyeka - eziquka ukuthandaza nokufumana iingcebiso zomfundisi okanye ugqirha.
Kuthando lwakho nomfana oncuma naye, kufuneka uthembeke kuye umchazele ukuba wawuxokiswa kukuba uneentloni zokungabi namntu ube umdala.
Xa esafuna ukuthandana nawe, ndikucebisa ukuba umchazele ngengxaki yakho yokuxoka ukuze akuxhase kumalinge okuzikhwebula kulo mkhwa mbi.
Xa engakuxoleli, kubone oko njengesifundo songalahlekelwa kuko ngenxa yokuxoka. Ndiyathemba oko kuya kukukhuthaza ukuba uphile ubomi obuthembekileyo.
Ingxaki yothando
Bhota Sis Angie: Ndilixhwele elineminyaka engama-28 yaye ndidibene nendoda endiyithandayo.
Ingxaki kukuba ungumfundisi wecawe engayamkeliyo into yezinyanya.
Ndiyamthanda yaye wamkelwe nazizinyanya zam. Kodwa ufuna sivule eyethu inkonzo kungekudala. Andazi ukuba ndithini.
nguMahadi, eBoksburg
Bhota Mahadi: Ndiyakuvela ngengxaki okuyo. Andikujongeli phantsi ukuba lixhwele kwakho, kodwa kungenzeka ukwamkelwa kwakhe zizinyanya zakowenu zikubonisa ukuba zifuna uye kude.
Ungaba yinkosikazi yomfundisi kuba wazi amacala onke obomi.
Kaloku ebomini sikhuliswa ngeendlela esingazaziyo. Sigqitha ezintlungwini, kwiinkxwaleko noqeqesho lweemeko ezinzima.
Mhlawumbi kuhle uqale ngokufumana iingcebiso kwiTraditional Healers' Organisation eku-16 de Villiers St, Joburg. Ungabafowunela

Bhotani bahlobo
KUKHO umbhalo weBhayibhile (1 AbaseKorinte, 13:4) othetha ngokubaluleka kothando.
Le vesi ithi uthando luyanyamezela yaye lunomonde. Alunamona, aluzigwagwisi kwaye alunakratshi.
Akukho ndawo ethi uthando lukuvisa ubuhlungu.
Maninzi amabhinqa aphethwe gadalala kweli lizwe lethu - kuwo "uthando" luthetha ukubethwa, ukwenziwa ikhoboka nokuviswa ubuhlungu.
Imbalasane ekwikhava yethu, uKhanyi Mbau, ulelinye lamawaka ngamawaka amabhinqa aphathwe gadalala ngamadoda awathandayo. Kwiphepha lama-20 usiphalazela imbilini yakhe ngaloo mpatho gadalala emtshatweni wakhe.
Zinomdla izizathu zokuhlala kwakhe nokunyamezela loo mpatho. Ndiyacinga ukuba njengamabhinqa sifanele siwashiye amadoda asibethayo nasingxolisayo.
Amabhinqa makazi ukuba ukuvumela ukuphathwa gadalala kubulala uThixo ophila ngaphakathi kuthi.
Sifanele siqonde ukuba uthando alufanelanga lusivise ubuhlungu. Masazi ukuba sinako ukonwaba eluthandweni kwaye sinako nokufumana indoda elungileyo - kaloku maninzi anjalo.
Kwiphepha lama-24 sityelele emzini ozele uthando kaHashi Elimhlophe nenkosikazi yakhe
u-Ebony. Bangumzekelo omhle weendwalutho ezitshatileyo ezithandanayo neziphumeleleyo.
Amanye amaphepha emagazini yakho azele ifashoni, ezobuhle nokutya ongaziphekela kona.
Nixole ngokungasifaki isipho sekama ebendinithembise sona kwinyanga ephelileyo. Siza kusifaka kwiBONA yenyanga ezayo.
Ndiqwele ngezimnandi zokuba ndithiwe jize ngembasa yeVodacom Rising Star ka-2009.
Le mbasa itsho lukhulu kum kwaye kumnandi ukuwonga ngolu hlobo ngento oyenzayo.
Iluphawu lokuba ukusebenza nzima kunomvuzo nokuba endikuphumeze ukuza kuthi ga ngoku kube ngenxa yeqela endiphangela nalo, nani bafundi.
Enkosi.
USbu Mpungose: umhleli weBONA nozuze imbasa ye-2009 Vodacom Rising Star Award. Ukusuka ekhohlo: nguFlo Modikwe: ongumncedisi wabahleli beWag the Dog Publishers, uRedi Direko: ongumsasazi weTalk Radio 702, uDot Field: wakwaVodacom noLiesl Pretorius: ongumhleli weThe Media magazine.

Oomedem nabancedisi
Emva kokufunda iThe Maids And The Madam (yeBONA, ka-Aprili 2009), ndingathi ubudlelwane obuhle phakathi kwakho nomntu oncedisayo ekhaya sisiphiwo esivela kuThixo. Elona thuba lide endakha ndalihlala nomntu oncedisayo yiminyaka emibini. Ndade ndadibana nemfundiso yamaKrestu, yokuphatha umntu oncedisayo ekhaya.
Phatha umsebenzi ngendlela nawe ofuna ukuphathwa ngayo. Naye ungumntu kwaye kufuneka ahlonitshwe amalungelo akhe. Emva kokufunda oku, nditshintshile. Oko ndiqeshe umntu omnye ukusuka ngo-Aprili 2007 kwaye ubudlelwane bethu buhle.

Z ININZI iinkqubo ezenziwayo ukunqanda ubundlobongela nezikhuthaza ubuntu, kodwa noxa kunjalo kusekho ulunya, ukunganyamezelani nentiyo phakathi kwabantu beli abathetha iilwimi ezohlukeneyo.
Enye yezinto esazilwelayo kule minyaka mininzi kangaka lilungelo lokuba sibengabemi beli loMzantsi Afrika sonke, kungabi ngabathile.
Kubuhlungu ukubona ukuba emva kweminyaka eli-15 sikhululekile, kusabuya uqhushululu lwakudala.
Kwimicimbi echaphazela ukuhlala okanye ilizwe lethu, sifanelwe kukubeka ecaleni ukubandlululana ngokobuzwe sizibobe njengabemi boMzantsi Afrika.
Sinoxanduva lokwenza indawo yethu ibenabantu abanothando nentlonipho.
Ewe, sifanele sizingce ngobuzwe bethu, kodwa loo nto ayithethi kuthi masizibone sibhetele kunabanye. Yenzekile loo nto ngexesha lobandlululo, jonga ukuba loo nto yakhokelela phi.
Masiyiyekeni le nto sizingce ngokuba ngabemi boMzantsi Afrika. Masimanyane, ukuze singatshabalali.

N DINQWENELA ukubalisela abafundi beBONA eli bali lifutshane elingokukhula kwam. Ndiyathemba ukuba liza kuba khuthaza ukuze baqhubele phambili ngobomi nokuba bajongene nobunzima obungakanani.
UTata wayesebenza kude egoduka rhoqo emva kweenyanga ezimbalwa. Mna ndandishiyeka nomama, owayenxila endiphethe gadalala. Maxa wambi ubendigxotha ndize ndilale ehokweni yeenkuku.
Ekuqaleni utata ubengakwazi okuqhubekayo. Ndithe ndakuba mdala ndamxelela baze banengxabano enkulu benomama. Emva koko umama wafunela utata abantu bokumbulala. Emva kokugwintwa kukatata umama uhlel' iminyaka emibini kuphela entolongweni.

Umama usweleke kanye emva kokuphuma entolongweni. Ndandineminyaka eli-11 ngoko ndaze ndakhuliswa ngutat' omkhulu nomakhulu.
Iminyaka yokuqala yayinzima - kwaye ndisafikelwa ziinyembezi nangoku xa ndicinga ngayo - kodwa ndiye ndazibonela ngokwam ukubaluleka kokungancami, kuba izinto ziye zaya ngokubabhetele.

Ngokutsho kukaGqr. Buthelezi oku akuyonyaniso kwaphela. Amabhinqa amaninzi abeleka ngotyando ngezizathu ezithile kwaye kuyenzeka xa zisekho ezo zizathu kwixesha elizayo. Kodwa wongeze ngelithi kufuneka ibhinqa libeleke ngokwendalo esibhedlele. UGqr. KUFUNEKA UZITYE IZINTO OZITHANDISWAYO YAYE UTYE KAKHULU UKUZE UBENOSANA OLUKHULU NOLUPHILILEYO
Ngokutsho kweengcali akuyonyaniso leyo. UGqr. Buthelezi uthi okona kubalulekileyo kukuba nosana oluphilileyo kunokuba nosana olukhulu.
"Eneneni usana olukhulu lubonisa ukuba bekuneengxaki ukukhulelwa kwakho, njengesifo seswekile esingabonwanga okanye esinganyangwanga, kwaye kungabangela iingxaki xa ibhinqa libeleka," utsho.
Ibhinqa elikhulelweyo kufuneka litye ukutya okunazo zonke izakha-mzimba, kwaye ukutya into kakhulu okanye kancinane akulunganga nakuwuphi na umntu, wongeze ngelo uGqr. Mbokota.
Ukwathe xa ukhulelwe lindela ukutyeba nge-12,5kg.
Maxa wambi ukuthanda izinto ezithile xa ukhulelwe yindlel' umzimba okuxelela ngayo ukuba unento ongayifumani ngokwaneleyo.

Xa umntwana enomsindo
Abantwana babaneengcwangu ukubonakalisa umsindo wabo nokukhathazeka, ucacise watsho ugqirha wengqondo, uGqr. Ken Resnick.
Uthi okubalulekileyo okumel' ukwaziwa ngabazali kukuba ukumohlwaya ngokumngxolisa okanye ukumbetha kuza kumenza abenomsindo ngakumbi kwaye kubangele aphinde awuphinde lomkhuba emva kwexesha.
Uthi ukuzama ukuwuthothisa umsindo womntwana ngokumnika akufunayo kokona kungalunganga.
UGqr. Ken ukunika amacebiso okumelana nomntwana onomsindo:
Ekhaya
Mthathe umntwana niye egumbini lokulala uzolile okanye egumbini elikhuselekileyo onokumshiya yedwa kulo.
Mshiye, uvale ucango, ungaphindi kuye de uhle umsindo wakhe.
Ukuba awuthandi ukumshiya eyedwa, hlala naye, kodwa musa ukumhoya.Ungamjongi nokumjonga oku.
Akuzola umntwana, thetha naye ngento ayenzayo.
Phakathi kwabantu
Myale phambi kokuba nihambe. Mxelele ukuba awuzukuthenga izinto obungazimiselanga ukuzithenga kuba zifunwa nguye.
Xa umbona umntwana ukuba sele eqalwa ngumsindo, mkhumbuze omyale ngako.
Ukuba akayeki, mfunqule niye kunogada umxelele umntwana ukuba uza kumshiya apho. Oku kuza kuwuthothisa umsindo kuba akazufuna ukushiywa nomntu angamaziyo.
Kungenjalo, mthathe umntwana niye
kwindawo eniza kuba nodwa. Linda ngomonde wehle umsindo.
Maxa wambi akuzukuba lula ukumthulisa. Umzekelo usenokuba ukwilayini ende netroli egcweleyo. Ukuba ukwimeko enjalo,
uyawusele unyamezela. Yenza ngathi awuva xa ekhwaza neentetho ezenyelisayo zabantu. Yehlisa umoya. Ukuphuma kwakho apho, thetha naye umntwana. [x]

ILUTSHABA LWAKHO
ITYENDYANA laseKurhuleni e-East Rand eJoburg, linebali elingaqhelekanga neloyikisayo - kwaye lifuna ukwazi ukuba ingaba lithakathiwe na.
"Ngenye imini ndeva ukuba kukho umntu endimcaphukisileyo ekuhlaleni kwaye undifunele amadoda aza kundibulala," utsho. "Ndandisoyika ndaza ndabaleka. Kwathi, emva kweentsuku ezimbalwa, ndaqala ndanento ethi mandizibulale."
Kwakufana nokunxanelwa utywala, kusiya ngokuya kukhula ukufuna ukuzibulala. Kwakungathi kukuphela kwesisombululo.
"Ndandiza kuzibulala bengekandifumani bandingcungcuthekise," utsho.
Wawufumana umpu, kodwa uthe akuwubamba ngesandla sakhe akabi nako ukuzidubula.
"Andizange ndibenako," utsho.
Ngosuku olulandelayo waya edolophini ngenjongo zokukhwela iteksi eya KwaZulu-Natal. "Ndandiza kubaleka," utsho.
EJoburg wayesiva ngathi usoloko elandelwa.
"Babefuna mna," utsho, "kwaye nokuba ndandingenza ntoni - babeza kukhwela nakuloo teksi iya eThekwini!"
Esoyika kwaye ebhidekile, waya evenkileni ukuya kuthenga imela.
"Yayiyeyokuzikhusela," utsho. Kodwa wabona sele ezihlaba esiswini ephinda-phinda ecaleni kwendlela.
Ngethamsanqa, abantu ababedlula ngendlela bayithatha imela kuye babiza inqwelo yezigulane.
Wabalekiselwa esibhedlela kwaye oogqirha bathi unethamsanqa lokuba abe usaphila.
Amadoda la ayemzingela" Ingaba wayekhuselekile esibhedlela"
Kungelilixa esachacha kumanxeba okuzihlaba apho wafumanisa into eyothusayo.
"Ndafumanisa ukuba yonke le nto yokuleqwa ngamadoda kwakuyinto nje esengqondweni. Akukho mntu wasekuhlaleni wayefuna ukundibulala!"
Kungabonakala ngathi sisigulo "esinempambano" phakathi, kodwa ukucinga ukuba kukho abantu abafuna ukukubulala luhlobo oluthile lwesigulo olunganyangeka ngeyeza.
Kwaye yile nto eyenzekileyo kumfundi wethu. Oogqirha bamyalela ukuba atye iipilisi ezithile yonke imihla. Ukuphela kwazo kwakufuneka aphinde esibhedlela alande ezinye.
Waziva ebhetele, kodwa akabamamela oogqirha. Ukuphela kweepilisi akaphindanga ukuya kulanda ezinye - saze saqala kwakhona isigulo sakhe.
Ngenye imini wadubula ugxa wakhe emsebenzini waze wagwetywa iminyaka esibhozo esentolongweni.
Entolongweni saya ngokuqinisa isigulo. "Ndandisiva ngathi amapolisa namanye amabanjwa baceba ukundihlasela bandibulale."
Waphinda wanikwa iipilisi wabhetele kwakhona. "Ngoku ndiyazi, ukuba ndiyayeka ukusela iipilisi zam ndibangathi ndiyaphambana."
Ndimyekile lo mfana walichaza ibali lakhe kuba linemfundiso.
Igqirha belingenakumnceda kuba, kwasekuqaleni, ubengafuni yena ukuzinceda.
Ubonile ukuba ukusela ipilisi kuyamnceda, kodwa akaphinda ukuya kufumana ezinye, njengoko exelelwe.
Nokuba sithetha ngamachiza esilungu okanye amayeza esintu, iingxaki zengqondo zinyangeka kade kunezigulo zomzimba.
Ukuba igqirha likucela ukuba ubuye amatyeli amanzinzi limamele.
Alizami kukukhuthuza. Kaloku liyazi ukuba olu unyango luthatha kade!
Ewe, ukuba, uchitha imali,kodwa iziphumo azikonwabisi yiya komnye umntu - kodwa linike ithuba igqirha! [x]
