isichitho sendlu yezigcawu
Umfundi waseMkhomazi, eKZN, uhlutshwa yindlu yezigcawu.
"Sendibonane namagqirha amaninzi kodwa akukho nelinye elikwazi ukundinceda ndohlukane nale nwebu yezigcawu ephuma nasezindlebeni zam!" utsho.
"Maxa wambi ndiyayiva naselulwimini lwam."
Esi sigulo simenze wangumntu okhawulezayo ukuba nomsindo, kwaye ukholelwa ekubeni, simenza abe nezothe nasekuhlaleni, sidala neengxaki kusapho lwakhe.
"Andinandawo yokuhlala kuba ndityeshelwe lusapho lwam ngaphandle kwesizathu."
Kucacile ukuba eli bhinqa linesichitho sendlu yezigcawu.
Kufuneka afumane iyeza elilodwa elenziwe ngendlu yezigcwawu kuquka nezigcawu uqobo.

Ulutsha
Phantse azizigidi ezine amantombazana aselula aseAfrika aviswa ubuhlungu obungathethekiyo kwisenzo senkohlakalo esithintela ukukhula kwamabele...
Isenzo sothuthumbiso
UJOSIANE Matia une-11 leminyaka yaye usendleleni yokuba libhinqa elipheleleyo. Ukukhula kukaJosiane kube sisiqalekiso esibi. Kaloku kuye nakwamanye amantombazana ukukhula kuza noloyiko nobuhlungu.
Kunzima nokuhamba xa esiy' esikolweni kuba uneenyanga ezintathu ebotshwe ngebhanti lesikhumba elimqinisa amabele.
"Ngaphambi kokuba ndibotshwe ngeli bhanti, umama wayetshisa ilitye emlilweni andi-ayine amabele.
"Qho ngokuhlwa umama ujonga isifuba sam aze asi-ayine ngelo litye lojiwe emlilweni," utsho.
Yenzelwa ntoni le nto imbi nebuhlungu kangaka" Yenzelwa "ukulalisa" amabele entombazana ukuze ingabi namtsalane emadodeni.
UBessem Ebanga weNational Network Of The Associations Of Aunties uthi eCameroon ama-24 amantombazana aselula ayalaliswa amabele awo.
KUSETYENZISWA amatye, isingqusho, amacephe okhuni, imicephe, amagqabi emithi eyohlukeneyo, iparafini, ityuwa, namabhanti esifuba ukuthintela ukukhula kwamabele.
Ngokophando olwenziwe ngoDisemba ka-2005, ama-58 ekhulwini oku-ayinwa kwamabele kwenziwa ngoomama, isixhenxe ekhulwini kwenziwa ngoomakhulu, ithoba ekhulwini ngoodadewabo, ithoba ekhulwini ngoomakazi, ishumi ekhulwini ngabagcini bamantombazana ukanti isixhenxe ekhulwini sizenza ngokwaso.
"Ngaphaya kokungcungcutheka, amantombazana akwasesichengeni sokuba nomhlaza wamabele," utsho uGqr. Marie Eteki wesebe lezempilo eCameroon.
Kwindibano yeUnited Nations International Day In Support Of Torture Victims Worldwide ebingoJuni eYaounde, elikomkhulu laseCameroon, uMathias Nyoh Dinga wesebe lezomthetho kweliya lizwe uthe uku-ayinwa kwamabele amantombazana sisenzo sokungcungcuthekisa yaye bafanele bohlwaywe abasenzayo.
Ephendula abo bathi esi senzo "sisisithethe" kwaye abantu abasenzayo abasenzi kuba befuna ukuthuthumbisa abanye, uDinga uthe nasiphi na isenzo nokuba sesesithethe na xa sinxamnye nentlalo asamkelekanga.
Ukususela ngoko baninzi abantu abakugxekayo uku-ayinwa kwamabele. Enye yezinto ethe yavela ekuchaseni kwabantu esi senzo kukuba asiyenzi into esenzelwa yona!
UKU-AYINWA kwamabele akuwenzi amadoda angawahoyi amabhinqa! Maninzi amantombazana akhulelwa eneshumi elivisayo leminyaka eCameroon. "Oko kubonisa ukuba uku-ayinwa kwamabele akuncedi nganto. Yintlungu nje eviswa amantombazana," utsho uGqr. Flavien Ndonko weGTZ, inkqubo yempilo yeGerman-Cameroon HIV/AIDS .
Lulutsha i-5,5 ekhulwini yabantu abaphila neHIV, ukanti isinye esithathwini sama-20 ukuya kuma-30 amantombazana akhulelwayo aneminyaka ephakathi kwe-13 nama-25 eminyaka, ukanti ngaphezulu kwesiqingatha sawo akhulelwa emva kokuba nendibano yesondo okokuqala, kutsho iGTZ.
"Kunzima ebazalini ukuthetha ngesondo nabantwana ngenxa yezithethe, ngoko bakhetha ukuphelisa iimpawu zokulungela isondo ngoku-ayina amabele," utsho uGqr. Ndonko.
Ngaphandle kokuvisw' ubuhlungu kwamantombazana, ashiyeka engazi ukuba angazikhusela njani kwiHIV, nto leyo iwenza abe sesichengeni sokosuleleka.
UJEANINE EFON onama-23 eminyaka uxelele abeInter Press Service ukuba ubuhlungu boku-ayinwa amabele kwamenza washiy' ikhaya waya kuhlala noninalume xa wayeneminyaka eli-13.
Kodwa naye uninalume nomalumekazi wakhe bazama ukum-ayina amabele waza wabaleka.
Waya kwammelwane owayebonis' uvelwano kanti uza kumdlwengula kwangobo busuku.
U-Ariane Elouna naye ubalis' ibali elifanayo. Ngeny' imini wathi ebuya esikolweni, umakazi wakhe wamlandela baya kungena kwigumbi lakhe wathi: "Yintoni le isesifubeni""
Emva koko unina nomakazi wakhe baqala "ukumnyanga".
"Umama wathatha intsimbi yokungqusha wayoja emlilweni waza wandilalisa phantsi wacinezela amabele am ngaloo ntsimbi ishushu.
"Wathatha umva wekhokhonathi wawoja eziko waza wacinezela ngawo amabele am.
"Ndandikhala kuba kwakubuhlungu kodwa ndingenakubaleka.
"Ngemini elandelayo ndazimela kwammelwane ndaza ndadlwengula ngumfana wakhona ndakhulelwa."
U-Elouna uneminyaka eli-15 ngoku, unyana wakhe uneenyanga ezi-3.
Abasemagunyeni eCameroon bathi basichasile esi senzo, kodwa abakasivali ngokusemthethweni, ngoko uJosiane Matia namanye amantombazana aselula azizigidi ezine asaqhubeka nokuva iintlungu.
"Nditsho esofelweyo ngenxa yeentlungu, kodwa umama athi: 'Nyamezela ntomb' am, usemncinci awafuneki la mabele,'" utsho uJosiane. [x]
BONA XHOSA - September 2006

LUYAMANGALISA!
Gcina ukufuma iiyure zibe ngama-24 ngeVASELINE INTENSIVE RESCUE
AbakwaVASELINE bayazi ukuba ulusu olomileyo alufuni kusoloko lufumile nje kuphela, koko ludinga ukunonophelwa ngokugqithisileyo. Yiyo loo nto abakwaVASELINE bevelise i-Intensive Rescue - uluhlu lokuqala lokunonophela ulusu lomzimba olukunika ukufuma okuhlalayo nokukhululeka okukhawulezileyo kulusu olomileyo. Izithambiso ezigcina ukufuma neekhrim zomzimba zeVASELINE INTENSIVE RESCUE zenzelwe zalungiselelwa ngokukodwa iimfuno zolusu olomileyo kuquka neendawo ezinengxaki. Isebenza ngendlela ezimbini - ineglycerin engena nzulu eluswini ize ikuphinda-phinde kathathu ukufuma kolusu, ngaxeshanye inceda ekomelezeni udonga olukhusela luvalele ubumanzi obudingwa lulusu iiyure ezinga-24.
Iziphumo: I-VASELINE INTENSIVE RESCUE ikhulula ulusu olomileyo, kodwa ayipheleli nje apho, igcina ukufuma ixesha elide ukuze ulusu lwakho luzinyange ngokwalo. Olu luhlu ngoku luneentlobo ezimbini, eziqholiweyo nezingaqholwanga ngoko ungakhetha leyo ikulungelayo ilowushini okanye ikhrim.[x]

inqaku lentengiso

Wadlwengulwa, wabulawa emva koko watshiswa!
Ngubani onokwenza isikizi elinje komnye umntu? Ukumdlwengula nokumbulala nje kukodwa ngamasikizi, kodwa ke wayemtshisela ntoni? Ufuna iimpendulo umama owaphuke umphefumlo
UJO-ANNE ROSENBERG (43) wabukela umzimba wentombi yakhe usitsha ngumlilo. Ubalisela uKamogelo Sebola weBONA ngokubulawa kwentombi yakhe ngendlela emasikizi ngumhlobo wayo
MALUNGA nentsimbi yesi-3 xa kusayo, ngomhla wesi-8 kuJulayi walo nyaka kwafika umntakwethu nenkosikazi yakhe. Ndabona bengekayivuli nemilomo ukuba ukhona undonakele.
Bathi intombi yam yokuqala uVeronique (26) ugetyengiwe kwaye watshiswa umzimba wakhe. Kwaba ngathi ndiyaphupha, kodwa bathi bakundisa kwindawo yesehlo ndaqonda ukuba andiphuphi. Ndabona iinyawo ndaqonda ukuba nguVeronique ngenene kwaye umzimba wakhe wawusatsha.
Kwakuyintlungu enganyamezelekiyo. Ndafa isiqaqa, yabuya ingqondo emva kokujongwa ngaboncedo lokuqala.
Umntakwethu wawubhula umlilo ngengubo wakugqiba wawogquma umzimba kaVeronique. Ndandimane ndizibuza ukuba ingaba yenzeka nyhani na loo nto?
Ngoko uVeronique wayehlala eWestbury nabantwana bakhe; mna ndihlala eDe La Rey eRoodepoort eJohannesburg.
Andisoze ndiyilibale loo mini. Wayesiya kuthenga utywala kwiflethi ekufuphi nabahlobo bakhe. Wahlal' apho de kwabasezinzulwini zobusuku emva koko wasuka wagoduka.
Kurhanelwa ukuba walandelwa yindoda ethile eyayimazi. Akazange ayiqonde kakuhle loo nto, wajika waphindela kwiflethi ababesela kuyo, wahlal' ithutyana.
Wathi akugqiba ekubeni ahambe, yamlandela kwakhona loo ndoda.
Akazange akwazi ukubaleka. Yamhlaselwa yamhlaba ebusweni nasemzimbeni izihlandlo ezingama-53.
Bathi abakwantsasana umbulali uqale wamdlwengula phambi kokuba ambulale. Waze wawutshisa umzimba womntwana wam.
Emva koko umrhanelwa waya eflethini katata wafika wamxelela into ayenzileyo.
Utata akazange amkholelwe, de wazibonela kumgama ongaphantsi kwekhilomitha ukusuka eflethini umzimba kaVeronique ulele ngesisu usitsha.
Lwabizwa usapho sebalekile umbulali. Wayenabantwana ababini uVeronique: uShinique (5) noTyrique (3), esabasa kunyango lomothuko emva kwesingcwabo. Wayengafanelanga ukubhubha ngolo hlobo uVeronique kuba wayengumntu olungileyo owayethanda ukupheka nokwabelana nabanye abantu; ingakumbi ebulawa ngumntu owayembona engumhlobo.
Kwafuneka ndongeze i-R900 kumzi wabangcwabi ngenxa yokuba umzimba wakhe wawubola ngokukhawuleza. Kwafuneka ndithenge nebhokisi ekhethekileyo engaphezulu kwama-R15 000.
Ndeva ubuhlungu ngoko kunzima ukumxolela umbulali wentombi yam. Ndisazibuza ukuba angayenza kanjani umntu ophile qethe into enje komnye umntu abe loo mntu wayembona njengomhlobo?
Ambambe emva kweveki amapolisa umrhanelwa, oneminyaka eli-19 ubudala, ezimele endlwini kadadewabo.
Ndinqwenela ukumbuza umrhanelwa ukuba wayecinga ntoni ngelaa xesha wayebulala umntwana wam. Kwaye wawutshisela ntoni umzimba wakhe?
Ndiyanqwena kwaye ndithandaza ukuba umthetho uzodlala indawo yawo kwaye ndinqwenela ukuba umbulali kaVeronique angaze aphinde alibone ilanga.
Kodwa ke noko kunjalo owakhe umama uza kukwazi ukumane eyokumbona entolongweni kodwa mna andisoze ndiphinde ndimbone owam umntwana. [x]
UBOMI BENENE
Umama wakhe uza kumane esiya kumbona entolo-ngweni, kodwa mna andisoze ndiphinde ndimbone umntwana wam
UVeronique wayelungile enothando, utsho uJo-anne.
UJo-anne nabantwana bakaVeronique, uShinique noTyrique.

UKUTYELA UKUPHILA
UCriselda Kananda uyasinceda ukuze sazi ngokuthe vetshe ngeHIV/AIDS ukwasicebisa neendlela zokuphila nayo!
KUTHIWA ukuthintela kokona kubhetele kunokunyanga. Ukutya okunazo zonke izakha-mzimba kuyanceda ekulweni nezifo ezingahlasel' umzimba wakho xa uneHIV.
Kule nyanga siza kuthetha ngeendlela ukutya okunganceda ngayo ukunciphisa inani labantu abaswelekayo eluntwini lwakowethu, ukanti kwinyang' ezayo siza kuthetha ngokuba zinceda njani ii-ARV ekulweni nolwamvila lweHIV.
Njengoko nemoto ingahambi xa ingenapetroli, nemizimba yethu ayinako ukulwa nezifo xa singatyi ukutya okufanelekileyo. Imizimba yethu ifun' izondlo ezithile ezinjengeeprotini, iikhabhohayidrethi, iivithamini nezinye ukuze ibesempilweni.
Zonke ke ezi zakha-mzimba sizifumana ekutyeni kwaye kubalulekile ukuba imizimba yethu izifumane ngokwaneleyo ukuze amajoni omzimba omelele akwazi ukulwa nokusulelwa komzimba zizifo.
Ukutya okungenamafutha kakhulu akugcini imizimba yethu isebenza kuphela, kuko nokwenza sibeneziqu ezisempilweni, ingakumbi xa unentsholongwane ye-HIV.
Ukutya okungenazo zonke izakha-mzimba okunamafutha neswekile kakhulu nokungenayo imifuno neziqhamo akuwancedi amajoni omzimba.
Ukutya okunazo zonk' izakha-mzimba kufanele kubenezi zinto: amafutha alingeneyo; iikhabhohayidrethi ezininzi ezifumaneka kwizonka, irayisi neetapile; imifuno neziqhamo ezitsha; nokutya okuneeprotini njengenyam' ebomvu, inyama yenkuku, intlanzi, amaqanda, iimveliso zobisi namandongomane.
Kubalulekile nokuyazi indlela yokukupheka ukutya kuba izondlo zako zingaphela xa ukupheka okanye ukuqhotsa ngokugqithisileyo.
Umzekelo, imifuno ungayipheki de itshintshe ibala layo; kufuneka uyitye isekrum-krum, isenazo izakha-mzimba.
Kufuneka utye kathathu ngemini, usele kakhulu amanzi acocekileyo nencindi yeziqhamo entsha.
Kungenzeka kufuneke usele nezinto eziya kongeza iivithamini neeminerali egazini lakho. Zisenokuba zinoVitamin C no-E, ii-omega 3 fatty-acids, oovitamin B nezinye izibulali zintsholongwane. Ezi zakha-mzimba azifanelanga zikuyekise amayeza owanikwa ngugqirha (njengee-ARV) kwaye zisebenzise ngemvume kagqirha wakho.
Xa uneHIV kwaye uzama ukulwa nesifo esithile okanye unesifo esingapheliyo, kufuneka utshintshe ukutya okutyayo ngokweemfuno zakho.
Umzekelo xa unotyatyazo kunokufuneka uziyeke iimveliso zobisi kuba zingakwenza uhambise kakhulu. Kubalulekile ukubuz' ugqirha wakho ukuba kukuphi ukutya ongakutya endaweni yazo okanye ukuba ungasebenzisa izongezi
zezakha-mzimba eziyintoni.
Ndikholwa kukuba ukutya iziqhamo nemifuno emitsha liqalo elihle. Usenokuthi ndikwenza into elula ukulawula iHIV neziny' izifo, kodwa kuyanceda ukwazi iziseko!
Kaloku iimveliso zendalo (njengeziqhamo nemifuno emitsha) zenza amajoni emizimba yethu asebenze ngokupheleleyo.
Mandiqwele ngokucaphula enye intetho ethi: "Impilo yenye
yeentsikelelo ezibalulekileyo umntu anazo." Masizigcine ke sisempilweni ngokutyel' impilo, singaphileli
ukutya. [x]
I-CD KACRISELDA
UCriselda Kananda ungumama, umkhuthazi wempilo entle nomsasazi wenkqubo yeengxoxo kwiMetro FM okuthandayo ukunik' ithemba abantu abaphila ne-HIV ngokubabalisela elakhe ibali.
KwiCD yakhe ethi Positive Talk uthetha ngokubaluleka kokuzazi imeko yakho, uchaza namagama athile ezempilo asetyenziswayo kwiHIV/AIDS, ukanti ukwacebisa nangonyango ongakhetha kulo. Ikwanengoma ethi Beautiful Woman ebhiyozela ubuhle bakho obungaphakathi.
Le CD ifumaneka kwiivenkile zakwaReliable elizweni jikelele. Ngeziny' iinkcukacha qhagamshelana noCriselda ku- info@positivetalk.co.za; fax: 086-617-5480; okanye uye ku: positivetalkservices.co.za.
IMITHETHO YOKHUSELEKO KOKUTYA
Kubalulekile ukucoceka kokutya nokuqinisekisa ukuba akunazintsholongwane. Izifo ezifumaneka ekutyeni ungaziphepha ngokwenza oku:
Hlamba iziqhamo nemifuno ngamanzi acocekileyo ngaphambi kokuba uzitye.
Qinisekisa ukuba izandla zakho zicocekile ngaphambi kokuphath' ukutya.
Ungayityi inyama ekrwada okanye engavuthwanga, neesaladi ezinamaqanda angavuthwanga.
Jonga umhla wokuphelelwa lixesha kokutya ngaphambi kokuba ukutye.
Qinisekisa ukuba ukutya kugcinwe ngendlela yaye kogqunyiwe ukuze kungangenwa ziintsholongwane.

fumana uncedo
Ngaba umntwana wakho akakwazi ukufunda"
Le ngxaki iyamlibazisa umntwana wakho esikolweni kodwa ingasombululeka aze akwazi ukuqhubeka nobomi...
UXOLANI wayetsala nzima esikolweni xa wayeneminyaka esixhenxe ubudala. Wayengakwazi ukufunda, engakwazi nokubhala. Babemangalisiwe abazali bakhe neetitshala. Wayekrele-krele, edlamkile, ebalasele emidlalweni nakweziny' izinto ngaphandle kokubhala nokufunda.
Xa eneminyaka elithoba wayesele ethatyathwa njengomntwana osilelayo esikolweni.
Abany' abantwana esikolweni babemqhula bembiza "ngesigqogqo."
Ngethamsanqa lakhe kwabakho ititshala eyarhana ukuba kungenzeka ukuba uXolani unengxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda waza wancediswa yititshala encedisa kwezonyango bayifumana ingxaki kaXolani.
Wathi esakufumana uncedo lweengcali yaphela loo ngxaki yakhe yokungakwazi ukufunda waqhubeka esikolweni.
"Ingxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda kufuneka ilungiswe kusekwangoko kungenjalo ibuphazamisa bonke ubomi bomntu," utsho uMarj Arslanian weAudiblox, ekuyinkqubo ekhethekileyo esetyenziswa kwihlabathi ukunceda iingxaki zokufunda kubafundi.
Le ngxaki ichaphazela abantwana nabantu abadala ngeendlela ngeendlela kuxhomekeke ekubeni ingakanani na.
Uninzi lwabo baba neengxaki zokufunda nokubhala ukanti xa yondele kakhulu le ngxaki abakwazi tu ukubhala nokufunda. Uninzi lwabafundi abanale ngxaki bayoyiswa zizibalo.
Ibonakala njani"
Mjonge emehlweni umntu onengxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda uza kubona into elolu hlobo...
Amagama alula uyawagqwetha umzekelo elithi RAT liyajika libe nguTAR.
Isivakalisi siyaxoveka singabinantsingiselo.
Oonobumba uyababhidanisa umzekelo u-b amenze u-d.
Thatha iphepha ulijongise esipilini uze ufunde lo mbhalo usesipilini. Abanye abantu abaneengxaki zokufunda bawufunda ngolo hlobo umbhalo oqhelekileyo.
Iimpawu
Nazi ezinye zeempawu ezixhaphakileyo nezintama ukuba umntwana uneengxaki zokungakwazi ukufunda yaye ufuna uncedo:
t Ukungaqiniseki ngesandla sasekhohlo nesasekunene okwenza awagqwethe amagama namanani xa efunda.
t Abantwana abanale ngxaki abakwazi ukulandelelanisa izinto njengokubala okanye ukulandelelanisa iintsuku zeveki. Bayoyiswa kukukhumbula okanye ukukwazi ukulandelelanisa izinto.
t Ukufunda aze apele amagama ngendlela engaqhelekanga. Le yingxaki eyondeleyo yokungakwazi ukufunda nebonakala ngokuqashela amagama nokuba engenantsingiselo.
t Ukuthetha kade okanye ukuthetha into engavakaliyo. Uphando lubonisa ukuba ukungakwazi kakuhle ukuthetha neengxaki zokufunda zinxibelelene.
t Ukufunda kancinci ethandabuza.
t Ukungakwazi ukubhala kakuhle.
Ongakwenza
Xa urhana ngathi umntwana wakho unengxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda nokubhala kubalulekile ukuba uthethe netitshala yakhe. Uninzi lwezikolo ezikhulu zinetitshala enceda kwezonyango eqeqeshiweyo eza kumnceda umntwana wakho okanye imse kwingcali yezonyango.
Xa kukho umntu omdala onale ngxaki mfunele uncedo, usengalufumana.[x]

UNGAZE UTHANDANE
NOMNTU ONJE
USLINDILE wathi kum ukudibana kwethu uhleli iminyaka emibini engenamntu, esitsho kwiminyaka eli-12 edlulileyo. Ndamkholelwa kuba wayebonakala njengomntu olungileyo nothobekileyo. Wayengasebenzi, ngoko ke ndandimnceda ngemali. Ndandimthanda kangangokuba ndaye ndamazisa ebantwini basekhaya, kukuhle phakathi kwethu. Wakhulelwa emva konyaka sithandana, ndaze ndamthembisa ukumtshata. Wandixelela ukuba akazange ahlukane nomntu wakhe, koko waye wabanjwa.
Ndandicaphuka kuba akazange andixelele ukudibana kwethu. Ndambuza ukuba uza kuthini xa ephuma. Wathi unezinye iintombi ancuma nazo, ngoko akazukumhlupha.
Sahlala kunye emva kokuzalwa komntwana wethu. Emva konyaka wasuka wanyamalala iiveki ezintathu. Ndandinexhala ndimfuna yonk' indawo, umnxeba wakhe uvaliwe. Ndade ndaxelela amapolisa.
Ekugqibeleni ndeva amarhe okuba useSebokeng nomntu wakhe osandul' ukuphuma entolongweni.
Ndeva ngomhlobo wakhe wandinika nedilesi yaloo ndawo, ndacela amapolisa ukuba andikhaphe. Samfumana ehleli etyotyombeni neso sihange sendoda yakhe. Wathi akasandithandi kwaye ucel' ukuba ndimgcine umntwana kuba isithandwa sakhe asizimiselanga ukukhulisa umntwana wenye indoda. Andizange ndikwazi ukuzibamba iinyembezi kodwa wayengakhathali.
Emva nje kwexeshana yabanjwa kwakhona loo ndoda ibanjelwa ukuphanga ixhobile. Wabuya wandicenga ukuba ndimamkele kwakhona.
Kwandithabatha ithuba, kodwa ekugqibeleni sabuyelana. Baqhubeka ubomi kwaye ndandicinga ukuba izinto ziza kakuhle - ndaze ndamlobola.
Safumana umntwana wethu wesibini kwiminyaka emibini edlulileyo. Zange ndicinge ukuba angandishiya kwakhona.
Kunyaka ophelileyo umntu wakhe uphumile entolongweni emva kweminyaka emihlanu, waphinda wandishiya kunye nabantwana wabuyelana naye! Uye wandixelela eziqhitsini ukuba yena uphindela endodeni yakhe emphatha okwekumkanikazi.
Ndazama ukuzibulala kodwa akwenzeka. Ndandizibuza ukuba kutheni ekhethe ukundishiya, ashiye nabantwana nekhaya elizinzileyo ukuya kuhlala notsotsi etyotyombeni.
Kungaphelanga neenyanga ezintlanu uye wakhulelwa umntwana weli banjwa. Ngelishwa, liye labanjwa kwakhona kwanyanzeleka ukuba yena aye kuhlana nonina.
Wandithumelela iiSMS endixelela ukuba ukwenze oku kuba ethakathiwe. Kodwa kweli ityeli ndiyafunga andinakuphinda ndimamkele ingakumbi sele enomntwana wenye indoda.
Sekulixesha eliphantse libengangonyaka ngoku kwaye mna nabantwana bam sonwabile ngaphandle kwakhe.
Ndigqibe kwelokuba ndizikhulisele abantwana bam mhlawumbi ke ndakubafumanela unina obathandayo
ngenye imini. [x]
Umbhali: Kamogelo Sebola
EZOTHANDO
IBALI LIKA-ANDREW:
Wandishiya kunye nabantwana ngenxa yomntu wakhe ongena ephuma entolongweni
IBALI LIKARHOFIWE:
Wayelinxila elandenza ndaphunyelwa zizisu ezibini kwaye wadlwengula nomakazi wam
UNAWO umbono wakho uthandana nendoda ehloniphekileyo nesebenza nzima kanti yindoda endlongondlongo engumdlwenguli nelinxila" Kwenzeke loo nto ke kum.
Ndadibana noNicholas sele eneminyaka emine engasayi kowabo eLimpopo. Wahamba wayokufuna umsebenzi eKrugersdorp emva kwengxabano.
Kwisithuba sonyaka sivumelene ukuba siza kutshata, ndazama ukumnyanzela ukuba axolelane nabantu bakowabo kuba babecinga ukuba ndim unobangela wokungagoduki kwakhe iminyak' emihlanu.
Emva kokuba sitshatile abantu bakowabo bathi akulunganga ukuba sihlale sobabini. Bathi mandihlale nabo, amane esiza kundibona uNicholas. Babeqonda ukuba xa ndihlala nabo uza kumane ethumela imali yaye abuye rhoqo. Wayivuma loo nto uNicholas, kodwa mna ndala.
Ndandinoonyana ababini endabafumana kubudlelwane bam bangaphambili yaye uNicholas wayebathatha njengabakhe. Sasihlala sobane eKagiso. Ndandimazi ukuba wayeyindla-manzi kodwa wayeka kuba wayefuna ukundibonisa ukuba uzimisele ngathi. Akwaba ndandingaqhathekanga kuba wandijikela, wandibiza ngehagu engazaliyo kuba ndandingenaye umntwana kuye.
Into eyothusayo kukuba ndaye ndakhulelwa, ntonje saphuma eso sisu kuba sasihleli sisilwa. Loo nto yasiqhekeza endaweni yokusisondeza, wahamba ekhaya ngelithi ufuna ukuba kufutshane nomsebenzi.
Maxa wambi kwakuphela iiveki engabuyi endlwini, xa ebuyile wayecel' uthando kubahlobo bam. Wakhe wathi akandifuni. Ngenye imini wabopha iimpahla zam ngeshithi wandigxotha. Kodwa ndaphinda ndabuya. Ndakhulelwa kwakhona yaye ndandingumlwelwe ixesh' elininzi. Oonyana bam babefunda isikolo, ndacela umakazi wam onama-20 eminyaka, uKondi ukuba aze kundinceda.
Emva kweeveki ezintathu ehlala nam ndaya edolophini. Wayekhona endlwini uNicholas kodwa wala ukuba ndihambe noKondi, ndamshiya ke kuba ndandingxamile yaye ndingazimiselanga kulwa naye.
Ndadibana noNicholas endleleni xa ndibuya; kwakho into engaqondakaliyo ngaye yaye wayenuka utywala. Ndafika endlwini uKondi ekhathazekile kodwa engafuni ukutsho ukuba ukhathazwe yintoni. Ndade ndeva ngomhlobo wakhe ukuba udlwengulwe! Ndambuza umntu omdlwengulileyo wathi ngumyeni wam - ndandingathi ndiphambene!
Sammangalela uNicholas, wavalelwa iintsuku eziliqela entolongweni. Bandicenga abantu bakowabo ukuba ndilicime ityala kodwa ndala. Ngelishwa yonke loo nto yayingemnandi kuKondi. Wayengazimiselanga ukuya enkundleni yamatyala, waza wagqiba ekubeni agoduke. Lacinywa ke ityala, wakhululwa noNicholas.
Nam yandenzela istresi loo nto sade saphuma nesisu kwakhona endandisikhulelwe. Waqhuba nokundithuka esithi ndiyihagu etye abantwana bakhe. Ndanyamezela iminyaka emithathu kweso sihogo somtshato ndade ndafumana nomnye umntwana.
Ndayeka isikolo, ndingenawo umsebenzi yaye ndingenayo indawo endinokuya kuyo. Ekugqibeleni ndaba naso isibindi sokumshiya. Usandifowunela uNicholas, kodwa ubomi bam buya phambili yaye andibuyi ngamva. [x]
Umbhali: Ntokozo Maseko
IBALI LIKA-ANDREW
(liyaqhutywa):
IBALI LIKARHOFIWE (liyaqhutywa):
Amagama abantu ekuthethwa ngabo kula mabali atshintshiwe.

Bhota Criselda
Ingaba unombuzo ngeHIV okanye nge-AIDS? Ubhidekile? Ulilolo? Uyoyika? Ungaxhalabi, indumasi kanomathotholo neTV, uCriselda Kananda uza kuphendula imibuzo yakho
I-HIV ibulala ubuhlobo
Bhota Criselda: Umhlobo wam uneHIV kwaye andazi ukuba ndifanele ndimkhuthaze kanjani. Sineminyaka engaphaya kweli-15 singabahlobo abasenyongweni, kodwa ndibona ukugula kwakhe kubutshintshile ubuhlobo bethu. Asisenanto sincokola ngayo kwaye naye akasenguye lowa ndandimazi.
NguKG, e-Alberton
UCriselda uyaphendula:
Le yingxaki abajongene nayo abahlobo namalungu osapho amaninzi. Sinento yokucinga ukuba xa umhlobo ekuxelela ngemeko yakhe, oko kumenza uxanduva lwakho. Simxelela into afanele ayitye, ayisele yaye ayinxibe ngokungathi uyingcali ethile. Kulumkele oko; kaloku ungumhlobo awuyongcali yempilo.
Kufuneka niqhube nokwenza izinto ebenizenza engekakuxeleli ukuba uneHIV.
Mhlawumbi wakuxelela ukuba uneHIV, ukanti ngoku uyazisola ngokukuxelela kwakhe. Xa uzama ukuzenza umhlobo wokwenene kuye, uza kuzithemba kwakhona aze aphinde akhululeke kwakhona.
Ukuthetha ngeHIV nomntwana wam
Ndathatha umntwana oneminyaka esixhenxe ongenguye owam ndamkhulisa. Wayekhe wadlwengulwa waza wosulelwa yiHIV. Ugqirha uthe ngoku lixesha lokuba makasebenzise ii-ARV. Andizange ndathetha naye ngengulo yakhe. Ndingawusingatha njani lo mba?
ngu-Ester Janjties, eKenilworth
UCriselda uyaphendula:
Le yeyona ngxaki inkulu ejongana nabazali kunye nabagcini babantwana. Kuhle uye kucela uncedo lwengcali yengqondo okanye umcebisi oqeqeshiweyo.
Uqhagamshelwano ngokuthetha nangezenzo lubalulekile kuba eyona nto ibalulekileyo yinto oyithethayo nokuba uyithetha kanjani. Xa uthetha nentombi yakho niza kuphendulana, nicebisane nivakalise neemvakalelo zenu. Xa ungathethi nayo ngendlela eyiyo ingazibona ingento yanto okanye izibone kuyimpazamo yayo eyenza yadlwengulwa.
Kufuneka ikhululeke ngento oyithetha nayo ukuze ikwazi ukutsho iimvakalelo neengxaki zayo. Ukwazi kwayo ukuba uyithanda injalo kuza kuyenza izithembe.
Iza kufuna nengqalelo eyodwa indlela oza kuxelela ngayo abanye abantu ngemeko yayo, kwaye ndiyathemba uza kulufumana uncedo ekwenzeni oko. Ungonqeni ukubuza ugqirha nantoni na kuba ukusebenzisa ii-ARV linyathelo elikhulu kuwe nentombi yakho.
Ndibaxelele abantu ngemeko yam?
Ndineminyaka emininzi ndafumana ukuba ndineHIV. Kutshanje ndenze isicelo somsebenzi bandibuza ukuba andinasigulo ndinaso na. Andikhange ndazi nokuba ndibaxelele na ngemeko yam, ngoko andikhange ndisizalise eso sithuba kwifom yabo. Ndifanele ndimxelele umqeshi imeko yam?
NguDora D, ePretoria East
UCriselda uyaphendula:
Ngelishwa abantu basacalulwa xa beneHIV, nto leyo inxamnye nomthetho. Oku ke kwenza abantu bangafuni ukuthi pahaha ukuba baneHIV.
Ukuphendula umbuzo wakho, ndingathi kuxhomekeke kumsebenzi owenza isicelo sawo - kweminye imisebenzi ukugula ngenxa yezifo ezikuhlaseliswa kukuba uneHIV kungakwenza ungakwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wakho.
I-HIV awunako ukuyosulela abantu ophangela nabo. Xa ufuna ukuthi pahaha ukuba unayo, kukho imithetho ethintela inkampani okanye umbutho ophangela kuwo ukuba ungakucaluli ngenxa yaloo nto.
Liyintoni ingomso lam?
Ndineminyaka engama-21 yaye ndafunyanwa ukuba ndineHIV ebutsheni balo nyaka. Ngoku andiqinisekanga ngezinto ezininzi ngengomso lam. Ndifun' ukutshata ndibe nabantwana, kodwa andithandi ukuba ngumthwalo kwabany' abantu. Kungoku nje izinto azihambi kakuhle ncam phakathi kwam nomfana endincuma naye. Kukho umfana endisandul' ukudibana naye nendimxeleleyo ngemeko yam kwaye uyandikhuthaza. Ndicela undicebise kuba andisaqiniseki ngengomso lam.
NguVanness, eKapa
UCriselda uyaphendula: Wenze kakuhle ngokuvavanyelwa iHIV ukuze uzazi imeko yakho. Ufanele ubonane nomcebisi ukuze aphendule imibuzo onayo.
Okwesibini awunako ukulungisa uthando olungahambi kakuhle ngokuthandana nomnye umntu. Asiyonyaniso ukuba akusayi kuba nabantwana kuba uneHIV. Unako ukutshata uphile ubomi obunemveliso nempilo. Oko ungakwenza ngokuhoya ubomi bakho nokwamkela ukuphila nale ntsholongwane. [x]

Criselda at HIV Q&A, Box 473014, Parklands,
2121.

OKUTSHA
Ukubamba ibhola ngonyawo
UKUFUNDISA unyana wakho ukudlal' ibhola ayikuko ukumthengela nje ibhola aza kuyikhaba-khaba ebaleni, utsho uMike "Tse-Tse Fly" Ntombela owayeyincutshe yeMamelodi Sundowns.
Sicel' uMike ukuba asinik' amacebiso okufundis' unyana ukudlal' ibhola, waza wathi mfundise ukubamba ibhola ngonyawo (i-"first touch") kuqala eselula. Ngoko xa ungafuni ukuva abantu besithi kuye: "Awukwazi ukukhontrola ibhola wena", mfundise ukubamba nokulawula ibhola ngonyawo. Oku kuza kumfundisa nokukhab' ibhola. [x]
Umbhali: Force Khashane
UBonginkosi Gonco noyise, uJohn Mkhabela.
UBUSAZI NA?
Abadlali abaninzi bafunda iindlela ezigwenxa zokudlal' ibhola phakathi kweminyak' emihlanu neli-11. "Amakhwenkwe athi efikelela kwibakala lokuqeqeshwa kumaqela abadlali abaselula xa eneminyaka ephakathi kwe-12 ne-15, ube sewenzekile umonakalo omkhulu," utsho uMike "Tse-Tse Fly" Ntombela.
Utata ngoyena mqeqeshi webhola ubalulekileyo kunyana wakhe, kuba kaloku nguye omele amfundise izinto ezisisiseko zokudlal' ibhola. Kodwa nabo ootata bayalufun' uncedo. Ukususela kule nyanga siza kuba nomhlathi wokunceda ootata baqeqeshe oonyana babe ziincutshe zangomso ebholeni
UKUBAMB' IBHOLA NGONYAWO
Kufuneka umqeqeshe koku kwindawo ethe tyaba. Kungaba kuqaqaqa okanye kwindawo egangathiweyo.
1 Kufuneka utata nonyana baphane isithuba esiyi-5m. Unyana makakhabe kuhle ibhola ngomphakathi wonyawo iye kuyise ngokucothayo.
2 Utata makayibambe ngomphakathi wonyawo naye ibhola. Aze naye ayikhabe kancinane ibuyele kunyana.
3 Mabaqinisekise ukuba ibhola iyafika komnye. Ukhumbule ubuchule bokubamb' ibhola ngonyawo kuxa ibhola uyibamba ime, ingabetheki kulo ihambe. Mayihlale elunyaweni de uyikhabe. Khabelanani niyibambe ngonyawo ibhola kahlanu ngonyawo ngalunye. Kubalulekile ukufund' ukuyibamba ngeenyawo zombini!
QAPHELA: Oku kukufundisa ukubamb' ibhola ngonyawo. Xa umntwana ephakathi kweminyak' emihlanu nesixhenxe, ungamngxameli. Kaloku ukukhab' ibhola kakhulu akubalulekanga kuye okwangoku!
Apha uBonginkosi ubonis' indlela ONGAFANELANGA ubambe ngayo ibhola. Uzam' ukuyibamba ngokubek' unyawo phezu kwayo, kungenzeka iphuncuke ibhola kuye. Yibambe ngecala lonyawo ibhola, ingasuki de uyikhabe wena.
UQEQESHO LWEBHOLA
ICEBISO

Njengoko inkoliso yabantwana bephindela ezikolweni, bahleli emakhaya abantwana abaneziphene emzimbeni...
Abafumani
NCEDO
UNOSIZWE Ziwele oneminyaka engama-58 ungumama ongatshatanga womntwana onesiphene emzimbeni nasengqondweni, kwaye uyabazi ubunzima bokukhulis' umntwana onjalo.
Intombi yakhe uXolelwa wazalwa enesiphene engalweni nasemlenzeni ngoko akakwazi kuhamba, ukuzityisa nokuzihlamba. Uhlala nayo etyotyombeni eKhayelitsha eKapa kwaye akafumani nkxaso ukuyikhulisa.
UNosizwe uthi akazange akwazi ukusa uXolelwa esikolweni sabantwana abaneziphene emzimbeni njengaye ngenxa yokuxhoma kweendleko. Akayedwanga kuloo ngxaki kuba baninzi abazali aboyiswa kukufundisa abantwana babo abaneziphene.
Ngokwamanani karhulumente, bangaphaya kwama-260 000 abantwana abaneziphene emzimbeni abangafundiyo. Ayothusa loo manani kube kusithiwa wonk' umntwana unelungelo lokufunda.
Yintoni eyenziwayo ukunceda abantwana abanjengoXolelwa?
Impendulo yaloo mbuzo ayilulanga njengoko ifanele.
Ukususela ebutsheni buka- 2007 urhulumente wenze izicwangciso zokufundisa abantwana abaneziphene ezingephi ezikolweni "zabantwana abangenaziphene". Ezo zikolo beziza kwakhelwa iindawo zokuhamba ngezitulo ezinamavili nezinye iimfuno zabantwana abaneziphene.
Ukwathembise ukwakha izikolo "zabantwana abaneziphene emzimbeni" kulo lonke eli.
Ekuqaleni wathi uzokwakha izikolo ezingama-30 kodwa ukunqongophala kwemali kwenze elo nani lathotyelwa kwi-12 ngokutsho kukaMoses Simelane weSebe leMfundo.
Ngokutsho kwengxelo kaSimmi Pillay weSouth African Human Rights Commission (SAHRC) okunye okwenza le ngxaki ibemandundu kukunqongophala kweetitshala eziqeqeshelwe ukufundisa abantwana abaneziphene esikolweni nangaphandle kwesikolo.
UDave Balt ongumongameli weNational Professional Teachers Organisation Of South Africa (Naptosa) uthi bayitshilo kurhulumente ingxaki yokunqongophala kweetitshala.
Ngokutsho kukaBalt, lo mbutho usalindele impendulo karhulumente.
USandra Ambrose weDisabled Children's Action Group uthi nomgaqo-nkqubo karhulumente awubahoyi abantwana abaneziphene baze bagqibele befihlwa emakhaya yaye bephethwe gadalala.
Kodwa isithethi seSebe leMfundo, uLunga Ngqengelele uthi urhulumente wenza kangangoko enako ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantwana abaneziphene bafumana imfundo esemgangathweni.
Uthi ngabazali abangabasiyo abantwana esikolweni nabangayiyo koonontlalo-ntle ukuze babancede.
Ngokutsho kweli sebe kukho isicwangciso zokwakhiwa kwezikolo ezilungele ebantwana abaneziphene emzimbeni kufutshane neendawo abahla kuzo ukuze bangahambi imigama emide ukuze bafumane izikolo ezibafaneleyo.
Omnye wabantu abaphala phambili kula malinge nguNosipho Franse oyinqununu weThembalethu Special School eseGugulethu eKapa.
Isikolo sakhe sinabantwana abali-185, ukanti abali-166 kubo bafumana inkxaso-mali karhulumente.
UNosipho ukwathe nakubeni kunjalo isikolo sakhe sisaqhwalela ukufuman' imali eyaneleyo yokufundisa abantwana nokubakhathalela xa bengekho esikolweni. Oko kwenza kubenzima ukuhlawula abasebenzi besikolo nokutheng' ukutya nokuthenga izithuthi zokuhambisa abafundi babo.
Ngaphezulu abafumani nkxaso ingako nasebazalini babantwana. "Malunga ne-80% yabo abaphangeli kwaye abathathi ntweni," utshilo.
I-SAHRC ithe usemkhulu umsebenzi ofuna ukwenziwa kwaye oko kufanele kuqala ngokufundiswa kwabazali ngezinto abanokuzenza ukukhulisa abantwana abaneziphene emzimbeni. "Namasebe emfundo makasebenzisane - kwenziwe neenguqu ezikhawulezileyo," utshilo.
Okwangoku abantwana abaneziphene emzimbeni abafundi ngokufanelekileyo kwaye oko kutshabalalisa ingomso labo.[x]
Umbhali nomfoti: Brenda Nkuna/West Cape News
UBOMI BOKWENENE
Banga-phezulu kwama-260 000 aba-ntwana abane-ziphene emzi-mbeni abanga-fundiyo
Abafundi abonwabileyo. Nangona zikho iingxaki zemali, inkoliso "yezikolo zabaneziphene" ziyaxomoloza noxa kunzima.
UZiwele etyisa uXolelwa. Uthi intombi yakhe ayifundanga kuyaphi ezikolweni zabantwana abaneziphene ngenxa yokuxhoma kweendleko.
UNosizwe Ziwele udlala noXolelwa oyintombi yakhe enesiphene emzimbeni ngaphandle kwetyotyombe abahlala kulo eKhayelitsha.

fumana uncedo
Ngaba umntwana wakho akakwazi ukufunda"
Le ngxaki iyamlibazisa umntwana wakho esikolweni kodwa ingasombululeka aze akwazi ukuqhubeka nobomi...
UXOLANI wayetsala nzima esikolweni xa wayeneminyaka esixhenxe ubudala. Wayengakwazi ukufunda, engakwazi nokubhala. Babemangalisiwe abazali bakhe neetitshala. Wayekrele-krele, edlamkile, ebalasele emidlalweni nakweziny' izinto ngaphandle kokubhala nokufunda.
Xa eneminyaka elithoba wayesele ethatyathwa njengomntwana osilelayo esikolweni.
Abany' abantwana esikolweni babemqhula bembiza "ngesigqogqo."
Ngethamsanqa lakhe kwabakho ititshala eyarhana ukuba kungenzeka ukuba uXolani unengxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda waza wancediswa yititshala encedisa kwezonyango bayifumana ingxaki kaXolani.
Wathi esakufumana uncedo lweengcali yaphela loo ngxaki yakhe yokungakwazi ukufunda waqhubeka esikolweni.
"Ingxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda kufuneka ilungiswe kusekwangoko kungenjalo ibuphazamisa bonke ubomi bomntu," utsho uMarj Arslanian weAudiblox, ekuyinkqubo ekhethekileyo esetyenziswa kwihlabathi ukunceda iingxaki zokufunda kubafundi.
Le ngxaki ichaphazela abantwana nabantu abadala ngeendlela ngeendlela kuxhomekeke ekubeni ingakanani na.
Uninzi lwabo baba neengxaki zokufunda nokubhala ukanti xa yondele kakhulu le ngxaki abakwazi tu ukubhala nokufunda. Uninzi lwabafundi abanale ngxaki bayoyiswa zizibalo.
Ibonakala njani"
Mjonge emehlweni umntu onengxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda uza kubona into elolu hlobo...
Amagama alula uyawagqwetha umzekelo elithi RAT liyajika libe nguTAR.
Isivakalisi siyaxoveka singabinantsingiselo.
Oonobumba uyababhidanisa umzekelo u-b amenze u-d.
Thatha iphepha ulijongise esipilini uze ufunde lo mbhalo usesipilini. Abanye abantu abaneengxaki zokufunda bawufunda ngolo hlobo umbhalo oqhelekileyo.
Iimpawu
Nazi ezinye zeempawu ezixhaphakileyo nezintama ukuba umntwana uneengxaki zokungakwazi ukufunda yaye ufuna uncedo:
t Ukungaqiniseki ngesandla sasekhohlo nesasekunene okwenza awagqwethe amagama namanani xa efunda.
t Abantwana abanale ngxaki abakwazi ukulandelelanisa izinto njengokubala okanye ukulandelelanisa iintsuku zeveki. Bayoyiswa kukukhumbula okanye ukukwazi ukulandelelanisa izinto.
t Ukufunda aze apele amagama ngendlela engaqhelekanga. Le yingxaki eyondeleyo yokungakwazi ukufunda nebonakala ngokuqashela amagama nokuba engenantsingiselo.
t Ukuthetha kade okanye ukuthetha into engavakaliyo. Uphando lubonisa ukuba ukungakwazi kakuhle ukuthetha neengxaki zokufunda zinxibelelene.
t Ukufunda kancinci ethandabuza.
t Ukungakwazi ukubhala kakuhle.
Ongakwenza
Xa urhana ngathi umntwana wakho unengxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda nokubhala kubalulekile ukuba uthethe netitshala yakhe. Uninzi lwezikolo ezikhulu zinetitshala enceda kwezonyango eqeqeshiweyo eza kumnceda umntwana wakho okanye imse kwingcali yezonyango.
Xa kukho umntu omdala onale ngxaki mfunele uncedo, usengalufumana.[x]

Iingxaki Zomthetho
Niziphathelwe yiBONA nabeScorpion Legal Protection
Ingozi eziindleko
Ndapaka imoto yam ngaphandle kwevenkile ndathi xa ndiphuma ndafika itshayiswe yenye imoto eyayimiswe kwindawo eyehlayo eyasuke yazihambela ingenamqhubi. Ndathi kumnini wayo ubengayitsalanga ihandbrake, kodwa wandiphikisa wathi ubeyitsalile qha kunokuba kwenzeke ingozi. Wathi ukumtyhola kwam akunabungqina ngoko andinakumbek' ityala ngaloo ngozi.
Iindleko zokulungis' imoto yam zibe yi- R6 275 ngoko andiboni ukuba ndingahlawula imali engako kube kungeyompazamo yam.
nguElizabeth Nkosi, eThekwini
lZimbini izinto ezingafanelanga umntu anokuzenza komny' umntu: ulwaphulo-mthetho okanye umonakalo oziindleko. Umonakalo oziindleko ke kukuba umntu akwenze into embi kodwa ekungenakutshiwo ukuba lulwaphulo-mthetho ngaphantsi komthetho weli weCommon Law okanye iCriminal Procedure Act okanye eminy' imithetho yeli lizwe.
Xa kwenzeke olu hlobo lomonakalo umntu owonakaliselwe impahla okanye owenzakalisiweyo kusenokuba nguye othwal' iindleko zaloo monakalo. Ezo ndleko ke unako ukuzifuna kumntu owenze umonakalo.
Ukuze uzifumane kufuneka ummangali atyhole aze anike ubungqina ukuba yaba kukungakhathali kommangalelwa okwenze loo monakalo. Xa umangala ke kufuneka zibe nobungqina bokungakhathali izityholo zakho.
Umntu nomntu unoxanduva lokuzama ukungonakalisi impahla yomnye umntu. Ngoko umntu omise imoto yakhe kwindawo eyehlayo wayefanele aqinisekise ukuba imoto yakhe ayinakusuka izihambele iyokonakalis' iimoto zabany' abantu.
Intetho ethi "yenza kangangoko unako imbaxa gqitha", kodwa ke yayiluxanduva lomnini wemoto eyatshayisa eyakho ukuqinisekisa ukuba iziqhoboshi zayo ziyasebenza.
Kwicala lakho zikho izinto ongazithelekelela ukuba zenzeka.
Okokuqala kukuba kungenzeka ukuba ihandbrake kuloo moto yayingasebenzi okanye ke kube umqhubi akazange ayitsale iphelele.
Ingxaki yakho kukuba awuzange umbone kwaye akukho mntu wambonayo umqhubi engayitsali ihandbrake.
Phofu ke umthetho uza kuba ngakwicala lakho apho.
Kaloku kukho into emthethweni xa umntu ethelekelela into enokuba yenzeka ngenxa yokungakhathali komnye umntu, ibe loo nto ingakholeleka nokuba kungekho ngqina, "kuthiwa loo nto ibubungqina obuzithethela ngokwabo."
Oko ke kuthetha ukuba unako ukutyhola umqhubi wemoto ngokumisa imoto kwindawo ehlayo, wayishiya ingenamntu, yaza yasuka yaya kutshayisa imoto yakho yenza umonakalo.
Apha ubungqina obuzithethelayo buthi akazange ayitsale ihandbrake, ngoko ke akazange abe nankathalo. Xa uzimisele ngokummangalela loo mntu ufune iindleko zakho kuza kufuneka ufune igqwetha. [x]
Sizamile ukuqinisekisa ukuba iingcebiso esikunika zona zifanelekile. Kodwa ke imeko yengxaki nganye ifuna ukuphandisiswa. AbakwaScorpion Legal Protection (Pty) Ltd, amalungu eengcali ezicebisayo, iBONA nabashicileli bale magazini abanakubekwa tyala nguye nabani na osebenzisa ezi ngcebiso.
Thumel' ingxaki yakho kule dilesi: BONA Legally Yours, Box 32083, Mobeni 4060. AbakwaScorpion baza kunika wonk' umntu ofake isikhalazo sakhe ivawutsha yemizuzu engama-30 yokuncokola negqwetha e-ofisini yabo naphi na kweli okanye ngomnxeba.

IIMFIHLELO ZIKAKELLY KHUMALO ZOKULUNGISA IINWELE
Esi stayile ngumzekelo omhle weenwele ezifakelwayo apho iinwele zakho ziflerhwa zonke ze yona ithungelwe ngaphezulu. Okumnandi ngayo kukuba ikhusela iinwele zakho, okuyinto ebalulekileyo nokuba uneengxaki okanye uyindwalutho efana noKelly Khumalo elungiswa iinwele yonke imihla.
"Indilungele kuba ndingumntu onomunyu ngeenwele zam," utsho uKelly. Nanga amacebo akhe ama-3 awathandayo:
Mkhethe ngononophelo umntu olungisa iinwele zakho: "Esaluni ndenziwa linenekazi elinye kanti nakuRhythm City mnye umfo ondenzayo, sele bezazi iinwele zam."
Zikhethe iimveliso zakho: "Ndiyaqiniseka ukuba kusetyenziswa ishampoo elungileyo nehair food isetyenziswe rhoqo. Ndiyazithanda iimveliso zakwaMizani."
Bazi ubuthathaka bakho: "Mna indawo ekuqala kuyo iinwele zam ibuthathaka."
Yandisa
iztayile zakho
Iinwele ezifakelwayo zifuna ukukhethwa ngobuchule nokuphathwa ngononophelo ukuze zikuvumele wenze iztayile ozithandayo, itsho ingcaphephe yeenwele uFaith Seuoe
ENYE yeentento endizithandayo yethi, "Khohlisa de kube yinyani" - ngoko ke ukuba uneenwele ezimfutshane kwaye uziva ungenakulinda zikhule, kulungile thenga iinwele ezifakelwayo.
Fumana esakho istayile
Umbala, inkangeleko, ubude nendlela ezichetywe ngayo - oku ungakwenza ngeenwele ezifakelwayo. Zininzi iindlela ongenza ngazo, ungazithungela, uzincamathisele ngeglue okanye ngephini kungenjalo wenze iisingili okanye iikhonrowzi.
Kodwa qiniseka okokuba wenziwa yincutshe ukuba ukhethe ukuthungelwa. Khumbula kaloku kumbalwa apho iinwele ezithungelweyo ziphuma zintle, kwaye naxa uza kuzicheba istayile esithile awunakuchetywa nangubani na.
Iindidi zeenwele ezifakelwayo
Ukuzithungela iinwele ezifakelwayo kokona kuxhaphakileyo kuba uba neenwele ezinde ngesaquphe kwaye zibukeke njengezendalo. Ukuba ukhetha ukuba iinwele zakho ziflerhwe ikhonrowzi zonke ze kuthungelwe ezifakelwayo ngaphezulu, unako ukuthenga iinwele ezingafaniyo nohlobo lweenwele zakho zokwenene nkqu nombala. Le indlela yeyona ilungileyo xa ufuna ukuphumza iinwele zakho kwiztayile ezenziwa ngobushushu, okanye iinwele zendalo ongafuni kuzirileksa kodwa ube uzithanda neenwele ezoluliweyo neziphothekayo.
Ukuba awuziflerhi zonke, ushiya ezisemacaleni ukuze zona zihlale phezu kwezifakelweyo, thenga iinwele ezifakelwayo eziza kufana neenwele zakho.
Ngaphandle kokubreyida iisingili neekhonrowzi, ezinye indlela zokufakela ihuman-hair extensions ziquka:
IGlu: Ukuncamathelisa iinwele ezifakelwayo entlonzeni ngeglu yindlela elula. Kodwa akulo cebo xa ufuna zihlale ixesha elide kuba ingazimosha iinwele zakho zendalo.
IMicrobonding: Le yeyona ndlela inexabiso elixhomileyo, yenziwa ziisaluni ezikhethekileyo apho uhlawuliswa ngokobunzima nobude beenwele ezo kuquka nokuzifakela.
Ukunonophela iihuman-hair extensions
Ukuba uza kuzihlamba ekhaya ii-extensions zakho, funa iingcebiso kwingcaphephe, wazi ukuba yeyiphi ibrashi, ishampoo neconditioner omawuzisebenzise.
Zibrashe phambi kokuba uzihlambe ngeshampoo, uzikame ngekama enkulu ziseneconditioner.
Thambisa kancinci ezakho iinwele nentlonze ukuze zingemki. Ungayisebenzisi i-oyile okanye isifumisi kwii-extensions kuba iza kuzenza zigqole yaye zimbatshe.
Ukuze zivuseleleke ezijijiweyo sebenzisa ileave-in conditioner okanye imousse engenatywala kabini nakathathu ngeveki kwiinwele ezimanzi. Ngeziny' iintsuku zitshize ngamanzi, uzikame kuhle okanye uzibrashe, zihlikize uziyeke zizomele ukuze kuvuseleleke imiphotho.
Qiniseka ukuba iinwele zakho zenene zomile emva kokuzihlamba nokufaka iconditioner ukunqanda ukungunda nentlonze enukayo.
Thenga ihairdrier elungileyo, iflat-iron kunye nehot-brush.
Ukuhoya iisynthetic extensions
Ungazihlamba uzikhondishine ekhaya lula ezi iinwele, ngaphandle kokuba zifuna uhoyo oluthe kratya, njengezijijiweyo okanye ikinky extension ingakumbi ke ukuba ziisingili. Ziphithana lula ngoko yiya esaluni.
Isynthetic hair ungayitshiza, uyithambise ukuze ibukeke ikhazimla. [x]
Kufote: Ivan Naude; iinwele nolungiso-buso; Faith Seuoe; iztayle: Marina Walsh
UNONOPHELO LWEENWELE
BONA XHOSA July 2008
3
Ungachitha imali engakanani?
Bala imali onako ukuyichitha xa uthenga ii-extensions nezinto zokuzinonophela.
Lingakanani ixesha olichithayo ezinweleni zakho ngemini?
Ukuba ungumntu oxakekileyo, qiniseka ukuba ukhetha istayile esiza kukwenza ubukeke ngaphandle kokufuna uhoyo olumandla.
Luluphi uhlobo lwakho lwe-extension?
Ihuman hair ixhomile ngexabiso kodwa iyahlala kwaye ungabusebenzisa ubushushu ukuyolula/okuyiphotha kanye njengeenwele zakho zokwenene. Ukuba ukhethe zona, buza ingcaphephe ukuze uthenge ezisemgangathweni nezinexabiso.
Kanti isynthetic hair ungakwazi ukuthenga eziliqela ukuze uzixube. Qiniseka ukuba azikhazimli kakhulu, kuba ziza kucaca ukuba ayizonwele zokwenene.
Ezinye iisaluni nabathengisi abayithengi kakhulu ihuman hair ngenxa yexabiso layo elixhomileyo - isynthetic hair yona isoloko ifumaneka kuba yona iyafikeleleka. Kodwa eyona nto ibalulekileyo kukwazi ukuba wena unemali elingene ukuthenga ntoni na.

Akayondoda yokwenene
Ndinengxaki yendoda endithandana nayo. Yandixelela ukuba ayiyondoda yokwenene kodwa iyazama ukundonelisa ngokwesondo. Sele indilobola le ndoda ngoku ndiyazibuza ukuba ndiza kukwazi na ukumelana nale meko andizunqwenela ukuva into eyenziwa ngamadoda okwenene emva kokuba sitshatile. Ndicela undincede kuba ndiyayithanda le ndoda kuba iyinto yonke kum.
nguJMS, eThekwini
Yingxaki le ukuyo yaye kufuneka wenze isigqibo sokuba uza kukwazi na ukumelana nayo ubomi bakho bonke - okanye uza kube ucinga ukuba njengokuba utshate nale ndoda nje uphoswa yintoni phandl' apha"
Awucacisanga ukuba yintoni kanye kanye ingxaki yale ndoda kwezesondo. Kufuneka ucingisise ukuba yintoni ebalulekileyo kuwe. Luthando lwakhe" Okanye bubudoda bakhe" Xa uhlala ucinga ukuba amadoda okwenene enza ntoni na loo nto ixela ukuba uthando lwenu aluyi ndawo.
Andifuni kuhlalisana naye
Ndingumama wabantwana abane oneminyaka engama-38 ubudala. Ndifuna umntu endiza kuthandana naye oza kundondla nabantwana bam kodwa angandakheli umzi kuba ndinawo endihlala kuwo nabantwana bam. Ndiya kukonwabela ukuba andityelele kodwa angezi ukuza kuhlala nathi. Ndicela undicebise.
nguDHN, Intuthuko
Ucinga ukuba ikho indoda eza kuvuma ukukondla nabantwana bakho isakugqiba ingafuni kuhlala nawe" Andiboni njalo mna!
Kulula kuwe ukutsho into oyifunayo nongayifuniyo kodwa ndicinga ukuba ulinde de umfumane umntu oza kukuthanda ze kamva uqale ukujonga ukuba ufuna ntoni na okanye yintoni ongayifuniyo. Kungenzeka ufumane umntu oza kufuna ukuphila naye ubomi bakho bonke yaye loo nto ingenza ukuba nifune ukuhlala kunye... Linda de kube kukho into eyenzekayo.
Ndiyarhawuzelelwa yaye ndiyaqaqanjelwa
Ndinama-39 eminyaka ubudala yaye ndinengxaki yokungakwazi ukubamba ilindle nomchamo. Indiqale ekuqaleni konyaka le ngxaki ndaza ndaya ekliniki. Ndineenyanga ezingaphaya kwezintathu ngoku ndiwasebenzisa amayeza endiwanikiweyo kodwa iyaqatsela le ngxaki. Ilungu lam langasese libuhlungu yaye xa ndichama ndiyarhawuzelelwa. Ndithini" Ndicela uncedo.
nguSMM, eCarltonville
Andikwazi ukukunceda kwingxaki yezempilo kodwa ndingakucebisa ukuba ucele ugqirha wakho akuthumele kugqirha oqeqeshelwe olu hlobo lwezifo. Uphathe namayeza owasebenzisayo ukuze ugqirha azi ukuba ngawaphi la mayeza angakuncediyo.
Khawuleza uye kugqirha nanjengoko usithi le ngxaki yakho iyaqatsela.
Wathembisa ukulinda
Ndinama-30 eminyaka umama wabantwana bam yena unama-27. Ndagwetywa iminyaka engama-20 ngo-1999. Ndamxelela ukuba azifumanele mntu wumbi kuba ndingafuni ukuba ahlale iminyaka emininzi ngolu hlobo elinde mna. Kodwa wandithembisa ukuba uza kundilinda. Wandityelela ngo-2001 eze kucel' uxolo kuba equlethe umntwana weny' indoda. Wathi usandithanda kodwa mna andisamthembi. Ndimxolele bethu"
nguMS, eJohannesburg
Wamxelel' umama wabantwana bakho ukuba azifumanele eny' indoda kuba usazi ukuba ukulinda ama-20 eminyaka lo gama wena usentolongweni lixesha elide kakhulu elo. Wathembisa ukukulinda kuba mhlawumbi kwakuyinto efanelekileyo awayenokuyitsho ngoko.
Kutheni ngoku ungasamthembi nje" Kungenxa yokuba ephule isithembiso okanye kungenxa yokuba enomntwana weny' indoda"
Wawusazi ukuba kuza kuba nzima kuye ukukulinda iminyaka engama-20, ngoku ngaba wothuswa yindlela eyenzeke ngayo yonke le nto"
Ndicinga ukuba kubhetele umxolele. Usemtsha yaye kufuneka aqhubeke nobomi. Mhlawumbi uya kuthi xa sel' uphumile entolongweni nibonisane ngekamva lenu nobabini xa eza kube engekatshati.
Ufuna ndilale kowabo
Ndine-18 yaye ndithandana nendoda enama-20 eminyaka ubudala. Siyathandana kakhulu yaye yiyo ethathe ubuntombi bam kulo nyaka. Ingxaki yam ke kukuba ngoku ifuna ndiye kulala nayo ubusuku bonke kowayo. Ndiyoyika ukuyenza loo nto mna kuba abazali bam asoze bayivumele into enjalo. Bangqwabalala kakhulu yaye bafuna ndibuye ekhaya qho ngaphambi kwentsimbi ye-9 ngokuhlwa.
Ndiyixelele le ndoda ngale ngxaki kodwa ithi yona ifuna ndiye kulala kowayo qha yaye ithi kufanel' ukuba ngoku bayilindele loo nto ntonje abasoze bandixelele.
Ndithe mayilinde kodwa ithi ukulinda akwenzi mahluko. Ndiyafuna ukuya kulala kuyo kodwa ndoyika abazali bam.
nguGNT, ePaarl
Xa uhlala nabazali kufuneka umamel' imithetho yabo. Xa besithi yiba sekhaya phambi kweye-9 ngokuhlwa loo nto intama ukuba abafuni ukuba ungalali ekhaya - njengokuba icinga le ndoda.
Andazi ukuba ninexesha elingakanani nithandana kodwa ndiyaqonda ukhe walinda ngaphambi kokuba ulale nayo.
Xa ikuthanda nyhani iza kuyiqonda imeko ophantsi kwayo yaye ayizi kukufaka uxinzelelo oluza konakalis' ubudlelwane bakho nabazali bakho.
Ndiyathemba ukuba niyazikhusela xa nisabelana ngesondo kuba ugawulayo uyalugqib' ulutsha yaye ndiqinisekile ukuba nawe awufuni kuba lixhoba!
Umama okhathazekileyo
Intombi yam yamithiswa yindoda engayazi kakuhle. Yathi xa iyixelela ukuba ikhulelwe le ndoda yayixelel' ukuba mayohlukane nayo. Sele ezelwe ngoku umntwana yaye ndifuna ikhule izazi ukuba izalwa phi na. Xa ndiyifowunela le ndoda ndifun' ukuthetha nayo ayifuni kundimamela isuke ivale iselfowuni yayo. Ndithini"
nguNGM, eSipingo
Ndiyathemba ukuba intombi yakho ifunde isifundo sokuba ingaphinde ilale nomntu engamaziyo ingakumbi njengokuba nogawulayo ehlasele kangaka nje.
Le ndoda kufanele imondle umntwana wayo kodwa makhulu amathuba okuba imphike lo mntwana nto leyo ingakhokelela kuvavanyo lwegazi oluza kubonisa ukuba inguyise womntwana ngenene.
Ndikucebisa ukuba ufune iingcebiso zomthetho. AbakwaScorpion Legal Services bangakucebisa yaye ungabatsalela kule nombolo 011-842-8994.
Kumba womnombo womzukulwana wakho khauzibuze lo mbuzo: xa le ndoda ingamfuni lo mntwana ngaba kubalulekile ukuba asisebenzise isiduko sikayise"
Akakagqibi ukundilobola
Ndihlala nendoda endincuma nayo kodwa ayikagqibi ukundilobola.
Ayindiniki impendulo xa ndiyibuza ukuba uza kugqiba nini ukundilobola. Ndicinga ukuba unobangela woko kukuba andikabi namntwana wayo yaye ngoku iyathandabuza ukunditshata. Ndicela undicebise.
nguZC, kwaMsomi
Awutsho ukuba ninexesha elingakanani nithandana kodwa ndiyarhana ngathi seninexesha elide. Xa ingakuphenduli indoda yakho kubhetele ubuze ebantwini abadala ukuze wazi ukuba kuqhubeka ntoni na.
Xa le ndoda yakho ingakwazi ukuthetha nawe ngemiba ebalulekileyo ngoku ucinga ukuba iza kutshintsha nisakutshata"
Unxibelelwano nokunyaniseka sisiseko somtshato oqinileyo yaye ndithi mhlawumbi inganguwe othandabuzayo ukutshata nale ndoda.
Okwesibini: ngaba sikho isizathu sokuba ikutshate ekubeni ihlala nawe yaye iphatheke okomntu otshatileyo"
Ndicinga ukuba ininzi into ekusafuneka niyilungise nale ndoda.
Indoda ekrele-krele
Ndinama-21 eminyaka ubudala. Intombi endincuma nayo ayifuni ukuba sisebenzise ikhondom xa sisabelana ngesondo. Ndiyayithanda kakhulu, ndithini"
nguMQM, eKroondal
Kuyakhuthaza ukuva indoda ikhuthalele ukusebenzisa ikhondom ukanti kuyothusa ukuva intombi engayifuniyo ikhondom. Yichazele ngengxaki kagawulayo ohlaseleyo kweli uyixelele kwanokuba ikhondom yeyokuzikhusela ukuze ungosulelwa ngulo bhubhane. Kuyinto elungileyo ukusebenzisa ikhondom. Xa ikuthanda nayo le ntombi iza kuvuma ukusebenzisa ikhondom.
Xa ingafuni kucacile ukuba ayikuthandi yaye ayikukhathalelanga. Ungabeki ubomi bakho esichengeni! [x]

Ukhuseleko lwabantwana
Abantwana baseMzantsi Afrika basesichengeni sokusweleka ngengozi ngokuphindwe kabini kunabamanye amazwe ehlabathi - kodwa ukwazi iingozi ajongene nazo umntwana wakho kungakunceda umkhusele
kubhale uPATRICIA McCRACKEN
kufote uVAL ADAMSON
abafotiweyo bayabonisa nje
SIZA kubulala abantwana baseMzantsi Afrika abangaphezulu kwe-1 000 ngonyaka ngempazamo. Ngokomzekelo, iRed Cross War Memorial Children's Hospital eseKapa inyanga abantwana abangaphezulu kwe-10 000 abenzakeleyo - nani elo linyangwa kwisibhedlele esinye.
Yonk' imihla abantwana basinda cebetshu ekufeni ezindleleni zeli nasemakhaya, imizinjana yabo ekudala ibetheka isinika irekhodi embi kakhulu xa ithelekiswa neyamazwe anjengeVietnam, iChina neKorea ngokutsho kweWorld Health Organisation. Okwangoku akakabikho amanani amany' amazwe aseAfrika.
Ngokutsho kukaNjingalwazi Sebastian van As ongumlawuli weChild Accident Prevention Foundation of SA (CAPFSA), la manani abonisa ukuba umntwana waseMzantsi Afrika usesichengeni sokwenzakala ngokuphindwe kali-10 kunowaseJamani. Kodwa ukwathe kuninzi esingakwenza ukuphucula le meko.
Baswelekaphi abantwana bethu"
Umntwana omnye kwabathathu abasweleka ezingozini sukuba engene ezindleleni zeemoto zeli.
"Kaloku azikabikho iindawo zokudlal' abantwana ezilokishini. Kuyenzeka futhi ingabikho nendawo yabantu abahamba ngeenyawo ecaleni kweendlela zeli, ukanti namakhaya akabiyelwanga abe namasango avalwayo. Ngoko abantwana badlal' ezitratweni kube kukho neemoto ezihla zinyuka ngesantya," utshilo uVan As.
"Abantwana abangaphantsi kweminyaka esibhozo ngabona baba sengozini kakhulu ezitratweni kuba abakakwazi ukuphepha ingozi yeemoto - nkqu nokuba balunyukisiwe. Yiloo nto kufuneka besoloko bebekwe elisweni.
"Nangona kunjalo kuxhaphakile ukubona imveku eneminyaka emihlanu ibhadazela yodwa endleleni yeemoto. Loo mntwana akafanelanga abekwe ityala ngaloo nto. Kwaye oko sukuba kungeyongozi, koko kukungakhathali komntu omgcinileyo loo mntwana."
Umntwana omnye kwabali-12 abafa ezingozini ngabantwana abasukuba behamba ngeemoto - ukungafakwa kwabo amabhanti okhuseleko kwenza kwenzakale kakhulu abantwana abane kwabahlanu abahamba ngeemoto, utsho uVan As.
"Eyona nto ibuhlungu kakhulu kuxa abo bantwana besenzakala kuba abazali babo bebecinga ukuba bakhuselekile xa bebasingathile emotweni. Nokuba uhamba ngo- 50km/h ngemoto xa utshayisa into umntwana ukutsala okwento enobunzima obuyi-1 000kg. Akukho mntu ke unokuxhathisa ebambe into ebunzima bungako," utshilo uAs.
Njengoko intloko kuyeyona inzima emzimbeni wakhe, yeyona ingabetheka kwideshbhodi okanye phantsi kuqala ngoko abantwana ngabona baba sesichengeni sokwenzakala kakubi entloko engozini yemoto.
Yintoni ebulala abantwana bethu"
u Amanzi abulala malunga nomntwana omnye kwabathandathu abasweleka ngengozi.
"Umntwana angasweleka ngemizuzwana engama-30 engakhali kwichibi lamanzi ayi-4cm," ulumkise watsho uVan As.
u Ukutsha kubulala umntwana omnye kwabathandathu abasweleka ngengozi.
"Oyena mbulali mkhulu ngamadangatye omlilo nezitovu. Kodwa abaninzi benzakaliswa kukutshiswa zizinto ezingamanzi emakhaya. Likho neqaqobana labenzakaliswa ziintambo zombane, nekudla ngokuba lapho kudityaniswe iintambo zombane ngokungekho mthethweni."
u Okokugqibela, kukho abantwana abachaphazeleka kudushe lokulwa kwabantu abadala ngemipu. Umntwana waseKapa usesichengeni sokwenzakala kudushe izihlandlo ezingama-25 kunomntwana waseBirmingham, eNgilani.
"Siphila phakathi kwezikrelemnqa ezingadubul' iimbumbulu ezingama- 2 000 ngenyanga," utsho uVan As.
"Ukuchanwa komntwana yimbumbulu kudushe akuyongozi kuba besifanele siluthintele olo dushe."
Ukwathe abantwana beli basoloko besesichengeni kuba bahlala kwiindawo eziyingozi ezilungiselelwe abantu abadala.
"Abantwana bethu babethwa nakukuba intlalo yaseMzantsi Afrika idibanisa abantu abazizinhanha nabangathathi-ntweni.
"Kweli ubona amatyotyombe ecaleni koohola bendlela neziporo zikaloliwe, kube kukho neziny' iingxaki ezinjengeemeko zentlalo ezingekho mgangathweni, ukuhlala kwabantu abaninzi kwimizi emincinane, ukusetyenziswa kwezitovu zeparafini nokudlala kwabantwana kwiindawo ezisanyentiweyo."
Nangona kunjalo uVan As uthi asifanelanga sinikezele kwezi meko. Singawasebenzisa amaqela oluntu ukuze sakhe imigaqo-nkqubo eza kunceda abantwana beli, kwaye okona kubalulekileyo kukuba sibagade abantwana bethu...
BONA XHOSA - March 2007
Sindis' abantwana kwizinto ezibabulalayo kweli
Amacebiso OKUKHUSELA umntwana wakho
Abantwana abangaphezulu kweminyak' emine ubudala basethubeni lokubulawa kukwenzakala kunokugula. Kodwa uNjingalwazi Van As uthi iingozi ezininzi zibangelwa zizinto ebezinokunqandeka kuba i-70 phesenti yazo zenzeka ekhaya.
Singazinqanda ngokubagada abantwana nokubafundisa ngokhuseleko ukuze bakhule bekwazi ukuzikhusela. Abantwana abangaphantsi kweminyak' esibhozo abakwazi ukuzikhusela ngokwabo nokuba basekhaya okanye bangaphandle kuba ingqondo yabo ayikakhuli ngokwaneleyo ukuze bakwazi ukubon' ingozi.
Nokuba uxakeke kangakanani na, khumbula ukuba sithetha ngobomi babantwana bethu apha, ngoko cinga, uthethe nabany' oomama abangabamelwane ngokutshintshana ngokugad' abantwana.
Nanga amacebiso angakunceda owanikwa nguNjing. Van As neCAPFSA:
INGOZI 1: Iimoto zezona zibulala abantwana abaninzi eMzantsi Afrika abahamba ngeenyawo nabakhwele kuzo. Abantwana abathathu kwabane baseKhayelitsha abalaliswa eRed Cross Hospital eKapa basukuba bengqutywe ziimoto.
Ongakwenza: Bafundise imithetho yokhuseleko ezindleleni bakukwazi ukuhamba ube ubavuselela ngokuya bekhula. Khumbula ukuba umntwana ongaphantsi kweminyak' esibhozo ufanele agadwe xa ehamba ecaleni kwendlela. Qinisekisa ukuba udlala kumzi obiyelweyo nonesango elivalwayo ukuze angayi endleleni yezithuthi.
INGOZI 2: Ukubulawa kukurhaxwa ngamanzi kuthabatha imizuzwana ukanti amanzi afumaneka naphi na - ezi-emeleni nasezibhafini ekhaya; emachibini, emilanjeni nasemachibini okuqubha. I-CAPFSA ithi umntwana omnye kwabathandathu abasweleka ngengozi sukuba erhaxiwe. Abona bantwana basesichengeni kakhulu ngabo banonyaka omnye ukuya kwesibhozo kunye nabantwana abadala abangakwaziyo ukuqubha.
Ongakwenza: Babeke elisweni abantwana xa besemanzini okanye bekufutshane nawo, ungaze ushiye umntwana ebhafini. Ii-emele zamanzi mazivalwe.
Fundis' abantwana ukuba bangaqubhi emilanjeni ebalekayo nokuba bangaqubhi bebodwa.
Bafundise ukuqubha. Xa uphangela kumzi onechibi lokuqubha, ungamyeki umntwana adlale yedwa phandle xa ichibi lingabiyelwanga.
INGOZI 3: Bamalunga nama-500 abantwana abanyangelwa ukutsha eRed Cross Children's Hospital ngonyaka. Abanye batsha kangangokuba omnye kwabasixhenxe elizweni liphela uyasweleka.
Ongakwenza: Khumbula ukucima amakhandlela, izibani zeparafini, iihita nezitovu xa nilala. Beka imatshisi, izilumeki nezinto ezingamanzi ezitshayo apho bangafikeleliyo abantwana. Abantwana mabangasondeli emililweni kuba isenokutsha impahla abayinxibileyo. Ungatshay' icuba kwigumbi lokulala kuba imililo emininzi ibangelwa kukulala kwabantu betshaya. Ungomisi impahla ngomlilo okanye ngehitha. Ungafaki izinto ezininzi kwiplagi yombane yaye uzitshintshe iintambo zombane ezigugileyo kuba zingabangela umlilo.
INGOZI 4: Abantwana abangaphantsi kweminyak' emine badla ngokuba ngamaxhoba okutsha ekhaya kuze oko kubashiye beneziva ubomi babo bonke. Abantwana abane kwabahlanu abatshayo batshiswa zizinto ezingamanzi, ngoko jongisisa okuyingozi ekhitshini lakho. Ulumkele neeplagi zombane kuba abantwana bayathanda ukufaka iminwe emingxunyeni yazo.
Ongakwenza: Yenza bangafikeleli esitovini nakwizibambo zeembiza ezishushu. Iikomityi ezinento eshushu zibeke embindini wetafile kungabikho nelaphu elijingayo abangalitsala bagalelwe zizinto ezishushu.
Intambo yeketile yombane mayingajingi kuba bangayitsala. Ungashiyi i-ayini eshushu kwigumbi elinomntwana - xa ubizwa yifowuni okanye kukho umntu onkqonkqozayo, yikhuphe kwiplagi uyibeke apho angenakufikelela khona nakwizixhobo zombane ezingasebenziyo.
INGOZI 5: Abantwana abanonyaka ukuya kwemine ngabona basengozini kakhulu yokutya ityhefu kuba basoloko befun' ukwazi izinto ezikufutshane nabo ngokuziphatha nokuzitya. Bangaphezulu kwama-500 abantwana abanyangwa eRed Cross Hospital emva kokusel' iyeza okanye izinto zokucoca indlu ngengozi.
Ongakwenza: Tshixa iikhabhathi ezineparafini, amachiza okucoca ekhaya neziny' izinto eziyityhefu kungenjalo zibeke phezulu apho bangenakufikelela abantwana.
Iparafini yithenge ngeebhotile ezingenakuvulwa ngabantwana. Ungagcini iparafini kwiibhotile zesiselo kuba abantwana bangacinga ukuba sisiselo baze bayisele.
INGOZI 6: Abantwana abangaphantsi konyaka bomiwa yaye bafuthaniseleke lula. Bamalunga nama-800 abantwana abanyangwa eRed Cross Hospital kuphela ngonyaka kwaye ngonyaka bali-100 abaswelekayo kweli ngenxa yoko.
Ongakwenza: Ungamshiyi yedwa umntwana xa esitya. Idami ungayifaki intambo ende. Abantwana bayathanda ukulinga izinto ngokuzifaka emlonyeni njengemali, iimbotyi, amaqhosha nophini. Iiplastikhi, imitya neentambo mazingabi kufutshane nabantwana. Ungamphi amandongomane umntwana ongaphantsi kweminyaka emihlanu kuba angomiwa xa engawahlafunisisanga. Fundis' umntwana ukuba angahambi okanye abaleke esitya.
INGOZI 7: IRed Cross Hospital inyanga abantwana abangama-2 000 abenzakaliswe kukuwa ezibhedini, ezitepsini nakwiindawo abadlala kuzo.
Uninzi lweendawo zokudlala kweli ziyingozi kuba zisanyentiwe ukuze zingabi nodaka. Zifanele zogqunywe ngemethi yerabha, kodwa nokuba zinengca okanye intlabathi azinakuba yingozi.
Ongakwenza: Ungamshiyi yedwa umntwana oneenyanga ezintathu okanye umlalise kwibhedi ephakamileyo. Makungabikho migangatho ityibilikisayo okanye iikhaphethi ezibekiweyo nje. Zogqume iikona zetafile ezibukhali. Iifestile ezisezantsi mazisoloko zivaliwe agadwe kwakhona umntwana xa ekwibhalkhoni. Celani umasipala wendawo enikuyo anakhele iindawo zokudlala.
INGOZI 8: Ukusikeka kuyingozi engehlela nokuba ngumntwana ongakanani.
Ongakwenza: Zisuse iiglasi neetayile ezophukileyo, ugcine iiglasi, izikere neemela kude nabantwana kuba bangazisika.
Fundis' abantwana ukuba bangabaleki bephethe into ebukhali, ubafundise nokuba xa bephethe into ebukhali bayijongise phantsi. Iireyiza zibeke kwindawo abangenakufikelela kuyo. Mazitshixwe iikhabathi ezigcine iiglasi nezinto ezenziwe ngodongwe. Zilahle izinto zokudlala ezophukileyo. [x]

Yintoni umyalelo wokhuseleko?
Xa ulixhoba lokuphathwa gadalala ekhaya eli lixesha lokukuphelisa oko. Eny' indlela yokwenza oko kukwenza isicelo somyalelo wokhuseleko wenkundla
Yintoni umyalelo wokhuseleko wenkundla?
Luxwebhu lomthetho oluyalela umxhaphazi ukuba akwehle, utsho uMzolisa Madolo, umtshutshisi kwinkundla kamantyi yaseRandfontein. Xa engawuthobeli umyalelo angabanjwa.
Uwufumana nini?
Ukuba uyaxhatshazwa okanye woyikela ukhuselo lwakho. Uxhatshazo luziindidi ezininzi. Luquka ukubethwa - njengokuqhwatywa, ukubethwa ngenqindi nokutyhilizwa - nokuxhatshazwa ngokwesondo.
Ukulawula iindawo oya kuzo, ukukuyekisa emsebenzini okanye ekuboneni abahlobo bakho, ukusoloko uchukelwa nokutshabalalisa izinto zakho nazo ikwaziindidi zokuxhaphaza.
Ungenza isicelo myalelo xa:
Utshate kwamantyi, ngokwesintu okanye ecaweni.
Nihlala kunye, kodwa anitshatanga.
Nithembisene ngomtshato.
Amalungu osapho nabahlobo bomntu oxhatshazwayo nabo bangenza isicelo somyalelo wokhuseleko xa benemvume ebhaliweyo yomntu oxhatshazwayo, utsho uNthabiseng Monareng kwi-A Simple Guide To South African Family Law.
Ndisenza njani isicelo somyalelo wokhuseleko?
Yiya kwinkundla kamantyi ekufutshane, uphathe i-ID yakho neenkcukacha zomxhaphazi, ezifana nomsebenzi nedilesi abahlala kuyo. Uphathe namanye amaxwebhu afana neengxelo zikagqirha, iifoto zomonzakalo, iingxelo ezifungelweyo ngamalungu osapho, abamelwane okanye abantwana malunga ngokuxhatshazwa.
Umantyi uyalimamela ibali lakho aze aphicothe amaxwebhu oze nawo. Emva koko uya kukunika umyalelo.
Ungacela umantyi enze ukuba umpu womxhaphazi uthathwe, amapolisa ahambe nawe xa uthatha izinto zakho okanye umxhaphazi enikwa uphum'aphele emzini wenu.
Unothimba wenkundla okanye ipolisa liya kusa umyalelo wethutyana kumxhaphazi. Amchazele ukuba abesenkundleni yamatyala ngomhla obhalwe kumyalelo.
Ngaloo mhla, wena nomxhaphazi kumele nivele enkundleni yamatyala.
Nobabini niya kuchazela umantyi ibali lenu, emva koko agqibe ukuba akunike kusini na umyalelo wokhuseleko.
Xa umxhaphazi engezanga enkundleni umantyi uya kwenza umyalelo wethutyana ube ngomileyo.
Ukuba umantyi wenza umyalelo wokugqibela omileyo, uya kukhupha nesigunyaziso sokuba umxhaphazi abanjwe. Oku kuthetha ukuba umxhaphazi uya kubanjwa ukuba akawuthobeli umyalelo wokhuseleko.
Uhlala ixesha elingakanani?
Umyalelo wokhuseleko uhlala de uwucime. Ukuba ufuna ukuwucima kufuneka unike isaziso esibhaliweyo umxhaphazi uze wenze isicelo enkundleni sokuwurhoxisa.
Kulumkele ukuwucima ngezizathu ezingezizo, utsho uNthabiseng Monareng. Abaxhaphazi bayakwazi ukuzenza ngathi badanile kwaye bathembise ukutshintsha ukuze uwucime. Wakuwucima baqalise bakuxhaphaze.
Kwenzeka ntoni xa umxhaphazi enyhasha imiqathango yomyalelo wokhuseleko?
Imiyalelo yokhuseleko inyanzeliswa ngokungqongqo kwaye abo bangayithobeliyo bohlwaywa qatha.
Ukuba unyhashiwe, kufuneka uye kwisikhululo samapolisa obuthunyelwe kuso umyalelo. (Ukuba ukude, ungaya nakwesiphi na isikhululo samapolisa.)
Phatha isigunyaziso sokuba abanjwe esincanyathiselwe kumyalelo uze uchazele ipolisa ukuba umxhaphazi uwunyhasha njani na umyalelo wokhuseleko. Xa ebanjiwe angathunyelwa entolongweni de avele enkundleni.[x]
Umbhali: NguKamogelo Sebola.
KONKE OFANELE UKWAZI
Ingaba usemthethweni umtshato wesintu? Yintoni umtshato othi "into yam yeyakho"? Uwuqhawula njani umtshato? Okanye usifumana njani isondlo somntwana? Inkoliso yabantu baseMzantsi Afrika abawazi amalungelo abo, ingakumbi angemiba yosapho. Ingakunceda incwadi kaNthabiseng Monareng ethi A Simple Guide To South African Family Law (Siber Ink). Ichaza konke ngemithetho echaphazela ezosapho. Ufanele ubenayo kwaye ifumaneka kwiivenkile zeencwadi, kodwa sineencwadi esiphisa ngazo. Kuphendulwa imibuzo yakho
Indlela ebheke ekubeni ngumdlezana ingawaxhalabisa yaye iwabhide amabhinqa azithweleyo kuba eva le naleya ngabantu. Sithe masiwanike iimpendulo angazithemba zemibuzo adla ngokuyibuza
1NDIKWIINYANGA ZOKUGQIBELA ZOKUKHULELWA - KUTHENI USANA LUNGASHUKUMI ESISWINI"
Usana alushukumi kakhulu xa sekukufutshane ubeleke. Iingcali zethu zithi ungakhathazeki. Kaloku ngelo xesha usana sukuba sele lulukhulu ingasekho indawo yokushukuma. Kwakhona ngelo xesha usana sukuba lulele ixesha elininzi.
Kodwa xa lungashukumi tu ngelo xesha, kubhetele uye eklinikhi okanye kwagqirha.
2YINTONI EYENZA NDIBE NAMAPHUPHA AMABI XA NDIKHULELWE"
Zimbini izinto ezikwenza ubenamaphupha amabi xa ukhulelwe ngokutsho kwengcali yezengqondo, uJoy Gumede. Abangelwa ngumzimba nengqondo. Ubanamaphupha amabi ngakumbi xa uqala ukukhulelwa kuba uxhalabiswe kukuba uya kukwazi na ukumelana nokuba nomntwana, utsho uJoy.
Ukwathe loo nkxalabo yeyendalo.
Ngokwasemzimbeni, ukukhulelwa kukwenza ungalali kakuhle njengesiqhelo - nto leyo ikwenza uwakhumbule amaphupha akho, kuba wothuka rhoqo. Oko kuya kukwenza uzibone uphupha ngaphezulu kwakuqala.
3 NDINGAKUTHINTELA NJANI UKUDUMBA KWEENYAWO"
Phumza iinyawo zakho kathathu okanye kane ngemini uzibeke kwinto ephakemeyo, utsho uGqr. Elias Radebe ongugqirha wabasetyhini kwisibhedlele saseThekwini. Xa ulele ebhedini, bek' iinyawo zakho emqamelweni; xa uhleli esitulweni, uzibeke kwinto ephakamileyo.
Ukwathe ungahlali uzijingisile ixesha elide. Sukuma uhamba-hambe imizuzwana rhoqo ngeyure.
Ukhumbule nokuba ukusel' amanzi kakhulu kuya kunciphisa ukudumba kweenyawo.
4 KUYA KULWENZA NTONI USANA ENDILUTHWELEYO UKUTSHAYA NOKUSELA KWAM"
Iingcali esithethe nazo zithe ukusel' utywala nokutshaya kuya konakalisa impilo yosana olukhulelweyo. Ukutshaya kungakwenza uluzale usana luluncinane nangaphambi kwexesha. Usana lwakho lungasoloko luhlaselwa yimikhuhlane, lube nokukraleka kwemiphunga nosulelo lweendlebe. Ukusela kungonakalisa ubuchopho bosana yaye luzalwe lunesiphene emzimbeni.
5 ZIINTONI EZINDENZA NDIBE NAMAXESHA OKUCINGA UKUBA SENDIZA KUBELEKA"
"Ezo zinto ziyindlela yokulungiselela umzimba wakho ixesha lokubeleka kwaye ziyenzeka kuwo wonke amabhinqa akhulelweyo," utshilo umbelekisi waseSoweto esithethe naye.
"Ezo zizihlunu ezinwebekayo zilungiselela isibeleko ukubeleka."
6KUYA KUPHELA NINI UKUTHANDISWA UKUTYA OKUTHILE KWAYE KUTHENI NDINGAKUTHANDI OKUNYE UKUTYA"
Kuqhelekile ukuthandiswa ukutya okuthile xa ukhulelwe kwaye kuya kuphela wakubeleka.
Kuqhelekile nokungazithandi izidlo ezithile, zitsho iingcali kwiWebsite yakwaPampers.
Buz' ugqirha okanye umongikazi ukuba ukutya ongakuthandiyo luyakudinga na usana olukhulelweyo.
Xa lukudinga uya kukucebisa ngokunye ukutya okunezakha-mzimba ezifanayo.
7 YINTONI ENDENZA NDIBE NOLUSU OLUBI"
Iihomoni zakho ziyatshintsha xa ukhulelwe, luze ulusu lwakho lube buthathaka lubeneengxaki lula, itsho iwebsite yaseMzantsi Afrika ethi: paediatrician.co.za. Ezo ngxaki ziyaphela wakubeleka.
Thambisa izifumisi-lusu yaye ufune unyango lukagqirha xa lunamadyunguza okanye lurhawuzela. [x]
Umbhali: Smangele Zuma

fumana uncedo
Ngaba umntwana wakho akakwazi ukufunda"
Le ngxaki iyamlibazisa umntwana wakho esikolweni kodwa ingasombululeka aze akwazi ukuqhubeka nobomi...
UXOLANI wayetsala nzima esikolweni xa wayeneminyaka esixhenxe ubudala. Wayengakwazi ukufunda, engakwazi nokubhala. Babemangalisiwe abazali bakhe neetitshala. Wayekrele-krele, edlamkile, ebalasele emidlalweni nakweziny' izinto ngaphandle kokubhala nokufunda.
Xa eneminyaka elithoba wayesele ethatyathwa njengomntwana osilelayo esikolweni.
Abany' abantwana esikolweni babemqhula bembiza "ngesigqogqo."
Ngethamsanqa lakhe kwabakho ititshala eyarhana ukuba kungenzeka ukuba uXolani unengxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda waza wancediswa yititshala encedisa kwezonyango bayifumana ingxaki kaXolani.
Wathi esakufumana uncedo lweengcali yaphela loo ngxaki yakhe yokungakwazi ukufunda waqhubeka esikolweni.
"Ingxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda kufuneka ilungiswe kusekwangoko kungenjalo ibuphazamisa bonke ubomi bomntu," utsho uMarj Arslanian weAudiblox, ekuyinkqubo ekhethekileyo esetyenziswa kwihlabathi ukunceda iingxaki zokufunda kubafundi.
Le ngxaki ichaphazela abantwana nabantu abadala ngeendlela ngeendlela kuxhomekeke ekubeni ingakanani na.
Uninzi lwabo baba neengxaki zokufunda nokubhala ukanti xa yondele kakhulu le ngxaki abakwazi tu ukubhala nokufunda. Uninzi lwabafundi abanale ngxaki bayoyiswa zizibalo.
Ibonakala njani"
Mjonge emehlweni umntu onengxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda uza kubona into elolu hlobo...
Amagama alula uyawagqwetha umzekelo elithi RAT liyajika libe nguTAR.
Isivakalisi siyaxoveka singabinantsingiselo.
Oonobumba uyababhidanisa umzekelo u-b amenze u-d.
Thatha iphepha ulijongise esipilini uze ufunde lo mbhalo usesipilini. Abanye abantu abaneengxaki zokufunda bawufunda ngolo hlobo umbhalo oqhelekileyo.
Iimpawu
Nazi ezinye zeempawu ezixhaphakileyo nezintama ukuba umntwana uneengxaki zokungakwazi ukufunda yaye ufuna uncedo:
t Ukungaqiniseki ngesandla sasekhohlo nesasekunene okwenza awagqwethe amagama namanani xa efunda.
t Abantwana abanale ngxaki abakwazi ukulandelelanisa izinto njengokubala okanye ukulandelelanisa iintsuku zeveki. Bayoyiswa kukukhumbula okanye ukukwazi ukulandelelanisa izinto.
t Ukufunda aze apele amagama ngendlela engaqhelekanga. Le yingxaki eyondeleyo yokungakwazi ukufunda nebonakala ngokuqashela amagama nokuba engenantsingiselo.
t Ukuthetha kade okanye ukuthetha into engavakaliyo. Uphando lubonisa ukuba ukungakwazi kakuhle ukuthetha neengxaki zokufunda zinxibelelene.
t Ukufunda kancinci ethandabuza.
t Ukungakwazi ukubhala kakuhle.
Ongakwenza
Xa urhana ngathi umntwana wakho unengxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda nokubhala kubalulekile ukuba uthethe netitshala yakhe. Uninzi lwezikolo ezikhulu zinetitshala enceda kwezonyango eqeqeshiweyo eza kumnceda umntwana wakho okanye imse kwingcali yezonyango.
Xa kukho umntu omdala onale ngxaki mfunele uncedo, usengalufumana.[x]

kubhale uFORCE KHASHANE
UKUBA nesiqwana esincinci yinto eyamkelekileyo eluntwini lwakowethu kuba kubonisa ukuba sempilweni. Kodwa ukuncipha kakhulu komzimba ngexesha elifutshane kuyaxhalabisa.
Ukuncipha emzimbeni ngephanyazo kungaba luphawu lokugula, ukanti kungenza nabantu baqale ukuthetha ngawe besitsho le naleya.
Le ke yingxaki ejongene nomfundi ondibhaleleyo waKwaZulu-Natal. Uneminyaka engama-24 kwaye uthi ngaphandle kokuncipha emzimbeni, ulusu lwakhe "lurhabaxa" kweziny' iindawo.
"Ndisebenzise izithambisi zolusu ezininzi kodwa azindincedi. Maxa wambi ndiba namalungu aqinileyo," utsho.
Abantu abanale ngulo babhitya bashiyeke bengamathambo. Xa umntu onayo enganxibanga ungakwazi nkqu ukubala iimbambo zakhe.
NgesiTswana le ngulo ibizwa ngokuba si-"setshwabu" ukanti ngesiZulu kuthiwa "lucabangweni."
Iimpawu zaso
Iimpawu ziyashiyana ngokwabantu.
Yiva lo ke umfundi waseMount Fletcher othi unengxaki yeentlungu ezinganyamezelekiyo emantla esisu.
"Obu buhlungu buyaqatsela xa ndisitya, ngoko ndiyancipha nasemzimbeni. Ngoku nonyana wam oneminyaka eli-10 ukhala ngeentlungu ezifanayo," ubhale watsho.
Ukanti eliny' inenekazi eliselula laseKhayelitsha lindibhalele lisithi: "Ndicela undichazele ngale ngulo ndingayaziyo endenza ndingonwabi yaye iyandothusa."
"Le ngulo iyandoyikisa yonk' imihla. Amalungu amathambo am avakala eyeke-yeke kwaye engakwazi ukusebenza.
"Maxa wambi ndikhe ndizibone ndingcangcazela luloyiko kube kungekho nto yoyikisayo kwaye oko kwenzeka xa ndiphakathi kwabantu.
"Maxa wambi umzimba wam ukhe ube buhlungu wonke nolusu lwam lurhawuzele."
Kukho ke nendoda enama-29 eminyaka endizobele umzimba wayo ukuze indibonise iindawo ezibuhlungu. Ingxaki yayo yaqala ngo-1998, kwaye indichukumisile ileta yayo.
Ithi inobuhlungu obungathi buyatshisa ngaphambili esifubeni nasesiswini.
Ithi obunye ubuhlungu obungathi ihlatywa yinto bukwicala lasekhohlo esifubeni ngasentliziyweni, kwaye obo buhlungu butsala ixesha elithile.
Ethubeni uva kukho into engathi inyuka isihla emqolo.
"Xa ndigoba le nto iyehla, ndize xa ndiphakama ndiyive inyuka. Sendifumene unyango loogqirha abaliqela, kodwa andiboni mahluko."
Unyango
Ungothuki kuba isetshwabu asiyongulo isulelayo, kodwa yingulo ehamba nofuzo.
Ikuhlasela nje ingabhungisanga kwaye akucaci ukuba yingulo ebangelwa yintoni.
Isetshwabu asibangelwa kukuthakathwa ngumntu ongakuthandiyo!
Asinguye futhi nomoya omdaka nangona abantu abanaso besiva kukho into enyuka isihla esifubeni sabo.
Asihlaseli abantu abadala kuphela, koko siyabahlasela nabantwana neentsana. Iimpawu zaso ebantwaneni ziquka ukubona umntwana enyanzela iminwe ezimpumlweni nasezindlebeni yaye abe nemilebe eyomileyo.
Phofu ke iindaba ezimnandi zezokuba isetshwabu siyanyangeka.
Kodwa ke kufuneka ungagqibeli nje ngokusebenzisa amaqwili okanye intelezi.
Ukuze umntu onale ngulo anyangeke kufuneka anyangwe ligqirha okanye ixhwele elivunyiweyo nelikhe layinyanga ngaphambili.
Unyango lubandakanya ukuchazwa kancinane esifubeni. Ezo ntlanga ke zithanjiswa kancinane ngentelezi
engumgubo. [x]

Yintoni le ngxaki"
I-UTI kukudumba okwenzeka naphi na kumbhobho womchamo, kuquka nombhobho okhuphela umchamo ngaphandle, isinyi, imibhobhana emincinane esusa umchamo esinyini, izintso, okanye iprostate (esemadodeni kuphela). Ayosuleli.

Amantombazana anemibhobho emifutshane kunamakhwenkwe, kwaye indawo ephuma umchamo ikufutshane nomlomo kasisi nowomva ophuma ilindle. Idlala leprostate emakhwenkweni likhupha into edodobalisa ukukhula kwentsholongwane. Nangona iUTI ingaxhaphakanga kakhulu emakhwenkweni, xa iwahlasela, iwahlasela ngamandla.

Ingaba IYEZA liyamnceda umntu ofuna ukuzibulala"
Ingaba amagqirha namaxhwele ikho into anganceda ngayo kwingxaki yeli yokwanda kwabantu abazibulalayo"
KUTHIWA umntu omnye kwabali-10 kweli kungenzeka azame ukuzibulala. Iintliziyo ezaphukileyo, izifo, iingxabano zeentsapho, ulwaphulo-mthetho, uxinzelelo, ukungasebenzi - ezi zezinye zezinto ezinyanzela abantu bacinge ngokuzibulala.
Ingaba iyeza linganceda" Kwaye ingaba ubugqwirha bunento yokwenza nale ngxaki"
Amayeza esilungu aneepilisi ezilwa noxinzelelo lwengqondo olungakwenza uzibulale. Kukho ke nonyango lwengqondo, apho oogqirha bengqondo nezinye iingcali eziqeqeshiweyo, zimamela uloyiko neenkxalabo onazo baze bakucebise ukuba ujongane njani nazo. (Ungamlibali nomfundisi wakho naye "uyingcali eqeqeshiweyo" ongaya kuyo xa ufun' uncedo!)
Angenaphi ke wona amagqirha namaxhwele"
"Nathi magqirha sinazo iinkqubo zokucebisa," utsho uMartha Mongoya, osele eneminyaka eli-15 eligqirha.
"Eso sesinye sezizathu ezenza sichithe ixesha elininzi nomguli. Amathambo ayasinceda asibonise iingxaki ezikhokelela ekuzibulaleni ukuze sohlule phakathi kweengxaki ezifuna iyeza nezifuna iingcebiso."
Kodwa ke, uTat' uLamola, osele eneminyaka engama-25 eligqirha, uthi ezinye iziganeko zokuzibulala zibangelwa bubugqwirha. Amagqwirha enza imimoya emibi ayithumela ukuba iyokuhlupha elo xhoba de lizibulale, utsho. Le mimoya inamandla kangangokuba ungade uziphose phambi kololiwe ohambayo, utsho.
Ucebisa abantu abanoxinzelelo lwengqondo - okanye abo baziva ngathi baza kuphambana - ukuba bafumane unyango olululo kungekonakali.
Amagqwirha ayakwazi ukujika amayeza angenabungozi abeyingozi. Kodwa amagqirha namaxhwele anamava ayakwazi ukufumanisa ukuba kusetyenziswe eliphi na iyeza aze alixube namanye ukugxotha imimoya leyo emibi eyenza umntu azibulale.
Ucebisa ukuba uye kumagqirha namaxhwele anamava angaphaya kweminyaka eli-15. "Ayafuneka loo mava - xa uza kuphosa amathambo uxube namayeza - ukunyanga abo bafuna ukuzibulala," utsho.
Le mimoya inyangwa kuphela ngokuphefumla umsi osuka eyezeni elithile ngeempumlo nangomlomo.
"Ngokwenza oku umguli ucoca ingqondo yakhe," utsho uLamola.
UWellington Solonzi yena uneny' indlela. Sele eneminyaka engama-25 engumcebisi kwaye ukholelwa ekubeni ukunqanda umntu angazibulali kukumenza athethe ngeengxaki zakhe.
Ubalisa ngendoda eyazama ukuziphosa emlanjeni. Yathi yakoyisakala, yazama ukuzibulala ngomsi wemoto yayo.
Wathi akuthetha nale ndoda uWellington wafumanisa ukuba ilahle intombi yayo eyayimxhasa ngemali. "Ukunye neliny' ibhinqa ngoku, kodwa wandixelela ukuba isidala sakhe sagqibela ngelithi akazukufunyanwa nangomnye kubo. Oko kwandenza ndakrokra ukuba loo ntombi imthakathile," utsho uWellington.
Kwesinye isiganeko mfana uthile waziphosa phambi kololiwe ohambayo, kodwa wasinda.
"Ndafumanisa apha encokweni ukuba wayelisela. Uthi waphupha ngathi abantu abonileyo bafuna angcungcutheke," utsho uWellington.
Kweli tyeli lo mfana singathi uzithakathe ngokwakhe. Wayeka ukucinga ngokuzibulala emva kokuba enyanzelwe ukuba ajongane nezenzo zakhe ezibi aziqonde ukuba wonile. [x]
