WAZI AMALUNGELO AKHO
Kule nyanga: uthini xa ubanjwa kugqogqo lwezithuthi
lwamapolisa
UBANJWE KUGQOGQO LWEZITHUTHI
Ndaxelelwa ukuba ndikhutshelwe incwadi eyalela ukuba ndibanjwe ngenxa yokungahlawuli itikiti emva kokumiswa ngamapolisa kugqogqo lwezithuthi. Igosa lendlela lathi mandilinde lisaya kulanda ikopi yaloo ncwadi esikhululweni samapolisa. Ndathi xa ndicela ukugodusa usana lwam kuqala, landingxolisa - lathi ukuba andimameli liza kundimangalela "ngokuphazamisa ukusebenza komthetho."
Ndalinda iiyure ezintathu, landalela nokuba ndiziyele esikhululweni samapolisa, ndakhwela emotweni yamapolisa nosana.
Ndibona ndaphathwa kakubi. Ukulibala kwam ukubhatala itikiti akundenzi isikrelemnqa. Yintoni ongayenza xa befuna ukukubamba kugqogqo lwezithuthi ngenxa yokungabhatal' itikiti lesantya?
IINGCEBISO ZESCORPION
Akukho ncwadi yokubamba ikhutshwayo xa ungahlawulanga itikiti, ikhutshwa xa ungayanga enkundleni ngomhla obekiweyo. Oko "kukungahloniphi inkundla".
Kumatikiti endlela, mabini amanyathelo:
INYATHELO 1: Ulifumana itikiti lakho xa umiswe ngamagosa endlela okanye lithunyelwe ngeposi xa ufotwe yikhamera uhamba ngesantya esiphezulu. Ulindeleke ukuba ulihlawule phambi kosuku oluxeliweyo. Ukuba ulibele ukulihlawula, oko kukhokelela:
INYATHELO 2: Xa ungalihlawuli itikiti ufumana "iisamani."
Kucacile ukuba walibala ukulibhatala itikiti waze wangazihoyi iisamani. Kodwa unyanisile: oku akukwenzi "isaphuli-mthetho esiyingozi".
Ufanele ukuba nomsindo yindlela ophethwe ngayo. Ikho imithetho amagosa afanele ayilandele kwaye bonke abaqhubi kufanele bawazi amalungelo abo.
Nasi isishwankathelo:
Igosa elikubambayo malikubonise incwadi yaloo myalelo xa uyifuna. Awumelanga kuyalelwa mntu xa isaya kulandwa kude.
Kufuneka uxelelwe amalungelo akho, nesizathu sokubanjwa.
Ukuba amalungelo akho aye akathotyelwa unako ukuthabatha amanyathelo negqwetha lakho.
Emva kokubanjwa ufanele usiwe kwindawo ebhalwe encwadini okanye esikhululweni samapolisa ngokukhawuleza.
Ukuba awukhumbuli uzifumana iisamani, cela ukubona "i-return of service". Ezi zimpepha ezibonisa ukuba iisamani zafikela kubani, nini, phi. Kodwa ke awunalungelo lakuzibona ngexesha lokubanjwa kwakho - amagosa angakuvezela ngeliny' ixesha.
Okokugqibela: ukuba awuqinisekanga ngezinto ezininzi, bhala phantsi, indawo namagama amagosa abandakanyekayo. Oku kuza kukunceda xa ufuna ukufaka isikhalazo. [x]
KWIISAMANI
Iisamani ziza kukuxelela, ixesha nendawo yesehlo kunye nemali ongayihlawula ukuzama ukuphepha ukuvela phambi kwenkundla.
Ukuba ucinga ukuba kukho impazamo, iisamani ziza kukuxelela ukuba ufuneka nini enkundleni, ungalivumi ityala enkundleni ukuze nawe unikwe ithuba lokuthetha ngokwenzekileyo.
Iisamani ziza kukulumkisa ngokuba ingakhutshwa incwadi eyalela ukuba ubanjwe xa ungayihlawuli imali efunekayo okanye ungayi enkudleni ngemini ebekiweyo.

IINGCEBISO EZIZIZO
Elona cebo lililo esingakunika lona kukuba uqinisekise ukuba ulihlawula kwangoko itikiti lendlela, xa ubhatala, qiniseka ukuba ufumana irisithi okanye ugcine ubungqina bokuba ubhatele xa ububhatala ngekhompyutha!

Ndimsulwa
INGXAKI: Ndandiphangela egaraji kumatshini wemali ndingomnye wabantu ababesebenzisa ithili kwaza kwakulahleka i-R300 umnini-garaji warhanela ukuba ibiwe ndim nomnye umqeshwa waza wasinyanzelisa ukuba senze uvavanyo lobunyaniso sobabini.
Waluphumelela lo omnye kodwa mna andaluphumelela.
Akukho phando lumbi lwenziwayo koko kwahlala intlanganiso yokolulekwa kwavezwa neziphumo zovavanyo.
Andizange ndinikwe thuba lokunik' ubungqina koko ndagxothwa.
Andizange ndiyibe loo mali kwaye ndibona ngathi aliphandisiswanga eli tyala lam. Ndiyaluthandabuza novavanyo lobunyaniso. Ndicela uncedo!
ICEBISO LAKWASCORPION:
Ukuhlala kwentlanganiso yokolulekwa kusemthethweni.
Kodwa sikwakholelwa ekubeni akwenziwanga ngendlela eyiyo kuba ukungaphumeleli uvavanyo lobunyaniso akuthethi kuthi uyibile imali elahlekileyo.
Baninzi abantu abangaluphumeleliyo olu vavanyo ngenxa yezizathu ezininzi hayi kuba benganyanisekanga.
Umatshini wokwenza olu vavanyo awukwazi ukwahlula ubuxoki nenyaniso!
Kaloku wona uveza iinguqu ezenzeka emzimbeni womntu owenza uvavanyo njengokubetha ngamandla kwentliziyo, ukubila nehayi-hayi.
Kuthiwa ezi nguqu zenzeka xa umntu exoka.
Akunjalo. Ngeliny' ixesha ezi nguqu zenziwa luloyiko lokungaluphumeleli olu vavanyo abe umntu lowo ulwenzayo emsulwa.
I-CCMA yakhupha umyalelo wokuba iziphumo zovavanyo lobunyaniso azithethinto kangako xa zizodwa ngaphandle kwaxa zikhapha obunye ubungqina.
Siqinisekile ukuba uza kubuyiselwa emsebenzini kwaye sikucebisa ukuba uye eCCMA ngokukhawuleza apho uza kufumana khona uncedo lokumangalela umqeshi wakho okugxothileyo.
Xa uhlangabezana neengxaki nceda uqhagamshelane ne-ofisi yakwaScorpion ekufuphi nawe uza kufumana uncedo. [x]

BONA XHOSA - November 2007
Thumel' ingxaki yakho yomthetho kule dilesi BONA Legally Yours, Box 32083, Mobeni 4060 - uya kufumana ithuba lokuxoxa negqwetha imizuzu engama-30 kwii-ofisi zalo naphi na kweli okanye uthethe nalo ngomnxeba.
USAPHO lwakowabo lwacaphuka xa lusiva ukuba unyana walo ucinga ngokuba yimvumi nekungumsebenzi abambalwa abantu abaphumelelayo kuwo. Lwacaphuka nangakumbi lwakuva ukuba uLinda Zitha ufuna ukuba yimvumi ye-opera!
Phofu ke oko kwakungathethi kuthi lwalungawuthandi umculo. Kaloku unina wayecula kwikwayala yecawe ukanti uyise wayengumbhexeshi wekwayala.
ULinda naye waqala wacula kwikwayala kwaye oko yayiluphawu lokukhula kokuthanda kwakhe umculo.
"Ndiselula ndandiyithanda kakhulu imidlalo, ingakumbi ibhol' ekhatywayo. Ndaqal' ukuthand' umculo xa ndineminyaka eli-12," utsho.
Ngethuba efikelela kwibanga lematriki wayesezimisele kakhulu emculweni. Ngo-1992 wahamba nekwayala yecawe baya eItaly.
Okwamangalisayo kukuba akazange akhethe ukufundel' umculo akupas' imatriki.
"Ndenza izifundo zemarketing, kodwa kungekudala ndaphelelwa ngumdla kuzo," utsho.
Inkuthazo
Ithuba likaLinda lavela emva kokubona i-opera ePretoria State Theatre. "Ndacelwa ngumhlobo wam ukuba ndicule naye ingoma kaVerdi ethi Nabucco. Ndaqonda ngoko ukuba ndifun' ukuba yimvumi ye-opera.
"Ekuqaleni abazali bam babengafuni nokuyiva loo nto. Babefuna ndifumane umsebenzi 'wokwenene'," utshilo ehleka.
Baqala ukumkhuthaza bakubona ukuba abanakusijika isigqibo sakhe.
"Ngoku bangabalandeli bam abakhulu," utsho uLinda okhe wacula ii-opera ezinjengethi Tosca, La Bohème nethi Madame Butterfly.
ULinda uyaluthanda usapho lwakowabo. Ubatyelela rhoqo oodadewabo abathathu abahlala ePitoli. Xa kungekho msitho aye kucula kuwo ngokuhlwa, umfumana esekhaya nentombi ancuma nayo uMolebogeng Matlhare, okanye atyelele abahlobo bakhe.
Ngeziny' iimpela-veki utyelela kowabo eMalahleni eMpumalanga.
"Ndikhe ndacula izihlandlo eziliqela eMalahleni. Ukugqibela kwam ndandicula nabahlobo bam uKaiser Nkosi noGiven Mabena."
UKaiser noGiven abakhulela eMalahleni noLinda nabo baziimvumi ze-opera ezinempumelelo.
Impumelelo
Uthi inxalenye yempumelelo yakhe ibangelwe yiBlack Tie Ensemble. Emva kokugqiba izifundo zemarketing, uLinda waya kufunda eTechnikon Pretoria Opera School ngo-1994 apho wachitha iminyak' emine ecula kwi-opera eState Theatre.
"Emva kokuvalwa kweState Theatre kwavulwa iBlack Tie Ensemble ukuze incede iimvumi ze- opera eziseze ngobuso elizweni," utshilo.
"Emva kokuvalwa kwale thiyetha ngo-1999, ndacelwa ngabaseki beli qela uMimi Coertse noNeels Hansen ukuba ndizibandakanye nalo."
Usacula kweli qela le-opera kwaye ungomnye wamalungu esigqeba salo esiphezulu.
"Luhlobo lomculo omnandi kakhulu olu. Isinxibo sawo, umculo ngokwawo, ulwimi oculwa ngalo nokucula phambi kwezihlwele kuwenza ube nomahluko," utshilo xa ethetha ngomculo we-opera.
Xa eziphumlele uLinda wonwabel' ukuhlala noMolebogeng, ingakumbi ekhitshini. "Ukupheka ndikuthanda egazini. Ndithand' ukuling' izithako nokuzenzela isidlo esitsha. Kodwa ayikho into endiyithanda njengenyama yegusha," utshilo. [x]

Umtyibilizi emazeni!
Ubuyele kwakhona elwandle
Ukushunqulwa umlenze akumthintelanga lo mtyibilizi emazeni ekwenzeni umdlalo awuthandayo
kubhale uCONNIE MASINGA
WATHI ugqirha akuthi kuBongani Xulu - "kuza kufuneka siwushunqule umlenze wakho" - wothuka wathi: "Uthetha ukuba andinakuphinda ndikwazi ukutyibiliza emazeni kwakhona"" Kodwa ngoko wayengazi ukuba uluthanda kangakanani ulwandle.
Okwamangalisayo kukuba emva kweenyanga ezimbalwa wayetyibiliza emazeni ngeMalibu board.
UBongani wakhulela kwidolophu yaseBallito eselunxwemeni lolwandle olusemantla lwaKwaZulu-Natal. Unina wayephangela kumzi wabatyeleli ongaselwandle, ngoko uBongani wayechith' ixesha lakhe elininzi elwandle.
Apho wafumana abahlobo abangabatyibilizi emazeni olwandlwe waza kungekudala naye wazifumana sele etyibiliza emazeni nabo.
Wehlelwa lishwangusha xa kanye eqala ukuzibonakalisa kulo mdlalo. Wehlelwa yingozi yemoto wenzakala kanobom emlenzeni. Weva iintlungu ezimandla kwaye emva kwenzame zonyango oogqirha bamxelela ukuba kuza kufuneka bawushunqule umlenze wakhe.
Akazange akhawuleze ukubuyela ekutyibilizeni emazeni wakuphola umlenze wakhe uBongani.
"Ndandikungxamele kakhulu ukubuyela emanzini olwandle kodwa kwakunzima. Ndalila ubusuku bonke emva kokuchitha imini yonke elwandle ndiwiswa ngawo wonke amaza endidibana nawo," utshilo enikina intloko.
UBongani wayengeva ubuhlungu emzimbeni kuphela wayebuhlungu nasemphefumlweni kuba wayezibona enesiphiwo sokutyibiliz' emazeni ukanti ngoku wayengathi usafunda.
Kwamthabatha iinyanga ezimbini ezinzima efunda ukutyibiliza eguqe ngedolo nomlenze oshunquliweyo kwiMalibu board.
Yonk' into yayinomahluko kwindlela ebeqhele ukutyibiliza ngayo. Kwakufana nokuqala ukufunda umdlalo omtsha.
Kodwa ukuthanda kwakhe ulwandle nokukhuthazwa ngabahlobo kwamnceda uBongani ukuphumeza umnqweno wakhe - ukuchitha iiyure ezininzi etyibiliza ngebhodi yakhe emazeni olwandle.
Kodwa ibali lakhe alipheleli apho! Ukususela oko wehlelwa yingozi uBongani sele engumgwebi ohlonitshwayo kukhuphiswano lokutyibiliza emazeni kwaye ukhe waya eBrazil, eAustralia nasePortugal ukuya kuba ngumgwebi kukhuphiswano lwabatyibilizi emazeni.
"Njengokuba nam ndiwazi lo mdlalo, ndiyakwazi ofanele ukwenze ukuze utsale amehlo abagwebi," utsho.
Njengokuba eluthanda kangaka ulwandle uBongani, simbuze ukuba ukho na omnye umntu wakowabo ofun' ukulandela ekhondweni lakhe.
"Umntakwethu ekuphela kwakhe, uSandile uthand' iikhompyutha gqitha," utshilo ehleka. [x]

Uphando lweBONA
Umntwana udlala eBonne Esperance Refugee Shelter. Iimbacu eziselula ezingenabani zinyamezele ubunzima obungenambaliso kuhambo lwabo besingise eMzantsi Afrika.
BAWELA imida batyandyathe imigama emide besingise eMzantsi Africa. Endleleni banyoba onogada bemida, bahlawule abakhaphi ukuze bababoniswe indlela enqumla amahlathi neentaba. Isininzi sikwiminyaka eli-14 kodwa bakhona nabaneminyaka esi-7. Abaninzi babaleka iimfazwe, indlala, neenkxwaleko zesifo sikagawulayo (iHIV/AIDS) baze bafike baxhatshazwe xa bekwazile ukungena kweli.
Kubo uMzantsi Afrika "lilizwe lobisi nobusi", kodwa bafika "baqeshwe", ngqesho leyo inxamnye nomthetho ochasa ukuqeshwa kwabantwana, baze bahlawulwe imali engaphantsi nakwi-R200 ngeveki.
Amantombazana axhatshazwa nangakumbi kuba ahendelwa ukuba abe ngamahenyukazi.
Aba bantwana abaziwa luluntu loMzansi Afrika kuba bambalwa abadibana noonontlalo-ntle, abaninzi abafundi kwaye abanye bayabanjwa babuyiselwe emazweni abo, nto leyo ingavumelaniyo nomthetho.
Ezi nkcukacha ngabantwana ababhacela eMzantsi Afrika besuka kumazwe aseAfrika zifunyenwe kuphando olwenziwa yiYunivesithi yaseWits isenzela umbutho wase-UK ojongene nokuhlangula abantwana.
Olu phando lwenzelwe eRhawutini, eMusina (kumda waseZimbambwe), eMalelane naseKomatipoort (kumda waseMozambique).
Emva kodliwano-ndlebe nabantwana abali-130 ngokuqinisekileyo liyothusa inani labantwana abawela imida bebodwa.
Emva kodliwano-ndlebe kufumaniseke ukuba abantwana abaninzi basuka eZimbabwe naseMozambique. Abalinganiselwa kwi - 50% banyoba oonogada kanti i -80% ihlawula abakhaphi ukuze bababonise indlela eza eMzantsi africa.
Abafunyanwe eRhawutini basuka kumazwe afana neDemocratic Republic of Congo, eBurundi naseRwanda.
Le ngxelo izicacisa phandle iingxaki ezijongene nezi mbacu zingenakuzikhusela
Ukothuka okumandla
Isiqingatha sabo sibuyiselwe emva ngokungekho emthethweni ngamapolisa kanti abathelekelelwa kwi-25% babanjiwe baphinda bakhululwa.
Enye i-25% iphila ngokuthengisa esitalatweni, ize i-14% iziphilise ngokuqokelela iiplastiki neebhotile enkunkumeni izithengise.
Kulula ukufumana abantwana abaziimbacu abazizele ngokwabo kweli loMzintsi Afrika.
UMfundisi Geraldo Garacia waseKapa nongumlawuli weHouse Of Lawrence Home eWoodstock, uthi i-19 labantwana abaziimbacu abeza behamba bodwa kweli abaphakathi kweminyaka emi-5 ukuya kwi-14 bahlala kweli khaya labantwana.
Inkoliso yabo basuka eDRC, eRwanda naseAngola, kwaye baphantsi konyango lokuphazamiseka engqondweni kunye nomothuko ongamandla obangelwa ziziganeko ezibehleleyo.
Ikhaya leembacu eligcina abasetyhini nabantwana iBonne Esperance Refugee Shelter ePhilippi lingenise abantwana abane abazimbacu labanika ikhaya.
Udushe
Omnye wabo esiza kumbiza ngoAnna une-17 leminyaka usuka eKinshasa eDRC kunye nodadewabo oneminyaka emine.
Bahambe umgama omalunga neekhilomitha ezingama-3 000 ukuya eKapa emva kokuba abazali babo banyamalala emva kodushe lopolitiko kwiminyaka emibini.
U-Anna uye wancediswa yitoliki ukubalisa ibali lakhe kuba uthetha isiFrentshi. Uthe kwanyanzeleka asiyeke isikolo adlale indima yobuzali kudadewabo omncinci ngokuthengisa iimpahla ukuziphilisa.
Wathengisa iilekese esitratweni zalapho eKinshasa akuphelelwa yimali. Wabonwa ngumhlobo kanina waza wamnceda ukuba abalekele eMzantsi Afrika kunye nodadewabo nabantwana ababini, oneminyaka esi-8 kunye ne14.
Lwaqala ke uhambo lweentsuku ezintathu behlohlwe kwinqwelo enkulu kunye nabanye abantwana. Abanye babo kwanyanzeleka ukuba bahlawulele uhambo ngesondo.
U-Anna uthi ngethamsanqa elabo iqela lasinda kuba umhlobo kanina wabalungiselela umphako nemali yokuhlawula kodwa abanye babangamaxhoba okulalwa ngamadoda amadala indlela yonke.
"Andisokuze ndilulibale olo hambo kwaye kuza kufuneka ndiphile nazo ezi ngcinga," utsho uAnna.
Babesingise eMzantsi Afrika kwilizwe abathi lelethemba.
Bakufika eRhawutini umhlobo kanina wabathengela nje amatikiti okuya eKapa ngololiwe wabashiya.
Bafika ekuqaleni kwenyanga kaOktoba eKapa. Kungekho mntu bamaziyo nokwazi ukuthetha ulwimi lwabo. Ngethamsanqa badibana nomfo waseCongo wabanceda wabasa kwikhaya leembacu iWynberg Refugee Centre baza batshintshelwa eBonne Esperance Shelter.
Balahliwe
Noxa zininzi iimbacu ezifudukela eMzantsi Afrika incinci kakhulu ingqwalasela kweli ngabantwana abeza bengahambi namntu umdala.
UJulia Zungu weSave The Children UK uthi iimbacu eziselula zifikela eRhawutini ubukhulu becala.
Eminye imizila esetyenziswa zimbacu yile, ngosuka eZimbabwe uye eRhawutini, osuka eMozambique uye KwaZulu-Natal naseLusuthu ukuya eFicksburg eFree State.
UKaajal Ramjathan-Keogh ongumququzeleli kwilizwe jikelele kwinkqubo ejongene neembhacu nabafuduki kumbutho wamagqwetha olwela amalungelo abantu uthi akukho nkqubo ilandelwayo ngokuphathelene nabantwana abafika behamba bodwa ababhacela kweli.
Noxa kungekho balo lwenziwayo ukuqonda inani lezi mbacu ngonyaka, uRamjathan-Keogh uthi le nyewe iseyingxaki.
UTal Schreier ongumcebisi weembacu ngomthetho kwiyunivesithi yaseKapa uyavumelana noku.
Uthi ukungabikho kwemithetho "akwaziwa" ukuba bafanele bathiweni abantwana ababhacela kweli bebodwa.
Uthi abasebenzi kumasebe afana neSebe lezeNtlalo-ntle nelezaseKhaya abanalwazi kwaye abafumani ngqeqesho yokujongana nale meko kukwanjalo nakumaqoqo abucala akhusela abantwana.
"Sidibana neemeko apho onontlalo-ntle besala ukunceda abantwana ngelithi abangabo abemi boMzantsi Afrika," utsho.
Imiceli-mngeni
Nangona umthetho uvuma ukuba abantwana mabakhuseleke kuze abasweleyo bafumane uhoyo, kodwa awutsho ukuba mazithiweni iimbacu zabantwana bamazwe angaphandle.
Zize iimbacu ezi zifumane zeyele kwezo "ntanda zomthetho ongaphelelanga".
U-Adolphine Mulanga wasePhilippi okwiziko elilikhaya likaAnna, uyazi ngqo lengxaki.
Uthi kuyingxaki ukulungisa amaphepha ezi ntsizana kangangokuba bona kunzima ukufumana amalungelo alinganayo nabantwana boMzantsi Afrika.
Ukwathe kunzima nokubabhalisa ezikolweni bengenazo iimpepha.
U-Agnes Muller ongumanejala kwiSebe leNtlalo-ntle uthe asililo isebe eliyalela oonontlalontle ukuba bangabancedi aba bantwana, koko ngabathile abazenzela unothanda.
Uthi eli sebe likwiphulo lokwakha iinkqubo eziza kujongana nabantwana ababhaca bebodwa.
Kuchasene nomthetho kwaye kunyhasha amalungelo abantwana ukubanjwa kwabo kuba bengenazo iimpepha zokuwela imida. Ubongoze amapolisa ukuba aqhagamshelane noonotlalontle ngale meko. [x]

Omawukwazi ngokucwangcisa...
BONA XHOSA - May 2007
Sikubonisa indlela yokukhetha uhlobo lokucwangcisa olukufaneleyo - ukwazi nokwahlula ubuxoki (obunobungozi)...
UKUKHETHA indlela oza kucwangcisa ngayo kuxhomekeke kwiimfuno zakho. Kuxhomekeke ekubeni impilo yakho injani na kwanokuba uyafuna na ukuba nabo abantwana yaye ubafuna nini.
Enye into ebalulekileyo kukuba unyanisekile na kwiqabane lakho okanye uthandana namaqabane amaninzi.
Noxa ubugcisa bamachiza bukwinqanaba eliphezulu kwaye neendlela zokucwangcisa sele ziphucukile kodwa ziikhondom kuphela ezikhusela usuleleko lweHIV/AIDS neziny' izifo ezosulela ngesondo.
Iingcali zicebisa ngelithi nokuba uyacwangcisa sebenzisa iikhondom ngaphandle kokuba uqinisekile ukuba wena neqabane lakho ninyanisekile omnye komnye.
Kuphando lwethu sifake iindlela zokucwangcisa ezifumaneka simahla kwiikliniki ezininzi. I-Intrauterine Device (IUD) yona ifuna utyando yaye ifumaneka kwiikliniki ezithile...
kubhale uGRACE KHUZWAYO
Iindlela zokucwangcisa ezisetyenziswayo
INDLELA YOKUCWANGCISA
UNCEDO
IINGXAKI ZAYO
Ikhondom yamadoda
Yenziwe ngelatex okanye ipolyurethane.
80-98%
Xa isetyenziswe ngokukuko.
Ithintela ugawulayo neziny' izifo ezosulela ngesondo. Ifumaneka lula kwiikliniki, ekhemisti nakwiindawo zikawonke-wonke.
Iyagqabhuka xa ingasetyenziswanga ngokukuko. (Qaphela: Ungayisebenzisi ikhondom nezinto ezinamafutha ezifana neVaseline kuba ziyithena amandla ilatex. Sebenzisa izinto ezinamanzi ezifana neKY Gel.)
Ikhondom yamabhinqa
Yenziwe ngeplastiki eyomeleleyo netyebileyo kwaye ivuleke ngaphezu kwekhondom yamadoda. Ifakwa kwilungu langasese lebhinqa ngaphambi kokwabelana ngesondo.
79-90%
Xa isetyenziswe ngokukuko.
Ithintela ugawulayo neziny' izifo ezosulela ngesondo. Inika ibhinqa igunya lokuzikhusela.
Kufuneka ifakwe ngaphambi kokwabelana ngesondo.
Iipilisi zokucwangcisa
Zine-oestrogen neprogesterone. Ukuzisebenzisa kwakho kuxhomekeke empilweni yakho kwanokuba awusebenzisi mayeza athile na. Kubalulekile ukubaxelela ekliniki xa kukho amayeza owasebenzisayo ukuze bakunike iipilisi ezikulungeleyo.
92-99%
Xa ziselwa ngokwemiyalelo.
Ziwalungele amabhinqa amaninzi, zinceda ukuhlisa iingxaki zokuy' exesheni, ukopha kakhulu nesilumo.
Zenza isicaphu-caphu, ukopha noxa ungekho sexesheni, intloko ebuhlungu kwaye ziyatyebisa. Azivani namany' amayeza. Xa ukhe walibala ukuzisela uyakhulelwa.
I-Mini Pill
Ineprogesterone. Yeyona ilungele amabhinqa ancancisayo. Idla ngokunikwa amabhinqa aneengxaki zempilo nalawo asebenzisa amayeza aselwa ixesha elide.
92-99%
Xa iselwa ngokwemiyalelo.
Iwalungele phantse onke amabhinqa yaye ineengxaki ezingaphantsi kwezeepilisi zokucwangcisa ezilapha ngasentla. Ikunik' ulawulo kwiintsuku zakho zokuy' exesheni.
Ukuze zisebenze ngokukuko kufuneka uzisele ngexesha elinye yonk' imihla. Xa ukhe walibala ukuzisela okanye wazisela emva kwexesha uyakhulelwa.
Isitofu
Sineprogestogen yaye kufuneka utofwe qho kwiiveki ezisibhozo okanye ezili-12.
92-99%
Sinik' ukuphumla kwengqondo. Usiphinda kane okanye kathandathu kuphela ngonyaka.
Ziyatshintsha iintsuku zokuy' exesheni de uyeke tu ukuy' exesheni emva kwexesha. Icacisa intliziyo nto leyo ikwenza utyebe.
I-Intrauterine Device (IUD)
Yinto encinci emilise njengo-T eyenziwe ngeplastiki okanye ubhedu. Uza kucetyiswa ngugqirha okanye ekliniki ngekufaneleyo. Ihlala esizalweni iminyaka eli-10. Ilungele onke amabhinqa.
98-99%
Isebenza ngokukhawuleza. Ayilwi namanye amayeza owasebenzisayo yaye ayikuniki ngxaki. Ayikukhathazi naxa usabelana ngesondo nanini na.
Ikwenza wophe kakhulu xa usexesheni okanye umana usopha noxa ungekho sexesheni. Xa ulala namaqabane amaninzi ufumana usuleleko.
Iingcebiso ngezesondo
BONA XHOSA - May 2007
Isondo elikhuselekileyo
Imo yongxamiseko
INDLELA ekhuselekileyo yokuval' inzala ebizwa ngokuba yiEmergency Contraceptive Pills (ECPs) ithintela ukumitha xa wabelane ngesondo elingakhuselekanga.
Iziindidi ngeendidi kodwa zonke zithintela ukukhulelwa ngokulibazisa iqanda lingaphumi okanye ngokunqanda iqanda elidibene nembewu yobudoda lingangeni esibelekweni.
Ii-ECP zisetyenziswa kwezi meko zilandelayo:
Xa wabelane ngesondo ungalindelanga waza awazikhusela;
Xa wabelane ngesondo ngesinyanzelo ube ungacwangcisi;
Xa kugqabhuke ikhondom;
Xa ungaselanga iipilisi ezimbini nangaphaya zokucwangcisa;
Xa usemva ngeeveki ezimbini ekufumaneni isitofu sokucwangcisa.
Ii-ECP ziyasebenza xa uzisele kwisithuba seeyure ezingama-24 kwaye kufuneka uzisele iintsuku ezintlanu emva kokwabelana ngesondo elingakhuselekanga.
Zisebenza ngokukuko xa uzisele kwangoko. Sela iipilisi ezimbini; eyokuqala yisele msinyane emva kwesondo elingakhuselekanga enye uyisele emva kweeyure ezili-12.
(Qaphela: Ungasebenzisi iiECP endaweni yokucwangcisa. Xa uzisebenzisa qho uzibeka esichengeni sokukhulelwa kunaxa usebenzisa iindlela zokucwangcisa eziqhelekileyo.)
BONA XHOSA - May 2007
Iindlela zokuval' inzala zendalo ezingakhuthazwayo
Ukukhuph' ilungu lobudoda ngaphambi kokufikelela kuvutho-ndaba nokulalana kwiintsuku ezithile emva kokuy' exesheni ziindlela zendalo zokuval' inzala kodwa iingcali azizithembi.
Ukulinda iintsuku kukubala iintsuku zokuy' exesheni ukuze ungabelani ngesondo ngexesha apho ibhinqa liqhama kakhulu.
Ukukhupha kukukhupha ilungu lobudoda ngaphambi nje kokuba likhuphe imbewu yaye ayithembeki le ndlela kuba imbewu kuyenzeka ibe sele ingenile kusisi.
Ispermicides ziikhemikhali ezibulala imbewu yobudoda yaye ziziindidi ngeendidi ezifana nekhrim, ijeli, ugwebu nezinto ezifakwa kwilungu lebhinqa langasese. Kufuneka zisetyenziswe kunye nediaphragm (into emile "okwekomityi" efakwa apha kusisi). Kubhetele zisetyenziswe neekhondom kuba azithembeki nazo. [x]
UNCEDO! Xa unemibuzo ngokuval' inzala ingakumbi kwimo yongxamiseko tsalela le nombolo yeEmergency Contraception: 0800-246-432
Ubuxoki ngoku-cwangcisa
BUNINZI ubuxoki obayanyaniswa nokucwangcisa nokukhulelwa...
Awukhulelwa xa uncancisa okanye xa usexesheni.
BUBUXOKI. Umntu uyaqhama nokuba uyancancisa okanye usexesheni.
Xa uqal' ukwabelana ngesondo.
Xa uzitsazisela ngamanzi emva kwesondo.
Xa utsiba-tsiba emva kwesondo.
Xa usabelana ngesondo umi ngeenyawo okanye xa ibhinqa lingaphezulu.
Xa uhlamba okanye uchama emva kokwabelana ngesondo.
BUBUXOKI. Zonke ezi zinto ngamampunge. Imbewu yobudoda ihamba nangayiphi na indlela yaye iyahlala iintsuku ezintlanu esibelekweni.
Endaweni yekhondom sebenzisa ibhaluni okanye iclingwrap.
BUBUXOKI. Zinobungozi.
Amantombazana angekaqali ukuy' exesheni angakhulelwa.
Ukuvala 'inzala ngokuphe-leleyo'
UKUVALWA kwenzala okanye ukudloliswa kwenziwa emadodeni nakumabhinqa akwi-18 leminyaka nangaphezulu.
Uyacetyiswa kuqala, kufuneka utyikitye ifom yokuvuma yaye iyasebenza le ndlela yokuval' inzala.
Amabhinqa: Olu tyando lubizwa ngokuba yitubal ligation. Iityhubhu ezithwala amaqanda ziwasa esizalweni ziyabotshwa ukuze amaqanda angachunyiswa yimbewu yobudoda.
Amadoda: Olu tyando lubizwa ngokuba yivasectomy. Kusikwa iityhubhu "zembewu yobudoda" zibotshwe ukuze imbewu ingadibani nolwelo oluphuma xa kufikwa kuvutho-ndaba lwesondo. Ambalwa amathuba okungaphumeleli kolu tyando. (Qaphela: Alukhawulezi ukuthintela ukukhulelwa - kufuneka usebenzise eziny' iindlela zokuval' inzala iinyanga ezi-3 emva kokulwenza.)

Yiba MHLE
kobu busika!
EQAQAMBILEYO
Imibala eqaqambileyo esiyibone phakathi kweli hlobo iza kuba mihle nangakumbi kwimibala embatshileyo yasebusika.
Imisebe iza kuba nemibala eturquoise nopepli, ukanti ziya kukuxhola ngemibala eluhlaza engqongqo, epinki netyheli.
IMIBALA EMENYEZELAYO
Imibala enjengogolide, osilvere nobronze yiyo eza kuqaqambisa iintsuku ezimnyama zasebusika. Ungayisebenzisa le mibala yonk' indawo ukususela emehlweni, ukuya ezinzitsheni nasemilebeni - kodwa ungayisebenzisi yonke ngexesh' elinye, ngaphandle kokuba ufun' ukutsal' amehlo.
EMDAKA NGEBALA
Abebesonqena ukusebenzisa imibala emdaka ngebala efike ekupheleni kwehlobo basenokubona eli kulixesha lokuyisebenzisa. Imibala emdaka enjengonavy blue nopepli mihle ezinzitsheni ezimfutshane. Abantu abaneentloni bangaqala ngokuyisebenzisa ezinzwaneni!
ENGQONGQO
Imilebe emenyezelayo enebala lendalo isesentweni kobu busika, kodwa nebomvu ngokuqaqambileyo isathandwa, kuba ibenza babe nomtsalane abantu abanolusu oluntsundu.
Nemilebe epinki ibamihle xa ungumntu oneentloni. [x]
Umbhali: Patricia McCracken
(Iinkcukacha zifunyanwe kwa: Revlon, Yardley, Nailene, Lalu, Avon)
UBUHLE BAKHO
Sebenzisa iimveliso zemake-up ezisentweni kobu busika
YIBA MHLE NGEMALI ENCINANE
Imake-up entsha yindlela entle yokuvuselela inkangeleko yakho. Kodwa xa usenza iimpazamo ezininzi, uya kuzifumana uchitha imali eninzi. Nazi izikhokelo ezine zokuzenza mhle ungangenanga nzulu epokothweni:
Jonga phambi kokuthenga
Zininzi iimveliso zemake-up ezivenkileni - ngoko ziqhelise imibala ngaphambi kokuyithenga. Unako ukuyivavanya imveliso ngaphambi kokuyithenga.
Iziseko ezizizo
"Uninzi lwethu lubanolusu olukhanyayo ebusika. Ngoko jonga ukuba udaka obulu-sebenzisa ehlotyeni lusakulungele na. Kungenzeka kufuneke uthenge oluncinane olukhanyayo oza kuluse-benzis' ebusika,"
Utsho uFaith Seuoe olungisa ubuso bekhava yeBONA
Qala ngokuyiqaba kancinane
Xa ukuthanda ukuqab' imake-up kodwa uyonqena imibala eqaqambileyo, kuhle ukuqala ngokuyiqaba kancinane.
Uba mhle, xa uqaba igloss phezulu kwesiqabi somlomo esimdaka.
Cinga kwangethuba
Theng' iimveliso zemake-up eziza kuba sefashonini ixesha elide, ucebisa ngelo uFaith. Imibala eqaqambileyo iza kuthandwa kobu busika, ngoko yithenge ngoku ubenayo.

UNCEDO LOMPHEFUMLO
UMfundisi George unika iingcebiso kwiingxaki zakho zomphefumlo
Ndithandana nendoda etshatileyo
Ndithandana nendoda etshatileyo kwaye nayo iyandithanda. Besike sazama ukohlukana, kodwa simana sibuyelana. Ndicebise ukuba ndiphume njani kule nto?
nguJK, eQwaQwa
JK othandekayo: Kuhle ukubona ukuba ufuna ukwenza okulungileyo. Yeka ukuthetha naye. Loo nto ithetha ukuba awumtsaleli mnxeba, awumbhaleli zi-e-mails njalo-njalo. Kuza kubanzima, kodwa uza kube uzikhusela kwiintlungu zomphefumlo ezizayo.
Ngubani owaziyo - mhlawumbi ikho indoda ezimiseleyo ecinga ngawe ngoku, kodwa ayinakuza xa icinga ukuba unomntu.
Ndincede ndifumane ibandla elingahlebiyo!
Ndilahlekelwe lukholo kuba ecaweni ndibona urhwaphilizo nezono. Ibandla lokugqibela endandililungu lalo laliyisebenzisa kakubi imali, umfundisi walo ekrexeza kukho nentlebendwane.
Kodwa ngoku ndikhumbula ukudumisa uThixo nabanye abazalwane. Ndenze njani ukuze ndifumane ibandla elilungileyo?
nguJoe Sebatie, ePolokwane
Joe othandekayo: Kubanzima xa ufumanisa ukuba abantu bayazenzisa ecaweni. Akungabo bonke abantu ababiza igama likaThixo abanyanisekileyo. Kodwa ke noxa ekhona amaxoki bakho nabanyanisekileyo.
Abekho abefundisi abangcwele, kodwa ungamfumana onyanisekileyo. Iza kubakho icawe eza kukulungela edolophini ohlala kuyo. Mhlawumbi kungenzeka ibe kude kodwa iza kukunceda umazi uThixo.
Yiba nomonde, ungangxami uThixo uza kukubonisa icawe eza kukulungela.
Ndiyabazonda abamhlophe
Abazali bam babulawa ngexesha lengcindezelo kwaye ukusukela ngoko andiphindanga ndamthanda umntu omhlophe.
Nakule mihla ndisayibona intswelo- bulungisa nocalulo; zinto ezo zindikhumbuza indlela endaphulukana ngayo nabazali bam.
Ndiwuthini lo msindo ndinawo?
nguMary Ngema, eSoweto
Mary othandekayo: Akekho omele kukwehlelwa yinto eyanehlelayo wena nabazali bakho. Abantu abakubulalela abazali balimosha izolo lakho musa ukubavumela bakumoshele nengomso. Noxa bengafanelanga baxolelwe kodwa wena zikhulule ngokubaxolela. Rhoqo xa uxolela ukhulula ibanjwa: ELINGUWE!
Thatha isigqibo, ucele kuThixo akuncede. Rhoqo xa usiva umsindo usenyuka, thandazel' abakonileyo. Awunako ukuyenza le nto uwedwa, kodwa unako xa ukunye noThixo.
Indlela yokuthandaza
Ndifuna ukufunda ukuthandaza. Ndiqala ngokuthini ndibe sele ndisithini?
nguJudith, eSebokeng.
Judith othandekayo: Umthandazo yinto elula. UThixo ukufutshane kunokuba ucinga. UYesu wasifundisa ukumbiza "Tata". Into omele uyenze kukuba uthethe naye njengomhlobo wakho. Qala ngokumbulela ngezinto zonke ezintle ebomini bakho (musa ukubala ezimbi kuphela). Mcele ke ngoku ukuba akuhlangabeze kwiimfuno zakho. Uyakwazi, khululeka phambi Kwakhe, Uyakuthanda kwaye uyafuna ukuchitha ixesha nawe! [x]
Asinandibano yesondo ngenxa kaThixo?
Owakwam wathi mandiye ecaweni ebesoloko ekhonza kuyo iinyanga ezintandathu. Nam ndavuma saze saya ecaweni sobabini. Ndiyayonwabela inkonzo ixesha elininzi, kodwa ngoku le cawe ihlohla inkosikazi yam ngolwazi oluthi indibano yesondo ayilunganga.
Ingaba indibano yesondo ayilunganga kwaye ingaba unelungelo lokwala ukuba sibe nayo?
nguPK, eThekwini
PK othandekayo: Indibano yesondo yindalo kaThixo. Kodwa ke, njengayo nayiphi na into, ingasetyenziswa ngendlela engeyiyo. Isibini esitshatileyo simelwe ukuyonwabela indibano yesondo kuba ayilohlazo (Genesis 2:25). Kwaye ngokweBhayibhile, ixesha eningazila ngalo indibano yesondo kuxa nobabini nivumelene ukuba niza kuchitha ixesha nizile ukutya nithandaza (1 Corinthians 7:1-5).
UNYANGO LOMPHEFUMLO
Indi-bano yesondo yindalo kaThixo. Isibini esitsha-tileyo simele ukuyo- nwabela
Bhalela uMfundisi George: Uncedo Lomphefumlo, Box 473014, Parklands, 2121

BONA XHOSA November 2008
ILA Palms Spa eseFourways eGauteng yakhiwe kumhlaba oziihekthare ezili-12 yaye amabhadi neetsiba-bhokhwe ziyazihambela kumabala ayo. Inika iinkonzo ezahlukeneyo zempilo nezobuhle ukanti ikwanendawo yokuhlala abantu abafikelela kwi-15.
Iingcali zobuhle zaseLa Palms Day Spa zisebenzisa izithambiso ezikhethekileyo ze-Eva Garden ezenziwa yingcali yolungiso-buso yase-Italy, uPaulo Guatelli.
Ngenela olu khuphiswano namhlanje ukuze uzuze imini yokuya kuphululwa umzimba okanye uqhagamshelane neLa Palms ukuze uzifumanele icham leHalf-day Relaxation Package eliyi-R425 kumntu ngamnye. Kungoku nje babhalisa nabantu abafuna ukwenzela khona amatheko okuphela konyaka. Bafowunele kule nombolo: 011-460-1383; Email: lapalmsspa@polka.co.za; Website: www.lapalmsspa.co.za
Ongakuzuza
Ukuya kulungiswa umzimba okuxabisa i-R7 500 umntu, ukulungiswa umzimba iintsuku ezintathu okuxabisa i-R1 350 umntu okanye isethi yezithambiso nezinto zokulungis' ubuso ze-Eva Garden ezixabisa i-R1 350.
Ulungiso-mzimba olupheleleyo; ilantshi; ukuphululwa kwentloko nomzimba; ukucetyiswa ngembonakalo; ulungiso-buso neenwele; nokufotwa emini.
Ulungiso-mzimba lwemini luquka isidlo sakusasa esilula; ukucocwa komzimba, ukuphululwa entloko; ilantshi; ulungiso-buso; ukulolwa iinyawo nokulungiswa iinzipho.
Indlela yokulungenela

Iintsapho ezikhethiweyo zidibanela ebhotwe lobukumkani zicele imvula kwizinyanya kodwa ayinethi. Ingaba amaBolobedu aphulukene namandla okunisa imvula"
kubhale kwafota uNGWAKO WAGA MODJADJI
INDLELA enamagophe iziikhilomitha ezi-5 ukuya kwiintaba zaseKhethakoni eBolobedu kwibhotwe lobuKumkani bukaModjadji. Yiminyaka esondele kuma-200 iiKumkanikazi zeMvula zamaBalobedu zisenzela umsitho wokucel' imvula kwezi ntaba.
Kuvakala ukuba nkqu nenkosi yamaZulu uShaka wakhe watyelela eBalobedu.
Iintaba zaseKhethakoni zisoloko zinenkungu kodwa thina sifike ingekho ngoko besikwazi ukubona imizi ephaya ezantsi yamaBalobedu.
Xa uphezulu kwezi ntaba ubona abantu phaya ezantsi bemanxada-nxada besenz' imisebenzi yabo yemihla ngemihla abanye benze imiqodi etephini yamanzi nto leyo intama ukubaluleka kwamanzi ebantwini bale ngingqi.
NgoOktobha lixesha lomsitho wokucel' imvula kuba kuthwasa ihlobo.
Ngethuba kusenziwa lo msitho kufika abantu abavela eJoburg ubukhulu becala, abancinane nabadala, amahlwempu nezinhanha bezobukela ezi ntsapho zintlanu zasebukhosini bakwaModjadji - olwakwaMathekga, olwakwaMasopha, olwakwaMorwatshehla, olwakwaMmapeule nolwakwaModjadji - xa zibongoza kwizinyanya zazo ukuba zizise imvula.
Kulo nyaka zijikil' izinto kuba lo msitho ubuphethwe yindoda, nto leyo ibiqala ukwenzeka ezimbalini.
UNkosana uMpapatla uthethe nezinyanya zakhe egalela amarhewu abizwa ngokuba yi-"mophapo," e-"Thokoleng" (eTempileni).
Amarhewu
Emva koko la marhewu aseliswe imazi yenkomo emnyama uMokgadi, ethiywe ngegama losapho lwasebukhosini.
Emva koko aselwe ngamalungu osapho ukuze aphiliswe kwizifo anazo kwaye abe namathamsanqa.
Kutyiwe inyama, kwaselwa utywala kwaza kwenziwa nemibongo.
Imvula ibilindeleke ukuba inethe kwiintsuku ezimbalwa emva kwalo msitho...
UJones Modjadji olilungu eliphezulu kwiBhunga loBukhosi lakwaModjadji uthi, "Imvula ibonwa njengentsikelelo ebantwini bethu. Sikholelwa ukuba izinyanya zethu zinawo amandla kwanokuba zinxibelelana nathi xa sisenza umsitho wokucel' imvula.
"Sithi kuphela abantu abanamandla okucela imvula kwizinyanya."
Ababoni ngolo hlobo bonke abantu kwaye nowalo nyaka umsitho ubenayo ingxwaba-ngxwaba.
Into ebaluleke kakhulu eyinxalenye yalo msitho luphondo lomlingo olugcinwa lusapho lwasebukhosini bakwaModjadji ukususela ebutsheni boo-1800.
Uphondo
Kutshanje usapho lwakwaMokoto lubhengeze ukuba lulo olungabalawuli abasemthethweni beBalobedu Ba ha Modjadji.
Bathi olu phondo lusetyenziswa ngabakwaModjadji xa becela imvula lolwabo. Bathi balunikwa ngooyisemkhulu kwaye mandulo abakwaModjadji babecela imvume kwaMokoto ngaphambi kokwenza umsitho.
Ingaba esi sisizathu sokunqongophala kwemvula kwesi sizwe"
Emva kokusweleka kweKumkanikazi yeMvula uMakobo Caroline Modjadji VI abanye abahlali bathi bakholelwa ekubeni imvula iza kunqongophala.
"Kudala sayigqibela imvula kwaye andisawathembi la mabali okucelwa kwemvula ukuba ayinyaniso," utsho uJoe Shoroma esidibene naye kwindawo yentselo ngemini yomsitho.
Intsomi
UJoe uneminyaka engama-29 kwaye uphila kule mihla yeeselfowuni, iiDVD, ihip-hop nexesha likabhubhane ongugawulayo.
Abantwana bala maxesha bawabona njengentsomi amabali okucelwa kwemvula.
Kodwa ngoku nkqu neenkonde ezifana noDerrick Mmapeule oneminyaka engama-82 uphelelwa lithemba emandleni amaBalobedu okuzisa imvula.
"Phaya mandulo kwakunetha kakhulu," utshilo ejonga ezintabeni ngokunga unethemba lokuba kuza kuvuleka umlambo omkhulu uhle kunethe imvula.
"Andazi nokuba sisenawo na amandla okunisa imvula. Mandulo sasiwenza umsitho ize ine imvula kodwa ngoku andazi nokuba siya kuphinda siyifumane na."
La mazwi antame ukuba abantu banoloyiko lokuphela kwamandla okunisa imvula kwabasebukhosini kwaye iBONA ide yahamba kungekhonto ibonisa ukuba imvula iza kuna. [x]

kubhale uFORCE KHASHANE
IDLISO liyeza eligalelwa ekutyeni komntu ukuze agule okanye afe - okanye ukuze lowo ulityileyo akuthande. Eli yeza lothando laziwa njengegomondela (ikorobela).
Abantu badla ngokudliswa emitshatweni nakumatheko eentsapho. Eziny' iintsapho ziye ziqinisekise ukuba umntu ophakela iindwendwe ezibalulekileyo ngumntu othembekileyo.
Iyeza lentando
Nabo bathi amayeza bawasebenzisela izinto ezintle ezifana nokwenz' umntu akuthande kufanele bayazi into yokokuba amayeza akanakuthenjwa.
Xa udlisa umntu ukuze akuthande ungaphoxeka kuba angasuke agule endaweni yokuba akuthande.
Akulunganga ukunyanzelisa umntu ukuba enze into angayithandiyo.
Awufuni wena ukuthandwa ngumntu uyile nto uyiyo, akuthande unguwe engakuthandiswa liyeza omdlise lona" Uyayikholwa into etshiwo ngumntu onxilileyo"
Ngokuqinisekileyo awuyikholwa!
Neyeza kaloku singalifanisa notywala kule meko. Kubhetele ukuba umntu akuthande kuba ekuthanda nyhani engekho "phantsi kwempembelelo" yeyeza.
Iyeza lokubulala
Kuthiwani ke ngabo basebenzisa iyeza ukuze badlise abantu bababulale"
Abantu abaninzi bakholelwa ekubeni badliswa xa belele.
"Ndiphuphe ndinyanzeliswa ukuba nditye inyama yenkuku ebigalelwe umgubo omnyama.
"Ndikwanyanzeliswe ukuba nditye umbungu kwakwelo phupha," kutsho omny' umfundi.
"Ndithe xa ndiphaphama kwelo phupha ndeva kukho into eshukumayo esiswini sam. Ndayiva ngezandla ishukuma inga izama ukubaleka."
Lo mfundi utsala isigwebo entolongweni ukholelwa ekubeni eso saba sisiqalo seengxaki zakhe.
"Kwiintsuku ezimbalwa emva koko ndaba nephupha elibi kwakhona. Kweli tyeli ndaphupha ngathi ndilele ngecala kwaye kukho le nto ifana nenkumba indiluma isikhumba.
"Ndavuka apho ndineqhuma. Ndathi xa ndilicinezela elo qhuma kwavakala isandi esingaqhelekanga.
"Ndafuman' unyango kodwa alwandinceda. Ngamany' amaxesha oogqirha babendixelel' ukuba abayiboni le nto ndigula yiyo."
Elinye lamaxhoba edliso libhale lathi: "Xa ndisitya izinto ezimnandi ezifana netshokholethi neekeyiki kuba ngathi ndingahlanza.
"Emva koko ndiye ndiphathwe ziintlungu zesifuba kwaye amagqirha andixelele ukuba ndinedliso.
"Ndizamile ukulikhupha ngokuphalaza ngamanzi ashushu kodwa aliphumi."
Ukulinyanga
Ukuze uzikhusele kufuneka uqale ukhusele ikhaya lakho.
Xa ikhaya lakho lingabethelelwanga kufuneka ufune igqirha eliza kubethelela ukuze ikhaya lakho likhuseleke.
Qiniseka ukuba ufumana omny' umntu oza kukuxilonga ngengxaki yakho yesifuba. Kungenzeka ukuba ezi ntlungu zesifuba azinanto yakwenza nedliso koko zihambisana nengxaki yentliziyo.
Iindaba ezimnandi zezokuba idliso liyanyangeka.
Ubusazi ukuba ubisi lwebhokhwe luyalidodobalisa idliso"

UKUKHULELWA SELE
ULIQINA
Isikhokelo somawukulindele xa uza kuba nomntwana uneminyaka engama-35 nangaphezulu
AMABHINQA angaphezulu kweminyaka engama- 35 ubudala asecicini lokufumana iingxaki ezininzi xa ekhulelwe, kwaye ukuba ubenomntwana wokuqala uneminyaka engaphaya kwama-40, usengozini ngakumbi, utsho uGqr. Magezi Hlongwane, ugqirha wamabhinqa akhulelweyo.
Kodwa ke, amabhinqa amaninzi anale minyaka akabinayo ingxaki xa ekhulelwe, kwaye ezivelayo iingxaki ziye zinyangeke, utsho uGqr. Hlongwane.
Njengalo naliphi na ibhinqa elikhulelweyo umel' ukuhamba iklinikhi okanye udibane nogqirha, yitya ukutya okusempilweni, kwaye phepha izinto ezikukhathazayo. Ukuyeka ukusel' utywala nokutshaya nako kwehlisa amathuba okuvela kweengxaki.
Nazi iingxaki ongadibana nazo xa ukhulelwe sele uliqina:
Ungakhulelwa nzima - Xa sele ungaphezulu kweminyaka engama-30 inani lamaqanda akho liya ngokuncipha. Kuye ngokuba nzima ukuthatha isisu.
Xa uneminyaka engaphezulu kwama-35 kwaye sele uneenyanga ezintandathu uzama ukuthatha isisu kungenzeki, dibana nogqirha. Amathuba okuba siphuncuke isisu nawo ayanda.
Xa uneminyaka ephakathi kwama-40 nama-44 ubudala, ayi-34% amathuba okuba singaphuncuka isisu kanti xa ungaphaya kwama-45 ayi-53%.
IGestational diabetes - Olu hlobo lwesifo seswekile luxhaphakile kumabhinqa amadala akhulelweyo kwaye singayingozi emntwaneni kuba ukhula agqithise esibelekweni. Wena kungafuneka ufumane unyango, kodwa esi sifo siyalawuleka ngokuthi utye kakuhle wenze nemithambo.
Ihayi-hayi - Ingayingozi kuwe nasemntwaneni xa ingagadwanga. Unganestrowukhi, isifo sentliziyo kwaye umntwana angakhula ngokucotha azalwe emncinci.
Ukuhlala ungakhathazwa nto kubalulekile xa ukhulelwe. Ukuba ufunyaniswe unehayi-hayi yenza izinto ozicetyiswa ngugqirha.
Ukubeleka phambi kwexesha - Umntwana ozalwe phambi kweenyanga ezingama-37 uzalwe phambi kwexesha ngoko uza kuba nomzimba omncinane. Ngokuyeka ukutshaya nokusela ungawanciphisa amathuba okubeleka phambi kwexesha.
Usenokubeleka ngotyando - Amabhinqa aqalayo ukukhulelwa eneminyaka engaphaya kwama-35 ubudala aqhele ukuba nengxaki yokubeleka. Usenokuvel' iplacenta previa - xa umkhaya ehleli kakubi egqume umlomo wesizalo.
IiGenetic disorders - Umntwana wakho anganeDown Syndrome. Kodwa ke lukho uvavanyo lokujonga ezi ngxaki. [x]
Xa ufuna olunye ulwazi vula ku-: www.pregnancy-info.com; www.mayoclinic.com
Umbhali: Kamogelo Sebola

Ngokuya ukhula kuya ngokuba nzima uku-thatha isisu
IXESHA LOKUBA NGUTATA
Uphando lubonise ukuba abantwana abazalwe kumadoda aneminyaka engaphaya kwama- 40 asebungozini bokuba neengxaki ezifana ne-autism. Amadoda angaphaya kwama-50 asebungozini bokuba nabantwana abazalwa neziphene.

Xa izinto zizenzekela
BONA XHOSA - March 2006
Ukwenzeka kwezinto ngexesh' elinye
SONKE sikhe sibone kusenzeka izinto ezingaqhelekanga uze uve abantu besithi: "Zaze zazenzekela izinto." Kodwa ngaba kuthetha ukuthini ukuzenzekela kwezinto"
Lowo ngumbuzo mhlawumbi ongaphenduleka kakuhle ngokwenza umzekelo. Masithi ebusuku uphupha ngomhlobo owamgqibela ngonoquku. Ngengomso uyamfowunela loo mhlobo.
Oko ayikokuzenzekela kwezinto kuba ucingile ngaloo mntu waza wamfowunela.
Kodwa xa uphupha ngomhlobo ekudala wamgqibela aze yena ngemini elandelayo akufowunele, oko kukuzenzekela kwezinto.
Kaloku akukho nto uyivileyo noyenzileyo. Usenokuba awusazi nokuba loo mhlobo uhlalaphi na ngoku.
Ngamany' amazwi ukuzenzekela kwezinto kuthetha ukwenzeka kwezinto ezifanayo kodwa enye ibe ingabangelwanga yenye.
Umzekelo kukuba uthi ucinga ukuba kazi unjani umama wakho - aze emva kwemizuzwana akufowunele. Oko kukuzenzekela kwezinto kuba awukhange wenze nto engenza umama wakho acinge ukukufowunela.
Abantu abaninzi bacinga ukuba oku kwenziwa kukuba bekwazi ukuthetha nabantu abangasekhoyo. Kodwa akusithi sonke esikwaziyo ukuthetha nezinyanya kodwa izinto ezizenzekelayo zenzeka kuthi lonke ixesha.
Eziny' izinto ezizenzekelayo ziyamangalisa. Khawucinge ngezi zinto zilandelayo...
Ibhinqa elithile eNgilani lasweleka emva kokuba ihashe elalilikhwele lisuke lathi xhinkxi phambi kwelitye lesikhumbuzo laza lawa labetheka ngentloko kulo.
Elo litye lalakhiwe njengesikhumbuzo sebhishophu nayo eyawiswa lihashe kuloo ndawo yasweleka.
l"Ndiphangela kwikhaya elihlala amaxhego namaxhegokazi," latsho ibhinqa elithile. "Ngomhla we-12 kuFebruwari ka-2003, sasicoca ngaphandle kwelo khaya saza safumama i-albham eneephoskhadi ezindala.
"Ezo phoskhadi kwakuzezeminyaka ephakathi kuka- 1911 no-1918 saza sothuswa kukuba iphoskhadi yokuqala yayiyeyomhla we-12 kuFebruwari ngo-1913!"
UGeorge Bryson wabhukisha ehotele ekuhambo lomsebenzi. Emva kokubhalisa wanikwa isitshixo sendlu engunombolo 307, waza waxelelwa ukuba uneleta. Wothuswa yiloo nto kuba esandul' ukungena kuloo hotele. Wanikwa ileta ebhalelwe uMnu. George Bryson, okwigumbi elingunombolo 307.
Loo leta yayibhalelwe omnye umntu onegama elifana nelakhe owayesandul' ukuphuma kwigumbi elingunombolo 307.
Lothuka usapho lukaErskine Ebbin waseHamilton, eCanada, xa watshayiswa yiteksi ehamba ngesithuthuthu wasweleka ngo-1975. Ngemini efanayo kunyaka ongaphambili, umntakwaboEbbin, uNeville naye watshayiswa yiteksi ehamba ngesithuthuthu.
Bobabini basweleka beneminyaka eli-17, bobabini baswelekela endleleni enye, kwaye zombini ezo teksi zaziqhutywa ngumntu omnye - yaye zithwele umhambi omnye.
Ibanjwa laseArgentina lagqiba ekubeni lifune utata walo elingamaziyo. Lade laqesha umphandi wangasese. Emva kweeenyanga ezimbalwa umphandi wamfumana uyise - wayengumphathi wentolongo owayevalelwe kuyo.
Ngo-1858, uRobert Fallon ongumdlali wepoker wadutyulwa wasweleka. Kuthiwa wafumana i- $600 ngokukhohlisa abantu.
Emva kokuba kungasekho mntu uhlala esitulweni sikaFallon yaye kungekho mntu ufuna ukuthatha i-$600, bafumana umntu omtsha oza kuvala isithuba sikaFallon ukuze afumane loo $600.
Athi amapolisa efika ezophanda ngokubulawa kwakhe afika sele eyinyuse loo $600 yayi-$2 200. Amapolisa athi i-$600 yokuqala mayinikwe usapho lukaFallon.
Bafumana ngoko ukuba le ndoda ethathe indawo kaFallon ngunyana wakhe owamgqibela uyise kwiminyaka esixhenxe edlulileyo!
Intatheli yabhukisha ehotele.Kwenye yeedrowa egumbini eyayilele kulo yafumana impahla kaHarry Hannin - owayengumhlobo waloo ntatheli.
Emva kweentsuku ezimbini engekamxeleli uHannin ukuba ufumene impahla yakhe, loo ntatheli yafumana ileta evela kuHannin.
Kuloo leta umhlobo wakhe wayemxelela ukuba kwihotele ebehlala kuyo eParis ufumene uthayi waloo ntatheli.
UHenry Ziegland wacinga ukuba uphuncukile. Ngo-1883, wohlukana nentombi awayencuma nayo eyazibulalayo ngenxa yokukhathazeka. Umntakwabo loo ntombazana wamzingela uZiegland waza wamdubula.
Emva kokuba loo ndoda izixelela ukuba imbulele uZiegland, yazidubula nayo. Kodwa uZiegland wayengafanga.
Imbumbulu yayigwengule nje ebusweni yaya kubetha umthi.
UZiegland wazibona ebe nethamsanqa. Emva kweminyaka embalwa wawusarha loo mthi imbumbulu isengaphakathi kuwo.
Wathi kuba esonqena umsebenzi wokuwusarha, wawuqhushumbisa ngedamanethi.
Imbumbulu eyayikuloo mthi yakhutshwa kukudubula kwedamanethi yaya kubetha uZiegland entloko wafa.
Ibhinqa ekuthiwa nguAnne Parrish lalijonga iincwadi kwivenkile yeencwadi ezindala waza wabona incwadi ethi Jack Frost And Other Stories. Wayithatha loo ncwadi wayibonisa umyeni wakhe, wamxelela ukuba wayeyithanda esakhula.
Umyeni wakhe wayithatha wayivula waza wafika kwiphepha lokuqala kubhalwe igama likaAnne Parrish. Yayiyincwadi yakhe.
Indoda yaseSoweto yayide yanayo imali eyaneleyo yokutheng' imoto entsha. Yayithengisa imoto yayo endala yathenga entsha. Emva kweeveki ezimbalwa yehlelwa yingozi - kanti yimoto yayo endala etshayisene nemoto entsha
Kukho abantu abathi uThixo, izinyanya, okanye nabani na owenza izinto zizenzekele uyathanda ukuhlekisa.

Y
Akukho mfuneko yokuba uthenge iimpahla rhoqo xa kutshintsha ixesha lonyaka. Nantsi indlela ongatshintsha ngayo iimpahla zakho zasehlotyeni kube zezona zikuncedayo ebusika
yobusika
eyilokhwe
iba nempahla
Ihempe eyilokhwe iyabafanela abantu abaninzi. Uyaphola ngayo ehlotyeni - ukanti ebusika ungayijika ibeyidyasi.
Yinxibe netophu enemikhono emide uze wolule imikhono ukuze ufudumale.
Ilokhwe yakho eyihempe ungayinxiba nejini ekubambayo, ibhanti nezihlangu ezichophileyo.
ICEBISO: Xa ikubamba ilokhwe eyihempe, kubhetele unxibe ithayithi ngaphantsi kwayo ukuze ubukeke unesiqwana.
Ukunxiba
Ihempe
IZISOMBULULO ZEFASHONI
Ilokhwana emnyama ungayinxiba naphi na nangaliphi na ixesha lonyaka. Ungayinxiba ilokhwana yakho yasehlotyeni nasebusika ngokuyinxiba neekawusi ezibomvu ezinemibala-bala.
Ungayinxiba nento efudumeleyo enithiweyo emnyama ngaphantsi kwelokhwe. Ukuze ufudumale ngakumbi, oko kunithiweyo kungaba nemikhono emide.
Ungazithi khunkqu nangebhanti elibomvu ukuze siphelele isinxibo sakho.
ICEBISO: Kuyifashoni ukunxiba izinto ezimnyama ukusuka phantsi uye entloko. Ungakwenza oko ngokunxiba iikawusi ezimnyama okanye ithayithi endaweni yeekawusi ezibomvu.
Ezinezithende ezikhulu ungazinxiba nasebusika. Ngokunxiba ithayithi efudumeleyo okanye iikawusi ezikhanyayo ungaba nomtsalane ngoxa abanye benxibe iibhutsi.
ICEBISO: Ukuthintela unyawo lungatyibiliki xa uhamba ufake iphentihowuzi, thenga iisoli zangaphakathi oza kuzifaka ezihlangwini zakho.

UBONGI wosulelwa yiHIV eneminyak' eli-15 kwisithuba seminyak' emine edlulileyo. "Ndandisazi ngeHIV, kodwa ndandisoyika ukuxelela umfana endandincuma naye ukuba makafake ikhondom. Ndandifuna ukuthi 'masisebenzise ikhondom' kodwa engaphumi loo mazwi emlonyeni. Kwakuba ngathi uza kundala xa ndikhe ndatsho," utsho.
UBongi wafumana ukuba uneHIV emva kokugula komntwana wakhe. Benziwa uvavanyo lweHIV, baza bobabini bafunyanwa benayo.
"Nangona sele bebaninzi abantu abaziyo ngeHIV/AIDS, okukhathazayo kukuba ulutsha luyakuthanda ukuzibeka engozini. Oko ke kwandisa inani lolutsha olusulelwa yile ntsholongwane," utsho umxelengi weAIDS.
"Inkoliso yolutsha oluneHIV-alwazi ukuba lunayo, ukanti lumbalwa nolutsha oluba nendibano yesondo oluyaziyo imeko yeHIV yabantu olulala nabo."
Yintoni eyenza ulutsha lube sesichengeni kangaka"
Zininzi gqitha izizathu zoko. Ulutsha oluninzi luba neendibano zesondo, lunjalonje olunye luqala ukuba nazo lusafikisa. Olungena ebudaleni, ingakumbi amantombazana akakwazi ukuthi 'hayi' kwisondo, okanye akakwazi ukuthi amadoda makafake ikhondom kuba amaxesha amaninzi sukuba exhatshazwa, enyanzelwa okanye elala nabantu abaza kuwanika imali okanye eziny' izipho.
Ezinye izinto ezibeka ulutsha esichengeni kukuba aluzihoyi izilumkiso, lulukuhlwa ziintanga zalo yaye nalo lulangazelel' ukuling' izinto ezintsha. Enye into ulutsha luyalibala ukusebenzisa iikhondom rhoqo kwindibano yesondo.
Ukuzigcina ukhuselekile
Intsholongwane yeHIV ayisasazeki lula. Ikosulela kuba igazi okanye iincindi zesondo zomntu onayo zingene emzimbeni wakho.
Njengoko inkoliso yolutsha oluneHIV luyifumana kwiindibano zesondo ezingakhuselekanga, elona cebo lokuzikhusela kukuzilumla kwisondo okanye ukuthembeka kumntu othandana naye xa kungekho osele enayo kuni.
Xa iindibano zesondo zikubeka esichengeni sokosulelwa zizifo zesondo, ungasinciphisa eso sichenge ngokusebenzisa iikhondom zamadoda nezabasetyhini. Ukuba namaxesha okungazisebenzisi kukubeka engozini, nkqu ukungayisebenzisi kanye.
Kubalulekile ukwazi ukuba ukungabi nayo iHIV ngoku akuthethi kuthi ayisokuze ikosulele, ngoko ukuzikhusela kubalulekile.
Xa ucinga ukuba kungenzeka ukuba usulelwe yiHIV emva kokudlwengulwa okanye kugqabhuke ikhondom, kufuneka uye kuvavanywa ukuba ayikosulelanga na uze ufumane neengcebiso ngokusebenzisa iipilisi ezibulala iHIV ukuze unciphise isichenge sokosuleleka.
Ungayisasazi iHIV
Kuthinteleka lula ukusasazeka kweHIV. Xa unayo kubalulekile ukwazi ukuba ungabosulela lula abanye abantu ngokuba neendibano zesondo ezingakhuselekanga. Ubosulela abanye nokuba wena uziva uphilile qete, okanye usebenzisa amayeza okuthibaza iHIV.
Ukusebenzisa iikhondom kuthintela ukosulela abanye abantu ngeHIV kwaye kuyakukhusela nawe ekosulelweni kwakhona yiHIV okanye eziny' izifo ezosulela ngesondo.
Usemtsha kwaye uneHIV
Ukufumanisa ukuba uneHIV kungakothusa ungazi nokuba ufanele uthini. Kuba yingxaki nangakumbi xa usemtsha kuba uthi ujongene neengxaki zokungena ebudaleni ube ukwanengxaki yokuba nesifo esinganyangekiyo, nenkxalabo yokwaziwa imeko yakho ziintanga zakho ibe ikutya.
Kunzima ukukhathalela ulutsha oluneHIV kuba kunzima kulo ukulandela imiqathango enzima yonyango.
Oonompilo bathi inkoliso yolutsha ithi yakufumana ukuba ineHIV kuyithabathe iinyanga ukwamkela loo nto phambi kokuba iqalise unyango.
Ukuzigcina uphilile
Xa uneHIV ezona zinto zibalulekileyo kukufumana unyango nenkxaso.
Funda kangangoko unako ngesi sifo. Uya kufumana iinkcukacha ezizizo kugqirha, umcebisi wakho okanye kwiziko loluntu elifundisa ngeAIDS.
Luyafumaneka ngoku unyango lokuthothisa iHIV nezifo ezihambisana neHIV/AIDS, ngoko ugqirha okanye unompilo uya kukuchazela awona akufaneleyo.
Xa uneHIV kufuneka uzikhathalele ukuze uphile ixesh' elide ingekakugulisi iAIDS.
n Yitya ukutya okunazo zonke izakha-mzimba. Inyama, intlanzi, amaqanda, amandongomane, ipapa, iitapile, irayisi, isonka, imifuno neziqhamo.
n Zilumkele iimvakalelo zakho. Xa usoyika okanye unoxinzelelo lwengqondo, thetha nomnye umntu. Ungazivaleli ngaphakathi ezo mvakalelo ubenoxinzelelo. Uxinzelelo lwengqondo luza kukugulisa. Phumla yaye ulale ngokwaneleyo.
n Khusel' amajoni omzimba wakho. Ungabuseli utywala, ungatshayi, ungadibani nabantu abanomkhuhlane neziny' izifo ezosulelayo, eziquka nezosulelwa ngeendibano zesondo.
n Fumana iingcebiso zonyango namayeza. Landel' imiyalelo kagqirha. Wagcine amadinga akho nogqirha yaye uwasebenzise ngendlela amayeza. Ukusebenzis' amanye, amanye ungawasebenzisi kuya kuyenza ikhule intsholongwane yeHIV. Nyanga nasiphi na isigulo esikungenayo ngokukhawuleza.
n Yiba neendibano zesondo ezikhuselekileyo. Ungazibeki esichengeni sokusulelwa zeziny' izifo okanye ukosulelwa yenye iHIV ngabantu olala nabo. Uya kukhawuleza ugule xa
ungazikhathalelanga.[x]

Malunga nekhefu olithatha xa uyobeleka
INGXAKI: Sele kuyiminyaka emi-6 ndisebenzela inkampani eyenza iziselo zeziqhamo. Kodwa abandivumeli ndithathe ikhefu lokuyobeleka - bathi mandithathe ikhefu elingahlawulelwayo. Kwaye ndixelelwe nokuba kunokwenzeka ndibuye uphelile umsebenzi! Athini amalungelo am"
USCORPION UYACEBISA:
Amalungelo akho emsebenzini alawulwa yiBasic Conditions Of Employment Act (BCEA). Ngokwalo mthetho uneenyanga ezi-4 zekhefu lokuyobeleka. Kwezi nyanga uyahlawulwa, kodwa aziphazamisani neentsuku zakho zekhefu lonyaka.
Ukuba umqeshi wakho uyazicutha iintsuku zakho zekhefu lonyaka ngenxa yekhefu lokuyobeleka, oko kuchasene neBCEA. Ukuya kukhalaza eCCMA kungenza sikhawuleze silungiswe esi senzo singekho mthethweni.
Ngaphezulu umqeshi wakho akakwazi ukusitshintsha isivumelwano esibhaliweyo sengqesho yakho ngaphandle kwemvume yakho.
Ikhefu lokuyobeleka liqala ubuncinane iveki ezine phambi kosuku oluqikelelweyo lokubeleka. Kodwa ke, ukuba ugqirha okanye umbelekisi ovunyiweyo babhale phantsi ukuba ikhefu malibe lide kunesiqhelo, umqeshi wakho umelwe kukuthobela loo myalelo.
Ukwabalulekile ke nomqathango othi awuvumelekanga ubuyele emsebenzini kude kube ziveki ezi-6 emva kokuba ubelekile.
Kwimeko ezinzima apho ukubeleka kuye kwanengxaki mhlwawumbi usana lwazalwa lungaphilanga, ugqirha angazandisa iiveki zekhefu.
Imeko yakho emalini ungayenza lula ngokufuna imali kwiUnemployment Insurance (UIF), kodwa isicelo sakho sifake kwinyanga ezimbini phambi kokuthatha ikhefu.
Ukuba isicelo sakho sifike kade, yenza isingxengxezo uqhubeke nesicelo sakho sentlawulo. Okona kubalulekileyo kukwazi ukuba awunakugxothwa ngenxa yokukhulelwa.
Ukuba umqeshi wakho ukugxothele esi sizathu waphula umthetho kwaye uCCMA uzakumbonela icebo.
Nawe unako ukudibanisa ikhefu lakho lonyaka nelokubeleka, kwaye uza kuhlawulwa.
Kodwa ke yazi ukuba uthatha ikhefu ngolu hlobo xa inkampani ivalela unyaka ngoDesemba, ungangayifumani intlawulo kungenjalo iphungulwe. [x]

UKUTYELA UKUPHILA
UCriselda Kananda uyasinceda ukuze sazi ngokuthe vetshe ngeHIV/AIDS ukwasicebisa neendlela zokuphila nayo!
KUTHIWA ukuthintela kokona kubhetele kunokunyanga. Ukutya okunazo zonke izakha-mzimba kuyanceda ekulweni nezifo ezingahlasel' umzimba wakho xa uneHIV.
Kule nyanga siza kuthetha ngeendlela ukutya okunganceda ngayo ukunciphisa inani labantu abaswelekayo eluntwini lwakowethu, ukanti kwinyang' ezayo siza kuthetha ngokuba zinceda njani ii-ARV ekulweni nolwamvila lweHIV.
Njengoko nemoto ingahambi xa ingenapetroli, nemizimba yethu ayinako ukulwa nezifo xa singatyi ukutya okufanelekileyo. Imizimba yethu ifun' izondlo ezithile ezinjengeeprotini, iikhabhohayidrethi, iivithamini nezinye ukuze ibesempilweni.
Zonke ke ezi zakha-mzimba sizifumana ekutyeni kwaye kubalulekile ukuba imizimba yethu izifumane ngokwaneleyo ukuze amajoni omzimba omelele akwazi ukulwa nokusulelwa komzimba zizifo.
Ukutya okungenamafutha kakhulu akugcini imizimba yethu isebenza kuphela, kuko nokwenza sibeneziqu ezisempilweni, ingakumbi xa unentsholongwane ye-HIV.
Ukutya okungenazo zonke izakha-mzimba okunamafutha neswekile kakhulu nokungenayo imifuno neziqhamo akuwancedi amajoni omzimba.
Ukutya okunazo zonk' izakha-mzimba kufanele kubenezi zinto: amafutha alingeneyo; iikhabhohayidrethi ezininzi ezifumaneka kwizonka, irayisi neetapile; imifuno neziqhamo ezitsha; nokutya okuneeprotini njengenyam' ebomvu, inyama yenkuku, intlanzi, amaqanda, iimveliso zobisi namandongomane.
Kubalulekile nokuyazi indlela yokukupheka ukutya kuba izondlo zako zingaphela xa ukupheka okanye ukuqhotsa ngokugqithisileyo.
Umzekelo, imifuno ungayipheki de itshintshe ibala layo; kufuneka uyitye isekrum-krum, isenazo izakha-mzimba.
Kufuneka utye kathathu ngemini, usele kakhulu amanzi acocekileyo nencindi yeziqhamo entsha.
Kungenzeka kufuneke usele nezinto eziya kongeza iivithamini neeminerali egazini lakho. Zisenokuba zinoVitamin C no-E, ii-omega 3 fatty-acids, oovitamin B nezinye izibulali zintsholongwane. Ezi zakha-mzimba azifanelanga zikuyekise amayeza owanikwa ngugqirha (njengee-ARV) kwaye zisebenzise ngemvume kagqirha wakho.
Xa uneHIV kwaye uzama ukulwa nesifo esithile okanye unesifo esingapheliyo, kufuneka utshintshe ukutya okutyayo ngokweemfuno zakho.
Umzekelo xa unotyatyazo kunokufuneka uziyeke iimveliso zobisi kuba zingakwenza uhambise kakhulu. Kubalulekile ukubuz' ugqirha wakho ukuba kukuphi ukutya ongakutya endaweni yazo okanye ukuba ungasebenzisa izongezi
zezakha-mzimba eziyintoni.
Ndikholwa kukuba ukutya iziqhamo nemifuno emitsha liqalo elihle. Usenokuthi ndikwenza into elula ukulawula iHIV neziny' izifo, kodwa kuyanceda ukwazi iziseko!
Kaloku iimveliso zendalo (njengeziqhamo nemifuno emitsha) zenza amajoni emizimba yethu asebenze ngokupheleleyo.
Mandiqwele ngokucaphula enye intetho ethi: "Impilo yenye
yeentsikelelo ezibalulekileyo umntu anazo." Masizigcine ke sisempilweni ngokutyel' impilo, singaphileli
ukutya. [x]

UCriselda Kananda ungumama, umkhuthazi wempilo entle nomsasazi wenkqubo yeengxoxo kwiMetro FM okuthandayo ukunik' ithemba abantu abaphila ne-HIV ngokubabalisela elakhe ibali.
KwiCD yakhe ethi Positive Talk uthetha ngokubaluleka kokuzazi imeko yakho, uchaza namagama athile ezempilo asetyenziswayo kwiHIV/AIDS, ukanti ukwacebisa nangonyango ongakhetha kulo. Ikwanengoma ethi Beautiful Woman ebhiyozela ubuhle bakho obungaphakathi.
Le CD ifumaneka kwiivenkile zakwaReliable elizweni jikelele. Ngeziny' iinkcukacha qhagamshelana noCriselda ku- info@positivetalk.co.za; fax: 086-617-5480; okanye uye ku: positivetalkservices.co.za.
IMITHETHO YOKHUSELEKO KOKUTYA
Kubalulekile ukucoceka kokutya nokuqinisekisa ukuba akunazintsholongwane. Izifo ezifumaneka ekutyeni ungaziphepha ngokwenza oku:
Hlamba iziqhamo nemifuno ngamanzi acocekileyo ngaphambi kokuba uzitye.
Qinisekisa ukuba izandla zakho zicocekile ngaphambi kokuphath' ukutya.
Ungayityi inyama ekrwada okanye engavuthwanga, neesaladi ezinamaqanda angavuthwanga.
Jonga umhla wokuphelelwa lixesha kokutya ngaphambi kokuba ukutye.
Qinisekisa ukuba ukutya kugcinwe ngendlela yaye kogqunyiwe ukuze kungangenwa ziintsholongwane.

WAZI AMALUNGELO AKHO
Kule nyanga: sithetha ngokwaneliseka kumlawuli weembambano nokuthi kungani kubalulekile ukuba ne-inshorensi yemoto
ULAMLO LWEMBAMBANO
Ndatheng' imoto emntwini emva kokuqinisekisa ukuba yeyakhe nokuba unalo na ilungelo lokuyithengisa.
Igqwetha lakhe labhala isivumelwano sokuba ndiyihlawule ngezavenge. Ndasisayina, ndahlawula idiphozithi, ndayithatha imoto yayeyam.
Yonk' into ihambe kakuhle, ndizihlawula nezavenge zenyanga - kodwa kuthe ethubeni ndafumana incwadi evela kwigqwetha elithile elithi umxumi walo wayithenga naye loo moto kumntu endayithenga kuye.
Lathi oko kuthetha ukuba imoto ndayithenga kumntu ongenalungelo lakuyithengisa, ngoko mandizise kulo.
Ndaya kuyiqonda loo nto ngoko nangoko kumthengisi wemoto. Wathi uza kuyilungisa loo nto, kodwa akayilungisanga.
Andiyisanga imoto egqwetheni njengokuba lalisitsho kwaye akafuni ukubuyis' imali yam nomntu endayithenga kuye.
Igqwetha endicele uncedo kulo lithe kukho umhlathi othi kuya kusetyenziswa umlamli kwisivumelwano sethu sokuthengiselana imoto. Likwathe andinako ukumangalela ukubuyiselwa imali yam de le mbambano isonjululwe ngumlamli.
Andazi ukuba kutheni le mbambano kufuneka isiwe kumlamli kwaye andiyazi ukuba ithini inkqubo yaloo nto.
ICEBISO LESCORPION
Umlamli ozimeleyo yinkqubo yomthetho yokusonjululwa kwembambano kungayiwa enkundleni yomthetho.
Umlamli uba ngumgwebi kuloo mbambano. Umamela ubungqina, akhuphe isigwebo. Isigqibo sakhe singenziwa "Umyalelo weNkundla".
Oko kunika umntu ogwetyelwe ngumlamli ilungelo lokukhupha incwadi esemthethweni yokuba abuyiselwe imali yakhe, okanye elokuba yeyakhe into ayithengileyo.
Abantu abaninzi bacinga ukuba xa imbambano isingethwe ngumlamli awunako ukuyisa enkundleni.
Kodwa ulumke. Xa ufun' ukuqhubela phambili umangalele umthengisi wemoto, oko kungayenza intsokothe le mbambano.
Xa ummangalelwa unokucela lirhoxiswe ityala de ligwetywe ngumlamli.
Xa esenza eso sicelo ke nguwe ofanele ubonise inkundla ukuba kungani ungafuni lo mba uchotshelwe ngumlamli.
Oko kuza kubanzima nokuba iimeko zithini na. Inkundla iya kunyanzelisa ukuba ichotshelwe ngumlamli kuba oko kuya kuyongela ixesha.
Kufuneka ubenegqwetha kulo mcimbi, ngoko cela uncedo kwiLegal Aid Board xa ungenamali. [x]

Imoto yam ndayithenga nge-R75 000 ndaza ndayithathela i-inshorensi yelo xabiso. Ndehlelwa yingozi emva kweenyanga ezintandathu. Ixabiso lokuyilungisa ibe yi-R30 000 yaza yathi inkampani ye-inshorensi iza kuhlawula i-75%, mna ke kufuneka ndihlawule i-25% kunye ne-"excess".
Ndingathini ukuhlawulela i-inshorensi kuze kufuneke ndihlawule eny' imali kunye ne-"excess" xa yonakele imoto" Ndiyaqhathwa.
ICEBISO LESCORPION
Uye untsokotha umcimbi we-inshorensi yeemoto kule minyaka idlulileyo kwaye nenkqatho ikhona. Kodwa cinga ngeendleko obuza kuzithwala ukuba ubungena-inshorensi - ubuza kuhlawula i-R30 000!
Inyaniso kukuba kukungabi nankathalo ukungabi ne-inshorensi yemoto kwaye kungatyabula kabuhlungu ngokwasezimalinni.
YINTONI I- EXCESS
I-"Excess" yimali ethe kratya oyihlawulayo xa imoto yakho ibenengozi iza kulungiswa ngeendleko ze-inshorensi.
Uninzi lweenkampani zidla ngokuthi ziza kuzama ukukubuyisela loo mali.
Kodwa xa uyifundisisa ipholisi yakho, akukho nto ithi zifanele zikwenze oko.
Oko ke kuthetha ukuba awunako ukuyinyanzela ikubuyisele loo mali!
Ezinye zithi ziza kuzama kodwa oko kungenzeki ngethemba lokuba uza kuyilibala.

UKUKHULELWA KWAKHO
Xa ukhulelwe baninzi abantu abazenza oogqirha nabongikazi babumini bakuxelele le naleya kuba befuna nje ukuzenza abantu abanolwazi. Sicele iingcali zokwenene ukuba zikuchazele iinyaniso ngobuvuvu ongabuxelelwa ngabahlobo
nezalamane

UKoluka IINWELE KUTSALA USANA NOKUSEBENZISA AMACHIZA EENWELE KUNGABA YINGOZI ELUSANENI.
Asiyonyaniso ukuba ukoluka iinwele kuchaphazela usana olukhulelweyo. Ingcali yogqirha wezifo zamabhinqa wasePietermaritzburg, uGqr.Thami Buthelezi uyasiqinisekisa ukuba "ukoluk' iinwele akuluchaphazeli usana."
Akunangxaki nokusebenzisa amachiza eenwele. Ngokutsho kweWebsite ethi: otispregnancy.org, intwana yedayi yeenwele iyafunxwa lulusu ize iphume nomchamo. Kodwa akuyongozi elusaneni olukhulelweyo.
Uthi nangona kuyingozi ebhinqeni elikhulelweyo ukusebenzisa izinto eziyingozi okanye nantoni na angaqinisekanga ngayo, ukuzenza mhle kulungile ngeli xesha linzima nelikuphathisa ngestresi.

AWUNAKUBELEKA NGOKWENDALO XA UBUKHE WABELEKA NGOTYANDO
Ngokutsho kukaGqr. Buthelezi oku akuyonyaniso kwaphela. Amabhinqa amaninzi abeleka ngotyando ngezizathu ezithile kwaye kuyenzeka xa zisekho ezo zizathu kwixesha elizayo. Kodwa wongeze ngelithi kufuneka ibhinqa libeleke ngokwendalo esibhedlele. UGqr. Meshack Mbokota wasePitoli uthi ibhinqa alinakubeleka ngokwendalo xa likhe labeleka ngotyando kabini kuba isiva esisesibelekweni sivuleka lingekabeleki ibhinqa.
KUFUNEKA UZITYE IZINTO OZITHANDISWAYO YAYE UTYE KAKHULU UKUZE UBENOSANA OLUKHULU NOLUPHILILEYO
Ngokutsho kweengcali akuyonyaniso leyo. UGqr. Buthelezi uthi okona kubalulekileyo kukuba nosana oluphilileyo kunokuba nosana olukhulu.
"Eneneni usana olukhulu lubonisa ukuba bekuneengxaki ukukhulelwa kwakho, njengesifo seswekile esingabonwanga okanye esinganyangwanga, kwaye kungabangela iingxaki xa ibhinqa libeleka," utsho.
Ibhinqa elikhulelweyo kufuneka litye ukutya okunazo zonke izakha-mzimba, kwaye ukutya into kakhulu okanye kancinane akulunganga nakuwuphi na umntu, wongeze ngelo uGqr. Mbokota.
Ukwathe xa ukhulelwe lindela ukutyeba nge-12,5kg.
Maxa wambi ukuthanda izinto ezithile xa ukhulelwe yindlel' umzimba okuxelela ngayo ukuba unento ongayifumani ngokwaneleyo.

KUYINGOZI UKUNXIBA IIMPAHLA EZIKUBAMBAYO KUBA ZICINEZELA USANA
Akuyonyaniso leyo. Iimpahla ezikubambayo zenza ibhinqa lingakhululeki qha, utsho uGqr. Mbokota. UGqr. Buthelezi uthi usapho nabahlobo abakhathazwa koku yindlela abaxelela ngayo amabhinqa akhulelweyo ukuba anxibe kakuhle engawa-phoxi. [x]

Indod' efuye iinyoka
IINYOKA ezimbini ezineminyak' emibini ubudala zigcinwa kwindawo yentselo, kodwa inkoliso yabantu abasela kule ndawo abafuni nokuzibona oku. Ziphiwa ukutya emva kweentsuku ezili-10. Ungacinga ukuba bezifanele ukuba zinomsindo ngenxa yaloo nto, kodwa ezi nyoka zibizwa ngoHoudini noCecilia zibonakala zonwabile.
Zombini zinobunzima obuyi-45kg ukanti ubude bazo buziimitha ezintathu.
Zakukhula zibendala, oko ke kukuthi ngo-2030, ziya kuba zinobunzima obuyi-100kg inye, ukanti ngelo xesha ziya kuba zinobude obuziimitha ezintlanu!
"Iinyoka zizidalwa ezizolileyo. Ndineminyaka eli-10 ndifuye iinyoka yaye zikundiluma kabini qha. Nalapho zazindiluma kuba kundim owenze impazamo yokungahoyi izilumkiso zazo," utshilo uCraig Exall ogcina iinyoka zakhe kwivenkile yakhe yokutya nentselo eThekwini.
"Xa inyoka icaphuka umqala wayo ubangathi unguS nezihlunu zayo ziyaqina. Xa kunjalo kufuneka uziyeke ungaziphazamisi usuku olunye okanye ezimbini."
UCraig unamaxesha okuthabatha iinyoka zakhe ahamba-hambe nazo kwiziko leevenkile laseYellowwood Park nalapho kukho ivenkile yakhe yokutya nentselo. Ngaba uhamba njani bethu nenyoka njengokuba ingenamilenze nje"
"Uyibopha ngentambo kaloku ukuze ukwazi ukuhamba nayo," utshilo.
Xa ehamba nazo ezi nyoka azinakuleqa iimoto ezigqithayo, kodwa ngokuqinisekileyo ziyabothusa abantu abazibonayo.
UPrincess Sikotoyi usebenza kule venkile yentselo, kodwa nangona engenangxaki nokuphangela apho kukho iinyoka, akafuni ukusondela kakhulu kuzo.
"Ekuqaleni ndandizoyika kakhulu, kodwa noko ngoku sendiziqhelile. Kodwa ke andiziphathi kuba andikwazi ukuzibona xa zinomsindo," utshilo.
UCraig unamaxesha okuzikhulula iinyoka zakhe zikhe zihamba-hambe kwivenkile yakhe yentselo. "Ufika zihamba ebharini nasezishelfini. Maxa wambi ufika zikrobe ngeefestile, kodwa amaxesha amaninzi ziyazilalela nje. Nabani na ongazoyikiyo angaziphatha kwaye oko akuzicaphukisi," itshilo intombi ancuma nayo, uRagan Porrill.
Kunzima ukutsho ukuba ezi nyoka ziyabatsala na abathegi okanye ziyabagxotha, kodwa uCraig uthe zinayo indima eziyidlalayo ekutsaleni abathengi.
"Abany' abantu beza kuba befun' ukuzibona, kodwa abasondeli kuzo kuba bezoyika. Emva kokuza amaxesha ambalwa, ubeva bebuza ukuba bangaziphatha na."
Ixesha lokuzipha ukutya iinyoka kuyabonisa ukuba azizolanga tu kwaphela. "UCecilia ngoyena ubonisa ukuba sisirhalarhume," utsho uCraig.
"Ndakufaka umvundla kwibhokisana ahlala kuyo uwutsibela ngoko nangoko awujijele kathathu aze awuginye."
Kaloku inyoka iyayiminxisela into eza kuyitya ukuze igazi lime emzimbeni wayo ize ife ngemizuzwana nje. Emva koko iyawuginya iqale ngentloko.
Abantu abaninzi bacinga ukuba inyoka enkulu kangaka ifanele itye nabantu, kodwa akunjalo. Nkqu nomntwana osemncinane angaba mkhulu kakhulu ukuba angaginywa yinyoka engako.
Phofu ke akuthethi kuthi ayinako ukulinga ukumginya.
Xa inyoka iqala ukuzibhijela emntwini oyiphetheyo, kufuneka kubekho umntu oyiswabulayo kwaye ayiqale emsileni. "Xa ndizikhuphile iinyoka ndiyazigada, kodwa andikhe ndibe nengxaki nazo," utsho uCraig.
UCraig wayekade eneenyoka ezili-18 kodwa ngoku sele enezisibhozo kuphela. Kwakhe unenye inyoka enobunzima obuyi-100kg kwaye inzima kakhulu ukuba angeza nayo kwivenkile yakhe yentselo. "Ifuna abantu abathathu ukuze niyiphakamise," utsho.
Nangona uHoudini noCecilia bechitha ixesha elininzi bevalelwe kwibhokisana encinane bayevana, abalwi bodwa.
Ngaphezulu ngoku uCecilia ubonisa iimpawu zokukhulelwa. Iminwe ngathi yalatha kuHoudini ngokuba nguye omithise uCecilia. [x]

EKHOHLO: Nangona abantu bezoyika iinyoka, baba namaxesha okufuna ukuziphatha.

AMACEBISO
SIKHE sive ngomdlali ekuthiwa unonyawo "akhaba kakuhle" ngalo kuze olunye lube "lolokuhamba" kuba akakwazi ukukhaba ngalo. Abadlali abakwazi ukudlal' ibhola ngeenyawo zombini kungabenza bazibone benxiba ijezi yeBafana Bafana ngeny' imini.
Olu qeqesho lwebhola olulandelayo lwenzelwe amakhwenkwe aphakathi kweminyak' emithandathu neli-10, kwaye elo lixesha elihle lokumfundisa ukukhaba ngeenyawo zombini ngokutsho komqeqeshi wethu, uFana Tshabangu.
Uqeqesho ngalunye maluthabathe malunga nemizuzu eli-10 ukuya kweli-15.
IZISEKO
1 ENGCENI
Unyana wakho makahlale engceni agobis' amadolo, olul' iingalo aphathe ibhola njengasefotweni yethu.
2 MAKAPHAKAMISE UNYAWO
Qinisekisa ukuba usahleli phantsi, uze uthi makaphakamise unyawo lwasekhohlo abengathi uyakhaba luze lufike kancinci ebholeni. Oku komeleza izihlunu, ngoko makangayikhabi ibhola.
3 KUPHINDE KANINZI OKU NGESANTYA
Makawuphinde lo mthambo ngonyawo lwasekunene. Ngokuya ewuqhela makawenze akhawulezise, aphakamise unyawo lwasekhohlo nolwasekunene ngokukhawuleza. Unyawo angakwazi ukukhaba ngalo luza kukhawuleza ludinwe.
4 GXININISA KUNYAWO ANGAKHABI NGALO
Xa kulunyawo lwasekunene angakwazi ukukhaba ngalo, menzise umthambo kakhulu ngalo. Oko kuluqhelisa ukukhaba
nalo.[x]
Umbhali: Force Khashane
Umfoti: Peter Whitfield
Ukukhaba ngeenyawo
ZOMBINI
Kule nyanga umqeqeshi webhola owayedlalel' iPirates neChiefs - uFana "Skhehla" Tshabangu ubonis' ootata indlela yokufundis' oonyana babo ukukhaba ngeenyawo zombini
U-Oscar Ndzunga nonyana wakhe oneminyaka eli-10, uNkanyezi.
Izinto ezimbini ezibalulekileyo:
Unyawo angakhabi ngalo malwenziswe kakhulu imithambo, kodwa maluqeqeshwe nakhaba ngalo!
Amakhwenkwe amancinane anokukruquka ngulo mthambo, ngoko kubhetele niwenze xa nizifudumeza.
UQEQESHO LWEBHOLA

WAZI AMALUNGELO AKHO
Kule nyanga: sithetha ngokwaneliseka kumlawuli weembambano nokuthi kungani kubalulekile ukuba ne-inshorensi yemoto
ULAMLO LWEMBAMBANO
Ndatheng' imoto emntwini emva kokuqinisekisa ukuba yeyakhe nokuba unalo na ilungelo lokuyithengisa.
Igqwetha lakhe labhala isivumelwano sokuba ndiyihlawule ngezavenge. Ndasisayina, ndahlawula idiphozithi, ndayithatha imoto yayeyam.
Yonk' into ihambe kakuhle, ndizihlawula nezavenge zenyanga - kodwa kuthe ethubeni ndafumana incwadi evela kwigqwetha elithile elithi umxumi walo wayithenga naye loo moto kumntu endayithenga kuye.
Lathi oko kuthetha ukuba imoto ndayithenga kumntu ongenalungelo lakuyithengisa, ngoko mandizise kulo.
Ndaya kuyiqonda loo nto ngoko nangoko kumthengisi wemoto. Wathi uza kuyilungisa loo nto, kodwa akayilungisanga.
Andiyisanga imoto egqwetheni njengokuba lalisitsho kwaye akafuni ukubuyis' imali yam nomntu endayithenga kuye.
Igqwetha endicele uncedo kulo lithe kukho umhlathi othi kuya kusetyenziswa umlamli kwisivumelwano sethu sokuthengiselana imoto. Likwathe andinako ukumangalela ukubuyiselwa imali yam de le mbambano isonjululwe ngumlamli.
Andazi ukuba kutheni le mbambano kufuneka isiwe kumlamli kwaye andiyazi ukuba ithini inkqubo yaloo nto.
ICEBISO LESCORPION
Umlamli ozimeleyo yinkqubo yomthetho yokusonjululwa kwembambano kungayiwa enkundleni yomthetho.
Umlamli uba ngumgwebi kuloo mbambano. Umamela ubungqina, akhuphe isigwebo. Isigqibo sakhe singenziwa "Umyalelo weNkundla".
Oko kunika umntu ogwetyelwe ngumlamli ilungelo lokukhupha incwadi esemthethweni yokuba abuyiselwe imali yakhe, okanye elokuba yeyakhe into ayithengileyo.
Abantu abaninzi bacinga ukuba xa imbambano isingethwe ngumlamli awunako ukuyisa enkundleni.
Kodwa ulumke. Xa ufun' ukuqhubela phambili umangalele umthengisi wemoto, oko kungayenza intsokothe le mbambano.
Xa ummangalelwa unokucela lirhoxiswe ityala de ligwetywe ngumlamli.
Xa esenza eso sicelo ke nguwe ofanele ubonise inkundla ukuba kungani ungafuni lo mba uchotshelwe ngumlamli.
Oko kuza kubanzima nokuba iimeko zithini na. Inkundla iya kunyanzelisa ukuba ichotshelwe ngumlamli kuba oko kuya kuyongela ixesha.
Kufuneka ubenegqwetha kulo mcimbi, ngoko cela uncedo kwiLegal Aid Board xa ungenamali. [x]
AMANDL' OMTHETHO
KUBI KODWA KUYINYANISO
Imoto yam ndayithenga nge-R75 000 ndaza ndayithathela i-inshorensi yelo xabiso. Ndehlelwa yingozi emva kweenyanga ezintandathu. Ixabiso lokuyilungisa ibe yi-R30 000 yaza yathi inkampani ye-inshorensi iza kuhlawula i-75%, mna ke kufuneka ndihlawule i-25% kunye ne-"excess".
Ndingathini ukuhlawulela i-inshorensi kuze kufuneke ndihlawule eny' imali kunye ne-"excess" xa yonakele imoto" Ndiyaqhathwa.
ICEBISO LESCORPION
Uye untsokotha umcimbi we-inshorensi yeemoto kule minyaka idlulileyo kwaye nenkqatho ikhona. Kodwa cinga ngeendleko obuza kuzithwala ukuba ubungena-inshorensi - ubuza kuhlawula i-R30 000!
Inyaniso kukuba kukungabi nankathalo ukungabi ne-inshorensi yemoto kwaye kungatyabula kabuhlungu ngokwasezimalinni.
YINTONI I- EXCESS
I-"Excess" yimali ethe kratya oyihlawulayo xa imoto yakho ibenengozi iza kulungiswa ngeendleko ze-inshorensi.
Uninzi lweenkampani zidla ngokuthi ziza kuzama ukukubuyisela loo mali.
Kodwa xa uyifundisisa ipholisi yakho, akukho nto ithi zifanele zikwenze oko.
Oko ke kuthetha ukuba awunako ukuyinyanzela ikubuyisele loo mali!
Ezinye zithi ziza kuzama kodwa oko kungenzeki ngethemba lokuba uza kuyilibala.
ABAFOTIWEYO BAYALINGANISA
Thumela ingxaki yakho yomthetho kule dilesi: BONA Legal Advice, Box 32083, Mobeni, 4060 - uya kufumana ithuba lokuxoxa negqwetha imizuzu engama- 30 ngaphandle kokuhlawula, kwi-ofisi zalo naphi na kweli okanye emnxebeni.
Sizamile ukuqinisekisa ukuba ufumana iingcebiso ezizizo. Kodwa ityala netyala lifuna ukuphandisiswa kwaye abeScorpion Legal Protection (Pty) Ltd, igqiza labacebisi neBONA nabashicileli bayo abanakubekwa tyala ngelahleko engafunyanwa ngumntu osebenzise iingcebiso zalo mhlathi.

iingxaki zomthetho
INGXAKI: Umntu osiphetheyo kwifektri endiphangela kuyo uyacaphuka xa sisiya ngasese ngexesha lomsebenzi. Ndakhulelwa ndaza ndayinto ebeth' ibuyelela ngasese, wandilumkisa ngelithi uza kundigxotha xa ndingayi ngasese phambi okanye emva kwexesha lomsebenzi okanye ngelantshi.
Ndazama ukulandel' umthetho wakhe kodwa kwabanzima.
Ndabizelwa etyaleni lokolulekwa kodwa ndamangaliswa kukufumanisa ukuba lichotshelwe ngulo mntu usiphetheyo. Wandigxotha kodwa ndicinga ukuba kwakungafanelekanga ukuba ityala lam lichotshelwe nguye. Andizange ndinikwe thuba lakuchaza kwaye azange abhale kwanto phantsi"
ICEBISO LABAKWASCORPION:
NgokweLabour Relations Act abasebenzi abavumelekanga ukuba bamelwe ligqwetha etyaleni lokolulekwa. Kodwa ethubeni lo mthetho ungqingqwa utshintshile zaza iiNkundla Zabasebenzi zamisel' umthetho wokuba abaqeshi nabaqeshwa banelungelo lokumelwa ngomnye umqeshwa, igosa lombutho wabasebenzi okanye igqwetha. Loo nto incede yenza la matyala anobulungiswa kubaqeshwa.
Ingxaki iseyileyo yokuba ngubani omakachophele la matyala.
Abaqeshi abaninzi bonyula omnye umqeshwa ukuba achophele eli tyala noxa iCCMA neeNkundla Zabasebenzi zingoneliseki yile nkqubo.
I-CCMA igunyazise ukubuyiselwa kwabaqeshwa abaninzi ngenxa yokuba amatyala abo ayechotshelwe ngabanye abaqeshwa nababagxotha kuba becenge ukungaphelelwa ngumsebenzi.
Lowo ochophele ityala kufuneka amamele ubungqina kwaye abize namangqina. Kufuneka ayazi inkqubo yoluleko yenkampani, ayazi ukuba ityala loluleko liqhutywa njani kwaye azi kushicilelwa njani okutshiwo etyaleni .
Kubalulekile ukuba abe nolwazi lwePromotion Of Administrative Justice Act 3 ka-2003.
Iinkcukacha osinike zona zibonisa ukuba awuzange ulinikwe ilungelo lakho lokuzithethelela etyaleni lakho loluleko. Sikucebisa ukuba uye kwi-ofisi ekufuphi nawe yaseCCMA ngokukhawuleza kwaye apho uza kuncediswa uzalise iifom eziyimfuneko zokufaka isikhalazo esisemthethweni ngendlela ogxothwe ngayo ngumqeshi

Ngaba usana lwam luphilile"
kubhale uPRIMROSE WILLIAMS
kufote abeGREAT STOCK!
KWINKOLISO yabantu ukufumana umntwana yinto echwayitisayo neyonelisa ngendlel' engenambaliso ebomini. Kodwa ke iintsana azifiki nencwadi ekuchazelayo ukuba ziphathwa njani na kwaye umzali oqalayo ukufuman' umntwana akanamava okuba ufanele enze ntoni xa kutheni. Nazi izinto eziqhelekileyo ezidla ngokubhida abazali abaqalayo ukuba nomntwana...
Ukopha elisweni: Amehlo osana akafanelanga ophe, kodwa emva kokuzalwa ungalibona libomvu iliso kwindawo emhlophe. Oko kuya kuziphelela kunganyangwanga emva kweeveki okanye iinyanga ezimbalwa.
Igazi kwilindle: Oku akusinto iqhelekileyo, phofu ayixhalabisi njengokuba uninzi lwabazali lucinga. Kusana oluphilileyo kudla ngokuba luphawu lokuba aluvani neprotini yobisi. Ukuyeka ukutya ubisi okanye iimveliso ezinobisi komama oncancisayo okanye xa eluncancisa ubisi lwevenkile ukulutshintshela kubisi lwesoya kuya kukuphelisa oko. Qinisekisa ukuba umsa kwagqirha okanye eklinikhi.
Amaqhuma emabeleni: Aza kuziphelela ngokwawo. Ungazikhami iingono zosana lwakho.
Ukukhohlela: Iintsana nazo ziyakhohlela njengathi ukususa izikhohlela okanye izinkcwe ezivale umbhobho womoya. Ukukhohlela akuthethi kuthi luyagula. Kungabonisa ukugula xa kuhambisana nefiva okanye xa kuluphazamisa usana xa lusitya okanye lulele.
Ukulila:Iintsana ziyalila. Maxa wambi zililiswa kukulamba okanye xa zifuna ukutshintshwa ilweyile. Funda indlela elulila ngayo usana ufunde nendlela yokuluthulisa.
Ukulila kungaba luphawu lwengxaki ethile xa usana lulila lutyekeza, okanye lulila emva kokulutyisa. Xa ungakuqondi ukulila kwalo, yiya kubuza eklinikhi.
Ukulila/ukuduntsa nokuhambiseka: Ngaba usana luyahambiseka, luyalila, ukuduntsa kuyinto eqhelekileyo akulophawu lokuqhinwa. Xa usana luqhinwa ilindle lalo liyaqina, libe ngathi ngamagaqa, okanye liqine ngaphezulu kwebhotolo yamandongomane.
Iingxaki zometyiso: Inkoliso yeentsana ingaba neengxakana zesisu ezibangelwa kukukhula kometyiso wazo. Ukuqunjelwa okungephi kungapheliswa ngokuhlikihlwa rhoqo esiswini, emqolo nasezimpundu. Kodwa xa usana luhlanza okanye luba notyatyazo ngequbuliso, ukuvuthamelana kwesisu okanye igazi kwilindle lalo, luse eklinikhi ngoko nangoko.
Ukukhutywa: Nangona zininzi iindlela zokuphelisa ukukhutywa ebantwini abadala nabantwana abathe dlundlu, usana ungaluyeka lukhutywe de kuziphelele. Ukuze uthintele ukukhutywa kosana, qinisekisa ukuba aluphangi xa lusitya nokuba aluginyi umoya omninzi.
Irhashalala: Ulusu losana olusandul' ukuzalwa lusenokuthamba, kodwa lubanawo amabala. Usana luba namaqhakuva obusana kwiiveki zokuqala kodwa aphinde aziphelele. Eziny' iintsana ziba namabala amancinane amahlophe okanye atyheli ajikelezwe lulusu olubomvu. Kodwa ayaziphelela emva kweentsuku ezintathu ukuya kwezintlanu. Inkwethu iyaxobuka emashiyeni, emva kweendlebe nasemqaleni. Ungayisusa nje ngokuluhlamba ngesepha. Irhashalala efun' ingqwalasela ekhawulezileyo yevuzayo okanye ehambisana nefiva.
Ukuthimla neempumlo ezivalekileyo: Zombini ziqhelekile kwaye zibangelwa kukungavani nomsi. Makungabikho mntu utshayayo kwindlu enosana yaye zama ukuzisusa izinto ezithukuthezelayo.
Ukutyekeza: Inkoliso yeentsana ziyatyekeza, maxa wambi rhoqo xa zityiswa. Ungakhathazeki ucinge ukuba usana luza kulamba kuba into oluyityekezayo incinane kakhulu. Ukuze usana lungatyekezi xa uluncancis' ibhotile, lungqengqise kancinane uyiphakamise ngasemva ibhotile ukuze luncance ubisi lungatsali umoya. Emva kokuluncancis' ibele okanye ibhotile lubhodlise uze ulugcine luhleli nkqo imizuzu embalwa.
Ukutyekeza kuyingxaki xa usana lungakhuli, lusoloko lunochuku, lukhohlela okanye lomiwa kakhulu.
Ukuncipha emzimbeni: Imizimba yeentsana incipha nge-10 phesenti emva kweentsuku ezintathu zizelwe. Phofu ke alufanelanga lunciphe ngaphezulu koko, kwaye lufanele lubuyele kubunzima balo emva kweeveki ezimbini. Xa lungabuyelanga kubunzima balo emva kwezo veki okanye luqhubeka nokuncipha,, kungathiwa eklinikhi luncancise nobisi lwevenkile xa uluncancis' ibele kuphela.[x]

Iimpawu zeengxaki ezinobungozi
Xa usana lwakho lunezinye zezi mpawu, yiya kufun' unyango ngoko nangoko:
Xa lungakhange luzithume ilindle eliluhlaza bumnyama kwiiyure ezingama-36 luzelwe.
Xa ulusu okanye iindawo ezimhlophe zamehlo ziba tyheli.
Xa lukhonyulukela ukuhlanza okanye luhlanza rhoqo (ingasekuko ukutyekeza nje).
Lungakufuni ukutya iiyure ezintandathu ukusa kwezisibhozo.
