Thumela ingxaki yakho yomthetho ku -BONA Legal Advice, Box 32083, Mobeni, 4060 - uya kufumana ithuba lokuxoxa negqwetha imizuzu engama- 30 ngaphandle kokuhlawula, kwi-ofisi zalo naphi na kweli okanye emnxebeni.
Sizamile ukuqinisekisa ukuba ufumana iingcebiso ezizizo. Kodwa ityala netyala lifuna ukuphandisiswa kwaye abeScorpion Legal Protection (Pty) Ltd, igqiza labacebisi neBONA nabashicileli bayo abanakubekwa tyala ngelahleko engafunyanwa ngumntu osebenzise iingcebiso zalo mhlathi.
Isizathu esingakugxothisa
xa ogxa bakho besiba
INGXAKI
Ndandisebenza kwicala lentlama yamazinyo kwinkampani enkulu yamachiza. Kwakuthi xa kophuke omnye woomatshini kubiwe intlama yamazinyo eninzi ithubeleziswe ikhutshwe efestileni iphoswe ngaphaya kocingo. Mna ndandingebi, kodwa ndandingomnye wabaninzi ababeyazi loo nto.
Emva kokwebiwa kwayo kutshanje, kubizwe inkampani eza kuphanda. Mna nabanye, siye savavanywa ngomatshini obhaqa umntu oxokayo. Kwathiwa loo matshini ubonise ukuba noxa ndingelilo isela kodwa ndiyawazi amasela.
Inkampani yandinyanzela ukuba ndiwaxele, itsho isithi xa ndisala iza kundibizela intlanganiso yokwalulekwa. Kodwa ndandiza kuthini? Xa ndibaxela ndandiza kubizwa ngempimpi ndibeke nobomi bam esichengeni.
Kwintlanganiso yoluleko ndafunyanwa ndinetyala, ndaze ndagxothwa. Ngoku usapho lwam luyafa yindlala andifumani msebenzi. Ikho into endingayenza ngale nto?
IINGCEBISO ZESCORPION
UMthetho waBasebenzi uthi bonke abasebenzi bamelwe "ukuthembeka emsebenzini."
Oku kuthetha ukuba umsebenzi ufanele abengakwicala lomqeshi wakhe ngalo lonk' ixesha.
Umzekelo...
Akafanelanga ukuqala ishishini elilelakhe eliza kufana nelomqeshi wakhe ngexa esamsebenzela.
Akanakusebenzisa "iimfihlelo zokurhweba" zomqeshi wakhe ukukhuphisana naye.
Ufanele alikhusele igama elihle lomqeshi wakhe.
Akhusele nezinto zomqeshi wakhe.
Konke oku kuyinxalenye yomthetho weli loMzantsi
Afrika. Naxa wena ungelilo
isela, useza kuqwalaselwa ukuba uye wathembeka na kumqeshi wakho.
Ukuba akakuthembi njengomsebenzi wakhe, unako ukukugxotha emva kokuchophela intlanganiso yoluleko.
Xa umsebenzi engumbukeli nje omsulwa kodwa engakuxeli akubonileyo kuthiwa oko kuziphatha kwakhe "yi-derivative misconduct," okuthetha ukuba wenze isenzo esibi esisusela kwesinye isenzo esikwanjalo.
Ukusukela ngo-1994 iiNkundla zaBasebenzi zagqiba kwelokuba esi senzo sisizathu esonelisayo sokugxotha umsebenzi.
INkundla yaBasebenzi yeziBheno ithi "umsebenzi makangasong' izandla xa kusonakala kwaye ukuba uyala ukuncedisa kuphando olwenziwayo unako ukubizelwa kwintlanganiso yoluleko." Siyavuma ukuba ubufakwa engxakini - nasengozini, kodwa unako kwaye ubufanele ucel' ukukhuselwa ngumqeshi wakho.
Ngokwale meko ngoku akukhonto inokwenziwa ukujika isigqibo sokugxothwa kwakho.
Kodwa abacebisi beScorpion bakholwa kukuba xa unokufumana igqwetha, ubhale i-afidavithi exela yonke into, ucacise ngoloyiko owawunalo ngeliya xesha, uze uxolise ngesenzo sakho, inkampani ingaphinde iyiqwalasele kwakhona imeko yakho. Mhlawumbi ingade izame kukunceda ufumane omnye umsebenzi.
Ungayeki ukufun' umsebenzi - kwisicelo somsebenzi uyichaze yonke imeko yakho. [x]
AMANDL' OMTHETHO
BAGXOTHWA BONKE
Ngo-1998, nkampani ithile yayingafumani ukuba ngubani osebenzisa kakubi iimoto zayo yaze yabhalela bonke abasebenzi bayo ileta eyayisithi: "ukuba kuphinde kwasetyenziswa imoto yenkampani ngondlela mnyama aze umntu owenze loo nto angaziwa, uza kugxothwa."
Ngenene kwenzeka, waze umqeshi wanika abasebenzi bonke imizuzu engama-20 ukuba beze negama lomntu ochaphazelekayo. Bala, baza bagxothwa bonke.
Eli tyala lasiwa phambi kweNkundla yaBasebenzi, lasuka apho laya kwiNkundla yaBasebenzi yeziBheno.
INkundla yaBasebenzi yeziBheno yaphuma nelithi "bonke abasebenzi babemazi umenzi wobubi kodwa bamkhusela."
Ngenxa yeso sizathu ke abaqeshi ababekwanga tyala ngokugxotha abasebenzi.
Wawufanele ucele ukhuselo
BONA XHOSA January 2009

Okwenza izinto ezincinci zibe yingxaki
Babek' iintente ezitratweni!
ibali libhalwe nguTEDDY GOMBA
KUKHO umntu owathi "ukungathobeli umthetho nokungahloniphi abany' abantu sesona sono sikhulu" nesingatshabalalisa isizwe. Ngamany' amazwi ke asilolwaphulo-mthetho olukhulu olwenza lungabikho uzinzo elizweni, koko ngabantu abophula imithetho emincinane bephindelela.
Abahlali baseSoweto bangangqina ukuba zibaphazamisa kangakanani izinto ezincinane ezenziwa ngabany' abahlali.
Phantse zonk' iimpela-veki kubakho umntu omisa intente kwakhe elungiselel' ipati, umtshato okanye umngcwabo. Akukho ngxaki ekwenzeni loo nto, qha ibankulu ingxaki xa loo ntente uyimisa endleleni ize iphazamise abamelwane bakho.
Omnye umhlali ubalise ibali lommelwane wakhe ongunoteksi owemba umsele endleleni ehamba ngakwakhe ukuze athintele abanye abaqhubi beemoto bangakrweli iiteksi zakhe xa zipakwe ngakwakhe.
"Omnye umqhubi wemoto owayengawazi loo msele watshona kuwo imoto yakhe yabetheka ngesampu," utshilo lo mhlali.
Kukho omnye umhlali owamisa intente yomtshato wentombi yakhe endleleni egqitha kwakhe.
"Loo ntente yema apho iintsuku ezintathu zonke. Akazange asimeme nakuloo mtshato njengabamelwane, ngoko saphazanyiswa yintente sibe singazungcamla nakwiziyunguma zomtshato."
Imvume
U-Edna Mamonyane wamapolisa kamasipala waseJoburg uthe nangona beqonda ukuba abantu babethwa bubuncinane beeyadi zabo ukuze babeke iintente ezindleleni, kodwa bafanele babacingele abamelwane babo.
"Xa kuza kutshata umntwana wakho, bacele abamelwane xa ufun' ukumis' intente endleleni, oko kubonisa ukubathobela abany' abantu," utshilo.
Kodwa wongeze ngelithi akukho mthethweni ukumis' intente endleleni kawonke-wonke.
"Kufunek' ucel' imvume kuceba wendawo okuyo ukuze kubekho isivumelwano esisayinwe ngabamelwane ukuba bayakuvumela umise intente endleleni.
"Abantu ke mabazi ukuba baza kujongana nengalo yomthetho xa bengayenzi loo nto.
"Xa ungawuthobeli lo mthetho ungadliwa imali efikelela kwi- R1 000.
"Isicelo ngasinye siyaphononongwa ngamapolisa kamasipala,umzekelo asamkelwa isicelo sakho xa loo ndlela ihamba iiteksi," utshilo uMamonyane.
"Amagosa ethu aya kususa nayiphi na intente ebekwe ngaphandle kwemvume, kodwa abanakuba kuzo zonke izitrato ngexesha elinye.
"Ngoko sibongoza uluntu ukuba lusifowunele xa kukho intente esendleleni kuba kungenzeka amagosa ethu angayiboni xa ikwindlela ephakathi kwemizi.
"Thina asinako ukuvumela abantu benze nantoni na abayithandayo."
Ukujongela phantsi
Ngathi ukugrogriswa ngokuhlawuliswa akubanqandi abantu kulo mkhuba.
Ingcali yomthetho uNjingalwazi Shadrack Ghutto uthi ingxaki kukuba uMzantsi Afrika usuka kwixesha elibi, apho imithetho yayimiselwa ngokobuhlanga.
Oko ke kwenza abany' abantu bangakuboni ukubaluleka kokuthobel' umthetho nozinzo.
Kodwa uthe abantu abafanelanga bazithethelele ngaloo nto xa besophul' umthetho.
"Nabani na ongathobel' umthetho unegalelo ekujongeleni phantsi urhulumente olawulayo," utshilo.
"Ulwaphulo-mthetho luqala ngezinto ezincinane njengokuba likhoboka leziyobisi - kaloku xa udibanisa into encinane eyenziwe apha neyenziwe phaya kuphum' into enkulu."
Makabonakale
UNeil Fraser ongumcebisi ngobomi basezidolophini uthi amapolisa kamasipala kufuneka aluthintele ulwaphulo-mthetho lwemithetho kamasipala, angasukumi kuba sekwenzeke into.
"Abantu bayithobel' imithetho xa bewabona ukuba akhona amapolisa. Umbuzo kukuba ngaba ayakhathala amapolisa kamasipala"
"Ndikhe ndiwabone efuna abantu abayabula ezitratweni benxilile. Intle loo nto, kodwa ngeny' imini ndandilinde ukuvula kwerobhothi ndibona iiteksi zisima ezirhobhothini zisehlisa abahambi ezibona amapolisa kodwa akathabatha manyathelo.
"Akazange abahoye abo noteksi kuba ayefuna abantu abahamba ezitratweni benxilile!" utshilo uFraser.
Kubahlali baseSoweto ke kucacile ukuba baseza kulinda ixesha elide ngaphambi kokuba abasemagunyeni bathabathel' amanyathelo abantu abophula imithetho kamasipala njengokumisa iintente nokumba imisele ezindleleni zikawonke-wonke. [x]
BONA XHOSA - February 2008
Ingaba uza kubanepati" Kutheni ungabeki intente esitratweni nje" Abahlali basezilokishini bakruqukile ngabantu abophul' umthetho kwaye bathe nqa ukuba kutheni bengabanjwa nje ngamapolisa ngokungathobeli imithetho kamasipala. Zinkulu ke iingxaki ezibangelwa koku "kungathobeli" imithetho kwabanye abantu...

Ukunika inkxaso kwisikhokelo seWorld Health Organisation kunye neSebe leZempilo, ubudala bokuqala ukutyisa umntwana ukutya okuqinileyo kuzo zonke iimveliso zakwaPurity ibhekeliselwe kwiinyanga ezintandathu. Zonke iimveliso zakwaPurity azifakwanga zilondolozi, izijiki-bala neencasa zokuzenzela.
inqaku lentengiso
USis Purity olilungu leqela leengcaphephe zokutya kweentsana lakwaPurity, uphendula imibuzo yenu malunga nokondla iintsana zenu
USis Purity uthi...
Umbuzo woku-1:
Ndiqaphela ukuba iiPurity Cereals zongezwe i-iron, i-zinc kunye neselenium. Ngokunjalo, kwiimagazini nakwi-TV kuthethwa nge-iron. Kutheni le nto ibaluleke kangaka kusana lwam uThabang oneenyanga ezi-7 ubudala, osancancayo? Umazala wam ufuna atye ipapa njengosapho lonke.
- Jabulile Motlaung
Impendulo:
Ndiyavuya xa ufunda ngezinto ezilungele usana lwakho. Kubalulekile xa ungumama wazi ngokondla usana lwakho kuba lukhula ngokukhawuleza kwaye ludinga iiminerali - i-iron, i-zinc ne-selenium - ukuze lukhule lusempilweni kwaye lunamajoni omzimba omeleleyo.
I-iron inceda ekukhuliseni ingqondo ukuze kwixesha elizayo incede xa umntwana sele efunda esikolweni. Ngoko ke wenza kakuhle ngokungamtyisi ipapa umntwana de abe uneminyaka emibini ubuncinane.
Umbuzo wesi-2:
Ingaba ndingalutyisa usana lwam icereal kabini ngemini? Ndilupha icereal yerayisi kusasa nesidudu seentsana iPurity Cream Of Maize ebusuku. Ndinoloyiko lokuba luza kutyeba kakhulu - luyasithanda isidudu salo. Kunjani xa ndilutyisa kanye ngosuku nokuyeyona nto ilungileyo? Ndicela iingcebiso malunga nendingalutyisa kona emini nasebusuku? - Phaka Singwane.
Impendulo:
Akukho ngxaki xa ulutyisa icereal kabini ngemini, kodwa ungalupha okunye ukutya emini. Uze kwesinye isidlo uqhubeke ngokulutyisa enye yezi cereal. Zombini azinakufane zikhatywe ngumzimba zize zilugulise ngoko zezona zilungele ukuba sisidlo sokuqala.
Isidlo sesibini ungalupha ukutya okutsha, njengeefruit purées ezenziwe ngeziqhamo ezinjengee-apile nezinye, okanye isingle vegetable purées ezenziwe ngethanga nebhatata. Xa usana lwakho lungakufuni ukutya okutsha, luxubele nenye yeecereals uye usongeza. Yonwaba nosana lwakho... Ixesha lokutya lixesha elimnandi.
Zonke iiPurity cereals zongezwe izakha-mzimba kwaye zine-iron ngaphezu kwayo nayiphi na imveliso yokutya kwabantwana ekhoyo kweli. Inyaniso kukuba, isidlo esinye nje sePurity Cereal sinika ama-50% e-iron efunekayo ngosuku emntwaneni oneenyanga ezintandathu ukuya kwezili-12. Ukhangele noVithamini C ephepheni elibhaliweyo, nanjengoko enceda umzimba wosana lwakho ukuba ukwazi ukwamkela i-iron.[x]
Kutheni iyimfuneko?
- Yakha izihlunu zomzimba
- Inceda umzimba ekulweni nezifo

LISAKUGQIBA ukuphosa amathambo igqirha nokuchaz' imiyalezo eliyinikwa ngamathambo liyabhavumla lisithi "Vumani"" (Niyavumelana na namathambo") Lowo oyobhula uyaphendula athi "Siyavuma!"
Ulwazi oluvezwa ngamathambo luxelelwa lowo oyobhula kuphela. Akufuneki olo lwazi kuhlaselwe ngalo abany' abantu.
Olu lwazi lulumkisa umntu ozobhula ngento eqhubekayo ebomini bakhe nendlela yokuphucul' ubomi bakhe. Lunceda ekubeni igqirha licebise ngento emayenziwe kodwa xa licelwa ngumntu ozobhula.
Ngaba abantu xa bebuya ukuyobhula bayalufihl' ulwazi abalunikwe ligqirha" HAYI!
Xa umntu eneengxaki ebomini bakhe utyhola abany' abantu.
Uyakhawuleza enjalonje nokunuka abantu. Uva ekhala esithi "Niyandithakatha!"
Wazi njani ukuba uthakathiwe" Uxelelwe ligqirha lakhe kaloku.
Uninzi lwaba bantu batyhola abantu ngolu hlobo iba ngabantu abangazange bakhe balubeka emagqirheni. Into abazama ukuyenza bona kukuziphindisela emntwini abakhe baxabana naye ngokumtyhola ngobugqwirha.
Kuyinyaniso engakanani ukuba sithakathiwe qho xa sigula okanye kukho izinto ezingasihambeliyo kakuhle"
Kulula ukugxeka abantu. Abantu abayiqondi into yokokuba ubomi bunamahla-ndinyuka - amashwa neengozi ziyazenzekela.
Inkululeko yasiphathela amalungelo kodwa ngelishwa ke kukho abawaxhaphazayo la malungelo.
Ngeliya xesha ookhokho bethu babehleli besonwabele inkululeko yabo ababeyiphiwe nguThixo kwakungekho mntu unuka omnye ngobugqwirha.
Inkundla yenqila yiyo eyayichophela amatyala alolu hlobo, ibize amangqina ize inyanzele ummangali ukuba aveze ubungqina. Namagqirha ayesazi ukuba kufuneka anike abantu ulwazi olubambekayo njengoko nawo ayebizelwa enkundleni ukuza kunik' ubungqina.
Kule mihla abanye abantu abakhohlakeleyo baye bathathele umthetho ezandleni zabo.
Elinye ibhinqa elineminyaka engama-23 elaliyititshalakazi lithi lagxothwa emsebenzini kuba lityholwa ngobugqwirha.
"Ngumntu omnye lo wasasaza la mampunge. Yandiphazamisa kakhulu loo nto kuba andazi kwanto ngobugqwirha. Ndandiyintlekisa yaye abantu endandiphangela nabo babendihleba.
"Ndandingasakwazi ukumelana nale meko ndaza ndawuyek' umsebenzi.
"Andisokuze ndiyilibale loo ntlungu yayindenza ndingalali buhlayo. Ndaya kufumana ukolulekwa ndaza ndanyangelwa udandatheko," utyatyadule watsho.
Waya kusebenza ekholeji. Wabonwa ngomnye wabantu awayesebenza nabo ngaphambili. "Waxelela udadewabo owayefunda apho ekholeji ukuba mna ndiyathakatha. Udadewabo wasasaza loo marhe athi ndi-i ekholeji."
Ngethamsanqa bakho abantu abangazange bakholelwe kwezo zityholo baza bangecala lakhe.
"Ezi zityholo zobugqwirha zilutsho lwaqhekeka phakathi usapho lwam," libhale ngolu hlobo eliny' ibhinqa.
"Xa kukho umntu ophethwe lizinyo okanye onomkhuhlane kuthiwa ndim obathakathayo.
"Nkqu nomama ondizalayo uyandityhola naye.
"Ndilibhinqa elinemimyaka engama-24 elimsulwa elingazange lakhe laya kubonana negqirha yaye andazi kwakuba uthikoloshe okanye impundulu yinto enjani na."
Izityholo ezilolu hlobo zikhokelela ekubulaweni kwabantu ngokungenalusini.
Kutshanje eLimpopo kutshiswe kwabulawa abantu abamsulwa ngenxa yezityholo zobugqwirha. Aba bantu babetyholwa ngokuthumela izulu elatshisa imizi labulala abantu.
Ibhinqa laseNtshona Koloni lagrogriswa laphathwa kakubi emva kokuba unyana walo eze nenkawu ekhaya efuna ukuyifuya.
Eli bhinqa latyholwa ngokusebenzisa le nkawu ebusuku xa lisenz' izinto zalo zobugqwirha emizini yabamelwane!
Ngaba uyakholelwa ebugqwirheni" Kulungile ke. Kodwa khumbula le nto: amagqwirha anobuqhophololo. Baqwalasele abo bakhuthalele ukutyhola abanye ngobugqwirha. Yintoni ebakhokelela ekwenzeni izityholo ezilolu hlobo" Yintoni le bayifihlayo abayenzayo"
Ungabakholwa aba bantu! Kungenzeka kuthi kanti kutyholwa umntu ongamthandiyo kakade kodwa yazi le nto: ngeny' imini iza kuba nguwe otyholwayo ube umsulwa. [x]

fumana uncedo
Ngaba umntwana wakho akakwazi ukufunda"
Le ngxaki iyamlibazisa umntwana wakho esikolweni kodwa ingasombululeka aze akwazi ukuqhubeka nobomi...
UXOLANI wayetsala nzima esikolweni xa wayeneminyaka esixhenxe ubudala. Wayengakwazi ukufunda, engakwazi nokubhala. Babemangalisiwe abazali bakhe neetitshala. Wayekrele-krele, edlamkile, ebalasele emidlalweni nakweziny' izinto ngaphandle kokubhala nokufunda.
Xa eneminyaka elithoba wayesele ethatyathwa njengomntwana osilelayo esikolweni.
Abany' abantwana esikolweni babemqhula bembiza "ngesigqogqo."
Ngethamsanqa lakhe kwabakho ititshala eyarhana ukuba kungenzeka ukuba uXolani unengxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda waza wancediswa yititshala encedisa kwezonyango bayifumana ingxaki kaXolani.
Wathi esakufumana uncedo lweengcali yaphela loo ngxaki yakhe yokungakwazi ukufunda waqhubeka esikolweni.
"Ingxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda kufuneka ilungiswe kusekwangoko kungenjalo ibuphazamisa bonke ubomi bomntu," utsho uMarj Arslanian weAudiblox, ekuyinkqubo ekhethekileyo esetyenziswa kwihlabathi ukunceda iingxaki zokufunda kubafundi.
Le ngxaki ichaphazela abantwana nabantu abadala ngeendlela ngeendlela kuxhomekeke ekubeni ingakanani na.
Uninzi lwabo baba neengxaki zokufunda nokubhala ukanti xa yondele kakhulu le ngxaki abakwazi tu ukubhala nokufunda. Uninzi lwabafundi abanale ngxaki bayoyiswa zizibalo.
Ibonakala njani"
Mjonge emehlweni umntu onengxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda uza kubona into elolu hlobo...
Amagama alula uyawagqwetha umzekelo elithi RAT liyajika libe nguTAR.
Isivakalisi siyaxoveka singabinantsingiselo.
Oonobumba uyababhidanisa umzekelo u-b amenze u-d.
Thatha iphepha ulijongise esipilini uze ufunde lo mbhalo usesipilini. Abanye abantu abaneengxaki zokufunda bawufunda ngolo hlobo umbhalo oqhelekileyo.
Iimpawu
Nazi ezinye zeempawu ezixhaphakileyo nezintama ukuba umntwana uneengxaki zokungakwazi ukufunda yaye ufuna uncedo:
t Ukungaqiniseki ngesandla sasekhohlo nesasekunene okwenza awagqwethe amagama namanani xa efunda.
t Abantwana abanale ngxaki abakwazi ukulandelelanisa izinto njengokubala okanye ukulandelelanisa iintsuku zeveki. Bayoyiswa kukukhumbula okanye ukukwazi ukulandelelanisa izinto.
t Ukufunda aze apele amagama ngendlela engaqhelekanga. Le yingxaki eyondeleyo yokungakwazi ukufunda nebonakala ngokuqashela amagama nokuba engenantsingiselo.
t Ukuthetha kade okanye ukuthetha into engavakaliyo. Uphando lubonisa ukuba ukungakwazi kakuhle ukuthetha neengxaki zokufunda zinxibelelene.

Ongakwenza
Xa urhana ngathi umntwana wakho unengxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda nokubhala kubalulekile ukuba uthethe netitshala yakhe. Uninzi lwezikolo ezikhulu zinetitshala enceda kwezonyango eqeqeshiweyo eza kumnceda umntwana wakho okanye imse kwingcali yezonyango.
Xa kukho umntu omdala onale ngxaki mfunele uncedo, usengalufumana.[x]

BEKUXOXWA ngomba onyeke-nyeke wokunikela ngamalungu omzimba noloyiko neenkolelo zoluntu lwakowethu ngawo kwinkomfa ebikutshanje eUniversity Of South Africa. Lo mba uvelelwe kwiinkalo ngeenkalo, kuquka nemfuneko emandla yabantu abanikela ngamalungu omzimba ngokunjalo neembono zamaIslam, ezamaJuda namaKrestu ngalo mba.
Bendisesinye sezithethi kule nkomfa kwaye ndithanda ukunibalisela endikuthethileyo.
Xa uthetha ngokunikela ngamalungu omzimba kwabantsundu ziliqela izinto zamasiko nezithethe ekufuneka uziqwalasele. Akukhathaliseki nokuba uyakholwa, ufundile, uhlala ezilalini okanye uhlal' edolophini.
Ndingathi nje yinto engekaginyeki kwimidaka yoMzantsi Afrika kwaye uninzi luyibona iyindlela engalunganga yokwandisa imihla yobomi bomntu.
Ngaphezulu kukho abantu abafuna ukungcwatywa esaphelele amalungu emizimba yabo.
Indlela esibahlonipha ngayo abantu abaswelekileyo uyiva kwakulwimi lwethu.
Kulwimi lwesiNgesi kuyatshiwo ukuba umntu "ufile" kungabikho ngxaki, kodwa kwiilwimi zemidaka igama elithi "ufile" linenye intsingiselo.
Kaloku thina sitsho esilwanyaneni ukuba sifile, asitsho emntwini. Xa ingumntu sithi "uswelekile" okanye "ulandulele eli phakade".
Sitsho njalo kuba sikholelwa ukuba abafanga koko balele. Amangcwaba yindawo esiyihlonipha kakhulu kuba kulapho sithetha khona nezinyanya zethu sicela ukuba zisikhokele.
Ingaba ke oko kuthetha ukuthini xa kufuneka senz' isigqibo sokunikela ngelungu lomzimba"
Kukho uloyiko lokuba ukusweleka engasaphelelanga amalungu omzimba wakho kukwenza ungamkelwa zizinyanya zakowenu.
Oko kungabenzel' iingxaki abantu abasaphilayo ngenxa yengqumbo yezinyanya.
Kwenzeka ntoni ke xa umntu ebulewe wasikwa amalungu omzimba kwayokwenziwa ngawo amayeza - ziyamamkela izinyanya zakowabo"
Ewe ziyamamkela. Kodwa umntu osweleke ngolo hlobo uba kwiqela lezinyanya ekuthiwa ngabandawu ezinesiphiwo sokuziphindezela.
Ngamany' amazwi abandawu liqela lezinyanya "ezinomsindo" ezingabantu abasweleka kabuhlungu njengakwiingozi zendlela, ababulawela ukwenza amayeza nangezinye iindlela ezinobundlobongela.
Ezo zinyanya ke ziquka nabantu abangazange bangcwatywe ngendlela kuba iintsapho zabo zingazange zibafumane.
Kodwa ezi zinto azithethi kuthi abantu abantsundu mabangayivumi into yokunikela ngamalungu omzimba - ukuze basindise ubomi babany' abantu!
Kungangxengxezwa kwizinyanya xa kukho amalungu omzimba akhutshiweyo emntwini oswelekileyo. Angakwenza oko nomntu ophilayo oza kunikela ngelungu lomzimba.
Oko kunganceda umntu onikela ngelungu lomzimba nomntu omnikelayo bakhawuleze bachache kutyando lwabo!
Ngoko ukuze wamkeleke umba wokunikela ngamalungu omzimba kwimidaka yakowethu, kufunek' intsebenziswano phakathi koogqirha nabantu abanyanga ngamaqwili esintu abangenza amacebo angenza abantu bakwamkele ukunikela ngamalungu omzimba.
Kwakhona abantu abanikele ngamalungu omzimba ukuze basindise ubomi bezalamane zabo zegazi babalisele abanye abantu ukuba kunjani ukwenza loo nto ukuze bakhuthaze nabanye.
Kufuneka neentsapho ziqinisekiswe ukuba umzimba womntu awonakaliswa xa ekhutshwa amalungu omzimba seswelekile. [x]

ABABELEKISI babekade beyinxalenye yoluntu. Kwakudla ngokuba ngoomakhulu noomama asele bekhulile, abangafundanga, abangakwazi ukubhala nokufunda yaye babenceda banyange abadlezana.
Babenyanga nabantu abadala nabantwana abagulayo.
Ndiyitsho le nto ngenxa yomfundi ondibhaleleyo efuna uncedo ngokutshaya kwakhe intsangu yaye ndiyazi ukuba ngababelekisi abavela nemfihlo yokuyeka ukutshaya intsangu.
Babesebenzisa eli hlebo xa bebona ukuba ilungu losapho eliyindoda okanye eliyinkwenkwe litshaya intsangu.
Babemnika lowo utshayayo engazi - aze ayiyeke intsangu engazi nokuba kutheni na.
Ihlebo elifungelweyo
Ndaba nethamsanqa mna kuba ndakhula ndinomakhulu ongumbelekisi. Wandichazela eli chiza lilihlebo waza wandifungisa ukuba ndingaze ndilixele.
Ndisemi kweso sifungo ke nangoku yaye ndiza kutsho isithako esinye qha - ndize ndicele nabani na owazi umakhulu owayengumbelekisi ukuba abuze kuye ukuba ziziphi na ezinye izithako.
Isithako endiza kusitsho lubisi lwebele lomdlezana.
Sonke siyazi ukuba ukutshaya intsangu kunobungozi ebomini bomntu.
Abadlali bebhol' ekhatywayo neminy' imidlalo bafuman' isohlwayo esiqatha xa kufunyanwe intsangu egazini okanye emchameni wabo.
Njengoko ndisixelile isithako esinye seli chiza ndibona kubalulekile ukuba amagqirha enze uphando ukuze afumanise ukuba ngawaphi amayeza afunekayo khon' ukuze sihlangule uluntu lwakuthi kwesi sihelegu sentsangu.
Eyona nto ibaluleke kakhulu kukuba abantu bazithibe bangangenwa ngumkhwa wokutshaya intsangu.
Ukuzenza mhle
Enye yezinto ezindixhalabisayo kukwanda kwamabhinqa azimisele ukutyandwa amabele kuba efuna ukuba nomtsalane.
Eliny' ibhinqa elingatshatanga nelingayithandiyo inkangeleko yalo lindibhalele lathi: "Ndifun' ukusoloko ndinomtsalane. Ndity' ukutya okusempilweni yaye ndenza nemithambo rhoqo.
"Kodwa ndithi xa ndizijonga esipilini qho ngeentsasa ndizibone ndingenamtsalane kuba ndinamabele amancinci.
"Ndifuna ukuba namabele amakhulu.
"Nditsho nkqu nokuba ndinxibe iitophu zam ezintle awaveli kakuhle amabele am. Ndikhe ndafuna ulwazi ngokwenza utyando ndaza ndafumanisa ukuba luxhomile ngexabiso andinawukwazi ukuluhlawulela.
"Ngaba likho iyeza ongandicebisa ukuba ndilisebenzise ukuze ndikhulise amabele am""
Omnye umfundi ubhale wathi, "Ndinamabele amakhulu awileyo."
"Atshintsha ndisakufuman' umntwana wesibini.
"Ndingumntu ozikhathaleleyo empilweni, andifuni kutyeba kodwa amabele am awehli tu.
"Ngaba ikho into ongandinceda ngayo""
Amabhinqa akuthi kufuneka azifundise ukuzidla ngamabele awo nokuba anjani na.
Nokuba angakanani na, abalulekile kuba ondla iintsana yaye anceda abantu abatshaya intsangu bayiyeke! [x]

NGABA ufun' ukuphelisa uxinzelelo lwengqondo" Kutheni ungaphumi nje ubethwe ngumoya uye kufuman' into yokuthob' unxano uze ufumane nomntu oza kumngomba ukhuphele kuye uxinzelelo onalo" Kwamany' amazwe ingcingane enjalo ingakufak' engxakini uzibone sele uqamele ngenqindi entolongweni - kodwa akunakuba njalo eChina.
Abantu abasela eRising Sun Anger Release Bar eNanjing bayavunyelwa bakhwaze bathukise, bophul' iiglasi... babethe nabasebenzi balapho.
Phofu ke abagqibeli apho! Xa ezi ndlela zokukhuph' umsindo abanawo zingabancedi, le ndawo ikwanika abaxumi bayo izoluleko zengqondo!
Le bhari iqeshe amadoda omeleleyo akubudala beminyaka ekuma-20 nama-30 angenangxaki nokubethwa. Anxiba izinto zokuzikhusela, kwaye anikwa uqeqesho lomzimba rhoqo.
Umntu osela kule bhari uyatsho ukuba ufuna anxibe kanjani - ngoko ungatsho ukuba omnye ufuna anxibe njengomphathi wakho emsebenzini.
Le bhari ivulwe ebutsheni balo nyaka nguWu Gong onama-29 eminyaka othi wayithanda emva kokubona ezinye iibhari ezinjalo eJapan.
Abantu abasela kuyo bangena ngemali ephakathi kwe-R40
ne-R300 ukuze baphelise umsindo wabo, kuxhomekeke ekubeni bafuna ntoni na bona.
Abagxeki bale bhari bathi nangona kuhlekisa ukubona umntu ebetha umntu onxibe njengomphathi wakhe, kodwa bathi ukubetha akulungisi nto.
Nangona kunjalo bakho abayithandayo. "Uluntu lwale mihla lulufumana naphi na uxinzelelo lwengqondo kwaye aluzifumani izinto olungakhuphel' umsindo kuzo," utshilo omnye usomashishini.
Okona kunomdla kukuba ngabasetyhini abona bantu baninzi abeza bazokufuna ukukhuph' umsindo kule bhari! [x]
Qhwa! Bha! Eyish!

Le mvumi ibonakala njengomntu ozolileyo sele ibanjwe kalishumi ubuncinane ukusukela ngo-1992 emv kokukhutshwa kwecwecwe layo lokuqala. Wakhe wabanjelwa ukuchaphazeleka kwityala lokubulala, ukufunyanwa enemipu engekho semthethweni neziyobisi. Ezi ngxaki anazo kwezomthetho uSnoop aziqalanga ngenxa yodumo lwakhe. Kaloku wayelilungu leqela lezihange kwasesikolweni kwaye wabanjelwa iziyobisi emva nje kokuphumelela ibanga lakhe leshumi, wagwetywa iminyaka emithathu entolongweni. Awunakukholwa kodwa waqala wagqibelisa ukuvalelwa ngoko.
IINDWALUTHO ZAPHESHEYA
Abaphuli-mthetho baseHollywood
Ukuba uNaomi uzimisele ukuyeka ukuba yimodeli kwakufuneka acinge ngokuba yimbethi-manqindi. Sekukasixhenxe evela phambi kwenkundla phakathi konyaka ka-2000 no-2008 ngenxa yokubetha abancedisi bakhe abaliqela, abasebenzi ekhaya, umlinganisi othile, nkqu namapolisa ngenxa yokushiywa ngumsindo. Noxa amagqwetha akhe amshiya kuba esithi uyingozi ebantwini abamngqongileyo, kodwa izohlwayo azinikwayo zezokwenza iinkonzo eziluncedo eluntwini, ukuya kufunda ukulawula umsindo, neentlawulo engama-R35 000. Mhlawumbi uya kuthi usifunda esi sicatshulwa abe sele ebethe omnye.
Emculweni wehip-hop kubonakala ngathi ukubaluleka kwemvumi kubonwa ngeminyaka eyihleli entolongweni. Loo nto itsho imbeke kweliphi ke inqanaba u-Akon, ohleli iminyaka emine nesiqingatha entolongweni" Ingaba imenza eyona mvumi isemanqwanqweni" Asiboni njalo thina! Ukubanjwa kwakhe kusenokuba kumenze indumasi kuba wabhala ingoma ethi Locked Up kodwa ke xa sesithetha inyani akukho nto incomekayo ngokuba yinkokeli yamasela eemoto. Iqela lika-Akon lalisiba iiPorsches neeLamborghini lithengisela iindumasi nabashishina ngeziyobisi. Wayesoloko ephuncula emapoliseni xa eleqwa.
Ngokungathi bekungonelanga ukubona umculo werephu owenza ubukrelemnqa uthandwa kangaka, intandane yolutsha u-TI usuke wayongeza le ngxaki ngokuba abe sisihange nakubomi bakhe bokwenene. Emva kokubanjwa ezama ukuthenga imikhono yekati engekho semthethweni ngo-2007 neminye imipu, le ndumasi yehip-hop ethethela phantsi yagwetywa unyaka onosuku isentolongweni ngoMatshi walo nyaka yaze yayalelwa ukuba ihlawule imali esisohlwayo. Siyathemba ukuba ulutsha luyabona ukuba ulwaphulo-mthetho alunaziphumo zihle.
Waxokisa inkundla esithi ukhusela abahlobo bakhe ababebandakanyeka kudubulo olwenzeka ngo-2001 ngaphandle kwesikhululo sosasazo saseManhattan yaze le mvumi yerephu yagwetywa unyaka onosuku entolongweni ngo-2005. "Ndizamkele izohlwayo endizifumene ngenxa yezenzo zam. Ndanika inkundla ubungqina bobuxoki xa kwakuxoxwa ityala. Ndiyazi ndenza ububi. Ndilungile kwaye ndiyamoyikayo uThixo, le nto inzima kum," utsho. Kodwa kwezi ntsuku le mvumi ithanda iplastic-surgery yophula umthetho wefashoni kuphela, kodwa ke leyo sakuyiyekel' abahlalutyi befashoni.
Ihlabathi lonke lalimangalisiwe ziindaba zokuba izithandani ezinguChris noRihanna azifikanga kumsitho weembasa zeGrammy ngoFebruwari walo nyaka kuba uBrown ebethe imvumikazi esisinqanda-mathe sakhe. Le mvumi inama-20 eminyaka yazinikezela emapoliseni aseLos Angeles, yaza yabekwa ityala lokubetha ngeenjongo zokulimaza, yakhululwa ngebheyile
ye-R390 000. Walivuma ityala lokubetha uRiri oneminyaka engama-21 waze wanikwa umyalelo wokuba ahlale kude naye wabe ke uyasinda ekubeni libanjwa. UChris wanikwa nomyalelo wokuba afumane iingcebiso ngempatho-mbi, enze nomsebenzi woluntu. [x]

UBONTLE one-17 leminyaka waqala esithi uzama ukunciphisa umzimba wakhe ukuze abe nefiga entle kwimatric dance njengamanye amantombazana afunda nawo. Kusasa wayengatyi esela nje ikomityi yekofu, aze atye iqanda elibilisiweyo ne-apile ngelantshi, aze atye ilethisi netshizi ngokuhlwa. Waphila ngokutya ngolo hlobo de ngeny' imini wasuka wawa.
Wathi uAkhona one-18 akuva ukuba umhlobo wakhe ubesitya konke ukutya akuthandayo kodwa angatyebi, wagqiba ekubeni naye uza kutya emva koko ahlanze.
UBontle waba ne-anorexia nervosa waza uAkhona wanebulimia nervosa.
Ababulali ababini
Ezona ndidi zimbini ezixhaphakileyo zokungatyi ngendlela yi-anorexia nebulimia. I-anorexia idla ngokuphatha amantombazana kwaye ihambisana noloyiko olukhulu lokutyeba.
Umntu one-anorexia akafuni kutya nangona usenokuba uncipha umzimba wakhe ngendlela eyothusayo, yena akaziboni ukuba uyabhitya. Xa intombazana ene-anorexia izijonga esipilini okanye isenza umfanekiso-ngqondweni wayo, ibona nje intombazana etyebileyo ekusafuneka inciphe.
Ibulimia yohluke kancinane kwi-anorexia kuba umntu onebulimia akakuyeki ukutya. Uyatya emva koko akukhuphe ngokuhlanza okanye ngokusela into ehambisayo. Ibulimia nayo ihlasela kakhulu amantombazana alulutsha njengeanorexia.
Imbonakalo yomzimba
Imbonakalo yomzimba ibalulekile elutsheni. Inkoliso yawo iba nexhala lokuba xa etyeba xa engena ebudaleni aya kutyeba unomphelo.
Asuka axhalabe aze azame ukuzinciphisa kuba engazi ukuba utshintsho alubona emizimbeni yalo luza kuphela nemizimba yalo iyeke ukutyeba kungakhange kubekho mfuneko yokuba makatshintshe indlela atya ngayo.
Iimpawu zokuqala ezikwenza ungatyi ngokufanelekileyo ziquka ukungazithembi; ukungoneliswa ngumzimba wakho; ukuzibona utyebile nokuzama ukuba nomzimba omhle; imbali yosapho olunoxinzelelo lwengqondo; iingxaki zosapho ezigabadeleyo; imbali yokuxhatshazwa ngokwesondo, okanye uxinzelelo lwemidlalo oyidlalayo.
Ukubhitya kakhulu kuyingozi
Ukuzilambisa kungenza umonakalo emzimbeni kwaye kungabeka nobomi bakho esichengeni.
Umntu one-anorexia angonakalisa intliziyo, isibindi nezintso zakhe. Yonk' into emzimbeni wakhe inciphisa isantya sokusebenza kuze oko kubangele ukuhla koxinzelelo lwegazi, ukubetha kwentliziyo, ukuphefumla yaye kukwenze usoloko uziva ugodola.
Amanye amantombazana asenokude ayeke ukuya exesheni ngenxa yokuzilambisa kwawo. Kuxhaphakile nokuba ne-anaemia namalungu amathambo adumbileyo, kungenjalo ube namathambo ankumnkum.
I-anorexia ingenza iinwele ziqothuke, iinzipho zezandla zophuke yaye ukhule iinwele ezithambileyo umzimba wonke. Xa ikuphethe ngamandla ingakhokelela ekungondlekini de ikubulale nokukubulala.
Abantu abanebulimia badla ngokulunywa sisisu, isisu esixuxuzelayo, ukuqunjelwa, umqala obuhlungu okanye umonakalo esiswini nasezintsweni ngenxa yokuhlanza.
Amazinyo abo angabola ngenxa yokunyuka kwee-asidi ezisesiswini zize emlonyeni xa behlanza.
Njengamantombazana ane-anorexia, amantombazana anebulimia asenokuyeka ukuya exesheni, ukanti eyona nto iyingozi kakhulu kukuba ukuhlanza kungawenza alahlekelwe yipotassium ebalulekileyo emzimbeni.
Khulul' umzimba wakho
Eyona nto inzima kukwamkela ukuba unengxaki yokungatyi ngokufanelekileyo. Into yesibini enzima kukwamkela ukuba unengxaki uze ufune uncedo.
Kodwa ukungatyi ngendlela akusilohlazo. Uncedo luyafumaneka ngoko akufanelanga ubelikhoboka lokungatyi ngendlela unomphelo.
Wuthande umzimba wakho
Kubalulekile kulutsha ukwazi ukuba akukho mntu unomzimba omhle ngokupheleleyo. Xa engadalwanga waba nomzimba omhle makayamkele loo nto aze awuthande unjengokuba unjalo.
Cinga ngomzimba wakho njengemoto yeminqweno yakho. Wuxabise. Uwuhloniphe. Uwukhathalele.
Yenza uluhlu lwazo zonke izinto umzimba wakho okuvumela ukuba uzenze. Lufunde wongeze eziny' izinto.
Yonk' imihla kwazi okunokwenziwa ngumzimba wakho. Khumbula ukuba usisixhobo sobomi bakho, awusosihombiso.
Yenza uluhlu lwabantu obathandayo: abantu abanempumelelo, abantu ababe negalelo ebomini bakho, kuluntu lwakowenu okanye kwihlabathi. Cinga ngokuba iimbonakalo yabo yaba negalelo na kwimpumelelo yabo nezinto abaziphumezileyo.
Ungavumeli ubukhulu okanye ukumila komzimba wakho kukuthintele ekwenzeni izinto ozithandayo.

Musa ukujonga iziphako kuphela emzimbeni wakho
Okungenziwa ngabazali
Njengomzali kufuneka uziqwalasele iinguqu kwindlela atya ngayo umntwana wakho. Kuba bedla ngokuphika ukuba abatyi ngendlela, ukufuna uncedo lonyango kungenziwa xa lufunwa lilungu losapho.
Khumbula, ukungenelela ngendlela eyiyo kungasindisa ubomi bomntwana wakho. Xa ubona ukuba umntwana wakho unengxaki yokungatyi ngendlela, kubalulekile ukumfunela unyango ngokukhawuleza. Inganyangeka ngempumelelo le ngxaki xa ikhawuleze yasukunyelwa.
Nazi iimpawu ongazibona zokuba umntwana wakho akatyi ngokufanelekileyo:
Ukungamva esithi ulambile okanye ukungafuni ukutya kunye nosapho.
Ukutya kakhulu kodwa angabi mkhulu.
Ukusebenzisa izinto zokuhambisa.
Ukwenza umthambo ngokugqithisileyo okanye usoloko ethetha ngengxaki yokutyeba.
Ukungena kwigumbi langasese ixesha elide rhoqo emva kokutya - usenokuvulela amanzi ukuze singevakali isandi sokuhlanza kwakhe.
Ukusoloko efun' ukuhlala yedwa.[x]

kubhale uFORCE KHASHANE
UKWAZI okuza kwenzeka kuwe kwixesha elizayo kuyakunceda uphephe ukuzifak' engxakini. Ukanti uphila ubomi obumnandi xa usazi umntu okuboniswayo okuza kwenzeka kwixesha elizayo.
Apha ke andithethi ngomntu oligqirha - ndithetha ngomntu onesiphiwo sokubona esikuphathelwe lingomso.
Kodwa amaxesh' amaninzi abo bantu abahoywa ngabahlobo naziintsapho zabo.
Isiphiwo sokubon' izinto eziza kwenzeka sidla ngokuba lufuzo kwaye nkqu nomntwana oneminyaka eli-10 angabanaso. Kodwa abantu abadala abadli ngakuyinika ngqalelo into etshiwo ngumntwana.
Ubeva abanye besithi: "Liyakwaqalile ke igqirha lasekhaya. Lithi liboniswe kusweleke omnye wethu".
Awuboniswa ephupheni kuphela
Enye impazamo kukuba umntu onesiphiwo sokubona okuza kwenzeka sidla ngokucinga ukuba uza kuba ligqirha okanye umthandazeli. Akunjalo, xa unaso izinto awuziboniswa emaphupheni kuphela, koko uzibona nasemini ngeempawu ezithile.
Ndibhalelwe leliny' ibhinqa elitshatileyo elithi liphoxwa lusapho, abahlobo nomyeni walo elineminyaka engaphaya kwe-10 litshatile naye kuba abasamkeli isiphiwo salo sokubona okuza kwenzeka.
Ngokomzekelo lithi eli bhinqa liyazi ukuba umntu uza kusweleka xa liye exesheni emva kokumbona. Lithi ke liyaqhubeka nokuba sexesheni xa seswelekile.
Emva koko lithe... "Ndathabath' uhambo lweentsuku ezimbini ndisiya eFreyistata, ndaza ndaziva ndinenzululwane nesicaphu-caphu."
"Ndagqiba ekubeni ndigoduke ngaphambi kwexesha - ndabamba umyeni wam ehleli nebhinqa ancuma nalo emzini wethu."
Ngokucacileyo isicaphu-caphu owayenaso sasiluphawu lwento owayeza kuyibona.
Sisebusweni
Eliny' ibhinqa lithe lona esalo isiphiwo sisebusweni. Oko kuvakala kungakholeleki, kodwa yinyaniso.
"Xa ndidikizelelwa liliso lasekhohlo ngezantsi ithuba elingaphezulu kweveki ndiyazi ukuba kuza kusweleka umhlobo wam okanye ilungu losapho," litshilo kwileta yalo.
"Xa kudikiza elasekunene ngasezantsi ndiyazi ukuba kukho umhlobo okanye umntu endimaziyo oza kusweleka.
"Esi siphiwo sindenza ndingakhululeki yaye ndingonwabi kuba andikwazi kusiphelisa.
"Ndithethe nabantu abaliqela ngaso, abanye bathe mandihlikihle indawo edikizelayo ngomcinga womtshayelo, kodwa oko akundincedanga.
"Ndibona kubhetele ukungakwazi kungekenzeki ukusweleka komntu osisalamane.
"Ndingasiphelisa njani esi siphiwo siyinkathazo""
Ngelishwa awunako ukuphelisa ukudikizela kweliso nokuboniswa xa umntu eza kusweleka. Kuza kufuneka nje ukunyamezele.
Ukuphila nako
Inkoliso yamaxhwele namagqirha ayaziboniswa izinto kwaye afunda ukukwamkela oko njengenxalenye yobomi bawo.
Ibhinqa elithi liya exesheni unomphelo linganyangwa - kufuneka lisoloko lineyeza ekuthiwa ngumkhurushane okanye imositsane.
Lingawabilisa omabini la mayeza, okanye elinye lawo kwisiqingatha sekomityi yamanzi. Kufuneka upheke isidudu ngamanzi eli yeza uze usitye kabini ngemini isithuba seveki.
Kukho nento edla ngokucingwa ngabantu yokuba abantu baboniswa izinto ezimbi kuphela. Kanti akunjalo.
Kukh' indoda ethi xa irhawuzelelwa sisandla sasekunene iyazi ukuba iza kufuman' imali ukanti xa isesasekhohlo iza kufuman'
ileta. [x]

kanti ndisindile
UNGUMFUNDISI, igqirha, inkokeli yoluntu kwaye usawenza nomsebenzi wakhe omdala wokuba ngumtshiseli weentsimbi. UBishop Abram Mokoena uyindoda exakekileyo kodwa ngek' ukholwe ukuba unengalo enye.
"Ndiyazama ukuzenzela ndedwa imisebenzi yam ndingancediswa mntu," utshilo efaka ucingo lokutshisela kumatshini atshisela ngawo engancediswa mntu.
Washunqulw' ingalo emva kwengozi yemoto eyasuba umphefumlo wonyana wakhe. Ngaloo mini uMokoena, inkosikazi yakhe, uMasesi, unyana wabo nabany' abantu babevela entlombeni yamagqirha kwaza kwagqabhuk' ivili yabhukuq' iven ababehamba ngayo.
"Unyana wam wasweleka ngoko nangoko, kwaye nam babecinga ukuba ndiswelekile. Bandiyeka ndalala iiyure ezintlanu apho endleleni xa bebalekisa abanye abantu ababeenzakele esibhedlele.
"Ndavuka esibhedlele sendishunqulwe ingalo eyayicinezelwe lucango lwemoto.
"Ndadana yiloo nto, ndingazi ukuba ingomso lam liyintoni kuba ndandicinga ukuba umkam nabantwana bam baza kundilahla njengokuba sele ndiyingxwelerha. Ndavuya kakhulu xa esithi umkam akazundishiya," utshilo uMokoena.
Waqala ngoko ke uMokoena ukuzama ukubuyisela ubomi bakhe esiqhelweni. Emva koko wakha indlu yecawe angumfundisi kuyo yedwa.
Ungumfundisi weHoly St Phillip Apostolic Church Of South Africa, uyintloko yeCommunity Police Forum (CPF) kwingingqi yakhe, ukanti ungusihlalo wekomiti echophela iimbambano zoluntu kwiingingqi ezintathu zase-Orange Farm.
"Asiyonkundla yasehlathini thina, qha sizama ukwakha uxolo kumalungu osapho nabamelwane abaxabeneyo," utshilo.
Njengelungu leCPF esebenzisana namapolisa eSAPS baphumelele ukunciphis' ulwaphulo-mthetho kwingingqi yabo.
"Mna ndilwa nolwaphulo-mthetho ndisombulule neembambano zeentsapho. Ndinceda nabantu abangenamakhaya nabagulayo," utshilo.
Udibanisa ulutsha lwamabandla ngamabandla kule ngingqi kumaphulo okuqokelel' imali.
"Oku kwenza ulutsha lube nento oluyenzayo kwaye kutsalela nolunye ulutsha ecaweni."
Ingaba uhamba njani wona umsebenzi wakhe wokuba ligqirha? Wayexhathisa kubizo lwentwaso de wakhathazwa liphupha elinye kathathu. "Ndaphupha kusithiwa mandiye eVaal River, ndifike nditshone ezantsi emanzini ndiya kulanda ingxowa yamathambo endiza kusebenza ngawo njengegqirha," utsho.
Kwiminyaka eyagqithayo usapho lwakowabo lwathatha amathambo kayise-mkhulu owayeligqirha baya kuwaphosa kumlambo iVaal emva kokusweleka kwakhe.
"Babengayamkeli into yokunyanga ngamayeza esintu ngoko babengafuni mntu uza kuphinda abenentwaso," utsho uMokoena.
AKUZANGE kumangalise ke ukungakholelwa kosapho lwakowabo xa uMokoena ebalisa amaphupha akhe.
"Sicela ungasivuseli iingxaki ezindala esagqithayo kuzo," babesitsho xa ebaxelela. Kodwa waluqinisekisa usapho lwakowabo ukuba makalandwe loo mathambo ayeseneminyaka engama-24 ephantsi kwamanzi.
Ngaphezulu wayenamashwa ngenxa yokungalusabeli olo bizo lwentwaso.
"Izinto zazingandihambeli kakuhle ebomini, kwaye ndinamaxesha okufa isiqaqa," utsho. Ngeny' imini uyise omkhulu wamchazela apho akhoyo amathambo esafe isiqaqa njalo.
"Wandiyala ukuba ndingayityesheli imiyalelo yakhe."
Into eyayimchana kukuba kuthiwe kufuneka antywile eVaal. "Into eyayindoyikisa kakhulu kukuba ndandingakwazi ukuqubha," utsho uMokoena.
Ngemini owawalanda ngayo wavuka ngentsimbi yesithathu kusasa. "Kaloku kwakuthiwe ephupheni ndiwalande kungekasi. Utat' omkhulu nabanye abantu ababevela ephupheni lam bathi baza kundilinda elunxwemeni lomlambo, ngoko ndandingafuni ukushiywa lixesha."
Wakhwela kwiteksi yokuqala ngo- 4.30 kusasa.
Walibala ukuphath' itawuli okanye ingubo ukuze ayombathe akuphuma emanzini kuba kwakusebusika.
"Kodwa ndamangaliswa kukuba ndandingoyiki tu," utsho.
WAZIPHOSA emlanjeni iVaal esanxibile kwindawo owayeyiboniswe ephupheni.
"Ndayifun' iiyure ezimbini loo ngxowa kwaye ndandijongile emanzini ndingafuni ukungayiboni," utsho. wehla enyuka eyifuna de wayifumana!
Esaqala ukuba ligqirha wayengathandi inkosikazi yakhe ihamb' icawe.
"Ndandiyicaphukela gqitha icawe. Ndandisela ibhiya ndize ndibeke iibhotile zayo esangweni xa inkosikazi ibuya ecaweni. Ndandiyinyanzela ukuba iyondithengel' ibhiya isanxibe isivatho secawe," utshilo.
Kodwa ethubeni wayeka ukucaphukela icawe. Wafikelwa nguyis' omkhulu ephupheni ephethe isabhokhwe wathi kuMokoena makafunde iBhayibhile ku-Isaiah 44 - esisahluko esiqala ngelithi: "Ngoku yiva Jakobhi sicaka sam; noSirayeli elilizwe endilikhethileyo..."
UMokoena wabamkela ubuKrestu kwaye emva kweminyaka embalwa uqalise elakhe ibandla ukanti ngoku linamasebe amahlanu kulo lonke eli.
Namhlanje uMokoena nowakwakhe osandul' ukuphuma ekuthwaseni, bahamba icawe kunye baphinde banyange abantu ngamayeza esintu... [x]

IINGCEBISO ZEMISEBENZI
1 YIBA NGOGQWESILEYO
Zama ukuwenzisisa umsebenzi wakho. "Wuthande umsebenzi. Ngokuya uyibona indima yakho, uza kuya ngokuwonwabela umsebenzi wakho," utsho uMarty Nemko ongumcebisi ngezomsebenzi.
Kwakhona: soloko ukhangela iindlela eziphucukileyo zokwenza umsebenzi wakho - kwaye uqiniseke ukuba uyazifumana izincomo ezikufaneleyo.
2 UKUZINIKELA
"Eminye imisebenzi yenze ngaphandle kokuthunywa - ingakumbi engafunwa mntu - ngokwenza njalo ubonakalisa ukuzinikela nomdla wakho ekufundeni wonke umsebenzi," utsho uRoman van Niekerk wenkampani yakwaKelly efumanela abantu imisebenzi.
3MAMELA
"Sonke sicinga ukuba siyakwazi ukumamela. Kodwa khawutsho, bangaphi abantu obaziyo ongathi ngenene bayakumamelisisa" Kwaye nabany' abantu andiqondi ukuba bayihoyile indlela omamela ngayo," utsho uNemko.
"Ukumamela kunzima kunokuba ucinga. Kufuneka uzikise ingqondo ngokupheleleyo kuloo nto umntu ayithethayo, ujonge ukutshintsha kwentshukumo yakhe yomzimba kunye nangakuthethiyo.
4 ZINZA
Ingqondo mayizinze, amaxesha kaxakeka ngawona aza kucacisa ukuba uyakwazi ukusebenza kakuhle nangexesha elixakekileyo.
5 XABISA IXESHA
Enye indlela yokuphucula iziphumo zomsebenzi wakho kukusebenzisa ixesha ngendlela efanelekileyo. "Umqeshi wakho uzakubona xa ulihlonipha ixesha lenkampani nenkuthalo yakho egqithisileyo, ngoko ke musa ukuligada ixesha lokuphuma," utsho uVan Niekerk.
"Fika ngexesha uphume mva, noba yimizuzu eli-15 emva kwexesha lokuphuma. Yitya ngamandla kusasa ukuze ungasolok' ufuna ithuba lokuya kufuna ukutya kwakusasa.
"Xa ulithatha ikhefu lesidlo sasemini, mazise umphathi wakho kwaye ubuye usenexesha elishiyekileyo."
Kwakweli nqaku, uNemko uthi iintlanganiso zezona ziyinkcitha-xesha emsebenzini. Ucebisa ukuba ujonge ukuba inyanzelekile ibekho na intlanganiso okanye ingalunga nembalelwano ye-e-mail...
OKOKUGQIBELA...
"Enye indlela yokuyibona inkqubela phambili yakho emsebenzini kukuya kujonga iCV yakho kwakhona uzibuze ukuba yintoni oyenzileyo kwezi nyanga zili-12 ezidlulileyo ongayongeza kuyo," ucebise watsho uLiz Ryan, owayesakuba yihuman-resources manager nongumsunguli weWorldWIT, umbutho wamabhinqa axoxa ngezemisebenzi kwi-intanethi.
"Xa ungafumani nto unokuyongeza kwiCV yakho engakunceda uzithengise kuthetha ukuba usemi ndawen' inye." [x]
okuhambela phambili emsebenzini wakho
BONA XHOSA July 2008
AMANYATHELO
Iingcali zithi ukwenza okulula njengokutshintsha indlela owenza ngayo umsebenzi wakho, njengokuphucula indlela yokumamela nokuba nesisa kwabanye abantu, ingawongeza amathuba akho okunyuselwa... Kubhale uTHANDI ZULU

ZININZI iinguqu ezenzekileyo kuqeqesho lomsebenzi wezihombo ezenziwa ngamatye anqabileyo. "Uqeqesho lwalusenziwa iminyaka emihlanu ngumntu lowo uza kusebenza ngezihombo aze ahlawulwe umvuzo olingeneyo iminyaka emihlanu phambi kokuba aye kwenza uvavanyo lomsebenzi," kuchaza uChris De Beer oyintloko yoyilo nokuveliswa kwezihombo eDurban Institute Of Technology.
"IiTechnikon zaye zaqalis' izifundo zokuyilwa kwezihombo kuba zibona ukunqongophala kwabantu abaqeqeshelwe ubuchule bokuyila izihombo.
"Lakhula eli candelo zaza izifundo zagxininisa nakwizifundo ezifana nemanagement, igemology, itheory, idesign nemarketing.
"Neekhomyutha zingenile kakhulu kolu shishino yaye zizo ezize neenguqu kakhulu.
"Ezi nguqu zenze kwakho izihombo eziziintlobo ngeentlobo ezenziwa kweli. Inqanaba lezihombo ezenziwe eMzantsi Afrika lisaphuculwa yaye makhulu amathuba okuveliswa kwezihombo zeli.
"Ndingathanda ukubona ezi zihombo zinempembelelo yaseAfrika. Abafundi bethu baqiqile kakhulu yaye uninzi lwabo bazenzela ezabo lo gama abanye bezenza bazithengise ngoku besafunda ezabo izihombo."
UDaniel Kolobe utyelelise iBONA kwinkampani evelisa izihombo apho asebenza njengomyili wezihombo ophezulu.
Lo msebenzi unik' umdla - ukuxhonkxa izihombiso ukusa ekuzisikeni uzipolishe ukuze zimenyezele zithi ndithenge.
"Phakathi kwezifundo endandizenza ngethuba ndisenza ifine arts eFree State kukuyilwa kwezihombo. Ndabona ukuba ndinesiphiwo sokuyil' izihombo waza umhlohli wam wandikhuthaza ukuba ndiqhubeke nesi sifundo," kutsho uDaniel.
"Kwakunzima ukwenza ezi zifundo kodwa kuba ndisenz' into endiyithandayo. Saba bathathu kuphela abaphumelela isidanga kwezi zifundo saza senza imiboniso yomsebenzi wethu ngo-2002. Abaphathi bale nkampani ndiphangela kuyo ngoku bawuthand' umsebenzi wethu baza bandinik' umsebenzi."
UDaniel wenza zonk' iindidi zoyilo lwezihombo esebenzisa imizobo yesandla kunye nekhompyutha.
Ubukhulu becala uyila izihombo ezininzi ezilungel' ukuthengiswa ezivenkileni kodwa uyabenzela nabantu abazifunela ezabo izihombo.
"Ndiba nochulumanco kakhulu xa ndenze isihombo ngethemba lokuba nomxumi uya kuba nolo chulumanco xa esibona," utshilo uDaniel.
Amathuba engqesho
Abany' abayili nabavelisi bezihombo bathanda ukuzivelisa izihombo. Abanye bathanda ukuziyila bazithengise kwaye banxibelelane nabaxumi.
Ungazithenga uziqalel' ishishini lakho.
"Uninzi lwabafundi bazivulele amashishini yaye abanye babo bayaphumelela. Kubalulekile ukuba ufumane amava omsebenzi kuqala ufunde nesantya sokusebenza phambi kokuvula ishishini," utsho uChris De Beer.
Umvuzo ongawufumana
Umyili okanye umvelisi wezihombo okwinqanaba elisezantsi ufumana umvuzo ophakathi kwe-R3 000 ne-R5 000 ngenyanga xa ekwivenkile ezithengisayo okanye ezivelisayo.
Xa sel' unolwazi ufuman' umvuzo ngokomsebenzi wakho.
Iinkampani ezininzi zihlawul' imivuzo yabasebenzi ngokwengeniso eziyenzayo. Ngamany' amazwi xa unolwazi olubhetele uvelisa kakhulu uze ufuman' umvuzo othe kratya ongafikelela kwi-R20 000 nangaphaya kuxhomekeka kwindawo nobungakanani benkampani osebenza kuyo.
Uyakunqandwa ziinkwenkwezi xa ungumyili ophum' izandla oneshishini lakhe!
Iimfuneko zemfundo
Ukuze ukwazi ukufundela ukuyila nokuvelis' izihombo eTechnikon kufuneka ube nesiqinisekiso sematriki. Abafundi abafun' ukwenza ezi zifundo bayavavanywa baze babhal' uviwo. Kuyanceda ukuba nomqulu obonisa umsebenzi wakho wobuchule.
Amaziko emfundo
Izifundo zokuyilwa nokuveliswa kwezihombo ziyenziwa eDurban Institute Of Technology, eTshwane University Of Technology, eUniversity Of Johannesburg, eCape Peninsula University Of Technology, eCentral University Of Technology, eseFree State naseStellenbosch University.
Abafumene izidanga baba sethubeni lokwenza uvavanyo lomsebenzi besakugqib' uqeqesho lomsebenzi lweminyaka emibini. [x]

Ukuzihlangula ekuxhatshazweni
NGETHUBA uxelela udadewenu ukuba izinto azihambi kakuhle phakathi kwakho nomyeni wakho uziva ulusizi.
Umxelela ngendlela afuna ukubulawula ngayo ubomi bakho nto leyo imenza axakeke udadewenu. Uthi kuwe, unethamsanqa wena kuba unendoda ekuthanda ngolu hlobo.
Xa uxelel' umhlobo wakho ukuba kukho into engahambi kakuhle eluthandweni lwenu ukubonisa iziva ezibi azenziwe ngumyeni wakhe...
Uzityand' igila kumama wakho umxelele ukuba le ndoda iyakuthuka ikutyhole ngokungaziphathi kakuhle qho xa nibuya epatini. Unikin' intloko aze athi: "Nokuba angakuthuka asoze akonzakalise, xa engekakubethi nje kuphela akunanto."
Ungayikholwa loo nto! Nokuba iqabane lakho alikubethi, xa likuthuka, likuphoxa liyakonzakalisa! Xa uhlala uthukwa uphela unodandatheko nothotho lweziny' iingxaki!

Ayisithi sonke esikwaziyo ukuphumelela izifundo. Makubekho inkqubo yemfundo ekhokelela abafundi kwisakhono sabo.

Ukuthembeka kuwenza ube nesidima nesithozela umtshato. Kwenza abo batshatileyo bakwazi ukumelana neenzingo zomtshato.

Xa nithembene niyakhuselana, nithandane nikhuthazane.

Uyalivuma ityala lakhe
Nditsala iminyaka emibini entolongweni ngenxa yokuba imoto. Ndiyavuma ukuba ayilunganga into endayenzayo yaye nesohlwayo endisifumeneyo ndiyasamkela.
Akukho mnandi entolongweni. Kodwa indincedile kakhulu iBONA yandikhuthaza. Iyimagazini yam endiyithandayo!
nguNhlanhla Ndebele, eBenoni
Ungalahlekelwa yiyo yonk' into onayo...
Uninzi lwabantu luyangcakaza kanye emva kwexesha elithile - yaye bangcakaza ngobulumko.
Kodwa ke bakho abo bahendekayo bangcakaze okoko kuba befun' intywenka yemali ekhawulezayo.
Kuthi kusakubanjalo babe ngamakhoboka okungcakaza - nto leyo ineziphumo ezibi kwiintsapho zabo. Buyatshabalal'ubomi babantu ngenxa yokungcakaza.
Ukungcakaza akuyiyo indlela yokwenz' imali. Xa ucinga ukuba ungaphumelela ekhasino, uyaziqhatha.
nguAaron Tlou, eTweefontein [x]
Sincede ukuze nathi sikuncede
"IBONA ifikelela kwiindawo ezingafikelelekiyo," utsho uMnu. Mnguni. Ngaba ngenene kunjalo"
NGABA UYAYIFUMANA IBONA EBHALWE NGOLWIMI LWAKHO KWINDAWO OHLALA KUYO"
Sicela usixelele xa ungayifumani imagazini engolwimi lwakho. Sibhalele kwidilesi yeeLeta Eziya kuMhleli uze usinike ezi nkcukacha zilandelayo: ufuna eyaluphi ulwimi; igama lendawo ohlala kuyo kunye negama levenkile odla ngokuyithenga kuyo imagazini yakho.
Nkosi sikekel' iBONA!
Abantu kufuneka bayazi into yokokuba iBONA iyimagazini phakathi kwezinye. Kudala yayikho nangamaxesha eenzingo. Iyazama nokugcina ixabiso layo lifikeleleka.
IBONA iyabakhathalela abantu abangaphangeliyo nabagulayo. IBONA ifikelela kwiindawo ekungafikeleleki kuzo. INkosi iyisikelele iBONA!
nguSM, eReitz

ABANTU besizwe samaNguni abazingcayo abavela kwiGreat Lakes babengcwaba abantu babo bebasongele ngeemfele zeenkomo. Yayiyindlela yaseAfrika yokungcwaba. Kwafika amaKoloniyali anyanzela abantu ukuba babangcwabe ngeebhokisi zemithi abantu babo - "imikhumbi yamakoloniyali" esasetyenziswa nangoku.
Ndifun' ukungcwatywa ndize, ndisongwe ngofele lwenkomo njengoko kuyinto yaseAfrika leyo. Kodwa imithetho yaseAfrika inxamnye naloo nto!
Kufuneka ungcwatywe ngomkhumbi!
Ndifuna kube semthethweni ukungcwaba umntu esongelwe ngofele lwenkomo.
Ndibhalele uPallo Jordan ongumphathiswa wenkcubeko namasiko ndicel' inkxaso.
Ukubuyisa izithethe zaseAfrika kwicandelo lemingcwabo nokuvumela bonke abemi beli ukuba bangcwatywe besongelwe ngeemfele zeenkomo kuhambisana nombono kaMongameli Mbeki weBuyambo yeAfrika.
Ndifun' ukungcwatywa ndize!
Abafundi baza kulikhumbula ibali lethu elashicilelwa ngoFebruwari elalingemikhumbi yesintu eyenziwa eBronkhorstspruit yinkampani elawulwa nguBeau Brummel. Eli bali lalisixelela ukuba esakusweleka uBeau ufuna ukungcwatywa eze esongelwe ngofele lwenkomo yaye kubekho igqirha emngcwabeni wakhe. Akukho lula ukwenza yonke loo nto. UBeau usithumelele eli nqaku...
Ungalisebenzisa igama oziqamba lona kodwa sicela usinike igama lakho elipheleleyo nedilesi. Asitsho ukuba siyavumelana nezimvo zabafundi bethu ezishicilelwe kula maphepha yaye sinelungelo lokuzihlela ezo sizishicilelayo.

Usinde cebetshu
Ugetyengelwe ubuthi
Omnye umntwana ogetyengwe kabuhlungu...
kubhale uTSHWARELO ESENG MOGAKANE/AENS
NGOMMANGALISO othile wasinda ngezikaSibi xa wahlaselwa ngokuhlasimlisayo kuza kwenziwa ngaye amayeza, kodwa kuFortune Khumalo oneminyaka esibhozo intlungu kungona iqalayo. Phakathi kwezinye izinto, oogqirha bathi akanakuba nabo abantwana njengoko amalungu akhe angasese anqunyulwa kuhlaselo lwangomhla wama-25 ka-Agasti.
Kuza kufuneka enziwe utyando ukuze akwazi ukuchama.
Ngexesha lokubhalwa kweli nqaku, le nkwenkwana yakwaKhumalo ibisekwisibhedlele i-Dr George Mukhari eGa-Rankuwa, ngasePitoli. Unina wayo okhathazekileyo, uNancy Siweya, uhlala nezalamane ukuze abe nako ukuyityelela ntsuku zonke.
"Kunzima kum ukwamkela into eyenzeke emntwaneni wam. Kodwa ke, ndiyambulela uThixo kuba esaphila," utsho njalo uSiweya.
Oogqirha bamxelele ukuba unyana wakhe ube nethamsanqa ukuba asinde kolu hlaselo.
"Bathi ngumfana owomelele gqitha ukuba akwazi ukusinda," utsho njalo.
Le nkwenkwana yayizidlalela isoka nabahlobo bayo ngenjika-langa yelishwa yangoMgqibelo kwilali yaseJilongo ngaseGiyani eLimpopo yaza yaya ematyholweni isiya kuzinceda.
"Yayikumganyana ongephi ukusuka kwibala lokudlala, xa ngequbuliso kwathi gqi indoda engaziwayo," utsho njalo lo kaSiweya.
Le ndoda yayirhuqa le nkwenkwana iyingenisa phakathi ematyholweni, yakrazula ibhulukhwe yayo ngemela, yathi hlasi amalungu ayo angasese yawanqumla.
Isenza konke oku nje le ndoda ayitsho nelimdaka.
UKhumalo owothukileyo nowayelijaja ligazi wakhala esimantshiyane ecela uncedo waza wancedwa ngumntu owayezidlulela ngendlela wambalekisela esibhedlele.
Okoyikisayo
URisimati Hlungwane, inqununu yaseShingombe Primary, isikolo afunda kuso uFortune, uthi abanye abantwana bothuswe gqitha sesi sihelegu.
"Abantwana basuke basitsho esofelweyo. Ayimangalisi into yokuba akukho ukwaziyo ukumilisel' ingqondo ezifundweni. Sonke siphazamiseke gqitha," utsho njalo.
Uthi ibhodi elawula isikolo yabamba intlanganiso ekhawulezileyo emva kwesi sihelegu ukuze ibonisane ngendlela olungancediswa ngayo olu sapho.
"Sasixhalatyiswe yinto yokuba olu sapho lwale nkwenkwe aluthathi ntweni. Abazali bayo abaphangeli yaye kwakufuneka behambe umgama omde ukuya ePitoli," utsho njalo okaHlungwane.
Isikolo sasungula ingxowa-mali yokuncedisana nolu sapho. Abafundi bacelwa ukuba babinze nge-R2 umfundi ngamnye, ngelixa ootitshala bathi baza kugida nge-R200 ititshala nganye, yaye ukuza kuthi ga ngoku sele kwenziwe
ama-R5 000.
Incedisile kwiindleko zohambo, kodwa kusadingeka amalizo nangakumbi ukuze kuhlawulelwe iindleko zesibhedlele.
Umrhanelwa oneminyaka engama-23 ubudala wabanjwa ngosuku olulandela olo lohlaselo kwaye kuthiwa wayesaphethe amalungu angasese enkwenkwe leyo.
Uvumile
Isithethi samapolisa aseLimpopo uNtsumpa uMohale Ramatseba, uthe umrhanelwa uvumile ukuba usike amalungu angasese ale nkwenkwana yaye uthe ebecebe ukuwathengisa eGauteng.
Umrhanelwa wabekwa ityala lokuzama ukubulala nokufunyanwa enamalungu omzimba womntu.
Akabuzwanga nokuba uyalivuma okanye akalivumi kusini na ityala xa wayevele emaplangeni kwinkundla kamantyi eMalamulele ngomhla we-19 kuSeptemba, kwaye wagcinwa eluvalelweni.
"Akasazi nokusazi thina," utsho njalo uSiweya.
"Ngokolwazi esinalo, nakuba ehlala kwilali yethu, uhlala kude nekhaya lethu."
Waleke ngelithi unethemba lokuba uThixo uza kumpha isibindi sokuba intliziyo yakhe ikwazi ukuxolela umhlaseli wonyana wakhe. [x]
African Eye News Service
UNAKO UKUNCEDA
Khawuncede uFortune aphile kulo mhlola umanyumnyezi! Thumela amalizo akho kwingxowa-mali i-Fortune Khumalo Family Trust Fund, First National Bank, Malamulele Branch, Cheque Account # 62151417360.
BONA XHOSA - November 2007
UFortune nonina uNancy. Le nkwenkwana isachacha kuhle phantsi konyango.
Okuthethwa ngamaxhwele
"Abona bantu babulala ngenjongo yokwenza amayeza ngabo kuthiwa ngamagedla - amaxhwele angekakwazi ukunyanga - abathi bathembise abanye abantu ukuba baza kubenza izityebi ukuba nje bangabaphathela amalungu omzimba womntu," utsho njalo u-Anna Mphephu Rikhotso, obengusiyazi kangangeminyaka engama-40 nosisithethi soMbutho wamaGqirha eMveli kwisebe eliseVosloorus.
"Abanye basebenzisa imigulukudu okanye abantu ngabanye abathi bahambe besenzakalisa abantwana, ngenxa yokuba bakholelwa ukuba abantwana banamandla okuzisela abantu iintsikelelo, ngaloo ndlela kuqinisekiswa ubutyebi obunqwenelekayo.
"La magongqongqo akhohlakeleyo amelwe adandalaziswe ekuhleni!"
"Akukho yeza linokwenza umntu abe sisityebi," utsho njalo uMfundisi u-TJ Maphosa, obephilisa ngomthandazo kangangeminyaka eyi-34. "Ngamandla ezinyanya zakowenu kuphela anokukwenza uphumelele.
"Iyeza akukho mfuneko yokuba lifakwe izithako 'zabantu' ukuze lisebenze. Izinyanya zibonisa amaxhwele namagqirha iyeza lokuphilisa hayi ukubulala."
Kufuneka kusekwe ikomishoni yophando ukuze kuphandwe ukuba amaxhwele la namagqirha anesandla na ekubulaweni kwabantu ngeenjongo zokwenza amayeza, ucebisa elo ukhohlel' esingeni onguMartha Mongoya wombutho i-Gauteng Traditional And Faith Medical Practitioners.
"Ixhwele okanye igqirha elithwasileyo alibulali ukuze lenze amayeza okanye ligcine iinyama zomntu kwindawo yalo yokunyanga ukuze lizisebenzisele izinto zonyango.
"Olu phando luza kuba luncedo ekususeni igama elibi esityatyekwa lona kuze kusitshulwe neengcambu amabhedengu akhohlakeleyo kulo msebenzi.
"Kufanele kukhutshwe amaxhwele namagqirha aye kwindawo nganye ekunyangelwa kuyo. Nabani na ofunyenwe enamalungu omntu umele ohluthwe ilungelo lokunyanga aze anikezelwe kwabakwantsasana."
Amaxhwele namagqirha angabhaliswanga okanye angathwasanga amele ayekiswe ukusebenza, utyibela atsho.
- Force Khashane

Inkcazelo
Esi sikhokelo sithunyelwa xa kwenziwe isicelo sokuba umvuzo womrhafi uxhuzulelwe irhafu ngepesenti esisigxina. Umqashi nguye ekufuneka athumele esi sicelo egameni lomqeshwa.
Izikhokelo azitshintsheleki, kwaye xa umqeshwa ethe watshintsha imo yakhe yengqesho, kufuneka kwenziwe isicelo esitsha. Ukubangaba usebenzela abaqashi abaninzi, yenza izicelo zezikhokelo ezohlukeneyo ngokomqashi ngamnye.
Kufuneka iikopi zeencwadi zengqesho, izivumelwano ezizikhontrakthi zenkonzo kunye neminye imiqulu ebandakanyekayo, ukuze kungqinisiswe iimeko nemigaqo yengqesho.
Isikhokelo sokuxhuzula irhafu ngepesenti esisigxina siyakukhutshelwa ixesha elithi ga kwiinyanga ezili 12, kwaye kufuneka sivuselelwe emva koko.
Entla
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Qinisekisa ukuba imibandela yakho yerhafu ime kakuhle phambi kokuba wenze isicelo sesikhokelo serhafu. I-SARS ayidli ngokusikhupha isikhokelo serhafu ukubangaba kukho iincwadi zokubuyisa zerhafu ongekazibuyisi okanye kukho iintlawulo ongekazenzi.
Faka ezi zinto zilandelayo kwisicelo sakho sesikhokelo serhafu:
Faka le miqulu ilandelayo kwisicelo sakho:
o ikopi yesivumelwano esiyikhontrakthi yenkonzo (apho kuboniswa khona iinkcukacha zokunikwa kwenkonzo kunye nemigaqo)
Entla
Entla
Ixesha elithatyathwayo kunye nomgangatho ofikelelwayo
Sakube sivunyiwe isicelo yi-SARS, kuyakuthunyelwa ubungqina kwisithuba seentsuku ezimbalwa. Kodwa ke, sona isikhokelo esigunyazisiweyo serhafu singathabatha ukuyakutsho kwiiveki ezine.

I-Cape Gateway yinkonzo karhulumente ejoliswe kubemi beNtshona Koloni, ebonelela ngolwazi ngorhulumente wedolophu, owephondo nowesizwe

Iipemethe yomntu ocela ukukhuselwa ngumbuso
Iinkonzo zabantu
Iinkonzo zemibutho
Iinkonzo zabantu bamazwe angaphandle
Khetha ulwimi
Iipemethe yomntu ocela ukukhuselwa ngumbuso
Shicilela eli phepha/Printa eli phepha
Yongeza kwimiba ethandwayo
Beka njengephepha lokuqala
Nxulumana nathi
Imephu yesiza
Ikhasi lokuqala
Iinkonzo zabantu bamazwe angaphandle
Ukungena eMzantsi Afrika
Iipemethe yomntu ocela ukukhuselwa ngumbuso
Isicelo sepemethe yomntu ocela ukukhuselwa ngumbuso
Inkcazelo
Isicelo sokukhuselwa ngumbuso (asylum) sisicelo somenzi-sicelo sokuba avunywe njengembacu.
Umntu ocela ukukhuselwa ngumbuso ngumntu obaleke elizweni lakhe lemvelaphi ngenxa yokoyika ukungcungcuthekiswa (ngokwentlalo, ngokwenkcubeko, ngokwezopolitiko, ngokwenkolo yobutyalike, nankqu ngokwezoqoqosho), kwaye ocela ukuvunywa njengembacu - kule meko ke eMzantsi Afrika. Umenzi-sicelo uhlala engumntu ocela ukuvunywa njengembacu ngelilixa isicelo sakhe sisaqwalaselwayo.
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Umntu ocela ukukhuselwa ngumbuso ufaka isicelo ngokwakhe kwindawo echongiweyo yoKwamkela iiMbacu, apho kwenziwa ezi zinto zilandelayo:
Umenzi-sicelo uqale aphononongwe imeko yakhe
Umenzi-sicelo unyatheliswa iminwe (iifingaprinti)
Kuziswa itoliki (ukuba oko kuyimfuneko)
IGosa lokuQulungqa uBume beeMbacu liyaqhubeka ngokulamla kule nyewe yesicelo kwaye lithabatha isigqibo malunga nesicelo sokukhuselwa ngumbuso.
Ubume bobumbacu buhlala iminyaka emibini, kodwa imbacu kufuneka ibhale incwadi icele ukuqwalaselwa ngokutsha kobume bobumbacu okanye ukongezelelwa kwexesha lokusebenziseka kobume bobumbacu, kwiinyanga ezintathu phambi kokuba obo bume bobumbacu buphelelwe.
Ixesha elithatyathwayo kunye nomgangatho ofikelelwayo
Izicelo zingathabatha ixesha elifikelela kwiinyanga ezintandathu.
Iindleko
Le nkonzo ayihlawulelwa.
Nceda ukhethe iphondo
Nxulumana nathi
Imephu yesiza
IiMeko neMiqathango yokuSetyenziswa

Inkcazelo
Ukulobela ukurhweba Commercial fishing kukwenza umsebenzi onxulumene nokuloba ofana nokuthumela iintlanzi zolwandle kumazwe angaphandle ngenjongo yokuzithengisa. Ukuze uthumele iintlanzi zolwandle marine fish kumazwe angaphandle okanye ngaphandle kwemida yeRiphabliki yoMzantsi Afrika, kufuneka wenze isicelo sepemithi yokuthumela kumazwe angaphandle nesivunywa nguMphathiswa weSebe leMicimbi yokusiNgqongileyo noKhenketho Minister of Environmental Affairs and Tourism okanye omnye umntu onegunya lokwenza oko. Akukho mntu uya kuthumela iintlanzi zolwandle kumazwe angaphandle ngaphandle kwepemithi. Xa ipemithi yokuthumela kumazwe angaphandle ebikho iphelelelwe emva kweenyanga ezintathu, kufuneka wenze isicelo sepemithi entsha. Ukungaphumeleli ukubambelela kwimiqathango yepemithi kunganeziphumo zokunqunyanyiswa okanye ukurhoxiswa kwepemithi.
Entla
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Yenza isicelo sepemithi yokuthumela iintlanzi kumazwe angaphandle.
Nikezela ngale ngcaciso ilandelayo:
o ubungakanani beentlobo eziza kuthunyelwa kumazwe angaphandle o kwimeko yaxa kukho i-arhente ebandakanyekayo, kufuneka kuqhotyoshelwe isivumelwano phakathi kwamaqela achaphazelekayo amabini kunye neekopi zezazisi zabo banelungelo lokusayina (ID copies of signatories)
Intlawulo yokwenza isicelo eyi- R225 (equka konke) iyafuneka.
Izicelo zentsusa mazithunyelwe ngeposi, ukuze ingakhutshwa ipemithi xa ungakwenzanga oko.
Entla
Entla
Ixesha elithatyathwayo kunye nomgangatho ofikelelwayo
Inkqubo yokwenza isicelo ingathatha iintsuku ezisi-7 kwezomsebenzi okanye ngaphezulu ngokuxhomekeke ekufakweni kwesicelo ngokufanelekileyo.
Entla
Iindleko
Iinkcukacha zokubhankisha ukwenzela intlawulo yokwenza isicelo sepemithi yokuthumela iiintlanzi kumazwe angaphandle:
Ikhowudi yeSebe: 204109

Inkcazelo
Eli liziko lokutsalela umnxeba lokuxela ngobugebenga elisebenza iiyure ezingama 24 (ifumaneka iiyure zonke), kwaye lisingatha izikhalazo zoluntu. Ungatsala umnxeba kwifowuni ye-telkom okanye kwiselulafowuni. Yonke iminxeba engena kweli ziko iyashicilelwa.
Qaphela: Cofa le nombolo kuphela kwiimeko zonxunguphalo nongxamiseko. Ungayenzi indlalo le nombolo kuba oko:
kuthintela iminxeba esuka kubantu abakwiimeko ezibeka ubomi babo emngciphekweni kwaye abadinga uncedo lwamapolisa kuchitha ixesha lamapolisa njengoko amapolisa kungafuneka aye ngenqwelo okanye ngenqwelontaka kuloo ndawo ekuthiwa kwenzeka kuyo ubugebenga kuyinkcitho yezinto eziyimfuneko njengoko amagosa engasiwa kwindawo engenanxunguphalo nangxamiseko.
Kwizikhalazo nje ezingephi kunye naxa ubuzisa ngokubanzi, tsalela umnxeba kwisikhululo samapolisa esikufuphi kuwe.
Entla
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Tsalela umnxeba kwinombolo ethi 10 111 naphina eMzantsi Afrika.
Igosa eliphendula iminxeba liyaphendula, lize ke lithabathe yonke inkcazelo neenkcukacha eziyimfuneko
Inkcazelo ifakwa elugcinweni, uze ke unikwe inombolo yokubuzisa njengobungqina nokwenzela ukuba ubuzise ngayo kwixa elizayo.
Entla
Entla
Ixesha elithatyathwayo kunye nomgangatho ofikelelwayo
Zonke iifowuni ezingenayo ziphendulwa kwamsinyane kangangoko kunokwenzeka.
Entla
Iindleko

Iinkonzo zemibutho
Inkcazelo
I-learnership (inkqubo yokufunda nokuqeqeshela umsebenzi) yindlela eyenye yokuqeqesha egxininisa kumava okwenza umsebenzi.
Ii-Learnerships zibandakanya ukufunda kwigumbi lokufundela, kwiziko loqeqesho okanye kwikholeji, kunye nokuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini nqo kwindawo yokusebenza.
Ukuze ufumane inkcazelo ebanzi, yiya kwiSebe leZabasebenzi.
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Khangela umntu kwinkampani okanye kwiziko lakho akhokele abafundi kwaye abancede ngengxaki abangajongana nazo mhlawumbi kule nkampani yakho.
Khangela umntu wokuncedisa umfundi ngenxenye yezifundo zengqondo ze-learnership ngokukhetha umniki-nkonzo zoqeqesho. Lo mniki-nkonzo zoqeqesho kufuneka abe unikwe uqinisekiso lokuvunywa nokwamkelwa yi-SETA.
Abaqeshi bangakhetha abafundi kwalapha kubasebenzi babo okanye bangakhetha abantu abangaphangeliyo bangenele i-learnership. Ukubangaba abaqeshi bafuna abantu abangaphangeliyo kwii-learnerships, banganxulumana neziko lezabasebenzi elikufuphi kubo ukuze bafumane uluhlu lwamagama akhoyo abantu abangaphangeliyo. Akunyanzelekanga ukuba abaqeshi babaqeshe aba bafundi bangaphangeliyo emva kwee-learnership.
Abaqeshi, abaniki-nkonzo zoqeqesho kunye nabafundi kufuneka basayine isivumelwano se-learnership.
Akuba egqityiwe wonke la manyathelo, abaqeshi bangayiqhuba i-learnership.
Ixesha elithatyathwayo kunye nomgangatho ofikelelwayo

Le nkonzo ayihlawulelwa.
Yenza isicelo kwiSebe leZabasebenzi

I-Cape Gateway yinkonzo karhulumente ejoliswe kubemi beNtshona Koloni, ebonelela ngolwazi ngorhulumente wedolophu, owephondo nowesizwe

Isicelo sokwamkelwa kugrade R kwisikolo soluntu es
Iinkonzo zabantu
Iinkonzo zemibutho
Iinkonzo zabantu bamazwe angaphandle
Khetha ulwimi
Isicelo sokwamkelwa kugrade R kwisikolo soluntu es
Isicelo sokuphinda unikwe isatifiketi sematriki
Isicelo sokubhalisa umfundi kwinkqubo yokufundisel
Isicelo sokubhalisela ukubangumfundisintsapho leMfundo eSisiseko noQeqesho lwaBantu aBadala
Shicilela eli phepha/Printa eli phepha
Yongeza kwimiba ethandwayo
Beka njengephepha lokuqala
Nxulumana nathi
Imephu yesiza
Ikhasi lokuqala
Iinkonzo zabantu
Imfundo noqeqesho
Isikolo
Isicelo sokwamkelwa kugrade R kwisikolo soluntu es
Inkcazelo
U-Grade R ngunyaka wokuqala wesigaba sesiseko semfundo esekelwe kwiziphumo kwizikolo zoluntu zamabanga aphantsi (zaseprayimari). Eli banga lilungiselelwe abantwana abaneminyaka yobudala emine nesiqingatha ukuya kwemihlanu nesiqingatha. Abazali kunye nabantu abangabalondolozi babantwana kufuneka babhalise abantwana babo esikolweni phambi komhla wokuvala, ophakathi kuka-Agasti no-Okthobha, wonyaka ophambi kokuba abantwana baqale.
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Bhalisa kwisikolo esikufuphi kuwe.
Hambisa isatifiketi sokuzalwa kunye nekhadi lokugonywa.
Ukuba awungommi waseMzantsi Afrika, hambisa nezi ncwadi zilandelayo;
Ifom yokuhlala yexeshana okanye yesigxina ephuma kwiSebe lezeKhaya, kunye
Nobungqina bokuba usenzile isicelo semvume yokuhlala eMzantsi Afrika..
Ixesha elithatyathwayo kunye nomgangatho ofikelelwayo
Isicelo sakho singathabatha imini enye ukuya kutsho kwiiveki ezintandathu ukuze siphunyezwe.
Iindleko
Iintlawulo ezibizwayo zesikolo ziyahluka ngokwezikolo.
Nxulumana nathi
Imephu yesiza
IiMeko neMiqathango yokuSetyenziswa

Isicelo sesikhokelo serhafu intlawulo yomvuzo womq
Isicelo sesikhokelo serhafu: intlawulo yomvuzo womqondisi
Inkcazelo
Inkqubo emayilandelwe

Iindleko
Inkcazelo
UMthetho weRhafu yeNgeniso-mali, wango 1962 (Income Tax Act, 1962), ulungiselela iimeko apho kungenziwa khona isicelo sesikhokelo serhafu.
Entla
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Xa usenza isicelo sesikhokelo serhafu, qinisekisa ukuba imibandela yakho yerhafu ime kakuhle. I-SARS ayidli ngokusikhupha isikhokelo serhafu ukubangaba kukho iincwadi zokubuyisa zerhafu ongekazifaki okanye unemali ongekayihlawuli yerhafu.
Kufuneka kufakwe kwifom yesicelo le nkcazelo isisiseko ilandelayo:
Intlawulo yomvuzo egqityelwe ukufunyanwa kubandakanywa izibonelelo ezisecaleni, umzekelo i50% yesibonelelo sohambo kodwa ingabandakanyi izixa zezambuku kunye neengeniso ezenziwe ngabaqondisi okanye abaqeshwa ngokuphathelelene namalungelo okufumana izibambiso ezithengisekayo.
Unyaka wovavanyo ekufunyenwe ngawo intlawulo yomvuzo.
Inani leenyanga ezigqityiweyo ekwagqityelwa ngazo ukufunyanwa intlawulo eyaziwayo yomvuzo.
Intlawulo yomvuzo eqikelelwayo okanye eyiyo nqo kunyaka omiyo. (le nkcazelo mayinikwe xa isizathu somyalelo iyinzima).
Isicelo masiqulathe izizathu zesikhokelo. Xhasa ezi zizathu ngeencwadi ezibandakanyekayo, umzekelo, iingxelo zemali zethutyana kunye nemizuzu yeentlanganiso ezibanjwe ngabaqondisi, ebonisa ukuba iintlawulo zemivuzo eyakuhlawulwa abaqondisi iyakubangaphantsi kwaleyo yonyaka wovavanyo ophelileyo.
Entla
Entla
Ixesha elithatyathwayo kunye nomgangatho ofikelelwayo
Akukho xesha elisisigxina.
Entla
Iindleko
Le nkonzo ayihlawulelwa.
Entla
Entla

Nxulumana nathi

Inkcazelo
Le mali ifunyanwa kwixhoba ngeendlela eziliqela:
Ixhoba licelwa ukuba lifake imali kwi-akhawunti yebhanki echaziweyo ukuze kuhlawulwe iindleko zokungenela olu rhwebo.
Yakube ikhutshiwe intlawulo yokuqala, kungavela "ubunzima" obuyakudala imfuneko yenye intlawulo.
Kungabizwa intlanganiso kumazwe athile, kwaye lakuba ixhoba likweli lizwe, ipaspoti yalo iyoxuthwa kwaye liyabanjwa kude kufunyanwe imali eyaneleyo.
Ukuze ufumane inkcazelo ebanzi yiya kwiNkonzo yaMapolisa aseMzantsi Afrika.
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Xela apha kwimiqulu ukuba "Akukho lahleko yemali" okanye "Ikhona ilahleko yemali".
Nika iinkcukacha zakho zonxulumano kunye nenombolo okanye iinombolo zefowuni okanye ezo zaloo mntu okanye abo bantu bachaphazelekayo.
Abemi nabahlali bamazwe angaphandle:
Thumela ikopi yembalelwano ye "419" efunyenweyo, ngefeksi, kuNtsumpa weCandelo loBugebenga boRhwebo leNkonzo yaMapolisa aseMzantsi Afrika okanye kwiZiko loMthunywa oMkhulu/kwiNdlu yoZakuzo/kwiZiko loMmeli-Lizwe waseMzantsi Afrika ukuze igqithiselwe kwiNkonzo yaMapolisa aseMzantsi Afrika.
Nika iinkcukacha zebhanki (ukuba oko kuyabandakanyeka).
Xela ukuba "Akukho Lahleko yeMali" okanye "Ikhona iLahleko yeMali".
Nika iinkcukacha zakho zonxulumano kunye nenombolo okanye iinombolo zefowuni okanye ezo zaloo mntu okanye abo bantu bachaphazelekayo.
Imithetho esetyenziswayo
Ixesha elithatyathwayo kunye nomgangatho ofikelelwayo
INkonzo yaMapolisa aseMzantsi Afrika yiyo eqingqa ithuba lexesha lokukhutshwa kweengxelo zenkqubela. Ngokubanzi iingxelo zikhutshwa qho emva kweeveki ezimbini, kuxhomekeke kwiimeko zenyewe.
Iindleko
Le nkonzo ayihlawulelwa.
Azikho, kodwa kubalulekile uchaze apha kwimiqulu ukubangaba ufumene ilahleko yemali.
Nxulumana nathi
Imephu yesiza
IiMeko neMiqathango yokuSetyenziswa

Inkcazelo
UMthetho weRhafu yeNgeniso-mali, wango 1962 (Income Tax Act, 1962), ulungiselela iimeko apho kungenziwa khona isicelo sesikhokelo serhafu.
Entla
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Xa usenza isicelo sesikhokelo serhafu, qinisekisa ukuba imibandela yakho yerhafu ime kakuhle. I-SARS ayidli ngokusikhupha isikhokelo serhafu ukubangaba kukho iincwadi zokubuyisa zerhafu ongekazifaki okanye unemali ongekayihlawuli yerhafu.
Kufuneka kufakwe kwifom yesicelo le nkcazelo isisiseko ilandelayo:
Intlawulo yomvuzo egqityelwe ukufunyanwa kubandakanywa izibonelelo ezisecaleni, umzekelo i50% yesibonelelo sohambo kodwa ingabandakanyi izixa zezambuku kunye neengeniso ezenziwe ngabaqondisi okanye abaqeshwa ngokuphathelelene namalungelo okufumana izibambiso ezithengisekayo.
Unyaka wovavanyo ekufunyenwe ngawo intlawulo yomvuzo.
Inani leenyanga ezigqityiweyo ekwagqityelwa ngazo ukufunyanwa intlawulo eyaziwayo yomvuzo.
Intlawulo yomvuzo eqikelelwayo okanye eyiyo nqo kunyaka omiyo. (le nkcazelo mayinikwe xa isizathu somyalelo iyinzima).
Isicelo masiqulathe izizathu zesikhokelo. Xhasa ezi zizathu ngeencwadi ezibandakanyekayo, umzekelo, iingxelo zemali zethutyana kunye nemizuzu yeentlanganiso ezibanjwe ngabaqondisi, ebonisa ukuba iintlawulo zemivuzo eyakuhlawulwa abaqondisi iyakubangaphantsi kwaleyo yonyaka wovavanyo ophelileyo.

Entla

Akukho xesha elisisigxina.
Entla

iNkcazelo yeMiqulu neeNgxelo eziBalulekileyo zeMbali

Iinkonzo zemibutho

Isicelo sokubhena xa kwaliwe ubhaliso

Iinkonzo zabantu

Amaziko akwinqanaba lesithathu iNkcazelo yeMiqulu neeNgxelo eziBalulekileyo zeMba
Isicelo sokufumana inkcazelo kwiNkqubo yeLizwe esebenza ngoMatshini yokuKhupha iNkcazelo yeMiqulu neeNgxelo eziBalulekileyo zeMbali
Inkcazelo
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Ixesha elithatyathwayo kunye nomgangatho ofikelelwayo
Iindleko
Inkcazelo
I-NAAIRS incedisa abasebenzisi beendawo ezilondoloza imiqulu neengxelo ezibalulekileyo zembali bachaze kwaye babone ukuba ziphina izibhalo nezinto ezingqamene neemfuno zabo.
I-NAAIRS iqulathe kuphela inkcazelo malunga nezibhalo nezinto ezikwimiqulu neengxelo ezibalulekileyo zembali, hayi uqobo lwezibhalo nezinto zemiqulu.
Isininzi semiqulu neengxelo ezibalulekileyo ziingxelo zoluntu eziselugcinweni lweNdawo yeLizwe enguMthombo noVimba weMiqulu neeNgxelo eziBalulekileyo zeMbali (National Archives Repository), kunye neendawo zamaphondo eziyimithombo noovimba bemiqulu neengxelo ezibalulekileyo zembali. I-NAAIRS ikwafake iincwadi zelizwe zobhaliso lweengxelo ezingezizo ezoluntu eziselugcinweni lweendawo zabucala eziyimithombo noovimba bemiqulu neengxelo ezibalulekileyo zembali, ezingaphezulu kwama 40. Nangona nje ufikelelo loqobo kwimiqulu yeengxelo ezibalulekileyo zembali ingahlawulelwa, uluntu luyahlawuliswa ngokuvelisa iikopi zezi zibhalo neengxelo ukuze baphinde bazisebenzise; nokuba ziikopi zemifanekiso okanye zamaphepha. Nayo imipapasho iyathengiswa.
Entla
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Cela inkcazelo okanye iikopi ngolu hlobo:
ngokutyelela umthombo novimba wemiqulu neengxelo ezibalulekileyo zembali
ngokuthumela ifeksi okanye i-e-mail; okanye

Kungathabatha iintsuku zokusebenza ezisixhenxe ukuze ubone ukuba ziphina izibhalo nezinto ezikwimiqulu neengxelo ezibalulekileyo zembali.

Isicelo sokubhalisa ukutya kwasefama
Isicelo sokubhalisa ukutya kwasefama okanye ukutya kwezilwanyana zobuhlobo
Inkcazelo
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Ixesha elithatyathwayo kunye nomgangatho ofikelelwayo
Iindleko
Inkcazelo
Inkampani ya phesheya ayifanelanga ukwenza isicelo sokungenisa elizweni apha eMzantsi Afrika. Isicelo sokubhalisa ukutya kwasefama nezichumisi singenziwa kuphela yinkampani yasekhaya ebhalisiweyo, ummi waseMzantsi Afrika okanye umbutho osemthethweni obhalisiweyo apha eMzantsi Afrika.
Entla
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Isicelo sokubhalisa ukutya kwasefama siqulethe:
Incwadi echazayo evela kumnini wobhaliso okanye ummeli otyunjiweyo. Ileta echazayo kufuneka iquke:
o igama lemveliso o inombolo yobhaliso xa imveliso sele ibhalisiwe o isizathu sokuthumela isicelo (ukuthi sisicelo esitsha, isicelo sokulungisa, isicelo sokubhalisa imveliso ezalwa lubhaliso olukhoyo)
o iileta zesivumelwano xa kufuneka imvume yominini wobhaliso (imvume yokubhalisa imveliso ezalwa lubhaliso olukhoyo okanye imvume yokusebenzisa igama lemveliso yenye inkampani kwileyibhile)
Thumela iifomu (iikopi ezimbini)zesicelo zezicelo ezintsha nezilungiso kubhaliso olukhoyo, kuquka neenguqu zokwakheka.
Zalisa ngokupheleleyo, ngaphandle kokubhekisa kwizicelo zexesha elidlulileyo, iinombolo zamaphepha okanye ezinye iimveliso (okungenani ikopi enye yeefomu zesicelo kufuneka ibe nentsayino yentsusa. Enye inokuba yikopi).
Iifomu zesicelo kufuneka zisayinwe ngumntu otyunjiweyo ngokusemthethweni yaye lona kunqweneleka kube ngumntu wenkampani onoqhagamshelwano noMbhalisi.
Igama nenombolo yobhaliso yemveliso kufuneka lisetyenziswe njengoko kuchaziwe kwisiqinisekiso sobhaliso. Nayiphi na inguqu egameni, nokuba incinci kangakanani, iya kuthathwa njengesilungiso.
o thumela iikopi ezimbini o nikela ngesiNgesi nesiBhulu. Akukho mfuneko yokuba iileyibhile zishicilelwe ngeelwimi ezimbini o kufuneka ibhalwe ngendlela ecacileyo nefundekayo, ngendlela echanekileyo o ungabhali iinombolo kwizilumkiso neziqapheliso o onke amanqaku akwileyibhile kufuneka ahambelane ngako konke nalawo akwifomu yesicelo.
Entla
Entla
Ixesha elithatyathwayo kunye nomgangatho ofikelelwayo
Kungathatha iinyanga ezintathu kuya kwezine ukuba ukutya kwasefama nokutya kwezilwanyana zobuhlobo kubhaliswe.

I-visa luphawu olugunyazisiweyo olubekwa kwipaspoti esebenzisekayo yomntu welizwe langaphandle, olunika loo mntu welizwe langaphandle igunya lokungena eMzantsi Afrika.
ifunyanwe phambi kokuba umenzi-sicelo alishiye ilizwe lakhe endulukela eMzantsi Afrika ifunyanwe kwilizwe langaphandle, kwaye akunakwenziwa isicelo sayo kumasango okungena aseMzantsi Afrika kwenziwe isicelo sayo kwelo lizwe, kwindlu yozakuzo yaseMzantsi Afrika okanye kwiziko elimele uMzantsi Afrika, kumazwe apho uMzantsi Afrika umelweyo kuwo kwenziwe isicelo sayo kwindlu yozakuzo yaseMzantsi Afrika ekufuphi okanye kwiziko elimele uMzantsi Afrika elikufuphi, ukubangaba uMzantsi Afrika awumelwanga elizweni lakho. Oku kuyabandakanyeka nakubantu abaneepaspoti zozakuzelwano lwamazwe nezigunyazisiweyo abafuna iipemethe zozakuzelwano phakathi kwamazwe.

Isicelo sepemethe yokuthumela iintlanzi kwilizwe o
Inkcazelo
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Ixesha elithatyathwayo kunye nomgangatho ofikelelwayo
Iindleko
Inkcazelo
Ukungenisa iintlanzi zamazwe angaphandle ngenjongo yokurhweba kuthetha ukuba wenza imisebenzi efana nokungenisa iintlanzi zolwandle zamazwe angaphandle ngenjongo yokurhweba ngazo. Ukuze ungenise iintlanzi zolwandle zamazwe angaphandle (marine fish), kufuneka wenze isicelo sepemithi yokungenisa iintlanzi zamazwe angaphandle nesivunywa nguMphathiswa weMicimbi yokusiNgqongileyo noKhenketho (Minister of Environmental Affairs and Tourism) okanye umntu onegunya lokwenza oko (delegated authority). Akukho mntu uya kurhweba angenise iintlanzi zolwandle zamazwe angaphandle ngaphandle kwepemithi. Yenza isicelo sepemithi entsha yokungenisa iintlanzi zolwandle zamazwe angaphandle xa leyo ubunayo iphelelwe lixesha. Ukungaphumeleli ukubambelela kwimiqathango yepemithi kunganeziphumo zokunqunyanyiswa okanye ukurhoxiswa kwayo.
Akukho nonkala uhleliyo welizwe langaphandle unokungeniswa kweli lizwe.
Entla
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Funda ifom yokwenza isicelo ngononophelo uze uqinisekise ukuba uyazanelisa iimfuneko nemiqathango.
Nikezela ngale ngcaciso ilandelayo:
o ubungakanani beentlobo eziza kungeniswa zamazwe angaphandle.
Ngenisa isicelo sakho kunye nala maxwebhu alandelayo:
Iifom eziyintsusa mazithunyelwe ngeposi, kwaye ukungakwenzi oko, kuya kubangela ukuba ipemithi ingakhutshwa.
Entla
Entla
Ixesha elithatyathwayo kunye nomgangatho ofikelelwayo
Inkqubo yokwenza isicelo ingathatha iintsuku zokusebenza ezisi-7 okanye ngaphezulu ngokuxhomekeke ekufakweni kwesicelo ngokufanelekileyo.

Khupha ezi zinto zilandelayo ukuze uncedise i-SARS ekuvumeni isicelo sakho somyalelo werhafu:

Inkcazelo
NgokoMthetho wokuLawulwa koRhwebo lwaMazwe eHlabathi (International Trade Administration Act, Act 71 of 2002), uMphathiswa wezoRhwebo naMashishini, naninina xa ebona ukuba kuyimfuneko okanye kuluncedo kwiminqweno neemfuno zoluntu, angamisela ngesaziso kwiGazethi kaRhulumente, ukuba kungabikho zimpahla nezinto zodidi okanye zohlobo olungqalileyo ezingangeniswa eMzantsi Afrika; okanye ezingangeniswa eMzantsi Afrika ngaphandle kwaphantsi kwegunya lepemethe kunye nangokuhambisana nemiqathango exelwe kwipemethe ekhutshwe nguye okanye ngumntu ogunyaziswe nguye.
Izicelo zeepemethe zokungeniswa kwempahla nezinto, eziphantsi kwamanyathelo olawulo lokungeniswa kwempahla nezinto elizweni, kufuneka zenziwe kwifom emiselwe oku.

Inkcazelo
Xa uthe awukwazi ukuhlawula le mali ifunekayo ngalo mhla wokuhlawula uchaziweyo, ungacela ukwenza amalungiselelo okubeka omnye umhla wokuhlawula loo mali.
Amalungiselelo okubeka omnye umhla ngokuphathelelene nemali eyintsilelo kwi-akhawunti yakho, angaqwalaselwa uyakuyakuthi ga kwiinyanga ezintathu, kuxhomekeke kwizizathu zesicelo.
I-SARS iyakuqwalasela isicelo sakho kwaye yenze isigqibo sokugqibela kumalungiselelo okubeka omnye umhla wentlawulo. Nceda uqaphele ukuba i-SARS ingasala esi sicelo xa ibona njalo.
Entla
Inkqubo emayilandelwe
Thumela izicelo zamalungiselelo okubeka omnye umhla wokuhlawula kwi-SARS ngale ndlela ilandelayo:
Sayina isivumelwano sokubeka omnye umhla wokuhlawula phambi kokuba la malungiselelo abhalwe kwiingxelo zakho zerhafu.
Ukuba uthe awaphumelela ukuhambisana nemiqathango yokuhlawula le mali kusafuneka uyihlawule njengoko kuxeliwe kwisivumelwano esisayinwe ne-SARS, amalungiselelo esivumelwano ayakupheliswa kwaye kuyakuqaliswa imigaqo yokulandela yesiqhelo ukuze kufunyanwe le mali iseleyo kusafuneka uyihlawule.
